I would recommend this Sugar & Spice scent, I will be purchasing again in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Edward Buffington
review: I got two candles for the price of one.  The cinnamon were on sale. They will make great Valentine gifts!!!! They are perfect!!!! Great scent!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Amazon Customer
review: I love two wick yankee candle they just put the sent in the room twice as fast. The price is great. I refuse to pay the going price. I'd live without. I love spice sent at Christmas and actually all year. I also love cinnamon and the lilac. Smell like the real thing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: DEB53

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Keving
review: Scentless, every yankee candle sold on amazon has been brand new but does not give off any scent at all! Waste of money..Ive tried so many, haven‚Äôt had any luck through amazon. Disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Patrina
review: I love the smell but did not burn right the wick ran out and was left with a little under half the candle not burnt... Waste of money

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Nilda S Robinson
review: I bought 4 candles because they were the special of the day. I have burned 2 out of 4 and you CANNOT smell the scent. I think they were old candles and that is why they were on sale, I am So very disappointed!! I love a great smelling candle but will never buy yankee candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: K.N.

Unfortunately, there's a TON of wax on the side that never burns down.  I'm going to stick with the straight version from now on, even though it costs more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Michael
review: scent seems off for a Yankee candle?? Also burn time seems faster? compared this candle with one from the brick and mortar store this candle burned out three days before the brick and mortar version....?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: nanamama
review: Just in time for xmas!!! It smells amazing and has 2 wicks.. My grdgirls said it smells like red hot candies!!!i t does!!it It was used every day for 4wks and will last another 4 come xmas next yr

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Abby J
review: I had no issues with this candle. I was nervous after reading other reviews stating suspicions that it was a knock-off Yankee Candle. My wicks are burning just fine and the candle has a strong scent. I love burning cinnamon candles during the holidays. Will definitely buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Melissa Joy
review: These candles are the real deal! They are the same amazing quality you find in the store. I bought 4 so far and they are great!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Danielle
review: Literally doesn‚Äôt smell like anything...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Kindle Customer
review: This was an awesome price for a YANKEE candle. It is one of my favorite scents too. It burns nice and smells amazing. Sort of like a cinnamon smell but not too strong. I love it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Arinna
review: A very warm & cozy scent, perfect for a Christmas or house warming present. Arrived in pristine condition, inside a genuine Yankee Candle box. Order with confidence.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: David Blair
review: Pretty candle for Christmas - festive, burns evenly (maybe too well!), my wife likes the scent.  She dislikes the green balsam variety!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Sabrina harris
review: This candle is pretty and smells good when it‚Äôs 2cm away from your nose but even after burning it ALL DAY, no scent comes off of it. Probably why it was on sale for $8

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: jamar
review: Must have been an old candle......no scent of cinnamon whatsoever.  Burned it for about 5 hours, asked all that came in the door if they could detect any cinnamon.....unanimously...a resounding NO  .  Thanks for nothing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Steve
review: I could have opened a stick of gum and had more scent. Yankee Candle has become a joke. DON'T  WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS CRAP.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Cynthia
review: The smell is absolutely delicious.  Definitely made the house feel cozy.  Didn't give me any headaches/migraines.  No allergy reactions.  Even my boyfriend loved this!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Tammy L Shoemaker
review: This candle seems to burn evenly which is good and makes it last longer. But the aroma is not as noticeable as I would like.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Em Bennett
review: I live in a 400 square foot apartment and sometimes dinner smells can take over, especially when cooking with garlic or olive oil. This candle does an excellent job making the air more tolerable. Lovely scent and the color matches my kitchen. Overall a great product from Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: antonio c.
review: It‚Äôs a great candle and last a while problem is it‚Äôs not a very heavy sent you really can barely smell the cinnamon smell

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Judi
review: This is my favorite Yankee  candle and the price was right.  (They have gotten much too expensive at the  regular price!)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Mn Girl
review: Enjoy Yankee candles. Scent is not overpowering. Good value considering how expensive candles area.  Makes a nice gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: mack gilmore
review: I love Kitchen spice . BATH and body work discontinued their kitchen spice , so I found this one. Alittle costly butvworth it

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: KEN
review: Love Yankee candles! But I was surprised that this one wasn't nearly as fragrant as some of the others I've purchased.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: AZ_Native
review: The positive about this candle is that it burns slowly.  We used it throughout the Christmas 2020 and packed it away for 2021. The candle's scent, to me, was unidentifiable. It isn't offensive , it simply is a sweet oder that fails to engender the  spirit of  Christmas.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Julz
review: I love this scent! Yankee Candle is more expensive than other brands but I think it burns longer and has a scent that will fill a room. Unfortunately, Yankee Candle doesn't sell this scent any longer - Amanzon is the only place I've been able to find it.  Also, it is now a single wick instead of two which means a wax  ring is left after the wick is gone.  But if you want a scent that isn't too sweet or too spicy - this is the best!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: guilty pleasure
review: The replacement for my shattered, 28 dollar Yankee Candle is a no brand, no jar no packaging of any kind cheap candle. Very disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: wvamazonwarrior
review: This is now one of my favorite candles.  Strong smell.  Great for a large area.  May be too much for smaller areas.  I smell more vanilla and just a touch of cinnamon.  I try to get smells to reflect the season, and this will be my new post Christmas/pre-spring candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: CK
review: The scent is awesome with previous Large Tumbler Candle purchase; however did not have opportunity to enrich the scent with the Medium Tumbler Candle. Very poor packaging ~ No box or protection when shipped!  Arrived in many jingling, glass pieces  : ~(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Cassandra
review: I ordered Home Sweet Home. The sticker on the box said Home Sweet Home. The candle inside was Bahama Breeze. It's ok though because I like that one too. Lol

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Sm
review: I love yankee candles, they‚Äôre all I‚Äôve ever used however this home sweet home does not smell at all, super disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: La Princessa
review: This is a nice smelling candle that made my home smell yummy. Burned evenly. I will buy again. Also, came wonderfully packaged.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Ancient_Warrior_Collector
review: I have bought many Yankee candles but this one does not have much fragrance. Burns rather oddly, not long lasting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: tori
review: I love this candle and will be buying it again and again. It smells like cinnamon and has that homey feeling I just can‚Äôt explain. I love it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: kldmom3ga
review: I am so disappointed in this candle. I hadn't bought a Yankee Candle in years. I saw this one and remembered how much I loved their scents. I burned this one for hours at a time on several different occasions and I couldn't even tell I had a candle lit. There were no smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: L V
review: Packaged in a cardboard sleeve in a Yankee candle box and did not break in shipping! üòç (unlike my recent identical purchase from Walmart that came smashed) Highly recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: PetalPond
review: I purchased this candle because my friend had it and I really enjoyed the smell. However, I no longer like to burn this candle because I found out it is made using paraffin wax. Although the product description doesn't say what type of wax it is made from, which they should, a quick Google search states that Yankee candles are made using paraffin wax. Paraffin wax is made using "petroleum, coal, or oil shale," yuck! So although I like the smell, I'd really rather not fill my lungs with the burning fumes from "petroleum, coal, or oil shale" products. I think Yankee should be more concerned with the quality of their product and how it can affect the health of people and the environment, and start using soy waxes. I found the info on paraffin wax from Wikipedia.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Janice H. Schillo
review: The candle had melted and rehardened, either in storage.  Reordered.  Same problem.  Kept the first candle, with full refund.  Second candle also had melted and I returned it.  Got a refund but I think shipping was not refunded.  Should have been great product but severely damaged.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Michelle Veasey
review: Love YANKEE candles.. And there cheaper on AMAZON Yayy.. I bought the large size HOME SWEET HOME & KITCHEN SPICE.. These r a couple of my favorite flavors.. So amazing, and Strong, but not like your eating it/tasting it, if u had that happen b4 w/other candle brands & or flavors.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Kristie Rivera
review: The candles here on Amazon were half the price of buying them at Yankee. This home sweet home is my favorite scent. HSs the spicy fall feeling. It is my go to scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: sharon a douglas
review: I am very disappointed.  You can barely smell cinnamon and it smells like burning wax more than cinnamon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Riri's mom
review: HAVE ALWAYS LIKED MOST YANKEE CANDLES, THIS A FAVORITE. SADLY YANKEE CANDLE HAS KEPT MARKING THEIR CANDLES UP AND UP....WAY OVERPRICED.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: silentdreamer
review: This candle smells great! I love the jar candles because they seem to last longer than the pillars do and I‚Äôve ever had any problems with them burning uneven.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: YT
review: This scent is my favorite!! I like a strong scent and this definitely has one will definitely fill up a big room with this amazing scent and even after the candles blown out you can still smell the scent for hours

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: Pathtreker
review: Love Yankee candles and this large was at a great price! House smells great..home sweet home..my favorite scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: BlueJF
review: My husband loves cinnamon scented pinecones during Christmas.  We couldn't find them this year and this was a great substitute.  Every day he came home and lighted this candle...which is really funny to me.  I can't get him to do anything that requires repetitive schedule like that.  Lasted a long time (several months) for it being lit every day for at least half a day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home
author: O.
review: Purchased as a birthday gift without knowing how it smells. The recipient loved the scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Home Sweet Home

So, if I would have stayed with what I knew, I wouldn't have had to pay to have my walls cleaned and wasted money on a cheaper product.  "You get what you pay for" rings loudly for me.  Thanks for the excellent product.

It really, uncannily smells like the classic cherry popsicle when unlit. When lit, it starts to smell a bit more like cherry cough drops. It is a pretty good scent, though not as "cozy" as certain other candle scents, possibly because the cough-drop scent evokes less pleasant memories.

Also I order alot of yankee candles from Amazon and I haven't had  any issues with them burning like this. My mom and I are so disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Courtney G
review: I am very disappointed in this candle.  I have been buying authentic Yankee Candles for 20+ years and I‚Äôve never had such a low quality dud. This candle had no scent and the wick burned so quickly that I had to dump out wax so the flame would stay lit.  Even after dumping out wax, the wick burned unusually fast (for a Yankee candle). I went out and bought a comparable Yankee Candle from a reputable, authorized dealer and the difference was night and day. The candle I purchased from the dealer was exactly what I was used to seeing in a real Yankee Candle. I have a feeling this was a fake Yankee candle, but have no way of proving it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Talia O
review: The scent is amazing, but I remember being able to smell one yankee candle through the entire house. I don‚Äôt know if the formula has changed recently but the scent remains in the room. I miss the strong smell of yankee carrying throughout the house. I‚Äôm a little let down with the strength. The scent is amazing besides that fact.

review: I don't think it's an authentic Yankee candle. I've bought this sent before at a Yankee store, and what I bought on Amazon isn't the same quality. What i bought on Amazon has no smell while burning. And Yankee candles are known for their scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: mjjunie
review: I absolutely love this scent. It's not overwhelmingly sweet and still smells clean in the room. I took a chance on purchasing this here and am very disappointed by the packaging. The jar was simply placed in the box with another item and not surprisingly, was shattered upon arrival. When I picked up the box, I could hear the glass moving around. Unless I completely break off the remaining glass, I can't use this candle as is. And the broken jar is shattered in a way that I could not melt it down without great effort to avoid overspill or ruin a pot specifically to try to save the candle. A simple layer of bubble wrap may have saved it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin

review: It‚Äôs such a light fragrance you barely smell it. I ended up choosing my Woodwick candles all the time instead. Not recommended.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Psalm 144 1-2
review: After reading the reviews I was reluctant to order but decided to give it a try. First time ordering a candle online, fall is our favorite time of year so I chose, autumn wreath. It arrived in 2 days (thanks prime), sealed in a cardboard container with more than enough packaging, all in one piece. Even though it‚Äôs hot here in Florida the candle didn‚Äôt melt so way to go!! The smell is a perfect blend of clove, leaves and a hint of allspice. Not over powering just right. My mom happened to be visiting when the package arrived. She has a very sensitive nose yet she loved it so much I‚Äôm now ordering her one. My husband also loves it, he‚Äôs from the Blue Ridge Mountains and said the scent reminds him of autumn up there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lori
review: Candle came melted all to one side, scent oil leaked out. Not useable. Going to try and heat up and see if it can be redistributed.  Not sure i will get the wick though. Very disappointing for the cost. Even if i can use it most of the scent leaked out. Don't buy online!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Will W
review: Just like all the other reviewers....these have little to no scent....very disappointing...But its not just Amazon's Yankee Candles...Because of a recent sale, I have recently ordered from 3 well known online stores...ALL OF THE YANKEE CANDLES are the same...Little to no throw of scent, and I purchased 8 different scents...Some of you might not know, but most YC stores will let you exchange your candles for other kinds for free, even if they are used...I plan on visiting a retail store soon and doing just that...My advice though, is to stay far away from Yankee candles, they are no longer worth the money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kyle H
review: During pretty much any time of year I'm burning candles. I've burned cheaper ones like "American home" or "village candle" and I've burned nicer one's like "yankee" or "kringle". The cheaper candles are always faster burning and less fragrant. It's worth it to get a decent candle. Unless you REALLY want a specific (usually seasonal) scent, don't pay more than around 18$ for one of these. I've seen a bunch on here for like 25$+ and at that cost you're better off ordering kringle or some "artisan" brand. For 18ish bucks this candle is fantastic. This specific scent has lasted longer than some others, in that everyday I light it I can still smell it despite burning it for a week. Your nose and sense of smell is logarithmic (like your other senses) and after you have been exposed to the same smell for long enough, your brain stops recognizing it as unique and potent to your environment. It helps to buy several scents and rotate between them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mindy
review: I'm not sure why, but I've noticed the Yankee candle scene vary greatly in price from time to time. I've started watching to see which ones are lower (as much as half off) and trying different scents when I catch them at the sale price. This one had a wonderful scent, cinnamon was quite prevalent. The candle burned evenly and provided many hours of enjoyment. Yankee candies are typically very good quality and this one was no exception. I will definitely purchase again, even at regular price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Emily S
review: Nope. This is definitely a knock off and not a good one. The top is bubbled. The smell actually kind of hurts and is not at all like a real Yankee Candle. Spend the extra money at the Yankee Store. This is a total waste. Maybe the seller has good intentions but somewhere along the way they also got hosed because this isn‚Äôt a Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cher
review: I‚Äôve always been a Yankee candle fan, until recently. The quality isnt what it used to be. I received a candle today and was shocked when I took the top off of the candle. It had mold on the top. At first I thought it was just air bubbles, but after getting a magnifying glass out and looking at it, it is definitely mold. I called customer service and they said I may have to return it for my refund. Which means I have to take it across town to the UPS store to return it. I was sold faulty merchandise and it should not be my responsibility to take care of a bad product. Beside the mold issues, which is enough, it barely had a scent. It may smell stronger once it is burning, but there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm burning this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Karina-Oh!
review: It's worth the effort to always see what Amazon Warehouse has in stock before you buy your item. I've gotten in the habit of doing this when I'm looking for a Yankee Candle. I found a Spiced Pumpkin large jar candle just a couple of days ago that was reduced to $13.39. So I decided to give it a shot. All of my past experiences have been good and this one was no exception! It arrived 1 full day early & it was very carefully packed. Upon opening, the jar was in excellent condition. Everything about the candle is authentic Yankee quality. However, when I removed the glass lid I saw that the wick was slightly singed, yet none of the wax surrounding it had been melted. Sort of like it had been lit and immediately blown out. It wasn't intended to be a gift; but if it was it wasn't giftable, so I rated it only 1 star for that category. I lit my candle and in a few seconds, no one was the wiser, lol... This candle currently costs $24.97 brand new on Amazon. I can live with the savings of $11.58, though. It pays to check the Amazon Warehouse from time to time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nancy S.
review: It is a Yankee candle, came in a Yankee Candle box in one piece. Smells good before lighting it. But, it appears that during production the wax was old or something as there are a lot of what appears to be air bubbles through out the wax in the jar. Since its not a gift I went ahead and lit the wick. It is a faint scent, smells good, but hardly able to smell it unless I'm right up on the candle. I like candles to smell strong enough to fill my living room with scent. I wont purchase this again as not worth the money spent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Michele F
review: I have been buying Yankee Candles for years. My favorite is Macintosh apple. When I saw this scent, I decided to try it. Initially the scent was wonderful, my whole place smelled like someone was baking with cinnamon. I thought I had found a new favorite. Fast forward a couple of weeks. Once the candle had burned down about an inch, all of the scent disappeared. I am so disappointed. I have practically a whole candle that has no aroma. I've never experienced this with a Yankee Candle before, however I've read many reviews from people who have experienced a similar issue with other scents. If you're looking for a long lasting candle with a nice scent, steer clear of sugared cinnamon apple.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Trish
review: I was a little concerned when I read the reviews AFTER I ordered this candle.  Being from the Northeast, I have been using Yankee Candles for a few decades and fancy myself as somewhat if an expert on the subject. This candle did not disappoint! The scent is pleasant and just as strong as any Yankee candle that I have gotten in the past.  The candle arrived unbroken and packed well.  Shipping was faster than initially stated.  The price was AMAZING and I will definitely be buying more!! Very happy with my purchase!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Martha Male
review: I don‚Äôt always write a review for my orders, but after reading the reviews from previous purchasers I felt I should. My candle arrived today and it‚Äôs amazing!!! I am so pleased! With Covid, going to Yankee Candle just isn‚Äôt going to happen. Took a chance and I am so happy I did! It‚Äôs just what my home needs this fall. If I am going to continue to be stuck at home, damn sure it is going to need to smell good!! I have a husband and animals, they don‚Äôt smell good. My candle is my Covid hero!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Gina G-Lover
review: The first one I ordered arrived semi melted. See my photos. You‚Äôll see one where it actually leaked thru the cardboard it was packed in & thru that to the box it was mailed in. I returned it & got a replacement. The second one arrived semi melted too but not as bad as the first one. See photos. The top of the candle wasn‚Äôt flat & it got wax inside the cover & like stained it. I couldn‚Äôt wipe it clean. The second one wasn‚Äôt that bad so I kept it & it‚Äôs actually almost all gone because I‚Äôve been burning it. I was a big fan of Yankee candles because you could always smell the scent through out your house but I didn‚Äôt find that with this one? Not sure why?? Funny thing is I ordered this I believe in November/December & it‚Äôs not hot enough for the wax to be melting inside the candle during the shipping process. I don‚Äôt think I will buy anymore Yankee candles‚Ä¶besides the other ones I bought through here & had issues with too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kim Hagen
review: This candle appears to be the Yankee Candle brand sold at Walmart and other box stores.  There is very little scent, if any, and what scent is there is not long-lasting.  It also appears to be an older candle as areas of the wax are discolored.  Needless to say I am disappointed in the product and the vendor.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Great scent, arrived within 24 hours..the only reason for 3 stars instead of 5 is because it arrived melted (as pictured), it was supposed to be a gift, but is not presentable, so I'll just use it in my jar warmer instead. I bought 2 Harvest, still waiting on arrival of second candle, hopefully it's not melted too....*note, I also purchased 2 other yankee scents (mistletoe) ,they arrived within 24 hours & are not melted...I mentioned that because its june, & all candles are not melted.*

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe E.
review: I have purchased many different brands of candles over the years trying to find a company that competes in its fragrances with Yankee candles. I finally decided several years ago that I would only buy Yankee candles and stop wasting my money on the other brands, since I am always disappointed with them. I was thrilled when I found my favorite Cranberry Chutney jar candle available on Amazon a couple of weeks before Christmas. However, as I have burned it over the past several days, I have been extremely disappointed. My house used to be filled with the delicious aroma from this candle, but this time, I can barely smell it. I have heard the excuse that people are complaining about Yankee candles' scents this year due to a loss of smell from Covid-19. That is not the case with me, because I have not contracted covid, and my sense of smell is just fine. If other people are complaining, I have a feeling the Yankee Candle Company has changed something in the way it adds the different fragrances to their candles, so now, they are less potent than they always have been. I want a candle that can fill my house with a delicious scent, not one that I have to keep trying to smell! If you are expecting the Yankee Candle of old when you purchase this one, you will be disappointed. Please, Yankee Candle Company, go back to your former formulas for your candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ann McD
review: You cannot beat the price of an authentic Yankee Candle. I live in MA and it‚Äôs hard to find any on sale Amazon had the best selection. I buy them all the time for gifts. They‚Äôre packaged exactly how the company would ship them. I‚Äôve had bathe and body works candles show up broken and glass everywhere. Not these! This candle has incredible throw of scent and it lasts forever! For $19 I‚Äôm blown away. It‚Äôs like getting 4 regular candles in one. No comparison. Highest quality and timeless scent is worth the price. Thanks Amazon for letting me keep one lit every day! Makes my house homey! Perfect gifts- I recommend the sage and citrus, lilac as well. Not pink sands‚Ä¶ avoid that one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lanie
review: I've been purchasing Yankee Candle products (mainly candles) for over 20 years and can say without a doubt in my mind that it doesn't matter if you purchase from an authorized dealer or from the Yankee Candle website or in a corporate store, the majority of the time you aren't going to get much of a scent release from many of their candles when they are burning.  Their quality (or scent release) is just not even close what it used to be and that's a shame because they used to be the beast of candles when it came to scent.  If you are looking for a candle that has a lot of scent to it, Yankee is not the company to look at anymore and hasn't been for a while now. That said, I also think that this candle was worth the price that I paid for it.  I grabbed two of them for less than $10 each with free shipping.  That price changed how satisfied I am with the product and did effect my review rating and satisfaction level.  Hopefully that makes sense. Autumn Wreath does smell good when it is cold and the name fits the cold scent notes very well.  It really doesn't have much scent at all when it is lit.  I've had multiples of this one from a couple of different places that I caught on deep sale or clearance and not one performed better than any of the others. I placed this candle into a Yankee jar candle holder with the illuma lid hoping that the illuma lid would help because sometimes they do.  Unfortunately the extra heat that the illuma lid provides did not increase the scent release in this candle.  It just looks really pretty in the holder sitting on my kitchen counter. I will usually burn a candle that has a strong scent over by my stove at the same time so I have the ambiance of two candles burning but the scent of only one.  In an odd way, I actually like that I can practically count on Yankee to have zero scent release when burning so I can create a nice comfy look and feel, without multiple candles having a scent war that can give me a headache.  That is now the beauty of Yankee Candle and Autumn Wreath. All in all I think this candle is today's version of a typical Yankee Candle and that's why I gave it three stars.  It's a large candle that provides ambiance and looks pretty in a jar holder.  Nothing more, nothing less.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Weekend Coffee Guru
review: I am a long time purchaser of Yankee Candles and for the most part have always been satisfied with their products.  That being said, the Autumn Wreath Candle by Yankee Candle is very disappointing.  This candle has no scent what so ever unless you count the smell given off by a typical unscented candle.  Perhaps these candles lose their scent over time and this just happens to be a very old candle at the time of my purchase.  I also had made a gift of a second Autumn Wreath candle to a close friend and she also stated that her candle had no scent either.  At the same time I purchased a second scented Yankee Candle this one being Balsam & Cedar and am quite happy with that purchase.  Could it be just a bad batch of Autumn Wreath Candles?  Who knows?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Pamela Edwards
review: I bought Autumn leaves  2 years ago and absolutely loves the scent. I burned it almost every day due to a large animal population living with us at the time. It was amazing. I bought a new one a few weeks ago and I‚Äôm SO DISAPPOINTED. It barely smells, and it‚Äôs very different from the old one. I also bought Yankee candles in the past that came shattered when I opened them. I even reordered and the same thing happened. I also bought a lavender scented one that is disappointing. Yankee candles used to be the very best. My Fresh Roses one is almost gone ( it was perfect) but I doubt I will be reordering any more. I certainly hope Yankees Candles reads these reviews. It seems I‚Äôm not alone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chase
review: Arrived completely defective. It was visually leaking outside the packaging and this was clearly on Yankee Candle's end because the rest of my products inside the same Amazon box were all completely fine. Absolutely unacceptable. I usually buy from Village Candle instead, and believe me, you should too. I have had issue with every Yankee Candle I've purchased before and never a problem with their #1 competition...I'll let you draw your own conclusions on which company to buy from!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: scarredforlife
review: The last 3 Yankee Candle purchases I made were horrible.  On 6 candles, 3 large jars, 1 large two wick tumbler, and 2 perfect pillars, the wicks will burn to the level of the wax before the top of the wax is fully melted to the edges of the glass.  The worst of the bunch was my latest, a two-wick tumbler in "Crisp Fall Night". After the 6 prior candles I bought with 6 bad wicks, I waited for a year before I bought this newest candle.  I see it's still the same.  The Crisp Fall Night candle didn't make it past 1.5 hours until the wicks were burned right to the wax level.  I don't have this problem with any other brand.  I guess Yankee will be without a customer.  Strangely, I don't think they'll miss me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: DrM
review: I purchased this from Amazon and did not use it right away. When I went to use it, the wick was not useable so I could not burn the candle. I called Yankee Candle since it was outside Amazon's return window and they refused to replace it, kept referring me back to Amazon--even though it was not Amazon's fault they made a defective product. Very disappointed in Yankee Candle customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ariana
review: What‚Äôs not to love about a nice fall/winter candle? I chose this scent because it has a lot of spice accents to it, so I can use it when fall is approaching, but I can also use it as a Christmas candle because of the warm spice scents. I also purchased one for my stepdad and he uses it all the time - and it‚Äôs still very full, so he‚Äôll get a lot more use out of it. I love Yankee Candles because they tend to last a super long time, so they may be more pricey sometimes but it‚Äôs worth the money. Not to mention, sometimes Yankee Candles sold on Amazon are marked down to $15 or $16 as opposed to the full $30 price that Yankee Candle sells them for in their stores and on their website. A huge steal in my opinion! I only ever buy my Yankee Candles off of Amazon for this reason. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: ned stone
review: The scent from this candle is unbelievably warm and long lasting. The fragrance smells like the real thing not chemically made. The jar and lid are heavy duty even surviving a fall from a desk.  The wick is thick and lights up immediately and does not turn off unless I turn it off. The fragrance extends outside my home but is not over bearing or ‚Äúfake‚Äù smelling. It‚Äôs been used for over 20 hours and it is 2/3 finished. Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Meghan L. Dvorak
review: I‚Äôm quite fond of YC Cranberry Chutney. Yankee really does berry scents well. This has a toasty and invigorating fragrance. The description isn‚Äôt off at all, however, i found it does give off the scent of strawberry cobbler when it is burning. There are more berries at play here than just cranberry for sure. I have this in the large 1-wick jar, but my favorite is the large 2-wick tumbler jar because it has an amazing throw. I burned it during the holidays mostly, but it isn‚Äôt just a holiday smell, I can see myself burning if this candle throughout the year. I haven‚Äôt had the chance to get the smaller versions of this scent but look forward to obtaining them. I was lucky to get this large jar for eight dollars on here after Christmas. A total bargain. Thanks, amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lea B
review: This scent is great for fall and smells just like pumpkin and cinnamon. Plus I got a great deal ($10.98) However whoever packed the box ruined the candle. The candle itself was wrapped well but when the packer put the 2 candles in the Amazon box they clearly did not pay attention to the image and words saying to keep the Yankee candle box upright (listed on every side of the box) and instead put them on their side. Needless to say the candles melted in the summer heat (luckily this pumpkin one stayed mostly intact except for the melted remnants around the rim/lid). My other candle did not fare as well. This is something Amazon should monitor as this issue could‚Äôve been avoided. I also think for candles like this the Amazon box itself should say ‚Äúfragile‚Äù and ‚Äúthis side up‚Äù so the delivery guys are also aware of this

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I am so sad this candle sucked so bad. I bought this maybe a week or two ago. And it is literally one of the worst I have ever dealt with. It came with weird wicks. I clipped them in the hopes to fix it. But from the get it constantly will not stay lit. I have soaked out wax with cotton balls. And everything else I know to do. At this stage I am half way through it and to make it work I am dumping out wax. I bought this maybe 2 weeks ago. It‚Äôs a real shame :( something with this is just off. I have never before had a yankee candle be a dud. But I will not buy this one ‚Äòcrisp fall night‚Äô ever ever again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Guts
review: Almost literally. You are burning your money away every time you light it. TL;DR: maybe I am not a candle connoisseur, but I was really expecting that all of the wax would burn with the wick. It does not - lots of left over wax along the walls of the jar. Also, scent although nice isn't very strong (maybe a plus for some folks). --- What are you supposed to get in return? A nice relaxing scent? I suppose so - but it's not that strong. Was hoping to use this to combat kitchen odor after cooking something... fragrant, but it's barely noticeable. Also, the wick burns too quickly and doesn't draw enough wax? I was expecting the heat from the flame would melt the wax, and the wick would draw the molten wax as fuel for the flame. That way as the wick goes down, so does the wax. However, with this candle, the wick's going down but a bunch of wax remains on the sides of the jar... I guess I'll scrape it down and buy extra wick to utilize the remaining wax?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: DFB
review: YANKEE CANDLE WHAT HAPPENED?? Don't waste your money. 2021 Christmas present. My husband bought 2 Spiced Pumpkin, 2 Vanilla Cupcake & 1 Home Sweet Home (wood wick). Spiced Pumpkin & Vanilla Cupcake are literally a non-scented candles sold as scented.  I haven't tried the Home Sweet Home. Hoping that one will be better. The 3rd  candle in my pictures is a small company who makes soy candles. This candle sold for $12.50 at my small country store that I owned a few years back. It's a much better quality candle with a fantastic scent throw. The scent is throughout my house, even floats up to my upstairs hallway (1,900 sq ft house). Yet, 2 Yankee candles, burning at the same time can't even throw a scent in the room they're lit in. I think I'll save them & use them at night on the deck. Usually, I use dollar store candles for that, but these aren't any different from dollar store candles. Done with Yankee Candle Co.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sleepless in Seattle
review: Smells fantastic, just like the classic "cranberry" scented candles of the past.  I was concerned that the addition of "chutney" in the description would alter the fragrance that Yankee Candles used to produce, but it rings true, as the original cranberry candles of yesteryear.  Before purchasing, I went to a Yankee Candle store in the local mall, to see if I'd like this newer version of the classic.  Now I can order online and not have to pay the full retail pricing.  If you've never tried it before, you should.  You won't regret it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Boosha
review: Here lately I have bought an abundance of Walmart candles, Bath & Body Works candles, Goose Creek candles Etc.. I'm one of those that wants the smell to knock your socks off or fill the whole house.. otherwise it's a waste of money for me. The Yankee Candles Are a little bit more expensive but this one proves again that it's the one I should have bought in the first place. I'm giving it 4 stars because I like the scent but it's not my absolute favorite. I had no idea what it smelled like I just went off some reviews off of here. It absolutely fills the whole house and I have even taken the top off and it was so powerful you could smell it within a large radius of our kitchen table without even being lit. I'm very placing my purchase I think next time I will go to one of my old favorites if they have it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Smells amazing! There's just something about this particular candle that just makes you want to light it up, and curl up on the couch with a warm cup of cocoa or tea! It really is great! Despite all the other customers having issues with cracked glass or a melted candle, I had no issues with mine. The packaging was perfect--a lot of packing air bags were included so that it wouldnt break! I also think the fact that some people received melted candles were probably because they ordered them during periods in which the weather might have been a lot hotter--so i definitely recommend buying these candles from Amazon when the weather has cooled down a bit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Hal and Michelle
review: The Cranberry Chutney Yankee Candle is even better than it's description. The fragrance is superb and fills the first floor of our home without being overpowering. The longevity is far superior to other candles and burns exactly as it should. If I had to select one word to describe this particular scent, I'd say "delicious". Several reviews mentioned that their candles arrived with the glass jar broken. That was NOT my experience. The packaging was very secure...and I ordered three others. Absolutely no issue at all. GREAT JOB!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe
review: Wife ordered 2 of the pumpkin spice candles.  When we opened them the smell was strong.  Hit us right in the face like a Yankee Candle normally does.  That was the end of that.  As soon as we lit it there was no smell at all.  Was lit for hours and the house just smelled like burnt wax.  2 of these burning in the house at the same time would normally make every floor in the house smell good.  Nope not these.  Disappointed in them.  Will be returning.  Seems pretty common based on the reviews not sure how people lucked out with good smelling ones and others didn't.  Maybe they are hit or miss but usually everytime I've ever bought a Yankee Candle directly from the store itself the scent was always really strong when they were burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I buy a new pumpkin apple yankee candle every fall, and decided to try ordering through amazon and it's the exact same candle and scent. Mine arrived in one piece and I took it straight to my office and light it daily. The scent is amazing and I cannot go through fall without it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: N&G
review: I got the Sugared Cinnamon Apple and find that the scent is very similar to Home Sweet Home, but a little less "Christmas-y" and heavy in the scent like HSH. I think Sugared Cinnamon Apple a good transition into winter months, or good for warmer weather versus Home Sweet Home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Dan B.
review: The product is fantastic! The problem is Bezos taking his cut which don't leave much meat on the bone for the seller, and I think that's BULLSHlT!! I sincerely hope, from the bottom of my heart that Jeff and the Sanchez live forever! Again, fantastic product! Great seller! Thank you very much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kay
review: I bought 3 different scents and the none of the candles smell when burning.  This gives Yankee Candle a bad  reputation! Total waste of money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Rich Briere
review: The Candles are Fabulous........Best on Earth....but have you purchased one of these to go with it?  3 times the Candle Life by NOT using Scissors to cut the wicks on your Candles.  Don't be a Mister Bungle..... Add this to your order. "EricX Light Candle Wick Trimmer, Polished Stainless Steel Wick Trimmer".  Do I have anything to do with that Company?  Nope..... but you should get a couple of 'em with the order you're about to place. :)  RB https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01N78UYIZ/ref=cm_sw_em_r_mt_dp_FctOFbPBNDNVA

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kate C
review: Received my candle quickly, however I noticed immediately when I opened it that there was liquid surrounding the lid of the candle. Prior to opening it also looked red all inside of the lid and on the upper walls of the candle. Open the lid and the candle is liquidy and getting all over my hands. The top of the candle has visible air bubbles on top of the candle with melted candle all over the sides. I would not give this for a gift, but technically is still usable it is just not visibly nice to be sitting on top of a table.  I am wondering if this will burn through quickly because the consistency does not seem to be of a usual candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: ajones
review: I have older "spiced pumpkin" candles -- it has a strong, pleasant scent. These older candles can be identified by the label: If it says "a subsidiary of Jarden Corporation", BUY IT!  If it says, "a subsidiary of Newell Brands", BUY SOMETHNG ELSE! These new ones are "meh". I'm not impressed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: EmBee
review: One of YCCs best fall scents (even good for winter). Smells like apples and woodsy as well as sweet spices. Not overpowering but excellent throw. Doesn‚Äôt tunnel too much. I use a topper and every so often push down some wax that builds up on edges with butter knife. Beautiful shade and label. Make sure you trim wick to 1/4‚Äù after each use. Burns best this way.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: LeAnne P
review: This candle was either fake or old. I've had new Yankees in Spiced Pumpkin before, and the smell is amazing. This one? Nothing. I let it burn for an hour and could not smell it. I left the room for a while and came back - still nothing. There is no point to an $18 spiced pumpkin candle if it does not smell and smell strongly. Returned.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jamille
review: I've always been a big fan of Yankee Candles and I was surprised that when I opened the delivery box the lip around the candle was broken. If I tape it just right I'll still be able to use it. But I was disappointed hence the three star rating and one star because you can't give a broken gift to anyone. Had it not been broken it would be a 5-star rating because These candles are amazing. They last a really long time typically and I don't know how long it's going to last if it's broken I don't know if some of it will leak out or whatever. These candles are typically excellent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Colton
review: Candle was shipped without the original box, loose rolling around in the Amazon box missing the lid. Pretty ridiculous to pay almost 30 dollars for a candle that was obviously not original stock. Even then the candle did not burn well the wicks burn down too short and end up tunneling, pouring out wax exposing more wick did not work either as the wick burned short again. Scent was good is about the only positive thing about it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Merressa
review: So I heard so many Good things about these candles so I decided to try one this year . I usually Grab some Bath and body works but didn‚Äôt feel like going into a store with Covid & all and that‚Äôs the fun part so decided to add one of these to my order . I‚Äôm not sure if mine was just a bad apple but I barely could smell anything I gave it about 3 tries before I decided to fill for a refund but I was definitely not satisfied. If I where you just Grab some Bath and body works They never disappoint

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smells nice but is no where near as nice as a real Yankee candle.  I think these are counterfeit - someone kept the jar and refilled it with a candle but it just is not as strong nor pleasant as a real Yankee candle.  I am disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amanda Langley
review: I am OBSESSED with autumn wreath and love burning it all fall.. When I saw that it was like $10 cheaper on Amazon than Yankee Candle, I was pumped and ordered it immediately. When I got it, the first thing I noticed is that there were air bubbles/pockets in it. I know this happens sometimes so I brushed it off. I‚Äôm not sure if it was because the air bubbles/pockets or if there was another reason, but this burnt so unevenly. I also noticed the smell is just a little off from the ones in the store. Since I‚Äôm so obsessed with the autum wreath candle/scent, I had 2 other ones in my house in other rooms. I compared it to the others, and the scent was definitely off. Not in a bad way, just not as fall-ish as the one in stores. It wasnt a complete failure, it still was close to the smell and still was as strong of a scent as the one in stores, but I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôd buy it again. **Definitely don‚Äôt buy it if you are thinking of giving it as a gift. The bubbles/pockets made it look weird.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Rambonrse
review: I LOVE the smell of fall spices. However, some of the candles made by Yankee seem to burn faster than they used to, which is disappointing. I will purchase this again because of the smell, and price was reasonable (~$18). Wish Yankee would do more quality control with their wax to slow burning time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amanda Zufall
review: These don't break the bank and they have a very nice scent. The only thing I noticed is that it takes awhile for the scent to fill a room. They aren't very very potent. (now keep in mind this is more a matter of personal preference than an actual complaint. I prefer really heavily scented candles.) Overall though, these do fill the room after awhile and they provide a lovely ambiance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Dave
review: I chose Yankee candle for its reputation for their nice strong scent. This candle has only a faint smell to it.  Not sure if it was just a bad batch, design/recipe change, impact of environmental conditions and/or age, but I‚Äôm overall disappointed. To their credit, they are made in the USA.  They have a rated burn time of 110-150 hrs., which seems about right based on my experience so far. I‚Äôll be either trying something else or purchasing from a store next time due to the weak scent, since that is the most important attribute for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Hope4Humanity
review: This candle doesn‚Äôt disappoint. It has a very pleasant fragrance that reminds me of holiday cooking, like pumpkin pies, apple pies, etc. It‚Äôs been a staple in my candle collection for years and I use it throughout the different seasons.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Eusebius
review: We frequently have a Yankee Candle lit in the kitchen and this Apple Pumpkin candle is my favorite winter scent. It has a nice warm spicy and rich scent that makes the kitchen smell like something really good just came out of the oven. The candle burns cleanly and evenly when I use an Illuma-Lid Jar Topper and trim the wick to 1/8‚Äù after every burning. The Illuma-Lid is more than decorative ‚Äì it helps keep heat inside the jar and prevents ‚Äútunneling‚Äù where the wick burns down through the center of the candle. Yankee Candles are a bargain. I used to buy inexpensive jar candles of uneven quality that didn‚Äôt last very long and frequently lost their scents.  In comparison, Yankee Candles always keep their scent, burn evenly, and last a very long time. They may cost a little more, but turn out to be much more economical in the long run.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Scott Lamb
review: Everyone out there in Amazon Land take heed. Yankee Candles are not worth the money, you‚Äôre basically paying for the name. I bought 3 candles, had them lit for well over an hour and could barely pick up any scent other then the burning wicks. Granted some scents maybe stronger then others, but I‚Äôm not willing to take that chance. Will not purchase Yankee Candles again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: G
review: Funky scent. Using for the bathroom so tolerating it. Can't recommend even at half the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bridget Magri
review: Glad I bought 2 candles! Pumpkin Spice has NO scent while burning. Terrible. Now, my other candle: Fresh Roses - smalls AMAZING while burning! Disappointed with the Pumpkin; Glade pumpkin candles give off tons more than yours!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kimigo
review: Apple Pumpkin is my very favorite harvest time scent for October and November. All the scents of the season in this one, great throw without being overpowering. The candle is a beautiful color that blends perfectly with my fall decor. Yankee Candle did a great job on Apple Pumpkin!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Laura Kirkland
review: Like many customers say in their reviews, very low scent. Not like any of the Yankee candles I've bought in the past. Also arrived shattered like so many others. What is going on, Yankee??

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: dabronx
review: Unfortunately, I could not smell the scent right from the beginning. That being stated, I am really not that disappointed as the price was Phenomenal. Also, I have a candle lit constantly for tranquility and Spiritual reasons., from that standpoint, I would purchase again For the longevity of candle burning. I have heard others state They would go directly to Yankee for this purchase;  I hope they Realize they will be paying 3 times the price and probably Shipping too. I am staying with Amazon!üëçüëç

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Just me
review: I like the scent, but it is kinda faint.  Is it old? IDK, but will try the scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jennifer Blair
review: Autumn Wreath has been my favorite Yankee Candle scent for several years but I was very disappointed in this one. I‚Äôm not sure if maybe this was a fake Yankee or if it‚Äôs old? But the candle has no throw and no smell. I‚Äôm basically just burning wax. I‚Äôm so disappointed!! I will stick to ordering directly from Yankee from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: This ‚ÄúCranberry Chutney‚Äù candle smells deliciously fruity and fun. Honestly my favorite candle scent ever. I gave one as a gift and they absolutely loved it ‚Äî because who wouldn‚Äôt? If you can imagine a cranberry-flavored Jolly Rancher, that‚Äôs what this candle smells like. It really smells like a delicious fruity flavor (with none of a cranberry‚Äôs bitterness, of course). I love this candle, and I‚Äôm certain I‚Äôll be buying a giant one next time I need a new candle. It‚Äôs delightful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Todd
review: I'm a fan of Yankee Candle and have even visited their facility/headquarters. I've never purchased a candle from them and been disappointed . . . until this candle.  I ordered this and also a Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup, for the Fall season.  We can barely smell anything from the Yankee Spiced Pumpkin.  For a similar seasonal scent, I'd recommend the Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup. Great scent. Yankee needs to go back to the drawing board on the Spiced Pumpkin.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Rcbird
review: I ordered the Honey Crisp Apple Cider candle. It‚Äôs been burning for at least an hour and there is little to no smell. I‚Äôve never had this issue with Yankee Candles in the past so not sure if this is a fake or they are starting to lack. Would leave 0 stars if I could. Don‚Äôt waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lightworker USA
review: With homes being all sealed up to keep utility bills down, we've lost the smells of the outdoors. Yankee has a winner here... it just smells like FALL. Jumping into piles of raked leaves, the faintest smell of leaves burning (very faint) with hints of pumpkins and spicy things. We live in the center of South Carolina, and as transplanted Yankees, we miss the 4 seasons. Spring and fall are both very brief, so we swiftly go from sweltering humid to cold and rainy with about 6 weeks in between. Don't get me wrong - South Carolina is a wonderful place to live, & as my husband says, "You don't have to shovel rain." He's a native of upstate New York, a veteran of a LOT of lake-effect snow... so we have Spring & Fall vicariously through Yankee candles' wonderful aromas. Just remember - trim your wicks to 1/4 inch, and you won't get smoke.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mimi
review: I am very disappointed in this Yankee candle. I have been buying authentic Yankee Candles for more than 20 years. This my first Yankee Candle purchase on Amazon. In the past, I have always purchased from Hallmark Stores or Bed, Bath & Beyond, and never suffered a low quality Yankee Candle. This candle from Amazon vendor has a very weak scent. Past purchases had scents so strong the fragrance required burning a short 10 minutes only.  I have burned this fake candle almost 2 hours to only get a faint Autumn Harvest scent by sniffing near the jar. Having bought a same scent Yankee Candle from a reputable, authorized dealer, I am astounded at the difference being night & day. This is a knock-off Yankee Candle and my last purchase of such on Amazon. I would not recommend any fragrance offered of this cheaper version. You get what you pay for‚Ä¶buyer beware! Burned but not by the candle wick.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: E
review: I read reviews that said this had a very weak scent, but I gave it a shot anyway. First, it arrived in a Yankee Candle branded box, as if it was shipped directly from the source, and it was packaged well. Although when I took the top off, there were weird bubbles on the top of the candle that deprecated when I touched them...weird! I was just in a full price Yankee Candle store yesterday and it appeared to be the same candle (I shouldn‚Äôt have hesitated and just bought it directly from the store). I lit the candle and went into another room to test it out. I waited to see if the fragrance would carry over to the room I was in, because that‚Äôs what happens with my other Yankee Candles. I checked periodically and there was zero scent. The only time I smelled anything at all was if I stood directed over the candle and put my face close to the top. This is ridiculous. I think this is an OLD candle. Just like perfume, I think candles can lose their potency. Don‚Äôt waste your money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: B. J. Cory
review: I have been buying these candles for years, maybe too many.  For the most part, I like them.  However, because the large ones last a fair amount of time, they should really have two wicks.  Most of them don't burn eve Love You and one must move the wick back to center after every burn while soft or you end up removing all the unburned wax from the edge.  Removing and letting melt usually works but, for the price, I don't think I should have to do that.  Please just add a second wick to the large size.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Florida Girl
review: Love Yankee candles but this was the very first I have purchased that had absolutely NO SCENT!  It‚Äôs still a pretty candle but without the scent‚Ä¶‚Ä¶so disappointing. What happened Yankee Candles?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: 1956netta
review: I purchased this Candle in November, & saved this particular candle to light closer to the week of Christmas. The scent whatever it is did not work for me. There is hardly a scent, & smells nothing like Apple Cinnamon. The way it burns, & aside of the wax looking really weird, I‚Äôm inclined to believe this is not an Authentic ‚ÄúYankee Candle!‚Äù Will be returning!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: mjcali
review: You can't beat a Yankee candle. I'm a full grown 60 year old man that knows when times are stressful, a great way to help destress is by taking care of myself in my home. My best friend and fishing buddy was diagnosed with terminal cancer. I live in a beautiful area of the forest in northern California. He and his wife would come up often in his final years. I would light candles in their guest room before they arrived and they always commented on how nice it was to walk into the room with that smell. Having a nice scented candle when trying to let go of the weight is a great way to let go. Treat yourself or a friend to a little relaxer now and then.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bone
review: NOT an authentic Yankee candle not even close, burning in a small room for almost 3 hours now and can barely smell it. Sad that amazon keeps letting sellers rip buyers off with replica products. A true Yankee candle burning for 3 hours would over power a large house, with which ever scent is burning. This candle is 5 feet from me and I smell nothing. Got up left the room came back in a few times and could barely smell it when i re entered. Its what i get for trying to save $10 bucks. Ill be ordering directly from Yankee from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Megan Webb
review: I am positive these candles that were delivered are NOT made by Yankee Candle and just have their label slapped on the jar. I purchased two of my favorite candles. I buy them every Fall and am very familiar with the scent and how strong it is. This is a cheap knockoff. Both candles have barely any fragrence whatsoever. I am so disappointed. The wick burns with heavy black smoke which is abnormal for a true Yankee Candle. Glade candles have more fragrence and a cleaner burn than this junk. Will never buy this brand from Amazon again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe Morrow
review: Love the scent of this particular candle. Seasonal and warm. My kids love it, too. These candles last forever - dozens of hours of burn time. Do need to use a wick cutter, but that's basic candle care. When these go on sale, I love to give them away as holiday gifts because there is such a variety that they are customizable in terms of who I give them to.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Tee Kay
review: Burning a hole right down the middle of the candle, leaving a half inch ring of solid wax as it goes. :-(  Very disappointed to have a Yankee candle do this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chandra
review: I got an off brand yesterday (different candle. It‚Äôs 10000% better than this one) that puts this candle to shame. Also wtf is this? Messy packaging and melted. Will not be buying another yankee candle with my own money ever again. Village candle is way better and much more worth it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nora M .
review: This is the first Yankee Candle that I didn't care for . The scent was not as I expected at all. The scent was more like a rancid and old smell . Was not giftable at all , the top of the wax was bubbly and discolored.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Dennis Husejnovic
review: I don't know if what I got was fake but I was never this disappointed by a Yankee candle. The pumpkin spice candle smelled like burning wax, no scent at all. I wonder if I was sent a fake... Never spending the money on them again, now they are expensive for no reason.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: New Jersey
review: I keep going back to Yankee Candles every time!!! Amazon keeps very competitive pricing... better than Ebay!!  This candle I just received was a "used" product...not the candle itself but the outer boxing was damaged... to save like .79 cents, I got autumn candle from the "used" section, along with another Large candle. I have gotten 4 other used candles in the past.... never an issue, this one unusable...lol I will buy new, from here on out, the Autumn candles I've had before were all sooooo nice!!! Awesome throw, but not overpowering! Spicy, woodsy scent.... i burn them all year round!!!  So i guess my review is a heads up to what can happen sometimes. Amazon almost immediately refunds to Amazon account unless you want it back to your payment method. My only hassle is having to mess with this broken candle to return. It's pretty unstable. PPE time üòÄ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: NO SCENT...I have never had a Yankee Candle with no scent!  I was so disappointed!  If you buy Yankee you know that delicious scent usually permeates the entire room/ house.  Not sure if these are factory rejects or what?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Colette Burns
review: I was disappointed when it came and was smashed, but contacted seller and they are replacing immediately.  I bought my daughter one and hers was fine. Several are writing about the lack of fragrance, but mine is great and strong and I can smell throughout my house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lateralus
review: This candle does not give off hardly any scent. Unfortunately this is not the first Yankee candle I have purchased that gives off almost no discernable aroma. I jumped on google to see if anyone else has had these issues with Yankee candles and apparently this has been going on for eight or nine years with even ardent candle enthusiasts and fans of the company itself blogging, filing consumer complaints, and posting to message boards with the same complaint. How can you be atop the scented candle market with the most aggressive pricing and change the potency and ingredients that got you to the top on the first place?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ben
review: The media could not be loaded. I bought this candle for about $20. It was bought using a gift card & I had no idea if it was worth it, but I wanted a candle & this scent caught my attention, and I am not dissapointed. I've had the candle lit for 12+ hours and it hardly made a dent in the wax. I've used it everyday since I recieved it 3 days ago. The scent takes just a little while to set in, but it will fill a room unlike some soy blends. I am almost certain that this candle will last me until March/April. And when that time comes, I WILL buy another. I recorded a video to show the small dent it has made. (Ignore the WAP in the back)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Brooke1982
review: I worry about buying candles online because sometimes they come melted, cracked, or older with no scent. This candle smells like it should and is in gift giving condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mari S.
review: I ordered two for me and 1 for a Christmas gift. I'm not really smelling the scent on these. Very disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Julie C.
review: This scent is fall in a jar! The scents of fallen leaves, fall spices and ripe apples blend beautifully to create a unique scent. I purchase this every year in the fall and it always  fills my home with beautiful fragrance. The scent throw is amazing and the burn time is quite long. It's an excellent value when you consider how many hours of burn tie you get out of this. It fragrances a room even unlit. Just removing the lid releases the scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: TB
review: I normally buy the 3-wick candles from bath and body works. Compared to those candles, this candle had a very weak scent. That said, since the candle had quite a long life, I had time to get used to the scent that was not quite as powerful. It is a very pleasant smell, but I just took one star off since it was not as strong as I would have liked. I kept the other four stars on though since it was quite a bit less expensive than the bath and body works candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Overall, my customer experience is positive. I ordered Cranberry Chutney, which smells just like a cranberry-scented Febreeze spray that I bought last fall. On a negative note, the scent isn't very strong...it's better for a small room (hence, my 4-star review). Last, although the first candle arrived shattered, I had no problem getting a free replacement. The next one arrived three days later, thankfully unbroken. In conclusion, this candle is not my favorite because of its weak throw, and I will probably purchase only if on a good sale.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Barry B0000
review: I have bought several Yankee Candles and was very pleased with looks, burn time and scent. This candle is a very big disappointment. No discernable scent at all. Very disappointed in this product  and a waste of money for both the candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lisa D. Sample-Page
review: I‚Äôve always loved Yankee Candles,  I especially love the ‚Äúautumn‚Äù aromas.  This candle definitely delivered, great aroma, last forever, would make a great gift

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: K. Daisley
review: I can't even write a review of the product because the jar arrived smashed and the candle in pieces. Not even able to return it without risking injury. *Update* I've changed this to four stars because the company immediately replaced the broken candle for me without issue.  I love the scent and I would be happy to order again thanks to the great customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Janellemp
review: My household loves Yankee Candles. We purchased the Spiced Pumpkin scent for the fall. I've tried the votive size before and they spelled great. However, this larger jar doesn't seem to smell much. When we burn the candle, we can barely smell it. Disappointing because it's such a large jar. The candle was packaged very well so there was no issues with breaking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: QAmidala29
review: This is my least favorite of all the YC candles. You can't smell anything within the first 30 minutes; after that it just smells like a burning candle. I would not recommend. I'm going with my normal smells next time. Don't get me wrong I still love YC candles but I'm also trying to go towards SOY candles to help with in home toxins and help out my air filter.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Courtney
review: I bought 5 of these for myself and my family as gifts. I feel terrible i gave these to my fam. They don‚Äôt smell like anything at all. Not my experience with yankee candles.. don‚Äôt know what to make of how not good these are.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: kathy b.
review: I always buy yankee candles but I think this is the last time I have bought 3 in the last 2 or 3 months and I do not get that high smell like I got in the past years.  I don't know what you have done but the candels are not the same the smells are VERY VERY FAINT  I AM UNSATISFIED CUSTOMER AS OF NOW

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Valerie100
review: I don't doubt that this is truly a Yankee candle, but I am surprised that the smell for this candle is not as good as the brand is known for. Unlit the candle smells like straight apple butter, not a bad thing to me. Lit, it smells like 45% apple butter and 55% plain wax. The smell doesn't have a lot of throw either. Not terrible but I wouldn't repurchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nonnie
review: I burned this candle for 3 hrs & it gave off no scent, at all. I grew up in MA where authentic Yankee Candles were manufactured. The reason everyone paid extra was for the extraordinary scent, which filled the New England homes. I bought 2 of these & neither of them give off any scent. Dollar store candles are better than these. Do Not  Buy

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nilda S Robinson
review: I bought 4 candles because they were the special of the day. I have burned 2 out of 4 and you CANNOT smell the scent. I think they were old candles and that is why they were on sale, I am So very disappointed!! I love a great smelling candle but will never buy yankee candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Moby
review: I am so Disappointed. I read several of the reviews that said that this Yankee pumpkin spice candle had very little scent but others  were very positive so I decided to go ahead and purchase it. Well I‚Äôm here to tell you there is NO SCENT WHATSOEVER! It‚Äôs been a number of years since I bought a Yankee candle as I had become disillusioned with less and less scent that they gave off but this is the worst ever. Grateful that I didn‚Äôt pay full price for this although it‚Äôs a total waste of money for me. Never again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mike Graff
review: Smell is good, but it is the name you're paying for. Plenty of less expensive candles that last as long and smell as strong and good for about half the price. Burnt the candle about 1/3 of the way and the way it was made,, the wick was too close to the glass and it cracked from the heat.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jaclyn Hensley
review: It was major savings and a risk (scent). Hope it smells better while burning. Apple is great, but the pumpkin or combining it has that indescribable unnatural tinge I dont like.  Packaged was impressive! Always worry about glass! Egg carton around the candle and fit snuggled in Yankee candle box, shipped in another box.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bubbas Mommie
review: Very disappointed in these as I have always known Yankee candles to be delightfully fragrant and true to their named fragrance. Not these I am afraid. They have a strong chemical smell when lit and permeate the atmosphere with the smell of burning creosote. Going back. Terribly sad as had these been what I have come to expect from Yankee Candle...they would have been a great value. Makes me question their authenticity.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Magimae
review: For quite a while it seemed, the Spiced Pumpkin candle was not as strong or pleasant as the first couple of yrs it was out.  I've been buying Yankee Candles since the catalog days and the store in Mass, so the scent was markedly different.  I tried it on and off for years, and then decided to try it again after a number of years.  I'm happy to report that at least with the jar I received, the scent seems to be back - as good as before.  Spiced Pumpkin is one of my all time fave scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Heidi
review: I have bee purchasing Yankee Candles for about 20 years - they are not what they used to be.  The only time I can smell the scent is if I put the candle right up to my nose.  I have it right now sitting on the end table just under 2 feet from me and I cannot smell it.  I remember how they used to be so filled with scent that you could smell it all through the house.  I used to justify the expense of these candles by the quality.  Not anymore.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Spiced Pumpkin
author: Josh h.
review: I give this a 4 star for value for money because the burn is nice and slow, the frangrance strong, and the size big. BUT... I honestly cant stand the smell!
