If you want a highly scented, long lasting, baby powder candle, this might be a good deal for you.  Otherwise, it is highly disappointing, and I suggest that you keep looking elsewhere.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Maria
review: I ordered this and I don't like the smell. It smells like you sprayed men's cologne straight into your nose. This might be better in a larger space but idk. I burned it in a 450 sq ft apartment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: David Beblo
review: Yankee Candles used to fill the room with their wonderful scent. That's what made them worth the cost. Since the company was sold they aren't the same. It does smell nice when I walk by but 6 steps away and you can't smell anything. It's a shame.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: LK
review: This candle smells amazing, so of course I was super excited to burn it! Come to find out, the throw is not very good. This would probably be better in a small room or a bathroom, rather than a living room. 3 stars because it smells so dang good! It‚Äôs kind of got a cologne smell to it, but it‚Äôs also very refreshing at the same time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Justine Gorski
review: Always liked Yankee candle for filling your home with great aromas. You would think for the price you'd get some scent from it, you have to be within a foot to smell anything, to bad there is hardly any scent anymore

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Taylor
review: Be prepared that this is going to be a dye mess. Black/blue everywhere. Leaked out of the candle in shipment and all over the place and stained my shirt as I dropped it due to the oil slick. Never had this happen with Yankee candle and my favorite scent. Very disappointed but hopefully the replacement is not like this. Also this Candle smells old like it‚Äôs been left open for months. Not a strong scent at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: James Edwards
review: I don't right or read many reviews but I should have read the reviewed on this candle. It is a nice looking even burning 2 wick Yankee candle. The problem is there is zero scent. Nothing at all. I'm very surprised coming from Yankee. I don't recommend this candle if you interested in smelling it because you won't. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Foxcye
review: VERY SECURE PACKING when I ordered ONE candle... SO...I ordered 10 MORE candles‚ù£ Love this Sacred Suttle Scentü•∞ THANK YOU !  I WILL ALWAYS ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY!! **UPDATE**  purchased 7times TEN CANDLES each month...last FOUR were broken or melted over couldn't open! What happ to QUALITY CONTROL?!  REMOVING 4 STARS

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: George Ferrari
review: The scent and value are incredible...who doesn't love some fresh clean cotton haha. But my problem is the fact that the candle is crappy, to say the least. It's like the wicks are burning faster then the wax, so the wicks get super small and the melted wax ends up covering the wicks...such a waste of a good candle. That's the 2 wick candle as well, o switched over to that style because the single wicks were burning terribly, I got a candle that burnt almost straight down, it was a pain and I ended up throwing it away, wasting probably a ‚Öì of the candle. I've always had good luck in the past, but my last 2 purchases have really left a bad taste in my mouth and I'm not sure I wanna spend my hard earned money on wastful products. Thank you for your time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Fox
review: First bottle came broken but they were great about getting me a replacement. Unfortunately I didn't smell the first one bc the scent is awful. Smells just like Right Guard deodorant. Unless you're a middle school gym teacher, I'm not sure why you'd want to be in a room that reeks of this smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Candice dryden
review: What smell?? I hate that I spent this much on two candles and they have zero smell what so ever. One of these was supposed to be a gift for my mom. This was a waste. A complete waste of time, energy, effort, cost, and now patience. I am extremely disappointed. So much so that I went to the Yankee candle website directly and bought replacements

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Carolina

It has a clean but flowery smell to it that you can appreciate through out the kitchen and Livingroom since it's an open concept room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: its_trycki
review: Absolutely LOVE this scent. It‚Äôs great for the Christmas season and not too overpowering! I would give this review 5 stars for the scent and quality (duh, it‚Äôs yankee candle) but I  unfortunately recived the candle broken in the box upon arrival. I was disappointed to receive the product damaged (glass all shattered). I‚Äôm still waiting on a refund from Amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: D
review: Love, love, love the classic Yankee candle scent! It's extremely giftable. I bought the large and gifted it. They love it! You cannot go wrong with Eucalyptus. The scent is crisp and clean. The only con is the price is a bit excessive for a large at almost $30.00, but IMHO it should be around $25.00 + tax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: 4what-it‚Äôs-worth
review: Buyer beware with this one. Very sweet smelling and not in a pleasant way. Barely any eucalyptus scent even when burning. First time a eucalyptus candle has ever given me a headache and lid can‚Äôt be left off when not burning because it‚Äôs very strong sweet to almost nauseating odor.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Cookielishious
review: I love Yankee candles & I love Midsummer's Night scent. I also love the price point that Amazon offers for them for. I added them to my subscribe & save & just received these. Maybe they're melted, maybe they're fake. Idk & I don't care, but buyer beware. The substance is not wax, it leaked through both shipping boxes & is oily & transfers onto everything you touch. Gross.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: LMG912
review: This has to be a fake it has no scent to it. Initially upon opening the lid you smell the traditional yankee candle clean cotton smell, or so you think, but upon burning it, you get no smell at all! So disappointing. anyone who buys this should get a refund and Amazon stop selling these.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle couldn‚Äôt be worse. If you like how your Sunday school teacher smelled in 1973, this candle is for you. If you enjoy migraines buy this candle. My cat ran away from home because of this candle. If the power ever goes out I will sit in the dark before I light this horrific candle. I can‚Äôt say enough about how bad this candle is. I hate this candle. It has 2 wicks for to double your misery.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Maria Kally
review: I love Yankee Candle! The candles last longer than any other candles I‚Äôve tried and, like 96% of the time, they smell stronger. Unfortunately, this particular candle was in the 4%. It didn‚Äôt really smell as strong as other YC candles I‚Äôve had in the past. It still good, just not the ‚ÄòYankee Candle Great‚Äô that I‚Äôm used to. And sadly, I missed the return time frame because I didn‚Äôt use it right when I got it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: jram
review: The scent used to be the best and now is only noticeable if you have your nose 6 inches away yet they charge you plenty. I bought a dollar candle from dollar tree and it had more smell than the Yankee candle. Well I lost on this candle, but the good part is it will be my last time ever paying for a Yankee candle with no scent. Yea

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Pamiam 218
review: I buy only Yankee candles but his one had a strange and thick wick that remained a pain until I tossed the candle.  I trust this was a fluke but wouldn't try another one of these.  My history with Yankee candles is long and pleasant but I am sharing the truth of this particular candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: kirk
review: I bought this candle as a gift for someone that preferred clean smells over sweet or fruity smells.  It was a great gift and smelled really good. The person who received it really loved it.  I got it on sale and it‚Äôs a really large jar candle.  I would definitely purchase again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Viking Princess
review: "MidSummers Night" scent Yankee candle is a favorite of mine. While I prefer Soy based candles for the benefit of my felines, the location in the house for this "MidSummers Night" scent Yankee candle is in a purrfect location, so I get to enjoy one of my favorite scents by Yankee.  GREAT PRICE!  Normally $29.00, this was on sale for $16 and change.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Ji
review: This Sage & Citrus candle smells pretty weak. After burning for 2 hours, I can only smell a hint in my small living room. If you are going for a subtle smell in your home, buy it. If you want a more obvious smell, it's a no. Although everything else other than the weak smell is perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Piper
review: Not sure what‚Äôs happening with Yankee candle but I‚Äôve bought many, many candles over the years. The last bunch I have bought have very little scent even after first lighting them. So I will look for something different and pass on Yankee candles moving forward.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: LOVE TO SHOP!
review: Yankee candle tends to be a little on the expensive side but they have the greatest scents! The sage and citrus is wonderful! But I wish they would go back to producing the "teakwood and citrus" scent also! That was my favorite of all time! Still a fan- 30 years

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Nicole
review: I like this candle because sage & citrus are both extremely effective magical substances, and the scent fills my bedroom with an aroma similar to sitting by the fire on a cold winter night.  Great price and strongest scent I have found in a candle. Yankee Candles are the best brand on the market and Amazon for some reason offers them at a great price. Thanks Amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Evan Gisonna
review: I ordered this candle many times! So i ordered two this time around. The problem is i feel these candles could be fake or aftermarket YanKee Candles cause they didn‚Äôt come in a Yankee candle box like they usually come in. And also the tops don‚Äôt sit secure and click into the candle with a tight seal. Potentially got two knock off candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: ishrim
review: Yankee candle is a staple in my kitchen for eliminating odor and keeping the area fresh. Love how the scent is non synthetic, very natural . I stock them up whenever they are on sale. Quality remains the same over years. You wont be disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Nate
review: It‚Äôs definitely a candle that burns fast. Even after trimming the wicks, within 10 minutes of lighting it the flames are way to big. Wax melts the whole top layer within a half hour. The cover SHOULDNT be used to extinguish as it‚Äôs plastic, which is sad for an expensive candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Jenniefromtheblock
review: Feel like Yankee candles have lost their quality.  This used to be my favorite candle and scent but you can‚Äôt smell like it like you used to- it‚Äôs not just this scent but the brand overall I've noticed lately. Candle was lackluster.  Really disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Janice
review: Very disappointed as I lit two of mine and neither of them have a scent.  The other two were gifted and I feel sorry for them.  So it smells out the box but when you light them I get nothing.  If I can return a lit candle I would! I want a refund.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Floydboy
review: Not sure if I smell anything from this candle that represents a soft blanket. Merely a gimmick title for a candle that has mostly a vanilla scent with a hint of laundry detergent. It certainly doesn‚Äôt smell bad at all, but the name of the candle ‚ÄúSoft Blanket‚Äù, to me was very misleading.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Kasey
review: I don‚Äôt think this is Yankee. Mine came with a weird thin plastic seal that doesn‚Äôt seal. It wasn‚Äôt the normal seal in the top of the lids. I know for 2 reasons. #1. The plastic ‚Äúseal‚Äù was out of the jar. #2: At some point the jar opened and the wax had melted everywhere and was all over the box. Which was an black oily mess.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Barbara Elyse
review: Nice strong scent that filled my home - not over sweet as many are - I tend towards pine, balsam, spices rather than lilac, vanilla or baking cookies and this was just perfect - not evergreen but not sweet and as usual the candle lasts for days.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Angelcat47
review: I absolutely love Yankee candles.  I buy almost nothing else.  They burn cleanly and evenly all the way to the bottom.  They have great throw. My townhouse fills with scent within an hour.  This scent smells something like a man's expensive cologne.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: H2O
review: This smells absolutely fan-freaking-tastic! It takes me back to when I used to be able to go inside used bookstores and occult gem/incense shops in my home town. I am in love and will definitely be buying more in the future. The nostalgia is real ü•∫üíï

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Lois Keith
review: I normally love Yankee candles, but I gave this one a 1 star because it smells old and does not burn right. I would have returned it but I gave it as a Christmas gift and they told me of the problem. I don't recommend that you buy this product

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: PerfectStranger
review: Are we getting the real deal on Amazon?  Have burned Yankee Sage and Citrus for many years.  Last night I lit one and fell asleep on the couch while my husband was watching football. Woke up sneezing about 20 times in a row and nose hasn‚Äôt stopped running since.  In the trash!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Hansen Family
review: When I first received this scent as a gift I was hesitant to burn it as I thought the evergreen would be too strong. I was so wrong. It is a beautiful light citrus scent with a hint of evergreen that is so subtle. This thing burns forever because it is so large!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Amazon Customer
review: Looks like a Yankee Candle, burns like one but doesn't provide the rich room-filling scent of candles of past years.  The Eucalyptus candle used to fill the house and  this latest candle you can't tell if it's burning when you're in the same room.  What a disappointment as this was my favorite.  Not any more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Sh
review: I gave high stars cause yankee is the best candle but very disappointed one has been lite before as you can see in pic I just took them out of boxes and one wick been lit. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

Wish I could submit pictures so you can see, but it doesn‚Äôt give me the option? Please buy a Yankee from a trusted place, not off Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Guy Monday
review: Used to get these so I would have a long-lasting candle that covered up the funk with a fresh laundry smell, but despite lasting just as long as I remember, the smell doesn't seem to be nearly as powerful or long-lasting as they used to. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Pyriel

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Ras
review: The first burn smelled amazing but every time after that barely smelled like anything. It‚Äôs like the scent was only on the top layer somehow. These candles are overrated

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Allyson J.
review: I feel like lately the candles that I've gotten from YC have been a little less smelly, which is sad because they've always been so good about that, but this one was NOT a disappointment. It's so inviting and soft, not too sweet and not too powerful. Just right. I'm a huge fan of fresh smells, sweet/tropical scents make me sick to my stomach. So this is just sweet enough without being overbearing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Kellz
review: Glad I could bring life back to this candle! It‚Äôs smell is addicting! Like mans cologne uwu

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Gretchen McPhie
review: Yankee Candles used to be so fragrant but this candle doesn‚Äôt even smell. Won‚Äôt buy anymore of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Debbie
review: I can only smell it if I hold it right against my nose, even after having it lit for an hour. I would have liked more for what I spent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Jacques Lux
review: This is terrible!!!!! Doesn‚Äôt smell !!! What a waste of money !!!! I‚Äôm so disappointed!!!!!!!! I wish I can return it after is  been lighted  Don‚Äôt buy this item!!!! This is a SCAM !!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Diva Hail
review: Does not give off scent as expected. Have it on a warmer as I have done with other candles but can't smell it at all. Burned fir days and nothing

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Kaydub
review: I love Yankee candles. But the last 6 I have purchases through A m azon have been a huge disappointment.  The fragrance is almost non existent and they have burned incredibly fast. Think I will switch to a new candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Shilej
review: It‚Äôs like no scent at all! It‚Äôs my third day lighting the candle, and i still have to smell the candle! Waste purchase!! I‚Äôm surprised it‚Äôs yankee candle I had great hopes on these candles, but this made me very disappointing!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Samy
review: I love, love Eucalyptus and was so very happy to find it on Amazon.  I want more but there is no more.  It is very hard to find and had disappeared from the scene along with us old hippies.  Hope they bring it back.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Courtney
review: I always get these candles when they are on sale for my family. This year when I got this candle it came blank, no info on the scent or anything. Normally I wouldn‚Äôt care but it was a gift that I couldn‚Äôt even give.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Jacqueline
review: I gave this candle 5 stars on longevity only because there was no wick

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: None

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Cathy Woodard
review: I love this Yankee Candle, it‚Äôs a subtle scent,not overbearing.I had this scent before and my friends and family wanted to know what it was.It seems to be a scent that a lot of people like because it‚Äôs nice and not to strong,it‚Äôs just right!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: SunLove
review: Are used to purchase this fragrance from Yankee candle many years ago many times. This new product is not as good. The fragrance is off and it emits a ton of black smoke. I only use for short periods of time on stove when windows open.

author: Michelle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Barbara

I like the scent, and I decided to keep it rather than return it for a refund.  However, it was a disappointment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle was horrible to burn. The wick was split so there was an excessive amount of smoke/soot. Perhaps it was a QC fail or maybe Yankee Candle has just gone downhill.

I had to use a tool to remove solid wax from the sides (the small hole was getting deeper and deeper) and now my candle looks horrible. I

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amy Elizabeth Taylor
review: Dissatisfied purchase. All Yankee Candle products I have bought in the past have been fantastic, however, these particular candles gave off relatively no scent. Would compare it to a cheap Walmart brand candle and wouldn‚Äôt recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: S. Dial
review: I purchased three of these candles for my aunt (who is located in a different state across the country from where I live) who has severe mobility issues and wears a colostomy bag as a result of cancer treatment. She requested good quality & good smelling candles to help with the smell when she and her caregiver change her bag. I purchased the Balsam & Cedar, Lavender and Sparkling Cinnamon candles thinking that each would offer a pleasant and varied aroma depending on her mood. She was excited to receive the package and quickly tried each of the candles. Both she and her caregiver remarked that all three of the candles smelled "cheap", they said that "they smell like Lysol" and they're reminiscent of "dollar store quality candles". I am exceedingly disappointed. I expect more from Yankee Candle (a brand that I've personally used in my own home and normally have a high opinion of), I expect better quality for candles that cost more than $10 each. At the very least I expect for each of the candle aromas to be distinguishable from one another. Now my aunt is stuck with three terrible smelling candles that she won't use, and I think we can all agree that the situation must be bad if you prefer the smell of human waste to a product designed to freshen the air.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Barbara Elyse
review: the scent was so perfect for the holiday season and now after - they last and last and last - chose not to do a tree and the scent of this candle allowed me to have the fresh scent of a Christmas Tree without the work and clean up - the candle was so satisfying I purchased another a week later for the back of the house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: BIG_LYD
review: My absolute favorite Yankee candle scent!  Use it year round.  Nice outdoor/natural scent that isn‚Äôt overpowering. Make sure to burn candle one hour for every diameter inch (approximately 4 inches for large jar) so that the wax melts evenly and you don‚Äôt waste any of the candle wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: LaFawnDuh
review: This candle transplants me instantly to the dark Canadian wilderness. Trees, pine cones and even a hint of snow come alive in a true treat for your nostrils. Be careful though, Fire is hot!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jaline
review: Balsam & Cedar has always been one of my favorite Yankee scents! I really like this scent for the holidays. Mine arrived in perfect condition and the scent lasted until the was was gone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Sandi
review: I bought this thinking I'd have the faint pine scent of a real tree in the house for Christmas.  There were so many glowing reviews and Yankee candles have a good reputation, so I didn't think I could go wrong.  Admittedly, my husband has a sensitivity to smells, but he was right on this one - it didn't have that fresh pine smell.  It reminded me of the car air fresheners of old that people used to hang on their rear view mirrors.  It is much too strong - and not really the mild pine scent I had anticipated.  I gave it to a friend who wanted to try it and told her to donate it if she found they didn't like the scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Carin Elisa Laue
review: Candle arrived with no wick. I love yankee candles and order them frequently. I‚Äôve never had this problem before. I got a knife out to see if perhaps the wick was under the surface, but no. What a waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: matt stalone

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: mary e. hoffman
review: have bought yankee candles for years.  what a disappointment.  this is my last yankee candle purchase

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jeff H.
review: Once upon a time, Yankee Candles were premium scented candles. These days, not so much. I bought two candles, one Balsam & Cedar and the other Autumn Wreath.  You can barely smell the scents of either, even after burning for a substantial period of time. You can smell them if you hold your nose up to the candle, but the scent just doesn‚Äôt dissipate much once lit. I‚Äôm incredibly disappointed and most likely will be submitting a return on BOTH candles. And this is definitely not the first time this has happened. The quality of their candles has clearly went downhill in recent years. At any rate, it‚Äôs high time for me to find a new candle brand that actually delivers on their scents!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Annie
review: No scent.Very disappointing.Have never had this problem with Yankee candles before. Will only buy at Yankee Candle Store in the fuuture. I usually have been pleased with Amazon orders. Not this time

author: ccas

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jeanne Smith
review: Below is my review. I read an article (Avery Hartmans/Business Insider) that stated the lack of smell with this candle is due to COVID. Mr. Hartmans generalization is unfounded. I have Village Candles that I can smell just fine and have no issues tasting or smelling what I eat or drink. When will we stop blaming everything on COVID?!? The candle has one wick and is very pretty. There is zero scent when burning the candle. I purchased one for us and another to give as a gift. The lack of scent when being burned, I will donate the second one. We have always purchased Village Candles and trying Yankee Candles was not a good choice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Sherry Wallen
review: I love the scent.. I‚Äôm watching Rachel Maddow‚Äôs story about folks not being able to smell scented candles, including Yankee. Statistics seem to show a correlation of Covid cases with folks not being able to ‚Äúsmell‚Äù the Candles. I just want you to know I can smell your candles and I Love Their Scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: George
review: Item was supposed to smell like pine.. hardly any smell at all.calling Amazon tomorrow.return..thought Yankee candles were one of the best.can get more pine smell from car air freshener.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jessica
review: I was looking for for a Christmas feel. I have only ever tried jasmine scent that I bought at target, so I was really  blindly choosing my next scent. I first bought a medium size magical frosted forest scent hoping it would bring my fake Christmas tree to life .  The scent was not strong so I had to put it in my tiny bathroom  where it filled each inch of space with scent , my husband loved it , it was ok for me  at first I was upset I bought a candle that smelled like Pinesol cleaner  but once I lit it ,  it was more subtle  and then it ended so I bought this Balsam cedar also hoping it would bring my Christmas tree to life , it being much bigger , I was wrong  I also had to place this one in my tiny bathroom just to smell anything , and now I realized that the magical frosted forest smelled stronger and better  . I wish I could describe the exact scents I smell but I  am no expert  (yet). But I do think the eucalyptus in the magical frosted forest made a difference  so I would definitely buy that one again .

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Pepper
review: No scent. Dissapointing

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Joseph
review: I‚Äôll start out be saying that I‚Äôm the guy that will spend [maybe too much] money on a candle that smells good and is aesthetically pleasing to the eye. Don‚Äôt tell anyone. That being said, I have this candle on a ‚Äúsubscribe & save‚Äù monthly delivery. It may not look the best, but the label peels off easily and the smell competes with the super-expensive Thymes Frasier Fir candles. It‚Äôs a light, clean, fresh cedar/pine scent and fills our living area. Lasts about a month if you burn it for several hours daily.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Florida Gal
review: I‚Äôm so disappointed! I should have known better when I found my favorite Yankee candle scent for so cheap on Amazon. There is barely any scent. I‚Äôve been burning the candle for 3 hours and unless you walk right up to it, you‚Äôd never know it was scented. Save your money and buy directly from YC or one or their retailers.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Virginia W.
review: So disappointing. You cannot even smell this candle. This scent used to be a favorite of mine, but now you cannot even tell it‚Äôs burning. Yankee Candle must have changed their formula. I won‚Äôt buy another Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: BOB FROM MOUNTAIN HOME, AR
review: For a Yankee Candle, and the price I paid, I was very disappointed. The smell was non-existent. I thought Yankee were once the best? Apparently greed must have killed them like it does so many businesses these days. You get people running the biz that want to start using cheaper quality materials to make more profit, and they raise prices to ridiculous levels because people love their products. Only they don‚Äôt realize people aren‚Äôt as stupid as they hoped. The people begin to realize that they just aren‚Äôt as good as they once were and they are WAY out of the ballpark now for the Quality to Cost ratio. So people try another brand and go wow, that‚Äôs a great candle! And they never go back. They then talk to their friends about it and the friends ‚Äúwake up‚Äù and go ‚Äúyour right, their candles just aren‚Äôt that great anymore. Their prices have gotten ridiculous anyway.‚Äù It is now that they switch too over to that other brand that really knows how to make a great smelling candle, that stays smelling great, until the last bit of life leaves the flame on the wicks. I know for a fact that this happens as stated above. It is from direct experiences on my part, multiple times as well. I even started polling our friends and the majority of them actually verified the same sentiment. That Yankee Candles, which used to be everyone‚Äôs favorite, have gone downhill so badly and have gotten so crazy expensive, that it just does not make sense to keep wasting the amount of time I have to work to pay for them. I work hard. I want quality for my money and time. I‚Äôm not going to spend an hour working to throw away on garbage. Companies don‚Äôt respect the people who work to pay their salaries. The only thing they care about is my money and not the time I slaved at work just to purchase their crappy product. What happened to the days when ‚Äúcustomers come FIRST‚Äù? They‚Äôre gone and now it‚Äôs only about taking your money/time and passing it on to the fat executive that‚Äôs destroying their brand, just to make themselves and their greedy shareholders fatter and richer off the backs of those who do the REAL work in this world.... just for the privilege of buying their overpriced trinkets.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Karen Gordon
review: Very mild scent unlit and no scent whatsoever when burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Gregg E.Miller
review: YANKEE CANDLES - BALSAM CEDAR Sometimes the smell on Yankee candles can be a hit or miss.  This particular scent hits the mark and is very long-lasting. I give this candle a 5 star ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê rating.  Unfortunately, the Candle wicks were in the wax crooked and we're about 1/2 inch from the side of the glass.  As you could see by the photo it creates only a partial burn of the candle.  I chatted with Amazon customer service online.  And boy were they spectacular !!!  They immediately sent the replacement candle and I received it in 1 days !!!!  It is a pleasure working with Amazon as it seems like if I've had any issues they have been resolved.  I will be a lifelong customer.  üòäüòä

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Manilisa
review: It smells AMAZING, but it was all broken when I opened it. I was incredibly sad about that because I got it to give to my boyfriend. obviously it is not giftable, so I got a replacement (not here yet). Even though it was all broken, it is still OK to burn. It‚Äôs currently burning in our kitchen and our whole house smells like Christmas!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Floweringplum
review: I must say I had no issues with the delivery or the condition of the glass jar or the candle.  Packed well and the candle was in perfect condition for immediate use.  No issues with the wick and the scent is not overpowering but is true to being outdoors surrounded by pine trees. Coming from New England, that is a real compliment to those who create the Yankee Candle scents.  I purchased two as the price offered by Amazon was a good deal and much less than the retain store or the online store.  I checked both and decided to go with Amazon as the online Yankee was overwhelmed and not able to process at two attempts my order and the retail store was low on inventory considering the late date of my purchasing.  I was fortunate to have received on Christmas Eve with no delays in delivery, this is where Prime membership is worth having.  Both candle jars came in their own individual packed box and both boxes were wrapped in a cardboard cushioned cover to protect the glass from breakage in travel than placed into a larger box.  I would definitely recommend and give as a gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: GKR8
review: I bought several of these candles last fall in preparation for the holiday season. The intensity of the fragrance of those candles allowed the room to e filled substantially better than this one. All were Yankee candles, same size and same fragrance. The product is still good, just not as good. New Ownership?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Michael Vaughn
review: If you're one of the reviewers saying you can't smell this candle, you need to schedule a covid test. It's got a nice strong scent to it. My one complaint is the wick needs to be larger. Even letting it sit four hours for the first burn, I still got tunneling in this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Buckee
review: What a disappointment!  I was thinking this would be nice to burn in our living room where we set up our Christmas tree.  This is the first year that we‚Äôve had an artificial tree.  While I did not expect the candle to smell like a real tree, I was sad that it smelled nothing at all like a tree.  I detected a bit of a mint scent, but that‚Äôs about it.  I have an excellent sense of smell, as anyone in my family will tell you, so I know that it‚Äôs not that I‚Äôm missing something.  My spouse has a somewhat dulled sense of smell and he thinks the candle has a sort of sweet smell but not like a tree.  Did we get a ‚Äúbad‚Äù item?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle EXPLODED after about 2 hours and ruined my China cabinet shelf and glassware.  No one was in the room at the time it exploded thankfully.  This could have been a very bad incident and people could get seriously injured!  These should be REMOVED from the market!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Introvert kitty
review: Idk if these are old or didn‚Äôt pass quality control but there is no where near the scent of the ones about in store (balsam and cedar). I bought rose and lilac and those are fine. This one smokes a lot when you first start burning it, and normally you can get the smell to permeate the whole room just opening it up unlit, but even after burning it is  lac lister. Bought here because the stores were all sold out, and this normally smells like a candle my grandmother had out every Christmas so I really look forward to this smell every year to help keep those memories alive.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Adaveve
review: My mom used to buy these when I was little and I remember the smell being so strong it would fill the whole first floor. My husband had been wanting our house to smell like pine for Christmas since we have a fake tree. So I bought this as an early Christmas present. And he is loving it. I feel that the scent doesn‚Äôt drift quite as far as it used to when I was younger, but it‚Äôs enough for at least one room. It‚Äôs also a very large candle so I don‚Äôt think we‚Äôll have a problem with using it to quickly. I think that was kind of a sale point. Most other candles of the same price are half the size. My husband loved this gift and I would assume most other people would enjoy it as well. Just a small warning the flame can get pretty high so make sure you just don‚Äôt put stuff around it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Ravenhair312
review: I love everything about this candle, from the smell, to the price to the longevity of it.  The only thing I do not like and the reason why I subtracted one star is that the wick creates a lot of soot!  I mean, a little is understandable, but this is A LOT of soot!  So much so, that the top of the candle gets black every time I light it and I have noticed soot adheres to my walls and everything on that room too.  I still light the candle, but it is less frequent than before.  The soot ruins my enjoyment of it because I keep worrying about wiping everything clean.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: So disappointed! I bought this exact candle scent last Christmas- balsam and cedar - and it was perfectly scented. Beautiful and filled the entire room. This year I bought this scent again only the 2 wick style‚Ä¶no scent!  So I decided to purchase another‚Ä¶  go back to what I had last year-this jar style -thinking perhaps that was the difference.  Nope! No scent. Yankee candles have been my go to for years. I am sorry but no more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: MyOwnPlace
review: I bought this as a gift for my son and his girlfriend as they love the smell of balsam at Christmas. I stayed over at their house at Christmas and we all agreed there was almost no scent from the candle at all. Once in a while you‚Äôd get a whiff of what the candle was supposed to smell like. After this I won‚Äôt be buying Yankee candle scents. For the money, it definitely wasn‚Äôt worth it. (I also saw an article saying that the company believes that most people who say this have lingering effects from Covid and therefore have no sense of smell. In this case, that is not true. No one has had Covid.)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Samantha
review: I buy yankee candles every year .  I bought 4 large jars and they have little no scent ! I bought a cheaper brand Village candle and that candle  gave off a stronger scent then thsn all 4 candles I had. Burning  at the same time !  I NOTICED THIS LAST YEAR TOO ! My sister in law stop buying them 2 years ago for same reason .  I thought it was my inauguration. I'm now buying Thyme candles much better . The smallest Thyme candle had my whole livingroom smelling than 4 yankee candles did burning at 1 time. STOP USING COVID AS AN EXCUSE FOR POOR PRODUCT !!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Oregon2020777
review: I bought this candle because of the good reviews, how it burned very clean and lasted a long time. However that was not my experience when I lit the candle it immediately started burning black smoke I figured it would just burn like that at the start then go away. It didn't the smoke was bad enough for me to have to air out the room. The candle went in the garbage. Maybe I got a defective candle but for the price I expected more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Andy
review: The smell flows well through the home, the scent is strong but not powerful so you catch a wiff of it no matter where you are. It's not a constant scent that you get used to. It returns like a fresh candle from the store. I had mine lit non-stop for an entire week. 24/7. Never blown out. It lasted and stayed smelling good all week long. Not a candle guy, but this brand has made me one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Eiskrypta
review: I could totally add a picture of my tub... but ... Added this very festive candle to my spa night, for two weeks and was baffled by why there was a BLACK ring around my now empty tub. Gross. I do understand hygiene, so it was not me hanging with some essential oils. Had another spa day, sans candle... no black ring around the tub. SO... Yes, I do wipe down my sludge, however, the amount of soot this puts into the air of a not too small bathroom is a bit alarming. PSA Still love Yankee candle... buuuut.... with think twice about buying this candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Kay
review: This is one of my favorite candles to buy around the holiday season. It smells strongly of balsam and cedar, but it's not overpowering. I buy this every season and off-season if available. I would recommend if you love the smell of fresh Christmas trees. It is also perfect if you don't have real trees during the holiday and want that fresh pine smell in your house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Nonnie
review: I burned this candle for 3 hrs & it gave off no scent, at all. I grew up in MA where authentic Yankee Candles were manufactured. The reason everyone paid extra was for the extraordinary scent, which filled the New England homes. I bought 2 of these & neither of them give off any scent. Dollar store candles are better than these. Do Not  Buy

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: JackieK316
review: I absolutely love these candles and would burn this scent all year round but the two I just recently received don't smell at all when lit! An absolute waste of money if you ask me, and that's a shame because they are pretty expensive candles... üëéüèº

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Matt S.
review: This candle has a strong smell, but it's not overpowering. I burn this scent at Christmas time since I'm not a huge fan of sweeter scents like vanilla or Christmas cookie. This things burns clean and seems to last forever - I burned this for a few hours most days of the week during the holidays, and it's barely half used. It's also such a clean scent that you could easily use this outside of the holiday season. Unlike some customers, mine came packaged very well, and I didn't have any issues with breakage. All in all a great scent, whether for the holidays or year-round.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Joe Stewart
review: I bought similar candle in 2016 and enjoyed it almost two years in a row, periodically lighted it up to refresh hours with smell of the Cedar. However, the "new version" of "improved" candle has absolutely no smell, not even a bit. I would not recommend this product, may be look in the store where you can smell it first.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Donz
review: I've been using Yankee candles for 2 years, it's always reliable. But this time, the candle I got is strange. First, the smell is so so so weak compare to previous Yankee candles I've used. Second, there is heavy black smoke coming out of it when using. I stop using it because I am afraid the smoke will turn the white wall black. Maybe this batch is bad, or I got a fake product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: D. Chamberlain
review: The price was good... about what I pay when they are on sale locally... but... when it arrived the wax was up high surrounding the wick and had a large empty space down the side. I had to spend time using a sharp knife to cut up the wax and push it down into the empty area and to expose the wick enough to light it. Thankfully I was able to get it lit but it looks pretty cruddy. I'm hoping after it burns a few hours the wax will melt down into a pool of wax which no longer looks like chunky green sand. I will not be buying another.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Just a guy
review: Normally pretty happy with Yankee Candles however this one melted/resolidified during storage before shipping. Item arrived with all the wax formed along 1 side of the jar with the wick settled on the bottom.  I attempted to slowly melt the wax by placing the jar in hot water in hopes of salvaging the candle.  While I was successful in getting the wick, straightening it, and placing it to be useable...  the wax and scented oil apparently separated during my melting attempt and the candle has a very chemical smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Lexi
review: Bought everyone in family the same candle so everyone quarantined in their own homes  can enjoy the same scent at the same time. My way to try to "bring everyone together."  Although, I regret I didn't buy one for myself while on sale---stressing on unemployment and now TRUMP refuses to sign the Covid relief bill.  I would have SPLURGED and bought myself one now, today.....but Trump.....leaves Americans on unemployment hanging with no money in sight. Family loves the scent. The tree lot at Home Depot was torn down already.....no tree....no free clippings for the mantel for scent....no Christmas candle scent in home. WAAAAAAAA.  :(((((

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Alice
review: This is such a soothing and delightful scent!  It fills the home with the smell of evergreen and gets great compliments every time I light it.  I had one last year that I had gotten as a gift, so was very happy to find this scent again.  Reminds me of crisp fall days, winter snowy days, and even Christmas holidays.  A warm comforting scent that can be enjoyed in any home.  This candle is a good size and looks great on the counter. Highly recommended!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: JR
review: It looks nice, arrived in great shape, and is burning just fine, but the smell is hardly "balsam and fir." It smells like generic candle, as if someone showed a pile of paraffin wax what dollar store potpourri smelled like and told it to do its best impression. What's worse, after burning this potently bland candle for an hour, I ended up with a migraine. If this is "luxury," I'd rather live in squalor with my $3 candles from Michael's.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Tech Dad
review: I really wanted to have a holiday scent in my home since we have an artificial Christmas tree. I was weary of getting such a big candle in case I didn't like the scent but the price was really good for this size. I am thrilled with this candle. I burn it for multiple hours every day and there is still about 4 inches at the bottom left to burn. The scent is exactly what I wanted - like walking through a Christmas tree forest. LOVE IT.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Divebuff
review: This balsam and cedar candle emits a strong, pleasant smell that permeates my living area. Can't say much about the longevity as I haven't been counting the hours I have this lit but we are loving it. Just a warning about getting candles through amazon warehouse. I bought one at a discounted rate and it was marked "Used - Very good, like new" and was supposed to only have slight cosmetic imperfections at the top/sides of the product and wasn't in the original packaging. As it turns out, the candle I got was more than half-used. It smelled awesome though and I just put in an order for another one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: How am I supposed to light it?! It‚Äôs not even useable!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Beachbabe90710
review: This is my all time favorite holiday candle! We have a fake tree and this smells almost exactly as the real trees we used to buy! I love this scent sooooo much! Love the pine with a little sweet touch to is. Definitely lifts my Christmas Spirit! I literally buy one about every two years. I pull it out starting November and put back in at the end of Jan. I also light this a couple nights a week and it's usually at night time only. This definitely has lasted long!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Naanu Yaaru
review: First time yankee candle purchase. I recently got into candles and did lot of research to find out yankees are the best.  Got my first candle form amazon, and guess product arrived with cracked jar, got my refund, but was curios to smell the scent of this supposed to be the best scented jar candle from yankee famly. Totally disappointed, been burning since 3 days (few hours a day) and none of my family members are able to smell a bit of scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Shantanu
review: Burns unevenly. Most of the wax just burns through the center leaving a tunnel of wax outside left unburned. The scent is mediocre at best. I would recommend Bath and bodyworks candles over these ones just for better wax quality.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Kindle Customer
review: This can‚Äôt be a real Yankee Candle.  It‚Äôs smells terrible, as the jar is different than other genuine candles I‚Äôve purchased.  If the price is too good to be true, trust me it‚Äôs fake P.U. !!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Radio Writer
review: Way back when, Yankee released a Balsam scented candle which I loved.  Then they changed it to this combo of balsam and cedar.  The scent is okay, but it took me awhile to figure out why I was coughing a lot when this was burning.  Then it hit me:  they use cedar and balsam oils to get the scent ... and I'm quite allergic to cedar!  Had to quit using Old Spice deodorant because of allergies to the cedar oils (for the scent).  I quit burning this candle and the coughing cleared up in a few days. I'm now burning Christmas Cookie scent and no problems.  Just be advised.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: maribeth
review: no scent whatsoever unless you face plant in to the glass vessel. burned it for 8 hours and, ta da, NO fragrance

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Julie K.
review: I should have known that if I tried other brands of candles, I would be taking a risk.  They either don't smell nice, aren't strong enough, are too strong, or don't last!  Never again.  I'll stick with Yankee, especially for my all important Christmas tree smell!  This Balsam and Cedar is the one I prefer for the closest tree scent, now that I have an artificial tree.  It is the perfect scent - not too strong, not too weak, very fresh and natural.  Love it!!!  Will get one every year and gladly burn it until it's gone, which takes longer than any others!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: JeffthePlant
review: This has the label of the ‚Äúless expensive‚Äù Yankee Candle line that they make to sell through other stores, not the ‚Äúclassic‚Äù label on their in-store candles, so I didn‚Äôt expect it to be quite as nice as the ones you would buy directly from them. That being said, it‚Äôs a big candle for $15 that smells like a fir tree, which is exactly what I was expecting. I can smell it down the hall and it is lasting a while. My only complaint is that it gives off quite a big flame even after I trimmed the wick. I‚Äôve paid a lot more for some other candles that were very disappointing, so I‚Äôm happy with this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: WLPeck
review: A gentle scent which is not overpowering and burns slowly enough to last. Have been buying Yankee candles for years and always pleased. Once you‚Äôve tried Yankee brand, no others will be good enough. The value is in their longevity and true-to-life scents. Recommend for oneself or as gifts!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: J.K.
review: Every year for as long as I can remember, I splurge to get the Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar candle. The scents are always strong. Not this one. I couldn't believe it. The $3 supermarket pine candle I bought last week has way more scent than this. This is so unusual for yankee candle. I should have paid more attention to the other reviews. I could only faintly smell this candle when standing in front of it. I let it burn for an hour and there is very little scent. I'm going to buy from Yankee Candle directly and see if it's the same as this or the normal overpowering christmas tree scent it is supposed to be and that I love.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: MP
review: Every year around this time, I treat myself to a large Balsam & Cedar Yankee Candle. It is my absolute favorite scent. Last year, I didn't buy one, thinking that I could try different pine scents in my wax burner. I tried four.... yeah, four... different brands, and they smelled like bad cologne. I really can't describe it, but this scent is beautifully woodsy... but softer, sweeter.... it is the best.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: BHC
review: I have tons of yankee candles and this smell is so weak it‚Äôs like a cheap candle. Usually yankee scents are quite loud, especially this particular scent, but it smells like nothing. Beginning to wonder if their amazon candles are like defects or expired.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Barbara Butler
review: While I like the size, I am totally disappointed in the scent. I specifically bought this for Christmas and the Balsam Cedar Scent. I love those smells and expected my home to smell all cedary like a forest. I don't get any of that. When I buy citrus scented candles, I smell it right away. I have burned this candle for three hours now. I smell something, but not cedar. So, I am not very content with my purchase. I expected way more from the reviews and the company statement. I am giving a one star review due to my huge disappointment. I am sorry. I rarely give a one star review. If the seller gets back to me in a positive way I will alter my review. But for the moment I stand by my statement as fair and honest.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: DogMom
review: This is my favorite Yankee Candle scent! The Balsam & Cedar is so aromatic and not overwhelming at all! It truly has a fresh, forest-like scent that truly is perfect for indoor aroma! The price was amazing, too! I could not believe how inexpensive they were, and will definitely purchase again when they are on sale again! They make the perfect gift for friends and family! I very highly recommend this candle!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Valencia
review: This was an expensive candle and it has no aroma at all.  I burned it for more than 45 minutes.  Still can't smell it.  I won't be buying any more Yankee Candles.  Very disappointed.  Garbage.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: dabronx
review: Purchase (2) of the Balsam and  cedar candles and they arrived today. They were expensive,  but I counted on the Yankee Candle name to deliver as it always has in the past. The scent can only be smelled if I stand directly In  front of it. I was so excited happily waiting for them to arrive. I can only say this purchase will never be made again. I purchase Yankee candles  all the time and never had this problem: they must be old. One star was given for the scent I ordered , which, I love;  however this scent is mere wax burning -  nothing more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jo
review: Yankee candles were always my favorite‚Ä¶but I burned this for a couple hours and No Scent.. Never again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: John Olszewski
review: Received candle and it appeared that it had been near a source of heat. Bits of green wax on cover and the entire candle wax was not level with it's jar as if it had been stored at an angle and melted. Surface of candle had a white coating. Upon lighting was disappointed with very faint aroma of the balsam-cedar candle. Family members and friends pretty much had the same response, "that's a Yankee candle, what's the big deal with them?" I'll stick with glade or bath & body works candles in the future, better aroma and much better price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Purpledog
review: My absolute favorite scent from Yankee Candle but...living in MA, I can drive to YC and select my own (or make my own). Having found 'my' scent on Amazon at a discounted price by almost $8/jar candle, I bought 2 for the holidays. Extremely disappointed: hardly any scent unless I stick my nose into the unlit candle, the wicks are not centered on either one so they burn crooked and the wax pools so badly because of the crooked wick that even with rotating the candle countless times during the burning hours, it extinguishes the wick time and time again and still forms that carbon ball at the top of the wick. That causes a very high flame when next ignited so trimming is necessary. Just a huge disappointment. I'll burn them because returning them would cost more than the candles cost me initially, but never again. I'll stick to paying a little more for a much higher quality candle from Yankee Candle direct.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Mark
review: I used to buy yankee candles because they always smelled strong. This has changed over the past year. This is my third candle that I am disappointed with. No scent at all, just black smoke every time u light it that stains my ceiling. I am sad to say that I am done with Yankees candles. üôÅ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Darlene Quinn
review: I bought 2 large jars of Balsam and Cedar scent by Yankee Candle and I love it.  If I had gone by the negative reviews, I would be missing out on a wonderful, Christmassy scent.  I have one in my living room and one in my dining room and when I walk out of my home office into my hallway I can smell the scent right away.  So don't pay any attention to the reviews that say it doesn't have a scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Ericka DC
review: The media could not be loaded. It smells delicious, it only has one wick, not two, it is worth what it costs and the aroma is very well perceived.  I'll buy another in case they run out or not it's just as good

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: BostonProfessionalCouple
review: We've gotten into candles a lot, this second COVID winter. Most of them we've bought in person and been able to smell before buying. We bought 2 of these online - cedar and balsam are smells that we love so they seemed a safe bet. These smelled terrible though - any scent of cedar or balsam was overwhelmed by an indistinct sweetish perfumey smell, like a cheap bathroom soap or a car freshener.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: sandmaster
review: I used to love Yankee candles as they were well made.  The ones i recently ordered smell  great....but Yankee must've started using dollar store wicks, cause they just pour out black smoke.  At the beginning, in the middle  and I'm down to about two inches left in the jar, and still black smoke.  Wax melts clean from the jar, but good grief....these wicks are bad.  Yankee....what happened?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Rhoni
review: Who orders Balsam & Cedar for "light scent"? I usually get these from the Yankee store, but this year decided to order from Amazon. Seems like it was a big mistake. (Also I do not, nor have I had Covid) my kids tell me that I can smell crickets fart in Arizona & I live in Philly. This was such a disappointment. My house was ready for Christmas, but the entire affect was lost due to lack of what my house is supposed to smell like. I'll know better next time....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Believer50
review: I loved Yankee Candle but this is the second one I bought and both only sent out a waxy scent. No balsam smell at all. I was really disappointed. But had it on subscribe and save so a second one came before I could stop it. I understand now that the company was sold so the product may be different. But really at least a little scent of the fragrance should be possible as an expectation.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Michell
review: This candle smells so amazing. I burned it many times over a two month period so I feel like it lasted well. Always make sure to burn the candle long enough that the top layer is completely melted, otherwise it'll burn unevenly; you'll wind up with a tunnel burned down the center. Also, trim the wick down before every use. Since I've learned that, all my candles burn more evenly and I get much more use out of them. Hope that helps someone if they're having problems!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: beep h
review: Let me first say I DO NOT HAVE COVID and never have. This candle does not smell at all. I was soooo excited for the deal I was getting. 18 dollars for a large jar!! Unreal. And because I have had Yankee candles in the past and know how strong they usually are, I only bought one knowing it will smell up my entire house!! However, no smell. And I put my nose in the jar. NO SMELL!! Do not waste your money!!!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Ryan Winfield
review: The first 20 minutes or so of burning, the candle smells great and reminds you of pine and Christmas. Then after burning longer, the scent becomes pretty powerful, even in a large room. I'm familiar with Yankee Candle products and haven't had one that becomes overwhelming like this. BUT I will say, as long as you snuff it after 15-20 min of burning, it's a worthwhile product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Wendi Miller
review: Absolutely love this scent! I trimmed the wick to 1/4 inch each morning and burned the candle all day while working. Filled our home with the scent of Christmas. Lasted a full week, burning 12-14 hours per day!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Mary
review: This has very little fragrance.  Im really very disappointed as I bought for the Christmas season. I have another yankee candid I bought from Amazon.  The fragrance smells like cookies are literally cooking throughout our home. I just wouldn‚Äôt recommend if your looking for a balsam fragrance.  Couldn‚Äôt even smell directly in the room after burning for many hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Debby A
review: I ordered this particular candle because in the past it was very strong smelling. However I am sitting 6 feet away from it and smell nothing. I have to be a few inches away to smell it at all.  What went wrong with Yankee Candles?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: M. Cirka
review: You have to stand next to this candle while it‚Äôs lit in order to smell anything at all. I suspect that this could be a knock off with a Yankee Candle label stuck on it. If not then their quality seriously went down.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Chris G
review: We've been buying Yankee Candle's Balsam Cedar candle every year at Christmas for decades.  It started when we got our first artificial tree and still wanted that amazing balsam scent in the house.  This candle delivers.  While we have noticed that the strength of the scent has weakened over the years (hence 4 stars instead of 5), it's still enough scent for the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Kindle Customer
review: The media could not be loaded. My Yankee Candle is clearly defective!  Not full in areas of the candle.  Low quality.  Shame for selling without telling consumer it is a defective second!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: KA
review: This is my favorite scent from Yankee Candle. I ordered 2, one smelled like chemicals and the other had no scent unless you put your face up to the candle. Definitely not the quality I have always experienced when purchasing directly from Yankee. I would not purchase these again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Carmen Ellis
review: This is my favorite Yankee candle and I was so excited but after lighting it and burning it for a few hours there is no scent. Like nothing. This had to be old stock or something. Really disappointed..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Carol T
review: I wasn't going to write a review of this candle until I read an article about the reason that "WE" couldn't smell our new candles. Apparently, COVID is the reason. We can't smell it because we have lost our sense of smell. That's right "All of us who write these reviews". FYI, I have never had COVID! How can you explain that I can smell the litter box but not the candle? These candles are just a big paperweight and a waste of money! Don't buy Yankee anymore folks, the product is not up to par anymore.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: LisaMarie Nieves
review: I am very disappointed, I buy Yankee candles often. Though the delivery was very fast üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü There s no scent coming from the candle. It‚Äôs been burning for 6 hours, a day, and unfortunately I, and my family don‚Äôt smell the scent. I will be contacting the vendor. I know this isn‚Äôt their fault, by no means. I would hope, by contacting them, they will send me a replacement. Other than this unfortunate situation, Yankee Candles, by far are the best scented candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ficklepearl
review: I got an artificial tree this year and knew I would miss the scent of the tree so I bought this candle. Hoping it would offer a nice tree scent that wasn't artificial or too strong. My husband is super picky about scents, but he liked it!  I've burned the candle every day through the holidays and loved it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: winterfrost
review: There is absolutely nothing better than a Balsam & Cedar Yankee Candle anytime of the year...but it‚Äôs especially amazing during the Christmas holidays‚ù£Ô∏è I am not allowed to have a real tree in my apartment complex (independent senior living)...so I light this candle every evening to fill my apartment with the wonderful smell of pine üå≤

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ruthluk
review: As one who does not connect to strong smells, I bought this candle and it is perfect !! The room is full of a delicate and good scent of calm, highly recommended

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ccgirl
review: My husband is not exactly the candle type (HA!), but I put this on the kitchen counter, and he has been the one to light it nearly every time. He'll stand over it and give it a sniff before lighting. Great, fresh, outdoorsy scent; he's already telling me to get another one. (Hoping it goes on sale again--I caught a great price.)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: David L. Ellis
review: I bought this for my home office and am enjoying the scent.  It is quite strong, which I like but others may not, and it lasts even after the candle is snuffed out.  Consumption of the candle is slow, and I expect to get about thirty hours from it.  Overall, it is a very good choice for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: netta
review: Update: I let it burn about 10 minutes more and I‚Äôm finally getting some balsam scent!! I take back my 1 star and now give it 5. I literally bought this because we couldn‚Äôt have a real tree this year. So this is making me feel comforted. Thank you. Pretty bummed. Opened it up and sniffed and got excited. Lit it ... and there‚Äôs no smell. Not what I expect from yankee candle. I guess I should‚Äôve trusted the other reviews that mention the same issue. Not impressed y‚Äôall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: katt7482
review: I love Yankee candles but this one just didn't have a strong scent. I have burned it and also put it on a warmer and neither time has the scent filled my living room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ew
review: The scent is lovely but doesn‚Äôt seem as strong as Other Yankee candle items I have purchased direct from Yankee candle in Maine.it would fill the house in minutes. It was unexpected ‚Ä¶..also has one wick which if Memory serves me ,was changed to 2 at one point. Other than that I‚Äôd still buy yankee Candle items!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ess
review: I love this scent! It fills my bedroom and makes me feel like I'm in the woods. The scent lasts for a long time and is strong, but not overpowering. I will definitely buy this scent again for next winter. And if you follow the directions on burning the candle and trimming the wick then the candle wax won't tunnel.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Brooke Barton
review: Closet live tree scent I have ever tried without the tree mess! Smell lasts through every burn and doesn‚Äôt fade. Can‚Äôt beat the price. I was told by Yankee employees to burn for at least 1.5 hours to allow wax to burn out to glass edge to avoid ‚Äúwax pooling‚Äù creating a hole down the middle of your candle. Good advice for expensive candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: A. Mitchell
review: This candle reminds me of Christmas the moment I open it. If you're like me and have an artificial tree but long for that pine scent, you're going to love this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: A B
review: As others have said, this candle really lacks any scent when burned. You have to literally be on top of it to get anything. I have been VERY disappointed in Yankee Candles lately and will not be purchasing them any longer. The two fall ones I bought directly from their store had the same issue. Too expensive for this nonsense. Over it!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Big reese
review: This candle has a pleasant and not overwhelming scent. For those reviews that say it‚Äôs not long lasting if you remember to cut the wick down you‚Äôll get at least the listed hours. As far as the reviews showing melted candles, if you live in Phoenix you must order these in the winter months, not in July.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jackie
review: Finally a Yankee candle with that new fresh scent....it's been yrs since I have had a Yankee candle that actually smelled as strong as this one. Don't know why, for some reason they slowly got less and less fragrant. BUT, this one is FANTASTIC!! I will be buying more from this seller for sure!! Thank you!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Love 2 Shop
review: I bought this candle for the Christmas tree smell.  I'm not a fan of real trees but I absolutely love how real trees smell and these candles makes my home smell like I have a fresh cut Christmas tree.  The scent makes my home smell warm and cozy and puts my household in a more Christmassy feel.  The candle scent is light and not overpowering but strong yet subtle enough to be smelt though out the entire house.  One candle last for several hours and several uses.  The candle is a good price for the number of uses I will get.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: BlueFit_5591
review: I have been buying Yankee candles for years. Everyone knows they have a fairly strong scent that will fill the room. This candle barely smells at all. Complete waste of money in my opinion. I have never bought one on amazon so not sure if that‚Äôs why but I‚Äôm extremely disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: suzz
review: Ordered 2 of the exact same thing at the exact same time. One candle had a great scent that lasted most of the way thru the candle as it burned. The second one had very little scent. Not sure why.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Kindle Customer
review: I purchased a case of these candles for gifts for the holiday.  Package nicely for gift wrapping. However, the candle itself had no scent - non. Just the smell of flame.  I kept one for myself and then realized the poor quality, embarrassed to have distributed as gifts.  Wish I would have used mine before giving them out, I would have returned them. Terrible.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Tarachase
review: I bought this candle as a gift for a friend, and she loved it. The scent is very Christmas-y, which is what I was hoping for. I definitely recommend it. Also, got it at a great price on Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jacqueline Wehmeyer
review: This was my 4th Balsam & Cedar candle in just over a year. The three I bought in 2020 had a great scent as always. I finished the 3rd one & lite this one I received last month immediately. It has no scent. I have been burning it now for 3 weeks and the only time I can smell it is when I take the lid off. I am very disappointed I cannot smell this. And I do not have COVID as some news reports out their state that people have lost their smell due to COVID.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Emily Dickenson
review: Wondering if this is a real Yankee candle.  I recall their scent being stronger than what I got.  Will be purchasing other brands in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jon
review: This candle looks good.  When you open the lid it has a great christmasy smell so this engenders lots of hope that you will soon be sending the wonderful smell of the season through out your house.  But no... when you light the candle there is absolutely no smell what so ever.  Even if you sniff right over the candle... nothing.  Very disappointed.  Should have listened to the other reviews.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Buddy's mom
review: The candle left soot around the inside of the jar. I moved it thinking it must be in a draft. Apparently that wasn't it. It continued to occur.  However, the fragrance was why I had chosen to buy the candle. This was the scent I wanted in my living room. I was very happy with the scent.  Additionally the candle did not burn too rapidly. It lasted through Christmas and candle remains.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: David Beblo
review: I bought the Balsam & Cedar for the Christmas Season. It does smell nice when I walk past it but otherwise you'd never know that there was a lit candle in the room. My whole house is only 1084 square feet. I used to be able to smell a REAL Yankee Candle throughout the house. Not Anymore! Ever since Yankee Candle was sold their candles are no better than Dollar Tree candles. It's a shame.
