review: Ok so I blind bought this candle... Turns out I hate the smell of lilac. Besides that, candle burned evenly and had a very strong scent throw for the short time I had it lit before realizing I hated the scent. Scent is VERY strong. If you like lilac, go crazy man, not my cup of tea.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Anthony Carmine
review: I love the smell and formulation of this candle. The burn time is very stretched out and the aroma is very soothing, and comforting. I personally keep these in my bathrooms, because they match the aesthetic and the atmosphere of the room. Good quality wicks, long burn time, and an amazing, fresh scent. Highly recommended. This would also make a great gift. The smell is highly likeable!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Ashwin Shrestha
review: Yankee candle does last a long time and smell does not fade. But this smell was not for me - still recommend if you like the smell. Hard to tell if smell is good over the internet haha

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Jeanette Emmert
review: The smell of the roses in this candle are absolutely amazing. We gave this as a gift, and the recipient was so excited to get it because it is her favorite scent. Lovely

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: nallely arias
review: I love this scent I hVe 3 dogs in the house and they make stuff stink sometimes this candel drowns out the smell of my 3 dogs its good and not too strong lasted 2 weeks had it burning a long time every day though it smells like a garden of flowers love love love deff recommend for a gift ‚ù§

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Antonio J. Oliva
review: Yankee Candle's  Large Jar Candle in the Lilac Blossoms is a light aroma that does not overwhelm your senses. In the large size, I accept it to last a long time.  Spring is in the air.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: me
review: I love yankee candles but the smell of this lilac was not pleasing at all.  Yuck.  Hey, I normally enjoy the smell of lilac or I wouldn't have purchased it, but this one was a big no for me.  I suppose I could have gifted it but would have felt badly giving a candle that I thought smelled bad.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Cristina D.
review: I love the smell of roses but this candle was disappointing.  Not only did it not provide a beautiful rose aroma but the wick ended up not burning as long as it should have.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: John L. Cyr
review: Much to my horror, I found that the candle was leaving soot behind in every part of the house. I received a quote to remove the soot. $20,000! Someone please tell Jeff that the quality of his merchandise is going down, down down. As for the moon, I'd like to give this candle a free trip to the moon at the end of my foot.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Upset
review: Yankee candles are not the same anymore. They used to smell amazing and flow through your whole house, now you're lucky if you can smell a large candle burning in a 5x5 bathroom. I will not be buying Yankee candles ever again because the last two that I purchased had no smell whatsoever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: J. K. Vega
review: I was really looking forward to using this candle. I guess sitting in a HOT Delivery Truck not a good idea. The candle must have been laying on it's side because the wax was melted to the top of the candle lid. The wick isn't even visible.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: WolfMother
review: Candles seem to have been stored well; packaging all paper materials. Love love love Yankee Lavender scent. Haven't been able to find on Yankee site, so thank you Amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: MakenzieSargent
review: It smells like literal rose petal and I don't mean the metaphorical one or the prefume-ish smells it gave me a headache. But if you want the inside to smell like dirt or outside this is for you. It's not the candles fault I didn't like it though. I just expected something different.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Jason Nussbaum
review: Candle isn't even halfway burned and the wick won't stay lit anymore. Absolute joke of a product. Won't ever buy another commercially made candle again. Etsy here I come.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: NANCE
review: My candle arrived in 1 piece.  The scent is not as fragrant as I expected.  What was really disappointing was the color.  On the website the picture shows the candle as a vibrant lavender color.  My candle was much more muted.  Since I got it at a great price, I am not going to return it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: nully6n
review: This doesn‚Äôt have a very good lavender scent. It doesn‚Äôt smell like lavender

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: NerveBane
review: I bought two Yankee candles, Lilac Blossoms and Midnight Jasmine.  Both smell lovely but glass jar on the Jasmine arrived broken so I am only giving this one two stars. I was able to glue the pieces back on so at least it wasn't wasted. The Lilacs smell just like the flower but the Jasmine smells more like patchouli to me, still a lovely smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Christie Garcia
review: Only thing I didn‚Äôt like got price you can‚Äôt get the wick cut like you do in the store‚Äôs it makes difference however you can buy ur own cutter from Yankee candle store‚Äôs!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: ljvirgo
review: I love the quality that Yankee candles still produces for their candles, and love the scent - it is very soft, not flowery, just wonderful.  Price on Amazon is better than the sale prices I have seen.  Glad to be able to get it here.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: LK
review: As I‚Äôve found with another Yankee candle that I ordered, the initial smell is absolutely amazing. This one is sweet and very clean smelling, but not overly sweet. Unfortunately they don‚Äôt burn very evenly, and the throw isn‚Äôt very good with this particular candle. If I want it to burn evenly, I‚Äôve got to burn it the entire day, and even then I really can‚Äôt smell it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Sue-Ann Dunlop
review: I love the smell of beautiful lilac flowers.  If you like lilacs, you won't like this!  It had an extremely strong, harsh perfume odor that was very irritating.  So irritating that when I held it up to open and smell it, I recoiled and accidentally dropped and smashed the glass container.  What a waste of money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: J-Mac
review: I used to be a HUGE yankee candle fan! Maybe this one wasnt made up of the same chemicals/wax ingredients but even my boyfriend asked me send this back. We were looking for something to replace our constant flow of Bath and Body Works candles but we wont buy this again. Barely any scent - if at all - and still just as pricey as BB&W. Not worth it honestly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: DeAnne
review: This arrived in Colombia broken.  I explained and was told by Yankee Candle to return.  It was shattered glass and I had tossed it.  They replaced but charged me for the new item PLUS $7 shipping (original order was free shipping) so no more Yankee Candle orders for me!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Roni B
review: I LOVE YANKEE CANDLES!  The scent is always strong enough to fill a room and they last as stated.  Especially like the jar candle so you can snuff it out just by putting the lid back on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: MAWUTZ
review: Great smell

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Maria Bradham
review: I love yankee candles , my house is filled with candles, I NEVER experience any problems with them until now.  I was ready to light my gorgeous lavender candle and guess what no WICK.  I tried to dig a little, but there is no WICK PLEASE send me a replacement ASAP

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: CJ
review: The item they sent me was already used. Wick was already burned and wax showed signs of having already been melted. Scent is very strong. Was going to be a gift but not going to give anybody something that's obviously already been used!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: JoJo
review: This candle has hardly no scent. It's a ridiculously priced candle that I can buy a long lasting candle in a dollar store for a dollar. Never again will I buy a Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: CatLady
review: I love the scent of lilac‚Äôs & this candle did not disappoint. I will definitely be purchasing more in the future!!  Strongly recommend for other lilac lovers.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: kccbkdna
review: The first candle was used. The lavender scent is very light and barely detectable. Very disappointed. I also ordered a vanilla candle 2 weeks ago. It still hasn‚Äôt arrived. .

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Jeff
review: It is a nice candle and lasts a decent amount of time, but I was expecting a lighter scent than what it has. Some might like it, but it's too strong for me - almost a sweet smell. I definitely would not use it in a small room. The smell would be overwhelming. I would use it in larger spaces only.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Tom M.
review: This Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Lilac Blossoms has a very strong and lasting good smell and lingering in room for a long time.  I don't have a good nose but I can smell good aroma from this candle so this must be good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Faith Moddrell
review: We love the Yankee candles and their strong scent. The company no longer offers our favorite scent Beach Walk, so I thought I would try Amazon. The candle looks like the ones from Yankee Candle. But, when it is lit even for long periods there is really no scent. I am disappointed and will not buy it again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Patricia
review: Great customer service.  Instantly!  I‚Äôll buy my candles from them from here on out.  Customer service is sometimes more important than the product.  But they also sell YANKEE CANDLES!  My fav!  Thanks for helping me with my questions and concerns. You put my worries to rest

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Charles
review: This is my first Yankee Candle purchase and I'm very happy with the purchase.  It looks great smells great and burns nicely.  No wick issues or deformities in the wax like some of the pictures I saw in the reviews.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Franco
review: Strong scent and every guest that I had in my house loved the scent, I never pay regular price for this tho, always 10-15 max They last a long time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Robert Wilson
review: so far with burning for most of a day the scent is a little on the soft side compared to most candles the Burn down rate is real good and shows that this one is going to have a long burn life in it would recommend them as a buy if on sale!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: ljvirgo
review: When these are on sale, I always pick up a few.  The Yankee Lilac is by far the most natural lilac scent I have enjoyed.  There was a soy candle that once came close, but the constancy of Yankee makes it my go to for classic lilac.  I can't stand the complicated sweet, or 'air', or layered beach night.  I want a simpler truer scent and that is what I get here.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: mommy1
review: I haven't bought Yankee Candles in years because I thought they smoked too much, so I decided to try them again after reading about this scent in a magazine.  I would have rated it a little lower because it still smokes even if you trim the wick, but I really love the scent. It's a nice fresh and sweet fragrant smell that will suit any room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Michelle Singh
review: I gave my mom this candle for Mother‚Äôs Day as a gift. She likes scented candles and the Yankee Candle store. I thought of the Pink Sands from the beach from the calendar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Regina Chappell
review: It has a beautiful scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Suzanne-Marie
review: This candle has a lovely, true-rose scent and Yankee is one of the few that I've been able to find, lately, still offering some of the true-flower scents. A party candle company from which I used to buy has just about done away with all of their true-flower scents (I preferred theirs to any others, but since they no longer offer, it's a moot point!), so finding this available on good-ol'-Amazon, was nice for me...The scent is fairly strong (which I like) when the candle is burning and the candle color is a pretty, classic tea rose flower pink (not garish "bubble gum pink", thankfully wouldn't have bought!)...I like it all around, just fine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Mrs P
review: I used to love Yankee Candles and bought them regularly because of their wonderful scent. I could smell them all over my house when I burned one.  However, over the past couple of years they have changed their formula and you can barely smell anything.  Regrettably, this was the case with this candle.  Unless you're standing right next to it you will not be able to discern any measurably throw in your area.  Not worth the money and I will, sadly, not buy any of their candles again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: SimpleeSonya
review: Highly disappointed in this product! I‚Äôve burnt Yankee Candles before and have never had an experience like this...  There‚Äôs constant black smoking coming from the wick when lit (no matter how many times and how short I trim it).  Also, the flame from the wick is easily about 4 inches tall and at least two inches outside the top of the jar.  I honestly can‚Äôt even leave the room for 1 minute when it‚Äôs lit because I‚Äôm afraid somehow a fire will start.  This purchase is definitely among my top worst Amazon purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Bethany Phillips
review: Fantastic candle, last so much longer than cheaper ones from other brands. Great scent for year round, summery, and clean but cozy at the same time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: V. LaBore
review: This is another of my favorite scents with this company. It can be a bit powerful but still such a nice sweet and fresh scent to have in the house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: REREE
review: So disappointed with this purchase. This is my favorite candle scent.  I've bought this candle several times from the store. Almost immediately you can smell the scent coming off the candle.  This time there is almost no scent what so ever.  I burned it for hours and still it is so faint,  if anything at all.  Must be defective or something. Something is definitely wrong. Waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: MommaB57
review: Busted glass . So disappointed in delivery I doubt it was broken when it left the warehouse. I thought I accidentally ordered something else because of the jingling Do not put in bigger boxes ! The other arrived just fine

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: RescueFarm
review: The driver delivered about 10 minutes ago.  I mistakenly said ‚Äúarrived in the mail‚Äù in the video.  It has a nice scent,  but melted without a visible wick, it can‚Äôt be used.  Would like a refund.  Other similar candles were fine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Ian
review: It's really upsetting that it's broken. The glass is everywhere. I just did my surgery, and I wanted candles to relax. But it seems impossible. I also got my fingers cut because of the glass. I don't want to go to the store to return them, I can't really move and I don't feel safe to go to public area. Really sad, hope someone can help.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: B. Griffith
review: I‚Äôm now hooked on the scent of lilacs, and this is the best candle to make a room smell so good. The scent is much stronger than other brands.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Christine K.
review: Scent is not too strong for those sensitive to smells. However it does smell great and I wish the smell was stronger! It takes a while for an entire living room in an apartment to smell like the candle scent, so this may be perfect for those who dislikes strong scents

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Sundai L.
review: Spring is always in the air when you have a Yankee Candle lilac scented candle. I live in a small cottage and the lilac scent fills the entire house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Buckley
review: This scent is not their best.  Bought it because of great reviews. But, if you don‚Äôt don‚Äôt like any flowery or sweet smells, this one may be for you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: P. kashyap
review: I ordered once and liked the scent and longevity - so subscribed to it. Alas, this candle is not as fragrant as the last one. Is it possible that once you subscribe, Amazon starts sending Chinese counterfeit products or maybe this one is past expiration date... do candles have an expiration date??

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Paulina M.
review: I loved this candle, it smelled wonderful. Lilacs are one of my favorite flowers because they smell so good. I will definitely buy more of these

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Ena Mina Dika
review: Smell is what exactly I though but it's not strong enough. I used to get honey suckle which is my favorite smell among these and the smell used to be strong but couldn't find any. I took one star off because of the light smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: SonicSweeti
review: I was wary at first buying a Yankee candle from Amazon.... but it's exactly like buying it from the store! Strong scent, arrived just fine, very happy! :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Karen
review: My grandmother had a huge lilac bush in her yard. The color and the smell was so sweet.  This candle reminds me of fun times at her house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Sdamazon
review: Although the candle smells nice-the glass bottle top got hot enough to crack and break leaving jagged edges when the candle was being used

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: TechieGal
review: I purchase this candle after seeing so many positive reviews but sadly I‚Äôm not a fan of the smell, it‚Äôs a little too sweet and fruity for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Kim
review: This candle fills the room with a beautiful rose scent that is not overwhelming. I have medical conditions that cause problems when I‚Äôm around heavily scented perfumes and candles but that was perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: christine2010
review: I absolutely love the fragrance.  It actually smells just like lilac, and brings back childhood memories.  I will definitely be purchasing this product again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Marie
review: This was disappointing. I bought the same candle and a different retailer and fell in love with the smell. This one I ordered didn't provide any smell. Very disappointing.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Dan Parnell
review: What can I say about this candle?  It‚Äôs not edible, but you‚Äôll wish it was.  The room is filled immediately with the scent of a fresh baked blueberry pie, and that‚Äôs before you even light it.  Once it‚Äôs going, your neighbors will complain to the HOA about your baking wafting through the neighborhood and you didn‚Äôt offer them any.  You will get a sudden craving for sugary desserts.  You will consider having a little sip of the hot wax just to be sure it‚Äôs not edible (don‚Äôt; it isn‚Äôt).  You will go to the grocery store with the intent to buy ingredients to make a blueberry pie, and you will leave with a $250 bill because the candle made you so hungry you buy every carb-laden pastry in the bread aisle and bakery.  Then you will have a fire in your kitchen because you don‚Äôt actually know how to bake, and did not know Tupperware was not oven-safe.  Fortunately, this candle will cover up the smell of the smoldering plastic and the fact you didn‚Äôt know flour and baking powder were different things.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: EJL
review: I am extremely disappointed in this candle! Not sure how it got so many good reviews! I love the smell of coffee and the coffee scented candle i usually buy is so expensive so after reading reviews I decided to get this one. The ONLY time this candle smells good is when you smell it directly when its unlit! There is literally no smell from this candle when it‚Äôs burning! I definitely will not be buying this candle or any candle from this seller again! Sorry to the seller for the bad review but I‚Äôm just being honest!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Norm
review: Cinnamon Roll...what Cinnamon Roll!? I do not write reviews often..you can count them on one hand. It is not in my interest to besmirch a Company, I'm sure they produce some good candles...but thought I would save an unsuspecting consumer money and afford some friendly advice to those who are considering purchasing this candle in particular - don't! Unless of course your enjoy the scent of plain candle wax - I believe some more work in the lab is required before this particular candle smells like you've just walked into a Cinnabon. Invariably, I had to dispose of the candle...gave it a chance though, but the wife could no longer tolerate it...too bad, I liked the fact that it was made in the USA.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Robert & Joenett√©
review: This candle smells so amazing! One wick so it doesn't burn down too fast.  Smells like someone is baking a pie in the house. Quality candle. Worth the money.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Mederry
review: I was looking for the traditional and original scented candles and trust me I found it. WOW!!!! I am still amazed by the scent. Thank you for all the little attentions in the packaging. Beautiful!! Please keep on doing what you do! Have a blessed week!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: amanda b.
review: I was actually just about to buy a candle from Bath and Body Works because I was on the hunt for a yummy smelling candle.... at the last minute I thought I‚Äôd look on amazon and see if I could find a better deal. Glad I did! This candle came a day after ordering it, arrived in perfect condition and smells amazing! I will be ordering more for SURE! All the scents sound so yummy.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Mary Harris
review: Believe the reviews that say there isn‚Äôt much of a scent. There really isn‚Äôt! I was really looking forward to getting this candle and I don‚Äôt like to spend a lot on candles because why burn extra money when you don‚Äôt have to? So $15 was a lot for me to spend on a candle. It‚Äôs probably the weakest smelling scented candle I‚Äôve ever received!! It has the faintest smell of cinnamon, and that‚Äôs only if you get really close to it. It definitely won‚Äôt even make a small room smell good. There is a reason why this particular scent is on sale, trust me. Even on sale, $15 is way too much for a candle you can barely smell! Very disappointing, especially when you‚Äôre trying to bring in holiday cheer!!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Kris D
review: This was a really cute candle and I like the idea of buying from a smaller company, but it is not a quality product. As you can see it barely burns, and there is not much of a scent. I got the pumpkin pie for Thanksgiving and it smells nice right after you blow it out, but when it's burning it has very little scent. I probably will try another company in the future.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Georgette Gerics
review: Not happy how these candles burned..... wick burned unevenly and much of the candle was wasted.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Dihjet
review: I lit the pumpkin pie candle about an hour ago. Honestly, I was really looking forward to that smell especially now being quarantined since March .... felt it would make me feel happier during holidays. I didn't read the reviews before I ordered - just thought: Okay, healthier candles!  soy wax! better especially, especially with health issues. But sadly, after an hour, its just starting to smell like something - maybe a muffin.... but not like I've smelled other "pumpkin" candles in the past. For the price, I expected more. THough it comes nicely packaged - boxed for safety - and I had high expectations. I don't want to try the other one I purchased which is another flavor because it was supposed to be a gift. I really wanted to like this product and figured I found something great and new. :( Now - after 2 hours I have to put it out. It filled the air with a burnt smell and I can't take it. Sorry this didn't work out for me.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Amazon Customer
review: Candle keeps going out. I‚Äôve lit it many times and continues to go out on me. From what I can tell the scent is very light and not as strong as stated by other buyers. I am very dissatisfied and was hoping for a nice candle.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: noelle gonzalez
review: I purchased this candle so that my apartment (which is not too big) can be full of pumpkin pie fall vibes and was left disappointed. First, the candle advertised that it was eight ounces, but upon arrival it appeared to be the same size as the 3.4 ounce Glade candle I had just gotten rid of. Second, the wick is short and both times that I lit the candle the wick burnt out on its own within an hour. Third, I cant smell this candle at all. Just a total waste. The packaging is cute and homey, but everything else was a fail. :(

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: starsigma
review: I truly love the scent of this candle. I was looking for cinnamon scented candles to get rid of the view ants around my desk. But this has just been great to light on my desk. Especially during a time of working from home it just has a nice aroma. Will look at this brand again when considering a new candle. Just got it recently and have been sticking to the only burning for 3 hours at a time and it has not used up to much. So I think it it will last a little while as well.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Elizabeth M.
review: As many other reviewers have noticed, there is zero scent when lit. When I first unscrewed the lid on each of the three different candles I purchased there was a nice scent. I purchased Banana Bread, Pumpkin Pie and Snickerdoodle and the packaging is lovely. The scent when I literally put my nose in the glass container was on the mark for all three candles but once lit.....NOTHING! Very disappointing.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Michael Nelson
review: The scent has my neighbors thinking I'm hiding fresh-baked cookies! The jar should be wider for easy re-lighting. There are no toxic fumes since it's soy-based. I will buy more, but not as much as I would if the container design was different. The part where you have to find something to stick into the jar to light the wick takes away from the joy of watching the neighbors looking for cookies!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Stephanie
review: Got this candle for my good friend who at the time, recently helped my father out.  I made her a gift bag with goodies as a thank you.  Her favorite dessert is brownies, homeade not store bought.  Also one of her favorite smells from childhood.  She loves it and couldnt believe I found her a brownie candle.  Have bought several and love each one.  Burns slow and the aroma is amazing!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Sandra LaPlante
review: The best thing I can say about this purchase is that the seller fulfilled the shipment quickly, accurately and it was well packaged. The product itself was a real bust! They do not smell anything like what they are supposed to, in fact there is very little scent at all! With that said, what fragrance that is there is very faint and clean, it‚Äôs a pleasant smell but I would struggle to call this a scented candle at all. They last as long as you would expect for a small candle and they burn clean but I would never buy these again when I‚Äôm looking for a candle to project a fragrance into a room.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Tessa Valone
review: This candle smells so delicious. I bought this as a gift for someone who loves sweet rolls, and she said it smelled so much like them that she wanted to go buy some sweet rolls to eat before she burned it next because the candle smelled so good. If you like sweet rolls, you have to get this candle! The seller was also really courteous, and they even sent a personalized message to my email to give instructions on how to burn the candle most effectively. It made me so happy to support a smaller seller, and I would buy from them again and again.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: W. C. Beaton
review: I appreciated the seller sending tips about care of the candle prior to receiving the item.  The item came in a timely basis.  It is a nice scent - I light it first thing every morning to brighten my day. Nancy B

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Amazon Customer
review: I had to send this back twice.  Each time it burnt for about 45 minutes and then the wick stopped working. I‚Äôm well aware that I have to clip the wick and I have done that on both of the candles and I‚Äôve sent back.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Austin Lautenbach
review: I rarely if ever write amazon reviews but this is likely one of my most disappointing items I've ever purchased. I recently ran out of my B&BW 20oz pumpkin candle which I loved, but I thought I'd try a smaller brand for a change. I was very disappointed for the following reasons: - the candle lacks any scent other than a faint smoke. I used it in a small 8x10 room with no external windows opened and I was unable to smell any difference at all, even from 2 feet away - the candle does not burn effectively and went out on me multiple times. I followed the lighting instructions to the T meaning cutting the wick to the correct length, cleaning out any debris, and always burning within the reccomended time limit. I still had it go out multiple times - this candle has severe tunneling issues. I think the wick might be too small for the diameter of the jar, because my candle melted out the inside only and left thick wax walls around the edges. Again, this was all while following the correct use instructions - the candle is tiny for its price. I realize it is listed as 8oz so I was expecting it to be small, but in light of the other problems listed above this seems an unacceptable price to size ratio. You can easily get 18 or 20 oz candles on this site that are better. Overall, I am disappointed and would not recommend this product to anyone. You're probably better off burning a generic unscented wax candle as it will give you the same effect and probably won't go out as much.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Alex
review: This candle smells SO. INCREDIBLE. I got the Blueberry Pie scent and oh my gosh I just want to have it lit all the time, but also not because I want it to last forever!!! I cannot wait to buy more candles and try out different scents because I definitely will be a returning customer. The candle came fast, packaged safely and securely, and you‚Äôre buying from a small family owned business! Honestly what could be better??? 10/10 recommended!!!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Chey
review: This candle smells sooo good !! And it was packaged good. And they emailed me instructions on how to get the perfect burn every time and I‚Äôve been following them each time I light it. It makes my whole house smell amazing and every compliments it I will be getting one for my mama.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Jay
review: I really wanted to like this candle, especially with all the positive reviews. Maybe they changed their formula because the candle that I received had little to no scent at all. I really like the sugar cookie smell but this candle is a poor representation of it.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Book Smart
review: The scent as pleasant. The jar is cute. I had purchased several for gifts, so after having to throw out the first one because it wouldn't burn for longer than a few minutes, I used a second to make sure the product wasn't defective. It was obvious that the wick was the problem after excavating the wax to no good affect. The next one burned fine, but really fast. They're pretty expensive for the quality so I probably won't buy these again.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: rozann martin
review: Candles burned quickly, very little scent and tops of jars turned black with soot. I trimmed candles as instructed Frankly I believe I should be refunded my money. Walmart candles are better than these and I buy a lot of candles. I bought them with a gift card from my son for my 87th bday. He would be very dissapointed

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: M&C
review: It's a well made candle that burns for a long time without using up too much wick. And the size is good. But it's not my idea of a gingerbread scent. It smells like refrigerator cinnamon rolls to be exact. Kind of a cheap smell to me...but if you like that smell without having anything to eat with it then this could be the candle for you. Pretty disappointed cuz I love the smell of real gingerbread.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Heidi
review: Product does not smell like pumpkin pie.  In fact it does not really have any scent to it.  The company was really great about sending me a replacement candle.  I think the first 1 I got was just short on scent.  I love that these candles are in mason jars!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Bonnie Lemaster
review: WOW! OH WOW!!!! The scents are spot on. I'm burning the blueberry pie again, right now and the apple pie again in the kitchen. These are THE BEST candles I've ever lit, and I am a big fan of candles. Treat yourself! Whichever dessert you like best (Gingerbread, Apple Pie, Blueberry etc) know that the associated candle smells exactly like it's baking in the oven! Really delicious! Smells wonderful!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Amazon Customer
review: I disliked this product because it did NOT produce the aroma as promised and the wick barely lit, usually becoming sunk into the soft wax. I complained on my Amazon feedback but I don't think this company reads the reviews. I tried to get # for customer service too discuss this but alas, no number. VERY DISAPPOINTING!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: OGirl
review: First off I do not like to get reviews that make one question a product, but I will only leave my honest opinion of a product. These are cute candles, great packaging, they smell amazing. With that being said there was no smell when I burned it. I had it in a bathroom with the door shut. They are also very small of the price. Others have said the aroma is great. That was not my case.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Mary
review: Nice, even, slow burn‚Äî but not even a smidgen of blueberry scent.  I have burned this candle for 3 hrs , so there is an ample wax pool.  I happen to like the clear glass jar, because the flame is so pretty.  But if I want a scent, I will have to use a companion candle.  But I do wonder why there are such differing experiences posted here about the presence/absence of aroma.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Brian
review: Candle smells phenomenal. The other reviews are true, you will want to bake cookies, you will think someone is baking treats in your home, but regardless your home will smell amazing. Have tried blueberry and snickerdoodle and after loving those so much, I ordered apple pie and gingerbread cookie.. Blueberry is by far the most amazing, but all are great. Note I live outside of Phoenix, AZ and it‚Äôs mid July.. So far candles have been packaged in a way they stay fine also which is awesome!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Cam
review: Absolutely love these candles! I've already ordered several more after my first purchase, and I've added them to my Subscribe and Save. Clean burning. long lasting, and the right amount of scent. Favorites so far are Blueberry Pie and Fresh Coffee. The Banana Nut Bread is good as well. I will be trying others soon.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Luisa
review: My apple pie candle came very well packaged and with some really cute cooking grandma stickers. Although I‚Äôm an adult, I still get excited about stickers. Aside from that, the candle puts off a strong scent that makes my house smell as delicious as Hobby Lobby or Kirklands in the Fall. I highly recommend this candle!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Lorie
review: This is by far the most deliciously scented candle I've found in several years of searching. A close friend had a candle business until she became ill and since her business closing, I've not found any brand that claims to be homemade that carried a pleasant scent that filled several open rooms. Hope this brand stays around for a long time, they are worth every penny. Thank you for making a quality product.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Barbs

author: Be Happy
review: I was really disappointed with the candle. I could hardly smell it even when I took the lid off.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Courtney G
review: I am very disappointed in this candle.  I have been buying authentic Yankee Candles for 20+ years and I‚Äôve never had such a low quality dud. This candle had no scent and the wick burned so quickly that I had to dump out wax so the flame would stay lit.  Even after dumping out wax, the wick burned unusually fast (for a Yankee candle). I went out and bought a comparable Yankee Candle from a reputable, authorized dealer and the difference was night and day. The candle I purchased from the dealer was exactly what I was used to seeing in a real Yankee Candle. I have a feeling this was a fake Yankee candle, but have no way of proving it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Talia O
review: The scent is amazing, but I remember being able to smell one yankee candle through the entire house. I don‚Äôt know if the formula has changed recently but the scent remains in the room. I miss the strong smell of yankee carrying throughout the house. I‚Äôm a little let down with the strength. The scent is amazing besides that fact.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nicole
review: I don't think it's an authentic Yankee candle. I've bought this sent before at a Yankee store, and what I bought on Amazon isn't the same quality. What i bought on Amazon has no smell while burning. And Yankee candles are known for their scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Buyer beware!!!! Bad bad product!!!! No scent....none not even a whiff...second time this has occurred. Obviously Yankee Candle has instituted a cost reduction by not including the scents in this candle.And since I used part of it Amazon has no means for getting a refund!!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Madsome
review: I love Yankee Candles but are these coming from an old storage? Smelled funny and it was melted. Will be returning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: jason h.
review: i bought 3 of these for a christmas present for my girlfriend. there is NO smell at all when burning them. this is her favorite candle so we know the difference. there is a 2 month wait for a replacement which i find unacceptable .  i'm not sure if these are defective or a fake item. very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: mjjunie
review: I absolutely love this scent. It's not overwhelmingly sweet and still smells clean in the room. I took a chance on purchasing this here and am very disappointed by the packaging. The jar was simply placed in the box with another item and not surprisingly, was shattered upon arrival. When I picked up the box, I could hear the glass moving around. Unless I completely break off the remaining glass, I can't use this candle as is. And the broken jar is shattered in a way that I could not melt it down without great effort to avoid overspill or ruin a pot specifically to try to save the candle. A simple layer of bubble wrap may have saved it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: gardenmom
review: It‚Äôs such a light fragrance you barely smell it. I ended up choosing my Woodwick candles all the time instead. Not recommended.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Psalm 144 1-2
review: After reading the reviews I was reluctant to order but decided to give it a try. First time ordering a candle online, fall is our favorite time of year so I chose, autumn wreath. It arrived in 2 days (thanks prime), sealed in a cardboard container with more than enough packaging, all in one piece. Even though it‚Äôs hot here in Florida the candle didn‚Äôt melt so way to go!! The smell is a perfect blend of clove, leaves and a hint of allspice. Not over powering just right. My mom happened to be visiting when the package arrived. She has a very sensitive nose yet she loved it so much I‚Äôm now ordering her one. My husband also loves it, he‚Äôs from the Blue Ridge Mountains and said the scent reminds him of autumn up there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lori
review: Candle came melted all to one side, scent oil leaked out. Not useable. Going to try and heat up and see if it can be redistributed.  Not sure i will get the wick though. Very disappointing for the cost. Even if i can use it most of the scent leaked out. Don't buy online!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Will W
review: Just like all the other reviewers....these have little to no scent....very disappointing...But its not just Amazon's Yankee Candles...Because of a recent sale, I have recently ordered from 3 well known online stores...ALL OF THE YANKEE CANDLES are the same...Little to no throw of scent, and I purchased 8 different scents...Some of you might not know, but most YC stores will let you exchange your candles for other kinds for free, even if they are used...I plan on visiting a retail store soon and doing just that...My advice though, is to stay far away from Yankee candles, they are no longer worth the money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kyle H
review: During pretty much any time of year I'm burning candles. I've burned cheaper ones like "American home" or "village candle" and I've burned nicer one's like "yankee" or "kringle". The cheaper candles are always faster burning and less fragrant. It's worth it to get a decent candle. Unless you REALLY want a specific (usually seasonal) scent, don't pay more than around 18$ for one of these. I've seen a bunch on here for like 25$+ and at that cost you're better off ordering kringle or some "artisan" brand. For 18ish bucks this candle is fantastic. This specific scent has lasted longer than some others, in that everyday I light it I can still smell it despite burning it for a week. Your nose and sense of smell is logarithmic (like your other senses) and after you have been exposed to the same smell for long enough, your brain stops recognizing it as unique and potent to your environment. It helps to buy several scents and rotate between them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mindy
review: I'm not sure why, but I've noticed the Yankee candle scene vary greatly in price from time to time. I've started watching to see which ones are lower (as much as half off) and trying different scents when I catch them at the sale price. This one had a wonderful scent, cinnamon was quite prevalent. The candle burned evenly and provided many hours of enjoyment. Yankee candies are typically very good quality and this one was no exception. I will definitely purchase again, even at regular price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Emily S
review: Nope. This is definitely a knock off and not a good one. The top is bubbled. The smell actually kind of hurts and is not at all like a real Yankee Candle. Spend the extra money at the Yankee Store. This is a total waste. Maybe the seller has good intentions but somewhere along the way they also got hosed because this isn‚Äôt a Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cher
review: I‚Äôve always been a Yankee candle fan, until recently. The quality isnt what it used to be. I received a candle today and was shocked when I took the top off of the candle. It had mold on the top. At first I thought it was just air bubbles, but after getting a magnifying glass out and looking at it, it is definitely mold. I called customer service and they said I may have to return it for my refund. Which means I have to take it across town to the UPS store to return it. I was sold faulty merchandise and it should not be my responsibility to take care of a bad product. Beside the mold issues, which is enough, it barely had a scent. It may smell stronger once it is burning, but there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm burning this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Karina-Oh!
review: It's worth the effort to always see what Amazon Warehouse has in stock before you buy your item. I've gotten in the habit of doing this when I'm looking for a Yankee Candle. I found a Spiced Pumpkin large jar candle just a couple of days ago that was reduced to $13.39. So I decided to give it a shot. All of my past experiences have been good and this one was no exception! It arrived 1 full day early & it was very carefully packed. Upon opening, the jar was in excellent condition. Everything about the candle is authentic Yankee quality. However, when I removed the glass lid I saw that the wick was slightly singed, yet none of the wax surrounding it had been melted. Sort of like it had been lit and immediately blown out. It wasn't intended to be a gift; but if it was it wasn't giftable, so I rated it only 1 star for that category. I lit my candle and in a few seconds, no one was the wiser, lol... This candle currently costs $24.97 brand new on Amazon. I can live with the savings of $11.58, though. It pays to check the Amazon Warehouse from time to time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nancy S.
review: It is a Yankee candle, came in a Yankee Candle box in one piece. Smells good before lighting it. But, it appears that during production the wax was old or something as there are a lot of what appears to be air bubbles through out the wax in the jar. Since its not a gift I went ahead and lit the wick. It is a faint scent, smells good, but hardly able to smell it unless I'm right up on the candle. I like candles to smell strong enough to fill my living room with scent. I wont purchase this again as not worth the money spent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Michele F
review: I have been buying Yankee Candles for years. My favorite is Macintosh apple. When I saw this scent, I decided to try it. Initially the scent was wonderful, my whole place smelled like someone was baking with cinnamon. I thought I had found a new favorite. Fast forward a couple of weeks. Once the candle had burned down about an inch, all of the scent disappeared. I am so disappointed. I have practically a whole candle that has no aroma. I've never experienced this with a Yankee Candle before, however I've read many reviews from people who have experienced a similar issue with other scents. If you're looking for a long lasting candle with a nice scent, steer clear of sugared cinnamon apple.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Trish
review: I was a little concerned when I read the reviews AFTER I ordered this candle.  Being from the Northeast, I have been using Yankee Candles for a few decades and fancy myself as somewhat if an expert on the subject. This candle did not disappoint! The scent is pleasant and just as strong as any Yankee candle that I have gotten in the past.  The candle arrived unbroken and packed well.  Shipping was faster than initially stated.  The price was AMAZING and I will definitely be buying more!! Very happy with my purchase!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Martha Male
review: I don‚Äôt always write a review for my orders, but after reading the reviews from previous purchasers I felt I should. My candle arrived today and it‚Äôs amazing!!! I am so pleased! With Covid, going to Yankee Candle just isn‚Äôt going to happen. Took a chance and I am so happy I did! It‚Äôs just what my home needs this fall. If I am going to continue to be stuck at home, damn sure it is going to need to smell good!! I have a husband and animals, they don‚Äôt smell good. My candle is my Covid hero!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Gina G-Lover
review: The first one I ordered arrived semi melted. See my photos. You‚Äôll see one where it actually leaked thru the cardboard it was packed in & thru that to the box it was mailed in. I returned it & got a replacement. The second one arrived semi melted too but not as bad as the first one. See photos. The top of the candle wasn‚Äôt flat & it got wax inside the cover & like stained it. I couldn‚Äôt wipe it clean. The second one wasn‚Äôt that bad so I kept it & it‚Äôs actually almost all gone because I‚Äôve been burning it. I was a big fan of Yankee candles because you could always smell the scent through out your house but I didn‚Äôt find that with this one? Not sure why?? Funny thing is I ordered this I believe in November/December & it‚Äôs not hot enough for the wax to be melting inside the candle during the shipping process. I don‚Äôt think I will buy anymore Yankee candles‚Ä¶besides the other ones I bought through here & had issues with too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kim Hagen
review: This candle appears to be the Yankee Candle brand sold at Walmart and other box stores.  There is very little scent, if any, and what scent is there is not long-lasting.  It also appears to be an older candle as areas of the wax are discolored.  Needless to say I am disappointed in the product and the vendor.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Great scent, arrived within 24 hours..the only reason for 3 stars instead of 5 is because it arrived melted (as pictured), it was supposed to be a gift, but is not presentable, so I'll just use it in my jar warmer instead. I bought 2 Harvest, still waiting on arrival of second candle, hopefully it's not melted too....*note, I also purchased 2 other yankee scents (mistletoe) ,they arrived within 24 hours & are not melted...I mentioned that because its june, & all candles are not melted.*

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe E.
review: I have purchased many different brands of candles over the years trying to find a company that competes in its fragrances with Yankee candles. I finally decided several years ago that I would only buy Yankee candles and stop wasting my money on the other brands, since I am always disappointed with them. I was thrilled when I found my favorite Cranberry Chutney jar candle available on Amazon a couple of weeks before Christmas. However, as I have burned it over the past several days, I have been extremely disappointed. My house used to be filled with the delicious aroma from this candle, but this time, I can barely smell it. I have heard the excuse that people are complaining about Yankee candles' scents this year due to a loss of smell from Covid-19. That is not the case with me, because I have not contracted covid, and my sense of smell is just fine. If other people are complaining, I have a feeling the Yankee Candle Company has changed something in the way it adds the different fragrances to their candles, so now, they are less potent than they always have been. I want a candle that can fill my house with a delicious scent, not one that I have to keep trying to smell! If you are expecting the Yankee Candle of old when you purchase this one, you will be disappointed. Please, Yankee Candle Company, go back to your former formulas for your candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ann McD
review: You cannot beat the price of an authentic Yankee Candle. I live in MA and it‚Äôs hard to find any on sale Amazon had the best selection. I buy them all the time for gifts. They‚Äôre packaged exactly how the company would ship them. I‚Äôve had bathe and body works candles show up broken and glass everywhere. Not these! This candle has incredible throw of scent and it lasts forever! For $19 I‚Äôm blown away. It‚Äôs like getting 4 regular candles in one. No comparison. Highest quality and timeless scent is worth the price. Thanks Amazon for letting me keep one lit every day! Makes my house homey! Perfect gifts- I recommend the sage and citrus, lilac as well. Not pink sands‚Ä¶ avoid that one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lanie
review: I've been purchasing Yankee Candle products (mainly candles) for over 20 years and can say without a doubt in my mind that it doesn't matter if you purchase from an authorized dealer or from the Yankee Candle website or in a corporate store, the majority of the time you aren't going to get much of a scent release from many of their candles when they are burning.  Their quality (or scent release) is just not even close what it used to be and that's a shame because they used to be the beast of candles when it came to scent.  If you are looking for a candle that has a lot of scent to it, Yankee is not the company to look at anymore and hasn't been for a while now. That said, I also think that this candle was worth the price that I paid for it.  I grabbed two of them for less than $10 each with free shipping.  That price changed how satisfied I am with the product and did effect my review rating and satisfaction level.  Hopefully that makes sense. Autumn Wreath does smell good when it is cold and the name fits the cold scent notes very well.  It really doesn't have much scent at all when it is lit.  I've had multiples of this one from a couple of different places that I caught on deep sale or clearance and not one performed better than any of the others. I placed this candle into a Yankee jar candle holder with the illuma lid hoping that the illuma lid would help because sometimes they do.  Unfortunately the extra heat that the illuma lid provides did not increase the scent release in this candle.  It just looks really pretty in the holder sitting on my kitchen counter. I will usually burn a candle that has a strong scent over by my stove at the same time so I have the ambiance of two candles burning but the scent of only one.  In an odd way, I actually like that I can practically count on Yankee to have zero scent release when burning so I can create a nice comfy look and feel, without multiple candles having a scent war that can give me a headache.  That is now the beauty of Yankee Candle and Autumn Wreath. All in all I think this candle is today's version of a typical Yankee Candle and that's why I gave it three stars.  It's a large candle that provides ambiance and looks pretty in a jar holder.  Nothing more, nothing less.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Weekend Coffee Guru
review: I am a long time purchaser of Yankee Candles and for the most part have always been satisfied with their products.  That being said, the Autumn Wreath Candle by Yankee Candle is very disappointing.  This candle has no scent what so ever unless you count the smell given off by a typical unscented candle.  Perhaps these candles lose their scent over time and this just happens to be a very old candle at the time of my purchase.  I also had made a gift of a second Autumn Wreath candle to a close friend and she also stated that her candle had no scent either.  At the same time I purchased a second scented Yankee Candle this one being Balsam & Cedar and am quite happy with that purchase.  Could it be just a bad batch of Autumn Wreath Candles?  Who knows?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Pamela Edwards
review: I bought Autumn leaves  2 years ago and absolutely loves the scent. I burned it almost every day due to a large animal population living with us at the time. It was amazing. I bought a new one a few weeks ago and I‚Äôm SO DISAPPOINTED. It barely smells, and it‚Äôs very different from the old one. I also bought Yankee candles in the past that came shattered when I opened them. I even reordered and the same thing happened. I also bought a lavender scented one that is disappointing. Yankee candles used to be the very best. My Fresh Roses one is almost gone ( it was perfect) but I doubt I will be reordering any more. I certainly hope Yankees Candles reads these reviews. It seems I‚Äôm not alone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chase
review: Arrived completely defective. It was visually leaking outside the packaging and this was clearly on Yankee Candle's end because the rest of my products inside the same Amazon box were all completely fine. Absolutely unacceptable. I usually buy from Village Candle instead, and believe me, you should too. I have had issue with every Yankee Candle I've purchased before and never a problem with their #1 competition...I'll let you draw your own conclusions on which company to buy from!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: scarredforlife
review: The last 3 Yankee Candle purchases I made were horrible.  On 6 candles, 3 large jars, 1 large two wick tumbler, and 2 perfect pillars, the wicks will burn to the level of the wax before the top of the wax is fully melted to the edges of the glass.  The worst of the bunch was my latest, a two-wick tumbler in "Crisp Fall Night". After the 6 prior candles I bought with 6 bad wicks, I waited for a year before I bought this newest candle.  I see it's still the same.  The Crisp Fall Night candle didn't make it past 1.5 hours until the wicks were burned right to the wax level.  I don't have this problem with any other brand.  I guess Yankee will be without a customer.  Strangely, I don't think they'll miss me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: DrM
review: I purchased this from Amazon and did not use it right away. When I went to use it, the wick was not useable so I could not burn the candle. I called Yankee Candle since it was outside Amazon's return window and they refused to replace it, kept referring me back to Amazon--even though it was not Amazon's fault they made a defective product. Very disappointed in Yankee Candle customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ariana
review: What‚Äôs not to love about a nice fall/winter candle? I chose this scent because it has a lot of spice accents to it, so I can use it when fall is approaching, but I can also use it as a Christmas candle because of the warm spice scents. I also purchased one for my stepdad and he uses it all the time - and it‚Äôs still very full, so he‚Äôll get a lot more use out of it. I love Yankee Candles because they tend to last a super long time, so they may be more pricey sometimes but it‚Äôs worth the money. Not to mention, sometimes Yankee Candles sold on Amazon are marked down to $15 or $16 as opposed to the full $30 price that Yankee Candle sells them for in their stores and on their website. A huge steal in my opinion! I only ever buy my Yankee Candles off of Amazon for this reason. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: ned stone
review: The scent from this candle is unbelievably warm and long lasting. The fragrance smells like the real thing not chemically made. The jar and lid are heavy duty even surviving a fall from a desk.  The wick is thick and lights up immediately and does not turn off unless I turn it off. The fragrance extends outside my home but is not over bearing or ‚Äúfake‚Äù smelling. It‚Äôs been used for over 20 hours and it is 2/3 finished. Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Meghan L. Dvorak
review: I‚Äôm quite fond of YC Cranberry Chutney. Yankee really does berry scents well. This has a toasty and invigorating fragrance. The description isn‚Äôt off at all, however, i found it does give off the scent of strawberry cobbler when it is burning. There are more berries at play here than just cranberry for sure. I have this in the large 1-wick jar, but my favorite is the large 2-wick tumbler jar because it has an amazing throw. I burned it during the holidays mostly, but it isn‚Äôt just a holiday smell, I can see myself burning if this candle throughout the year. I haven‚Äôt had the chance to get the smaller versions of this scent but look forward to obtaining them. I was lucky to get this large jar for eight dollars on here after Christmas. A total bargain. Thanks, amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lea B
review: This scent is great for fall and smells just like pumpkin and cinnamon. Plus I got a great deal ($10.98) However whoever packed the box ruined the candle. The candle itself was wrapped well but when the packer put the 2 candles in the Amazon box they clearly did not pay attention to the image and words saying to keep the Yankee candle box upright (listed on every side of the box) and instead put them on their side. Needless to say the candles melted in the summer heat (luckily this pumpkin one stayed mostly intact except for the melted remnants around the rim/lid). My other candle did not fare as well. This is something Amazon should monitor as this issue could‚Äôve been avoided. I also think for candles like this the Amazon box itself should say ‚Äúfragile‚Äù and ‚Äúthis side up‚Äù so the delivery guys are also aware of this

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I am so sad this candle sucked so bad. I bought this maybe a week or two ago. And it is literally one of the worst I have ever dealt with. It came with weird wicks. I clipped them in the hopes to fix it. But from the get it constantly will not stay lit. I have soaked out wax with cotton balls. And everything else I know to do. At this stage I am half way through it and to make it work I am dumping out wax. I bought this maybe 2 weeks ago. It‚Äôs a real shame :( something with this is just off. I have never before had a yankee candle be a dud. But I will not buy this one ‚Äòcrisp fall night‚Äô ever ever again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Guts
review: Almost literally. You are burning your money away every time you light it. TL;DR: maybe I am not a candle connoisseur, but I was really expecting that all of the wax would burn with the wick. It does not - lots of left over wax along the walls of the jar. Also, scent although nice isn't very strong (maybe a plus for some folks). --- What are you supposed to get in return? A nice relaxing scent? I suppose so - but it's not that strong. Was hoping to use this to combat kitchen odor after cooking something... fragrant, but it's barely noticeable. Also, the wick burns too quickly and doesn't draw enough wax? I was expecting the heat from the flame would melt the wax, and the wick would draw the molten wax as fuel for the flame. That way as the wick goes down, so does the wax. However, with this candle, the wick's going down but a bunch of wax remains on the sides of the jar... I guess I'll scrape it down and buy extra wick to utilize the remaining wax?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: DFB
review: YANKEE CANDLE WHAT HAPPENED?? Don't waste your money. 2021 Christmas present. My husband bought 2 Spiced Pumpkin, 2 Vanilla Cupcake & 1 Home Sweet Home (wood wick). Spiced Pumpkin & Vanilla Cupcake are literally a non-scented candles sold as scented.  I haven't tried the Home Sweet Home. Hoping that one will be better. The 3rd  candle in my pictures is a small company who makes soy candles. This candle sold for $12.50 at my small country store that I owned a few years back. It's a much better quality candle with a fantastic scent throw. The scent is throughout my house, even floats up to my upstairs hallway (1,900 sq ft house). Yet, 2 Yankee candles, burning at the same time can't even throw a scent in the room they're lit in. I think I'll save them & use them at night on the deck. Usually, I use dollar store candles for that, but these aren't any different from dollar store candles. Done with Yankee Candle Co.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sleepless in Seattle
review: Smells fantastic, just like the classic "cranberry" scented candles of the past.  I was concerned that the addition of "chutney" in the description would alter the fragrance that Yankee Candles used to produce, but it rings true, as the original cranberry candles of yesteryear.  Before purchasing, I went to a Yankee Candle store in the local mall, to see if I'd like this newer version of the classic.  Now I can order online and not have to pay the full retail pricing.  If you've never tried it before, you should.  You won't regret it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Boosha
review: Here lately I have bought an abundance of Walmart candles, Bath & Body Works candles, Goose Creek candles Etc.. I'm one of those that wants the smell to knock your socks off or fill the whole house.. otherwise it's a waste of money for me. The Yankee Candles Are a little bit more expensive but this one proves again that it's the one I should have bought in the first place. I'm giving it 4 stars because I like the scent but it's not my absolute favorite. I had no idea what it smelled like I just went off some reviews off of here. It absolutely fills the whole house and I have even taken the top off and it was so powerful you could smell it within a large radius of our kitchen table without even being lit. I'm very placing my purchase I think next time I will go to one of my old favorites if they have it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Smells amazing! There's just something about this particular candle that just makes you want to light it up, and curl up on the couch with a warm cup of cocoa or tea! It really is great! Despite all the other customers having issues with cracked glass or a melted candle, I had no issues with mine. The packaging was perfect--a lot of packing air bags were included so that it wouldnt break! I also think the fact that some people received melted candles were probably because they ordered them during periods in which the weather might have been a lot hotter--so i definitely recommend buying these candles from Amazon when the weather has cooled down a bit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Hal and Michelle
review: The Cranberry Chutney Yankee Candle is even better than it's description. The fragrance is superb and fills the first floor of our home without being overpowering. The longevity is far superior to other candles and burns exactly as it should. If I had to select one word to describe this particular scent, I'd say "delicious". Several reviews mentioned that their candles arrived with the glass jar broken. That was NOT my experience. The packaging was very secure...and I ordered three others. Absolutely no issue at all. GREAT JOB!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe
review: Wife ordered 2 of the pumpkin spice candles.  When we opened them the smell was strong.  Hit us right in the face like a Yankee Candle normally does.  That was the end of that.  As soon as we lit it there was no smell at all.  Was lit for hours and the house just smelled like burnt wax.  2 of these burning in the house at the same time would normally make every floor in the house smell good.  Nope not these.  Disappointed in them.  Will be returning.  Seems pretty common based on the reviews not sure how people lucked out with good smelling ones and others didn't.  Maybe they are hit or miss but usually everytime I've ever bought a Yankee Candle directly from the store itself the scent was always really strong when they were burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I buy a new pumpkin apple yankee candle every fall, and decided to try ordering through amazon and it's the exact same candle and scent. Mine arrived in one piece and I took it straight to my office and light it daily. The scent is amazing and I cannot go through fall without it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: N&G
review: I got the Sugared Cinnamon Apple and find that the scent is very similar to Home Sweet Home, but a little less "Christmas-y" and heavy in the scent like HSH. I think Sugared Cinnamon Apple a good transition into winter months, or good for warmer weather versus Home Sweet Home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Dan B.
review: The product is fantastic! The problem is Bezos taking his cut which don't leave much meat on the bone for the seller, and I think that's BULLSHlT!! I sincerely hope, from the bottom of my heart that Jeff and the Sanchez live forever! Again, fantastic product! Great seller! Thank you very much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kay
review: I bought 3 different scents and the none of the candles smell when burning.  This gives Yankee Candle a bad  reputation! Total waste of money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Rich Briere
review: The Candles are Fabulous........Best on Earth....but have you purchased one of these to go with it?  3 times the Candle Life by NOT using Scissors to cut the wicks on your Candles.  Don't be a Mister Bungle..... Add this to your order. "EricX Light Candle Wick Trimmer, Polished Stainless Steel Wick Trimmer".  Do I have anything to do with that Company?  Nope..... but you should get a couple of 'em with the order you're about to place. :)  RB https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01N78UYIZ/ref=cm_sw_em_r_mt_dp_FctOFbPBNDNVA

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kate C
review: Received my candle quickly, however I noticed immediately when I opened it that there was liquid surrounding the lid of the candle. Prior to opening it also looked red all inside of the lid and on the upper walls of the candle. Open the lid and the candle is liquidy and getting all over my hands. The top of the candle has visible air bubbles on top of the candle with melted candle all over the sides. I would not give this for a gift, but technically is still usable it is just not visibly nice to be sitting on top of a table.
