review: I had this candle burning since about 6am. It's now about noon and I get a very faint smell of cranberry. This was a good price but I'm not sure I'm going to keep it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jacklyn and Eduardo
review: Not sure why it don't smell st all when lit but sure has a lot of black smoke coming from it.my other on is perfect not sure why this one's not smelling.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle smells very good.  The scent is strong.  You really do have to burn it for several hours the first time, otherwise the wax gets uneven.  You can take a lighter and use it to melt the uneven wax and fix it, but that's kind of annoying.  Overall this candle lasts long (a few weeks burning it every single day for 3-4 hours).

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Tyler
review: I‚Äôve been buying yankee candles for years! This has absolutely no scent whatsoever!!! Very disappointed!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Linda Liddic
review: I have a huge shelf filled with Yankee candles. For years one could only buy them at a Yankee Candle store. This candle had no scent ( aroma) at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Rainbow94
review: It took too nights (one of which was my annual Halloween party) to realize this candle DOES NOT have a scent!! I‚Äôm convinced it‚Äôs fake. Can‚Äôt say for sure but this burned for 6 hours and barely caught a whiff of anything. Took me tonight to realize this was a dud.  Returning with a vengeance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: H Steiner
review: I‚Äôve always liked Yankee candles because they lasted long and they always had a very nice scent.  Now sure what has happened to Yankee but this will be my last purchase of this brand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Tak191
review: Best smelling late summer/fall candle. I love the fresh and fruity smell. I give this to all 3 of my daughter in laws. They all have different tastes but agree Farmers Market is the best smell & they all love Yankee Candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: S. Wilshe
review: I love Yankee Candles, especially this scent, Farmers Market. The only issue I have is that this is the second candle that‚Äôs arrived with the outer glass shattered. (See photo). It‚Äôs still burnable, but ugly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bonnie
review: Yankee Candles are extremely expensive but we buy them because they are extra smelly. That is not the case with this product. I am sincerely impressed by how little scent it produces. Waste of money. Totally baffled. Would be upset if it weren't a completely absurd thing for me to spend money on in the first place.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sarah
review: I love Yankee Candles and was really looking forward to getting this. However, it seems that the product sold here on Amazon was damaged- first, the box had clear evidence of spilled wax. After opening the box, I saw the wax inside the jar appeared to have melted at some point (probably in storage) and re-solidified in a way that covers over the wick so I can‚Äôt even burn the candle. I will be returning this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Tammy Boone
review: Buying this product for a gift for someone who loves this scent and was so upset to find that it was being discontinued. Thrilled to find it here on Amazon. I can't wait to see the surprise when its opened.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kat
review: This is a Wonderful candle! Long lasting. and smells so much like autumn. It fill's my home with forever scent. Yes, Recommend this Candle 100 percent. AAA+++

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jane
review: Never written a review before and never had a problem with Amazon but the candle that came is NOT the spiced pumpkin that's pictured. This one is a different jar, different label and says "Yankee Candle Home Classics Pumpkin Spice". None of that would bother me if it smelled like the regular Spiced Pumpkin but it doesn't.  It has a sharper, more chemical smell, similar to some of the cheaper candles I've purchased over the years. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jen S.
review: Love this scent! Not pleased with the high price and to get an uncentered wick. Hope the pictures do it justice to show how off center it is. Hoping it will burn properly but really hope so since this scent is my favorite and I‚Äôd like for it to last a while.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Muddy
review: I LOVE this scent. It really smells like cranberry sauce. One lit candle smells my whole downstairs and the aroma can be smelled going up my stairs. The candle was delivered in perfect condition. There were no issues with the packaging or the glass. I‚Äôm very pleased and will definitely order more of this scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Madbarbee
review: Thought I would splurge and spend $20 on a Yankee candle instead of cheap ones. Disappointed! I thought they were supposed to be really good and strong fragrant. This Pumkin Spice barely, I‚Äôm not even kidding, barely smells like vanilla. I like the cheap Walmart candles better!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chef Shan Cooks
review: I love the scent and the fact that it is strong enough to smell across the whole room.  Good Quality candle. Smells like sweet tart cranberries to me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Katie Malloy
review: I go back and forth between this and the Spiced Pumpkin candle, and this is the one that always wins. People constantly compliment the smell of my house, it‚Äôs a strong scent, but pleasant. It is very similar to mulling spices. It carries the scent throughout my house (open floor plan) and I even bought the car scents for both my vehicles. This screams fall, fall, fall!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: John
review: It's scent is a little peculiar. I ordered pumpkin spice and it smells like bubble gum and doctor pepper mixed, not sure if it's ment to smell like that. For a Yankee candle I was expecting it to smell like what it advertised.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Didi
review: I love the smell.  The product was well packed and it arrived on a timely manner even tho it was shipped to a military base. Thank you so much!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cindy T
review: It arrived melted but we‚Äôre able to use it. I should have known better than ordering a candle to me delivered in Arizona.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Non-fiction Addiction
review: An excellent, refreshing scent perfect for fall and winter. This is the large (22 oz) jar with a single wick. Great packaging and a good value in a scent I had enjoyed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sylvia Perkins
review: Autumn Wreath is my favorite Yankee Candle scent. Very nice! It lasts a long time. I wish the stuck allowed them to burn completely to the bottom of the jar, but that's probably for safety reasons. Over-all a great product for a great price on this site!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: The candle arrived as promised. It was packaged in an eggshell type box inside another box like all these type candles come.  My wife likes the scent which is very strong.  These candles last a long time which is why I like them and the scent does not go away. But does not burn even. 1/2 inch on one side does not burn. Half way through and it is still there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: AFT
review: I love the smell but it‚Äôs not enough to fill a room with an aroma, which I love and why I buy candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jasper
review: Got this on sale was super excited until I lit the candle and after burning it for several hours realized it has zero smell which is disappointing I‚Äôm not sure if this was a knock off, a bad batch or if yankee has just gone down in quality that much. I‚Äôll stick with village candles moving forward.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Megan
review: I bought this on a whim not knowing the scent. Yankee is a fantastic brand but I‚Äôm picky about my scents. This smell is phenomenal. The perfect fall candle. I‚Äôm going to buy 10 so it lasts forever....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lostinabook
review: The scent is barely discernible, the shape is narrower and taller, and the wax looks totally different than the one I bought from the Yankee Candle store.  If this had been my first YC, I‚Äôd never buy another.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amber G
review: I'm not convinced this is a true yankee candle... I cannot smell it at ALL and I've had it burning all day for 2 days now. I have had yankee before and always thought they were worth the $$... but this is the first time bought off of Amazon. Fake. Just go into the store!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: linda simpson
review: I have used the scent Autumn Wreath for several years! I love the way it makes my house smell! I use the candles and the scent plug ins. My daughter has used the same scent as long as I have. Love it and always keep a candle or scent plug in on hand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: K B
review: Yankee is one of the best brands of candles. The scent is always great and the last for weeks, even if you burn them everyday. I always buy Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: tstuckey
review: Smells amazing for a long period of time! Perfect for a gift! I absolutely love Yankee Candles! Wished I had the funds to only use just that‚Ä¶. YANKEE PRODUCTS!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe
review: I'm a big fan of Yankee Candle and it's the only one's we burn in our home. Unlike cheaper candles from home stores these never leave soot on our surfaces. This specific candle has a great scent with a hint of cinnamon. It's strong and you can tell it's burning throughout the house. It's a great cozy scent that's perfect for the cooler months.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jcjwebster
review: The shipping box was fine, what I found inside was the lid was upside down and the glass busted. Not Amazon's fault, most likely the way it was originally packed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bee/my 2nd review after buying more Baleaf Shorts!
review: Warm clean fragrance!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: K. Sheehan
review: I have bought a Yankee Pumpkin scented candle for years.  This one did not live up to my expectations.  There was not much scent and the candle burnt very quickly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jennifer
review: I bought this candle for my husband after I accidentally broke another one he bought.  The smell is wonderful and fills the room while it's burning, but it's not too overpowering.  Yankee Candles are a bit pricey, but they sure do smell good.  I'll buy this one again once it's almost out.  They seem to last a really long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Paula Cox
review: Love the wonderful scent. It's my daughter's favorite one. Highly recommend this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: JEREMY WHATLEY
review: This candle has to be a knock off.. it has very little to no scent !! Do not buy! This is not a yankee candle .. I am a candle fanatic and this one is terrible!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Susan M. Booker
review: This candle was not up to the quality of the previous one (same kind) that I purchased. It was unevenly colored and the scent was not as strong (although just as lovely). Glad I didn‚Äôt purchase it as a gift for someone. Something must have happened to it in transit or it was poorly stored at the warehouse.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jax Naydol
review: The sun is a very nice fall sent but it doesn't smell up the living room it could probably smell up a bathroom but it's not as strong as they used to be. I've been searching for a strong scented candle and I just can't seem to find one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: dawgsmum
review: do I need to say more; If you ever have had one then it lasts forever....smells great for christmas but I buy these all year round...love the cranberry smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Matounagi
review: Smells like Bad cologne. It also doesn‚Äôt have a very strong scent that fills the house, which I guess might be a good thing. But for 40 bucks for a candle and a little disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Has virtually no scent, especially while burning. I guess there‚Äôs a reason why it was on sale so cheap as a deal of the day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Aquaquality Pools Spas, Inc
review: These Yankee candles just do not give off the scent like years ago.  I returned it.  I even bought Yankee candles at Bed Bath & Beyond with the same issue.  No scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: K Klein
review: Bought this scent for the first time and wasn‚Äôt very impressed with scent. Can hardly smell unless your right up next to it. Will try other scents next time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I normally order my candles on Amazon, but the candle that was delivered was defective; the wax melted onto one side; wax leaking out of lid; unable to access the wick to use the candle. Both candles in this order were defective - very disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Linda
review: ***VERRRY GOOD PRICE!....&ALWAYS VERRRY WONDERFULLY SCENTED!!!! **Got for a friend  for Valentine's  Day-**These are**ALWAYS A GREAT GIFT FOR ANYONE!! Came in EXCELLENT PKGING. ---*&KNOW this is one of *many FAVORITE SCENTS! üëçüëçüëç

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: jill
review: this candle makes me so happy

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: memories
review: My favorite candle ever !!  I use coupons and get them at the yankee store for a few dollars cheaper , but perfect if you don‚Äôt have a coupon. Cheaper than Walmart . I love yankee!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Gregory - Northeast USA
review: They dont make them like they used too! I only lit it bout 4 times.  For about an hour each time.  The wax is half gone already.  Jeez.  It does smell good.  This is their large size 22oz. But I cannot reccomend üôÑ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jan Bolding
review: This was not in good condition when I got it.  It was a gift for my daughter and she told me it broke easily after she got it out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: HavasuFlash
review: Not sure if this smells like a spiced pumpkin as I have never spiced one but it is a very pleasant and nose pleasing scent.  Unfortunately it tunnels like my last two Yankee candle in spite of my trimming the wick and allowing the candle to burn for at least 4 hours.  Next to Autumn Wreath this is our favorite scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jamie&Jordan
review: Comes very well packaged. It‚Äôs a very spicy cinnamon scent, it really fills the room. This candle also has a nice long burn, very helpful for a house full of kids and their assorted smells.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Richard Portwood
review: First off, I received it the day after I ordered it!!! SO that was a really nice bonus surprise! The candle is exactly what I look forward to every year, about this time, as I really start to anticipate and get excited for fall. Absolutely no complaints at all! 100% satisfaction!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: weezeee
review: Yankee candles are quite a bit more expensive than other generic ones that looks the same.  But the scent is much nicer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Starlena Profitt
review: Love the way this candle smelled. It didn't seem to last as long as other Yankee Candles I've gotten but it smelled great!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: MERAS
review: I am really disappointed because I bought this candle thinking that it was a real Yankee candle and you can't even smell anything I knew it was to good to be true I only pay $10 for this candle I will never buy this candles from here again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: R. C.
review: Somewhat disappointed. Yankee candes typically have a nice strong scent that fills ones house and I've had this Spiced Pumpkin candle scent before. However, this candle isn't very strong even after burning all day. Disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Faye
review: I am not usually a fan of Yankee Candles, but I was purchased by so many reviews. When I opened the package, I noticed the scent was mild, and when lit, the candle didn‚Äôt put out any scent at all! And of course, it isn‚Äôt returnable!! Do not waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joan White
review: I always love Yankee candles. I got the Spiced Pumpkin for one  and Autumn Wreath.  Each one by itself fills the house with a wonderful scent true to its name.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Roberta L. Gay
review: The scent of this candle is, to me, the epitome of autumn. I just adore it. So many visitors to our home have sniffed and said, "What is that scent and where can I get it?" There are other autumn-y scents for Yankee Candles, such as Autumn Wreaths, but my guests and I really do prefer this one - perhaps a little less sweet than the others, a bit more earthy. The medium candles, in my experience, burn more clearly and evenly than the other sizes, although that may have more to do with the shape and size of my living room, and the placement of our windows, than anything intrinsically pertaining to the jar-size.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Leshkee
review: This candle is one of my favorites from Yankee Candle. It smells fantastic and fills up the house with a great scent. It's also not too "spicy" scented like many other spice candles, it's just a perfect scent for Fall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Michelle K.
review: The smell is apples and pumpkin mixed together. It smells really really good! And strong in a good way. Shipping was really fast too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: sticks&stones
review: Love the scent of this candle! Bought it to go into a 2 part hurricane candle holder (top is for candles, bottom is for fillers such as potpourri, pine cones, stones,  lemons, Christmas ornaments, etc.). This current theme I'm doing is for Fall and apple season, so this candle not only makes the look come together, but the fragrance is amazing! (And, I haven't even burned it yet!).  : )

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Matt Peppard
review: This is a great candle for anyone who likes a bold, spicy candle. It's on the Masculine side, so it's my second favorite behind Midsummer Night.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Brittany wheeler
review: Not quite as strong as usual it seemed, but it lasted the whole candle and burned to the bottom so I can‚Äôt complain!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cynthia P.
review: Smells wonderful- just right not too strong smelling like some candles are - if you like the smell of walking into a hallmark store - you will enjoy this candle - long lasting big jar candle - great price for quality

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lauren D
review: Expected more of a smell like other candles they make when burned. For 20 bucks buy something different.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Anna Feather
review: Rolled the dice on the scent because of the price. Winner! Smells wonderful - a lot like apple cider! Would buy again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Katie O.
review: These candles are on sale for a reason, they are defective with air bubbles and holes. You can clearly see that they wouldn't sell at their store. Maybe they are old...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Bigtime shopper
review: I ordered 2 of these. One arrived shattered in the box, but able to receive immediate refund from Amazon. The other is a delightful scent, and appears to last a long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: JAM
review: 2016 Christmas Cookie candles smelled wonderful. I purchased 3 this year and they didn't have near the rich cookie fragrance as it did last year and years before.. Something is definitely different. Disappointing......

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: KatyKatMidwest
review: First, please know I am a huge Yankee Candle fan. They are my go-to for candles. That being said, I wondered why the Christmas Cookie candle has been such a great price. I ordered one, since I was out of holiday scents. The one I got just was not very powerful. I am not sure if these are just very old stock, or perhaps seconds. Normally, these fill the room with their wonderful scents. With the one I received, you can tell a candle is burning, but you'd never guess the scent (either while burning or after extinguishing it). Very different from my other YC items. So, just know that the price is great, but it might not be a bargain. It's still a nice looking candle; it just falls very short of what I have come to expect from Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: 1crazycute
review: I usually love Yankee candles because they do give out a good scent that fills up the room, but, this particular scent does nothing. The only time you are able to smell it, is when you are standing right next to it. I want to be able to walk into my living room and smell the candle....so, I am very disappointed to say the least. I will probably never buy a Yankee candle again. Better Homes candles  and Tuscany candles are a 100 percent better and they are cheaper. 12/28/2022 update: I read an article today on Google news, stating that the reason that people are putting bad reviews regarding there being no smell to some of the Yankee candles, is because it's one of the symptoms of having Covid...having no smell...LMAO!! You got to be kidding me right?! I truly hope it's not Amazon coming up with that lame excuse for their candles having no smell....I can tell you that I did not have Covid while burning their candle....MY CANDLE THAT I PURCHASED HAD NO SCENT UNLESS I WAS SUPER CLOSE TO IT. I KNOW I DIDNT HAVE COVID BECAUSE AFTER LIGHTING ONE OF MY OTHER CHEAP CANDLES, AFTER BEING DISAPPOINTED WITH THE YANKEE CANDLE, I WAS VERY MUCH ABLE TO SMELL IT JUST FINE!! It's sad that Google or Amazon have to make such ridiculous excuses because of having bad reviews on their candles....pretty pathetic actually!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amy
review: I ordered this as a mistake for a Christmas gift and decided to keep it. I'm not usually a Yankee candle customer as I prefer a different brand. I didn't have high hopes for the scent to last or really permeate a large living room but I was wrong. I lit it in our basement den which is large and open to several other rooms. Within 30 minutes all of the rooms downstairs smelled great and it was beginning to drift upstairs. My poor husband thought I was baking cookies!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: steven p. welty
review: Is this an authentic Yankee candle? I question it because I've burned these candles for 40 years and this candle has absolutely no sense at all. It's been burning for an hour and by now the house should have been full of aroma. However, I could put my nose right over the candle and not smell a thing but wax. Disappointed! Never experienced this with, a Yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: None
review: Really disappointed that this candle came melted and in a glob in the container with no wick!  Looks like it was either made wrong, or stored wrong.  Very disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Gina G-Lover
review: I ordered this twice. My first candle arrived broken. I did a live chat with an Amazon representative because I didn‚Äôt think it was safe to bring broken glass into a Amazon return center & she said yes, to do it. She asked me if I wanted her to do the return & I said ‚Äúno thanks‚Äù which I‚Äôm glad I did because she was WRONG about telling me to return this broken glass. I did the return on Amazon myself & they told me not to return it that they would replace it. So my replacement comes & the top of the candle is uneven because it melted some. See photos for both. Now if your a candle burner then you know burning  a candle with an uneven top is going to continue to burn unevenly & can even get to the point where your not even done with the candle & you no longer can burn it because the wicks get buried. So I returned the second one & just gave up! I ordered it in Nov/Dec. & it‚Äôs not hot where I live in those months! Good luck & hope your experience goes better then mine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: L Murphy
review: I seem to be getting good longevity (burn-hours) for this candle and I enjoy the "sugar cookie baking" smell. It has decent candle "throw" but I think it could be better? It has a single wick and the top of the jar is slightly tapered, so this may hinder that, I don't know. It doesn't smoke if you start with a slightly trimmed wick before lighting it, but I wouldn't call it smokeless. That would make it ideal. I got a great price after the holidays so I can't complain. I would not pay full-price for it, though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: julian
review: Great smell and fights dog flatulence. My dog let really nasty farts rip. This helps along with plug-ins, reed diffusers and humidifier oil diffusers. She‚Äôs one stinky b but this helps cover it up so we don‚Äôt have to scream at her and throw her out of the living room because the family is gagging. Lol üòÇ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kate
review: Very disappointed in Yankee Candle! I received these on January 13th and decided I was going to light one tonight. Not only is one defective, but both are. The tops do not have any wicks as they are as if they melted over the wicks. One is bulging up over the glass. If you can look down from the top and along the sides are a gap. Somebody that does quality control obviously was asleep that day. I would return these but I can't be bothered to take them to have them reshipped back to Amazon. Instead I decided just to give a not very happy review! I didn't even want to give this one star, but the review page won't allow it to be blank.  FACT!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Jenn
review: This is a great smelling candle! Reminds me of baking homemade sugar cookies. The scent isn‚Äôt too strong, which I appreciate because overly scented candles tend to give me a headache. The scent is really soft, and nostalgic. I‚Äôve been burning the candle for around 12 hours a day, for a week, and it barely made a dent in the candle. I was very pleased with the packaging - it was packed in a thick cardboard material, around the whole candle, and I‚Äôve had quite a few things break in the past, but this was very protected. I‚Äôve been buying a lot of my candles from small businesses, which I‚Äôm enjoying, but it was nice to get a Yankee Candle, because those were all my mom would burn when I was younger, so like I said, it was very nostalgic. All in all - great price, greaty product, amazing scent, slow burning, the packaging was remarkable, and I would definitely recommend purchasing this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: EJ or RA in AZ
review: The jar arrived in corrugated cardboard and was adequately packaged to keep the glass in tact. However, at some point the candle wax melted and arrived with the contents sideways in the jar. We had to put the jar in the microwave to melt the wax and then fish out the wick and position it properly. So, somewhere the product was not properly handled and/or stored. The Christmas Cookie scent is OK, but does not fill the room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Nikki H
review: This candle smells great. It's got a nice strong scent and you can smell it almost all throughout the house. I've seen reviews where people say it has no smell and they should get tested because they might have the virus. Just saying...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Anna
review: I used to purchase only Yankee Candles as they were the best ones ever. After a move, the only local option became Bath and Bodyworks so I tried those and they were wonderful too. This week, I decided to order a couple of homey type Yankee Candles that I had loved in years past: French Vanilla and a Cookie flavored one. They arrived today and neither of them have hardly any scent when you sniff them cold. I figured once lit things would get better. Nope. I have one of each of the ones I bought burning in a different part of the house and you'd never know there was a scented candle lit. Seems every company that puts out a product that is wonderful, decides at some point to go cheap and ruin it. I won't buy this brand again. BBW candles are amazing and have wonderful throws.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: mesh
review: Truly a wonderful scent of freshly baked Christmas cookies every time I light it! I purchased 2 for the Christmas season as the price on Amazon was unbeatable. The scent is noticeable within minutes of lighting. I trim the wick before each lighting & push down any soft wax as it burns to fully capture the entire candle for longevity. These Yankee Candles never disappoint. I purchase this scent every year for Christmas & I‚Äôm still enjoying it in January. Definitely recommend Christmas Cookie!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Deborah
review: I will never purchase another Yankee candle because of the black soot issue they've apparently had for years. Their candles are made of parafin wax and it's alarming to see all of the black soot on every surface after just a few days of burning.  I keep trimming the wicks and the soot continues to turn everything dingy. I threw the candles away today and caution everyone looking for scented candles to avoid Yankee and purchase soy candles instead.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kim
review: They definitely don‚Äôt make yankee candles like they used too.. my whole house would smell before, and now I had to put drops of oil in it just to get a tiny scent, that I can still barley smell. Very disappointed, yankee used to be my favorite. But I won‚Äôt be wasting my money anymore. I bought 2 cookie ones and a vanilla cupcake , and I should of just flushed my money, or better yet spent that money on Christmas shopping :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Jenna
review: I love candles. Especially scents like Christmas Cookie. I bought this as a gift but of course inspected it for the person I was giving it to. First of all, it does smell great. It is a good candle but I feel like it doesn‚Äôt add up to the Yankee Candle quality. It‚Äôs almost like a walmart candle in a yankees package. The price was great which is why I bought it from Amazon, but it doesn‚Äôt seem to match the quality at all that yankee provides. However I also see that you get what you pay for, so for the price I still think it was worth it. Just beware thst the quality is not going to be like buying straight from the yankee candle store.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: S76JT
review: My son was so excited to purchase me a Yankee Christmas Candle this year. He knows how powerful Yamnkee candles are But not this year... No scent at all once burned. Very disappointing to open this year for Christmas. I'm Not Happy with this years Yankee candle üòí. I want a refund or another scented stronger smelling candle. Last year the same candle had my whole room smelling Amazing. Don't know what happened to this year's batch. Maybe this is an off brand Amazon is selling this year. But it's not cool I'm very disappointed. And it has nothing to do with covid nor my scent of smells. All lies üò´ üòï.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: JB
review: Yankee Candles last a long time, smell fantastic, and are always a nice giftable item for anyone. This particular scent was nice as I didn't bake this holiday season due to health issues. It gave us the scent of the cookies without the calories!  I also bought the Green Balsam for the tree scent. It helped us forget we weren't in the Midwest with snow and family like we had hoped for yet another year, in small glimpses anyway!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Sara
review: I absolutely LOVE this candle scent! I don't normally spend more than a few dollars on candles but I can totally justify this Yankee Candle purchase because the smell is so comforting and actually smells like sugar cookies baking. Perfect for relaxing while studying. The scent is worth the cost. I also noticed that the candle lasts a really long time compared to my bath and body works candles. The scent is strong enough to make my boyfriend believe I was baking cookies (lol), needless to say its a must! It's so hot in Texas year 'round practically but this candle makes it feel like Christmas! This came in a yankee candle branded box and was packaged with styrofoam and arrived on time. Great for gifting. Suggestion: go for it! you won't regret it if you love warm/gourmet scents! *I will be buying more to stock up because this is my favorite scent yet!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: RH24
review: I'm likely upon the last 2-3 hours of burn time on my candle...so I have stopped using it and ordered two more to have in place to use Christmas Eve/day. This smell is not overbearing and is pleasant. I have to order fom Amazon as the Yankee Candle store in our area has closed :( I highly recommend this candle you would not be unhappy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: master Irrigator
review: The candle arrived well packaged so that it would not break.  I have only burnt it for 1 evening so far and it smells great. Not much more you can say. It melted evenly across the candle.  Not the strongest scent. So if you want a super strong scent then this is not it. It is very inviting. Best price i had seen around for this size.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Olivia
review: Repeat buyer! I have been a fan of the Christmas Cookie fragrance for many years. I purchased two here at Amazon at half price! I couldn't be happier! They came well packaged and they smell wonderful. I have tried giving them as gifts in the past, but I can't seem to ever give one up!  Yankee Candles are a quality gift. They come in a large jar candle that will burn for many hours. The tight fitting lid, will snuff out your candle when you put it on. The candle always burns evenly and I have nothing but compliments and positive things to say! I try to purchase them when on sale because I do burn them all year long.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Texas mom
review: When the Christmas Cookie candles were $14 for Black Friday, I bought two. A friend gave me one in this scent years ago and it's lovely- it's a super nice vanilla scent (among other things I can't put my finger on). The large jar candles last a long time, so this should carry us through the Christmas season. Great buy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Susan Copenhagen
review: I had a small one in my office at work and anyone coming in looked around for the cookies. It was fun just watching. Great sent on a cool day for welcoming home. üòã yum.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kaitlen
review: The media could not be loaded. I should‚Äôve known this would happen honestly, it doesn‚Äôt smell all that great but it‚Äôs definitely ‚ÄúChristmas-ie.‚Äù I‚Äôm having to boil this, just so I could have something to give to my mom for her Christmas present (I‚Äôm 17 btw). DO NOT bother buying candles from Amazon, try bath and body works site, or an actual candle site. This is very annoying and I‚Äôm pretty upset rn lol‚Ä¶ this is my first BAD review ever

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: NYGM66
review: Yankee candles are simply the best. They burn nice, smell amazing and are always a favorite. My daughter loves them, so when they run specials I always try and stock up for gifts. She mentioned them on sale on Cyber Monday so I bought a few. I will slowly give them to her, so that she has Christmas cookie smell all year long.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Sam
review: I was worried it would come melted like other reviews, but was perfect! I ordered this along with several other yankee candles for Christmas gifts. Each came packaged in a yankee candle box and a protective sleeve. All were in perfect condition. None melted and all smelled very good. Very Happy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: karrie jones
review: I have NEVER been so disappointed in Yankee candle before! Used to the smell permeated the room like fresh baked cookies! I can barely even smell this candle and there is no lingering scent cause there was none in the beginning!! I was so excited to get this and to pay $20 for crap! I will NEVER buy a Yankee candle again in my life! I wish I hadn‚Äôt lit it cause I would love to return it or throw it in the trash! It‚Äôs just so sad an disappointing! Awful! Awful awful!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Lily
review: I was really worried about the candle coming in broken or something being wrong as i read from the other reviews, but this product came in perfect! Packaged in really good protective casings so mine wasn't even chipped. I ordered christmas cookie, which always has a good strong smell for most of its duration, but warning towards the end of the wax burning the smell definitely lessons. if you like vanilla smells but dont want it to be overpowering (like the vanilla cupcake candle they have) this is a great alternative.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Lauren
review: I bought two of these candles. You can tell they‚Äôre old. They have practically no smell at all. As someone who used to work for Yankee Candle I‚Äôm extremely displeased. These candles are expensive and you want quality with what you‚Äôre paying for. This is not it. I suggest taking your money to your nearest ALDI and buying a 3 wick Huntington Home candle for 5 dollars that is better quality than this. Very unsatisfied customer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: lcb
review: I am new to buying scented candles. The smell of this candle is extremely strong and extremely sweet. I was hoping for a room that smells like cookies were baking.  It smells more like I dropped my face into raw cookie dough. Not the same effect or intensity. It is a very large candle, it will burn for quite a while. It is aromatic. Be sure you want a STRONG fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Western WA Resident.
review: I love the smell...but this particular candle wasn't sealed when I received it.. Plus the wax was melted off to one side.. I still have access to the wick so I am going to try and get it to burn right...but people should really keep wax away from heat?? Or remember that it needs to COOL before it's actually packaged..And if there's quality checks, this one was missed.  The more private people sell on Amazon, the worse the items are these days...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Victor
review: Yankee Candles are a marvel. Out of various ones I've ordered I've only received one that was shattered. Beyond that no issues at all. They last a while, look great as decoration,  and smell wonderful. My favorite so far is Mistletoe, Christmas Cookie was a close second but I feel it doesn't have half the scent of Mistletoe.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Coffee to wine time
review: I was excited to get this as I know Yankee candle scents are usually the most lasting and effective-fragrance. However, this candle is too mild to really smell. The packing was great- candle in a cardboard casing and extra box.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Laura E Moretti
review: My kitten has sensitivity to many essential oils. I have found this scent doesn't bother Sparkle Lissa at all. I've had to give away other candles due to Sparkle's sensitivity. The price was better than any other Yankee Candles I've purchased anywhere.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Peter Pen
review: Really disappointed. I know when buying well known brands off of Amazon it can be a hit or miss but there‚Äôs absolutely no scent whatsoever. The only time I get a hint of vanilla is when I blow out the flame and smell it with the cloud of smoke that‚Äôs released I‚Äôve had better luck with glad candles from the store. Not a good buy

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Princess Buttercup
review: Yankee candles are a wonderful addition to the interior of your home and with all their array of scents everyone is bound to find something they love.  MY only wish is the prices would be fairly reasonable because it's not always easy to convince yourself to buy a $20 candle that probably won't last a month. Yankee candles do create a great product and never fails to disappoint.  (only when it comes to how much they charge). Mahalo!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: TB
review: Yankee used to be top notch. I am very dissatisfied now. Packaging was padded so they did not arrive broken but they hardly have any scent. I will not be purchasing any more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: jane
review: i've been buying yankee christmas cookie candles for years.  they're my favorite scent.  i thought i found a bargain with the price here on amazon.  now i know why the price was so low - these have absolutely no scent. added a few days later:  after trying two of the three that i bought, one has no scent whatsoever, and the other made my living room smell like someone had just dumped gasoline.  i'm really disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Louisa Dexter
review: I purchased 6 candles and one had a smashed glass container from not being packaged correctly.  Some came in boxes but this one was wrapped in paper and was smashed to pieces.  These are the best Christmas Gift and something everyone loves because they last longer and have beautiful scents.  I highly recommend the candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Warrior woman
review: By far the best scented candle you can buy. It truly smells like Christmas cookies. When you first take off that lid the scent is so strong and amazing. This candle last a long time and really fills my studio apartment which is about 350 square feet if I keep it long enough my entire apartment can smell like cookies. Love it love it love it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Divine
review: My only issues is it burns weird.i know you have to keep it on a certain amount of time to get it to burnt straight but I did that and it took 5 hours and still didn‚Äôt burn right.nothing like the mid tone which burned perfectly

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Patricia A. Lamb
review: I like this candle very much. The size is perfect.  I will be using it for Christmas, and the scent is just like having Christmas cookies baking in the house. I have enjoyed it so much that I ordered another one as a Christmas gift. Thank you so much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: sarah
review: this candle smell so nice. it is a subtle and sweet aroma. not overpowering but fills your home with delicious yummy smell. i'm VERY picky about smells because i'm very sensitive to all smells, and this is really a delight to smell. will purchase again most likely! i hope it lasts a very long time; seems to be burning well!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Alexandra Tuttle
review: I love yankee candles and this one did not disappoint! The packaging was perfect and arrived without any problems! The smell is on point and smells of all things Christmas. I am a huge candle person and I burn this candle for about 3-4+ hours a day. It‚Äôs been a month and I still have some candle left! It‚Äôs a must buy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Liana
review: I wish I read reviews. It seems like if you‚Äôre buying them through this seller on Amazon you‚Äôre going to get all the defected candles. I received mine with a huge piece of glass missing from the jar but when I looked in the box to find the broken piece it was no where to be found which means they knowingly packaged the candle up like this and shipped it out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kathleen Johnson
review: I have been purchasing these candles, three at a time, for over a year.  This time I received a candle that won‚Äôt even light.  This has only happened to me twice but I don‚Äôt know what the steps are to get a credit.  I can‚Äôt return it because I don‚Äôt have the original packaging for it.  I love these candles and have just placed an order for three more. I‚Äôm hoping that somehow I could receive a credit or another candle to replace the one that won‚Äôt light. Thank you in advance for any help you can give me

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Jen Malcom
review: If this is a Yankre candle, then they messed up!  There is NO scent!  I gave it to my roommate, and they lit it, but you can't even smell it!  Don't buy, unless you just like the look of a lit candle!  I want my money back!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Gina Benedict
review: This candle was a great price and with it smelling so good, I just might have to keep it instead of giving it away üòÜ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: WhyteKnyte
review: Smells fairly similar to generic vanilla candles. I don't have a problem with this as I enjoy the smell of vanilla. However, Yankee candles usually last significantly longer than cheaper candles. The scent is strong enough to be noticed upstairs while I burn it on the main level, but is not overbearing when sitting nearby. Product is as advertised.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Shannon
review: I guess returns aren't checked.  This candle evidently was returned MELTED and resold to me.  It was melted sideways, like still in box.  No wick to be found.  Another candle i got was fine.  This one returned.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Thomas W. Foley
review: My wife loves candles so she asked me if I could look for them because she loves the smell. Well, needless to say, I bought the candle and she was surprised that I found it. Guess next year I''ll be back to get another as long as Yankee keeps making them. Keep your wife happy or there could be consequences.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Mackenzie
review: Classic scent, great go to without the smell test! Bought for my single adult brother and his roommate, because he needs some womanly things and who else would buy them besides his sister! I knew and trusted this scent through years of experience with brand and flavor and he confirmed just how incredible his house smells now!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Bjcoppi
review: I'm generally a huge fan of Yankee Candles--they smell better and last longer than any other candles out there. That said, I wish this scent was a little stronger. It smells fantastic--but it just isn't very strong.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Babyrae
review: This candle has no scent at all. I placed it in a very small room to test it once I determined it seemed to have no scent. Even in a small place there was no aroma at all. This was the first time I purchased Yankee Candles from Amazon and I was very disappointed. Back to Walmart I guess ‚òπÔ∏è

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: R. Stephens
review: I thought this was a good brand but apparently not. A quarter way through burning the top of the glass turn black. The candle burns with plums of smoke coming out. Unusable and unsafe.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Wendi. Oregon. Nana
review: Love my new yankee candle. The fragrance is strong but not overpowering. Lasts longer than my bed bath and beyond candles. Would have given it a 5 but I think candles cost too much in general.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: lattecat
review: Love this scent and I'm so glad they have kept it all these years.  Great for holidays, house guests and for using when buyers come to look at your home when you are ready to sell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: emily brown
review: smells the whole house up of imitation cookie.. it's gets a little sickening after a couple hrs and  I have to put it out. I ordered a red apple Christmas candle that has no smell. I'm writing a review on that one too

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Lily Farrell
review: This candle lasts super long and The scent stays the whole time which is harder to find in candles and I got it for a great price! I used it almost everyday of December and it didn‚Äôt run out so now I can save the rest for next year!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: K. K.
review: Was pretty excited that I got such an a good deal on this candle.......not so much. I'm not one to complain but I am very disappointed. I am will not have an opportunity to ship it back so I'm stuck with a useless candle and out the money. Very bummed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Jkwell
review: I needed more of these. It leaves the most pleasant, cozy smell in my home while I'm working or reading or watching netflix. It's what you would imagine if you were baking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Bash
review: Can hardly smell anything, smells like burning wax.  Usual Yankee scent is missing.  No Covid if entire gathering can‚Äôt smell after opening it brand new abs lighting??!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: KellyKel
review: You can never go wrong with a Yankee candle. I have loved each and every one of them that I have ordered off of Amazon. The smell lingers forever and fills the room just perfectly. This one particular, has a very sweet smell to it and I love it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Sabrina M.
review: Smells divine and is long lasting! This candle makes three of my largest rooms smell just like a Christmas cookie factory. It‚Äôs highly scented and warm enough to travel to various rooms. This candle will not disappoint especially during the Christmas season!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Lauren Elizabeth
review: The candle is great but I bought it as a gift and there's not even a sticker on it. The decorative sticker that says "Yankee candle [and] Christmas Cookie" isn't there. Not in the box either so it's just a plain yellow candle. Lol. But it still smells really good, it's just not as pretty without the colorful sticker label

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Paul Cummings
review: I usually love Yankee candles but not this one. The event usually fills my house, this one does not. I feel like this candle is best saved for when the electricity goes out and you need a candle but don‚Äôt want to waste your good ones.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Elsie
review: This has been lasting me regular burns throughout the early 1/3 of winter so far. The scent and appearance are lovely and cozy, and a nice perfume of sweet cookies, that go well with the winter. Other brands I‚Äôve tried with cheaper candles have not been so elegant in their burning and scent and longevity. ....I want more!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Ce Cee
review: i have been buying Yankee candles for quite some time now. But this is the second purchase where the candle has absolutely no smell what so ever. No scent when burning. I wont purchase Yankee again unless it is from bed bath and beyond and maybe not from them.  this is what i get for ordering this online

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Then
review: The old Christmas Cookie candles were more potent and made your whole house smell like cookies.  These are still a great smell, but not as potent.  Miss the old vintage.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Chaotic Gypsy
review: I adore these candles in the winter with a nice warm tea and a good book, snuggled in a blanket. It is one of my mental escape objects.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: J.S.
review: I have gotten this brand and type of candle before, and they smelled like cookies. These candles have little, if any smell. Huge waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Smgg
review: ZERO STARS. MUST BE FAKE. Has ZERO smell!! Got on sale but wow. Expected it to still smell! Must be fake!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: megan bellone
review: Love the smell!!! Favorite candle! I stock up every year and ask for Christmas gifts too!!! Wish they had it year round...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amazon Customer
review: Sent my mom a gift when I didn't know what to get. She liked it! It's a candle! It was low effort! Sorry mom! I wish you had more hobbies and I would get you cooler stuff! xD

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: wendy s.
review: Love this. I have many Yankees from Amazon and I have not been disappointed with even one. Ordered about 20 over the holidays. They are packed safely and arrive in the same way .  I love them.  I ordered 4 of this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amazon Customer
review: My favorite scent, smells like home cooked Christmas cookies. Highly recommend, unable to find locally when out of season. Candle very securely packed, received in excellent condition with prompt delivery.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Chase L
review: Yankee is the best candle, hands down: best long-lasting but not overwhelming scent!  And at Amazon's price, it's an excellent value.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Heather Rorrer
review: The throw on this candle is amazing. It can smell up a 3K square foot home with no problem. It burns evenly, as well.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kevin in Alabama
review: It's a Yankee Candle, of course I love the scent. Best candle on the market. I do purchase Yankee Candle at an "on sale price". I can't justify paying more than $17.00 or so for a candle, but at "sale price" I'm in.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: CZMom
review: Smells delicious but pretty shattered. Amazon will send another one soon. Thank you, Amazon. This item is a gift I need by 12/15.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Susan F.
review: I didn't expect to love this candle, but I got it as a promo during Black Friday while out shopping so I decided to light it first during the holidays. I fell in love, it smelled like my dream home and sweet, but not overpowering. I was so excited to find it on Amazon on sale so I HAD to snatch it up.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kris Dumschat
review: Not sure if I received a faulty candle but I have not been able to smell much from this candle when burning it. Disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kiersta D Barnes
review: Normally I love yankee candles, but the Christmas Cookie scent literally smells like nothing. It lasts a long time so that‚Äôs a plus. I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 because at least it didn‚Äôt smell bad...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: dellon
review: This is the Yankee candle we all know and love, the one that makes the whole entire area smell delicious. That amazing smell you get when you walk back into that room or living room with this candlelit smells like cookie heaven.  I would say some people get some duds or knockoff batches and they do not have a scent, but luckily the times I have ordered it was the real deal. Also, I wanted to share the price I paid, $13.99 right before Christmas! I suggest trying to wait for it to be this price but it is usually $19.99 most of the time. Even better deal than the company Yankee Candle offers itself.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: DARLA
review: I received Home Sweet Home, as a house warming gift, and it smelled so good I had to order another. This one was Christmas Cookie, and is definitely a good one. Long lasting, and great smelling. Totally recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: N. McNair
review: Christmas Cookie used to be one of my favorite scents but now the flavor is barely existent. I don‚Äôt know what is happening with Yankee Candles. The last couple of years the quality had dropped radically. I have been getting so many duds with no smell for which I have paid a total of hundreds of dollars for. I am honestly about to be done with them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: CONNOR OSHEA
review: Yankee Cancel a favorite .. this fragrance delights you with the warmest loving fragrance .  Labels peel off can use to store dried flowes tie a bow n what a love gift.  Burning time so far 5 days constantly.  Bought teb .. Will puchase more.  Heavenly all year.  Sale was great help.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: KPH
review: Smells really good! It does smell like you're baking Christmas cookies in your home! Only downside is the expensive price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Lori R
review: Imagine Santa..after a long night of delivering gifts, eating Taco Bell instead of cookies, drinking prune juice laced with Miralax instead of milk, and then squatting over a glass jar to do his business... add a wick and light it.. and you have this candle. Only, if this is actually how this was created then Santa needs to see a doctor because the color is way too pale for all that. The candle we had prior to this one, which is the exact same, smelled wonderful. Which is the only reason I gave 3 stars.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Charlotte
review: I like the 1 wick candles because they don‚Äôt overpower a room.  This is a very sweet scent yet mellow with only one wick.  Great value.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Mrs. Williamson
review: I absolutely love this candle company, and this fragrance is reminiscent of cooking sugar cookies in the kitchen for the holidays, warm, sweet and a touch of vanilla. Scrumptious!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amazon Customer
review: I buy this candle every Christmas for gifts. The scent is so delicious! Lasts for months even if you burn it everyday .

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: WendyJo
review: This candle smells great, but I can't smell it much when it's burning.  I was pretty disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Jame
review: Yankee was bought out. Their candles barely throw scent but still charge for premium. I've switched to Village Candle company.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amazon Customer
review: This is how the candle was in the jar ! For the second time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amazon Customer
review: When it arrived the jar was broke. Didn't send send back because it wouldn't be worth the trouble

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Linda W. Lonnett
review: The scent of this candle is really really wonderful, it makes you crave for sugar cookies. The packaging on this candle was very good (thick cardboard in shape of the candle) and boxed tight.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Lynne
review: Someone gave me a Yankee Candles shade for Christmas but I never got around to getting to the store to get a candle. Thank God I found this one!! Now my shade has a nice base. Oh, and the candle smells great of course.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Let's Go Brandon!
review: Very nice holiday smell. Not overpowering at all. I ordered 4 various yankee candles for my moma nd 3 for myself. This 'Christmas Cookie' scent was the clear winner!  The other two scents I bought for myself were very very bad however (Home Sweet Home, and Salted Caramel).

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Thomas
review: My kids really love the sugary scents of the holidays, so this is perfect. It lasts a very long time, the scent is strong enough to fill even a large area. It‚Äôs not a sophisticated scent, but it‚Äôs a quality candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: ToobytheTuba
review: I love this candle! The scent is very nice and makes a room smell so good - plenty of scent but not overpowering. I'll be ordering more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Gina Maki
review: Scent is amazing!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Southern Woman
review: One of my favorite and still has that wonderful Yankee Candle smell that reminds me of fresh baked cookies.  Works for my teenage granddaughter as well......since lighting one of these 'fools' her every time as she excitedly jumps out of bed in the mornings while visiting me to see what I am baking.  (Great way to get a teenager Up early on the weekends....lol). Just got a recent order but label on jar candle was not same as pictured, nor same as previous ones.  Scent more chemical and does not burn as cleanly....smokey.......not sure what is going on, but don't think this is authentic Yankee candle or? See photo of this label on purchase attached

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: angela Lee schminkey
review: The best smelling candles in the world..  last so long burns forever. Makes my whole house smell. Nice size.came package  very nice ..no cracks  very good price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Ebs
review: Yankee candles are one of my favorite candles. They have a such good smells and when they are lit it is strong enough it fills the room but it is not over powering. This particular smell is my husbands favorite and he looks forward to it during the Christmas season.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: T Smith
review: One of several Xmas scents that are 'must have', especially if u have an artificial tree

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Avery G
review: This candle has a great scent- it does smell like Christmas Cookies! As with all Yankee candles, the longevity is top of the line. It came packaged very well and safely. I am beyond satisfied with this purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Laru
review: Ordered two candles and they arrived packaged destructible!  Love the scent and just received these so no comment on the Longevity of the candle yet.  But very satisfied with my order

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kenneth Reneau
review: USPS sucks at delivering glass. Swear the drivers throw fragile items. Paper carton the candle was in was torn at broken glass end. Had several cracks.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Anthony/Valerie
review: Really enjoy this scent. I was given a medium jar as a gift & purchased the large jar bc I loved it so much. Smells just like fresh baked sugar cookies. Candle burned evenly & has a good throw, it fills the room up nicely.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: JMI
review: I have had SO MANY Yankee Candles and this is the one that had zero scent!! It's not worth it. All 3 that I got (Caramel, Christmas Cookie, and Vanilla Cupcake) are either FAKE or super old stocks that the perfume has long dried up. And they are also full priced except the Christmas Cookie one. Dissapointed. Don't buy!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Charles
review: These were Christmas gifts and the individuals that received them were extremely pleased with the quality and aroma of the candles.  If their happy, I‚Äôm happy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: AS
review: I have had some Yankee's as of recent that were lacking in fragrance so I was worried about this one, but it is fabulous! Very please with my purchase. My home smells like fresh baked cookies all the time now.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Darlene
review: I always remember if you bought a yankee candle you were pretty much guaranteed a candle that smelled amazing. Well this candle does not smell at all, what a waste of money

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Stacey
review: Had exact same candles several years ago and they smelled wonderful. This I can‚Äôt even smell if it‚Äôs right in front of me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: svl
review: Yankee candle not as good as they used to be.  Very little scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: VAM17
review: My favorite yankee candle. The only one I even buy honestly. Usually I purchase bath and body works candles because the scent is so potent and the candle life is good but I make an exception around the holidays for this one :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Michelle Brown
review: I love the smell of the candles that make it smell like you‚Äôve been baking! These larger candles last for a long time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: FlGal91
review: This candle was a Christmas gift for a friend.  I personally feel that you can't go wrong with Yankee Candles - especially if the recipient is a "candle person", which my friend is!!  She was very happy with her candle - and I am happy knowing that she liked it - and with AMAZON you always get "a bang for your buck"!!  Happy New Year - AMAZON !!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: KimMi
review: The scent is great and long lasting.  Perfect holiday gift.  My favorite holiday scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: layne kuhlman
review: This candle lasts a very long time and the scent is wonderful.  I don't know how many of my friends have come over and asked upon entering if I am baking cookies.  My favorite scent of all!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Adam P.
review: Maybe I had higher expectations, but I felt while this candle smells nice initially, I couldn't really smell much after about 5 minutes. I do like fact that cover is glass; I've used other candles that had metal lids which become scolding hot.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Coni Lyn
review: Packaging was fine, arrived in one piece. On time delivery. There is absolutely no scent. Had this burning for hours, and nothing. Not even a faint scent unless I put my face to the fire. Would not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: DRDC
review: This is a great scent for the holidays.  Nice alternative to the traditional pine, peppermint. Etc. Candles burn safely and last for days.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Flankzy
review: Tis the season for the best candle in the world. "Her Candles Smell Awesome" Amazing like always. Yankee candle is the best in the biz Facts!!! huge Win!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Preston Flurkey

author: CTaylor
review: I have been buying Yankee candles for 20 years. Ordered 2 Yankee candles and both came today. This particular one "Christmas Cookie" appears to be a fake! I'm 99% positive. The bottom of the jar doesn't have the "normal" Yankee candle sticker. Also it smells like a cheap vanilla sent from the dollar store. There is very little smell. You can also tell that it was poured very smoothly. Yankee candles are not smooth like that and have waxy oily fragrant bubbles in them! I have never been so disappointed. Definitely will never order from this seller again. I paid way to much money for this candle, for it to smell so cheap! I know what Christmas cookies Yankee candles smell like and this isn't it!!! I'm a stay at home mom so I don't get out often but lesson learned. So so disappointed! :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: HeatherY
review: I purchase this particular scent a lot, it's my mom's very favorite.  When I walk into my parent's house, I don't smell their dogs, last night's dinner, or even the coffee they have brewing.  I'm smacked in the face with a wall of this strong sugar cookie scent and it is wonderful.  The candles seem to last forever (or a few months until I buy her a new one).  They have a single wick which I personally prefer, as it increases the burn time, and the scent is really strong even with a single wick. I do agree that the rim of the candle can become coated in soot, and the candle is so large it's difficult to reach all the way in to light it without getting soot on your hand.  A BBQ lighter or long match solves both those problems.

review: We absolutely love the scent.  It is perfect for the Christmas and all year long.  We never get tired if it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amanda McDaniel
review: Product came melted. Unable to use.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Gloria
review: Still burning strong 3 months later

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: C. Bongiorno
review: Long-lasting candle.  Great scent, but a Yankee Candle used to fill a room with its aroma.  Now, you only smell it walking by the candle.  Not nearly as strong as it used to be, but pleasant nonetheless.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Nilda S Robinson
review: I bought 4 candles because they were the special of the day. I have burned 2 out of 4 and you CANNOT smell the scent. I think they were old candles and that is why they were on sale, I am So very disappointed!! I love a great smelling candle but will never buy yankee candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: J.S.R.
review: This is a basic vanilla candle. I wanted something a bit more festive/evocative, but all I got was something akin to a vanilla air freshener. How disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Tyler Morgan
review: No scent even though it‚Äôs a Yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Hector Pagan
review: AS DESCRIBE, ADVERTISED,

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Teresa B.
review: I love Yankee candles and just couldn‚Äôt pass this up!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amazon Customer
review: Not sure if I got a defective Candle but this is one of the weakest Yankee Candle scents I've ever had the displeasure of purchasing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Wanda Bradley
review: I absolutely love this product it smells so good and the scent stays in the house for so long

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie

review: Love this scent. One of my faves. Smells exactly like xmas cookies. Highly recommended

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie

review: Smells great

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amy R.
review: I was greatly looking forward to using this candle because it was tied to emotions from my childhood.  We used this candle around Christmas time growing up.  I bought it hoping it would envelop the room with the same scent.  Sadly,  I could barely smell it even if it was burning a few hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Tip your groomer
review: It looks like a candle. It smells like a candle. I bought a candle! If you‚Äôre looking for a candle then this is for you!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Jennifer Tschida
review: It isn't as sweet as I was hoping for.  It has a slice scent to it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Flocka Seagulls
review: smells nice but sickly sweet & I know christmas cookies are sweet cookies but i dont want to smell sugar in my house, i'm trying to lose weight over here

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Melissa
review: The scent was nice but it didnt really fill a room considering it was a large jar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kindle Customer
review: Fantastic scent of warm sugar cookies baking! Burns forever! The price is so low buy two!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: KMS
review: Nice scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Ray Quiroz
review: As stated above, no scent and it wick is short as instructed and it burned for over 4 hours!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Nutters
review: Omg so awesome!! Smells yummy and the price was awesome!! Always love the fast FREE shipping !!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Michael J. Manico
review: I just lit the candle yesterday and it has zero smell!!!! I always buy them in the store and this scent is my favorite candle!!! This has nothing just the smell of burning wax!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
review: Did not like this product. No scent, before and/or after burning at all....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amazon Customer
review: great shipping, packaging, and scent. Love this candle!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Teacher
review: I sent my candle it was not needed as a Christmas gift. But the smell was awesome.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
