review: I thought I did my study between soy or wax,,,Soy burns clean and no residue let behind,,but not much of a bang on sent...Wax burns longer but not complete but seems to put out twice the sent as soy,,,I guess is buyers choice,,,Oh..and buy the way wax smalls good without having to be lit.....GOOD LUCK!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Chicken Wing
review: Ordered these for my holiday table.  They arrived perfect and smell so good.  I loved saving so much money since I purchased from Amazon instead of the actual store.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Amazon Customer
review: I have always purchased B&BW candles. This was my 1st Yankee Candle and I must say it lived up to the hype. I burned it several days during the holiday season and it could be smelled all over my house every time. It burned evenly and it burned down to the bottom of the jar. I got my money's worth. I definitely will buy Yankee Candles again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: William Thompson
review: This candle is i think the best one we have ever gotten. We burned it right before Thanksgiving and Christmas!!! It smells like a Christmas tree and it makes it feel like Christmas already! I highly recommend this candle if you like the smell of Christmas trees.üéÑüòÉ

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Shannon
review: Great smell, similar to my favorite Christmas tree type, noble fir. We have an artificial tree now, so I miss the smell and bought this to burn during the season. This candle LASTS way longer than others I've tried. I've probably burned it for 30+ hours and there's still half or so left!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: MJ
review: I was sent an old expired candle, it was so old the rubber on the lid was a gross brownish yellow, there's no scent left, the wicks won't stay lit, really terrible, it's too bad that a company would do that to their customers.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: jamie

author: Steve E.
review: I love balsam candles, especially the one from Bath & Body Works, but this Yankee variety doesn't put off much of a scent and it constantly pools up with liquefied wax, making the wicks burn very low and inefficiently.

author: Elizabeth A. Hodges

I have the exact same candle in a jar with a heavy glass lid that I purchased 2 years ago, and that one infuses our house with way more smell. Not sure what's changed with this one, but I'm a little disappointed. Happy I got it on sale.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: cassandra
review: First product arrived melted with no visible wicks. I immediately went to return them but decided shipping them back was a barrier and pain in my butt - so I decided to keep them. Had to melt the wax to even find the dang wicks. üôÑ But this wax is off big time. I‚Äôve bought from yankee a bunch from my local mall, so I feel familiar with the products‚Ä¶. And these candles aren‚Äôt it. The wax is like a dollar store candle. I do not think these are actual yankee candles. I would skip this purchase. I‚Äôve been buying village candles from Amazon and they‚Äôve smelt better, and felt cleaner.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Coloratura Kiki
review: I like candles, especially on dark winter evenings, and even in Southern California, it gets chilly in the evenings, and of course our winter nights are long. I bought two of these large candles: Balsam and Cedar and Red Apple Wreath. (Wish I'd gotten Christmas Cookie.) To me, the Balsam and Cedar is the stronger smelling, but it smells a little more like soap than like a forest or a Christmas tree! The Red Apple Wreath has a lovely scent, but it would have been nice if the scent were a little stronger. The candles do last quite a long time, and thankfully, they burn clean. No nasty dark marks on ceilings or walls. That is a very important point to me. I like the containers, but these candles are so large that you really need a barbecue lighter to light them once they burn down low. Overall, very nice candles that would have been perfect five stars had the scent been up to par, but it just wasn't. This is especially true of my favorite of the two, the Red Apple Wreath. It's so difficult to find a really good scented candle today, and, sadly, these don't really rise to the occasion. Almost, but not quite. I will definitely use them, but I'm disappointed in the lack of a stronger scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Summer08
review: I‚Äôm annoyed it was shipped like this and don‚Äôt feel like going  through the process of returning it. üò´

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Candle Harlot
review: *Notes include* Top Notes: Golden Apples, Cinnamon Leaf, Clove Mid Notes:Apple Peel, Cracked Walnuts, Brown Sugar Base Notes: Amber, Melted Butter, Maple Syrup, Vanilla This candle is a must for the holidays. It's great because it's Macintosh with a little spice. Not too much but enough to let you know it's a festive candle. On a side note, I can't smell cloves. I hate cloves but love this candle. Has decent throw.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: sammy1
review: I purchased this candle as a ME gift. A one time purchase for each member of Amazon. Received it quickly, it was wrapped very securely as to avoid breakage. No one make a room or even house smell this good. I live in a large home and lite this about 1.5 hours until my husband came home. He came in and the first thing he said was how great the house smelled. Thank you Amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Grandma11
review: Not a real Yankee candle. It barely smells. pass on these.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Karla
review: we bought this candle for a Christmas gift, 1st one we received was with the other Yankee Candle we brought, one candle in another box packaged beautifully, but this candle was in a plastic bag and needless to say the glass jar was broke. So we replaced it, just received it today, glass jar again shattered. Couldn't figure out why the driver even delivered it considering you can hear the shattered glass in the box. :*(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: mjcali
review: You can't beat a Yankee candle. I'm a full grown 60 year old man that knows when times are stressful, a great way to help destress is by taking care of myself in my home. My best friend and fishing buddy was diagnosed with terminal cancer. I live in a beautiful area of the forest in northern California. He and his wife would come up often in his final years. I would light candles in their guest room before they arrived and they always commented on how nice it was to walk into the room with that smell. Having a nice scented candle when trying to let go of the weight is a great way to let go. Treat yourself or a friend to a little relaxer now and then.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Jen
review: This smells delicious. Very Christmas-y. It‚Äôs honestly my favorite candle, except for the fact that the price will jump all over the place, from 14.99-16.99 all the way up to 30 dollars or more. I use Amazon because it is supposed to be affordable. We are in a pandemic right now, and, this will sound crazy but this candle is very therapeutic to me. I would buy one or two a week if they were more affordable. I‚Äôve relied on Amazon heavily throughout this pandemic, and I know that I‚Äôm not owed anything, but you guys could afford to stop the price gouging on not only necessities, but also the small things that make people happy. Thank you and I hope you will submit this review.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Marie Bonadonna
review: Yankee Candle is ALWAYS my go to,last time I tried a new brand (Happy Wax wax melts) regretted it Yankee candle always has the perfect balance the perfect scents that actually fill your desired area I just found it odd that the wick was a little short maybe it was pre trimmed or maybe it‚Äôs just me but found it odd I hope it‚Äôll burn as well as all my other Yankee Candles and I can‚Äôt wait to get my Yankee candle waxes either! The scent of Red Apple Wreath is incredible the longevity is amazing no complaints other than odd about the wick being so small.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Amy
review: We purchase a Yankee Candle every year for the holidays.  It is traditionally a family event.  This year had sicknesses and distance so we ordered the candle for the first time.  It was still a family event.  We love the scent of the candle and burn it almost every day during the holidays.  The scent brings such a good atmosphere and good memories.  I  have asthma and can't tolerate most candle scents.  I have not had a reaction to any of our holiday candles yet.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Evelyn Ann
review: This was packaged very well that it arrived in pristine condition. I've burned it a couple of days now for about 1-2 hours and the smell last for hours and you definitely smell in the room/house the next day as well. Will definitely buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Inadia xue
review: I know buying candles without smelling them is scary but this scent is great. It's a gentle apple without being "pier one" overpowering.  Just enough Christmas without smelling like pine-sol soaked cinnamon. I'll surely buy it again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Tammy Jewell
review: Received the SAME DAY! Couldn't ask for better than that. The candles were well packaged. Price was better than in the stores, faster than ordering direct and still had a strong scent. I am very happy and would recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: bettygarcia
review: I have been burning Yankee candles for years.  There is something wrong with this Red Apple Wreath candle.  From day one, it sputtered and sizzled when I tried to light the wick; like there is water in the candle.  I persisted, because I do like the smell, but it hasn't gotten better.  Oftentimes the candle puts itself out. leaving an unpleasant smoke pervading the air.  When I trim the wick, necessary to prevent black smoke when it gets too long, it starts up with the sputtering again when I try to light it.  I've tried putting the candle under a warmer to melt the wax, to pour out some of the wax, to elongate the wick.  This has been a fruitless process.  I've ended up pouring half of the candle out, trying to get it to burn properly.  At this point, the wick is too long.  Black smoke pours off of it when lit.  I'm afraid to trim it anymore, in fear that I'll have to pour out even more of what little is left of the wax.  I am very disappointed in this candle.  I wonder if it is truly a Yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Audrey
review: Smells like hot wax with a hint of apple when burning. Looks like it was defective or oozed out in storage. Would never purchase this scent again, 2 other scents ordered at the same time seemed normal.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Ch
review: Smells nice. Be patient as the first hour or so you can barely smell it but then once the wick/wax gets to a certain level it's amazing every time you light it.

review: Red Apple is probably my favorite of all the scents. This candle doesn‚Äôt let me down with the true Red Apple scent either! It fills my kitchen with that fresh apple scent after cooking something delicious, but smelly. I wouldn‚Äôt feel comfortable giving this as a gift, because there were lots of tiny irregular bubbles on one side of the jar.

Additionally, even though it was Prime, it took 19 DAYS to receive. I got two emails saying it was delayed. That was pretty frustrating because I ordered it with a dinner party in mind. BE PREPARED FOR REALLY SLOW SHIPPING. SLOWER THAN ADVERTISED.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: nunyo
review: Yankee Candle's Large Red Apple and Wreath candle arrived by international shipping with melted red wax all over the jar lid and on the outside of the jar.  I have it in a medium-sized room and practically no scent noticeable even when I put my face directly over the burning candle.  Many air bubbles appear to permeate the wax in the candle.  On a different note, YC Cherries on Snow candle arrived a few days before by domestic shipping and it is great.  Fills the room with a nice aroma even with a short burn time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Eusebius
review: I like most all of the 22-ounce candles from Yankee Candle, but I don't really love this one. Even though the scent is somewhat reminiscent of apples and cinnamon, to me it smells a little too artificial.  When I first lit it and later came back into the room I couldn't recognize the scent and couldn't connect it with the candle.  Maybe it's the walnut and maple that throws it off, but either way, it's not my favorite. I like it, but not as much as the other Yankee Candle fragrances. As I wrote in another review, we've tried different brands of fragrance candles and none of them even come close to the Yankee Candles. They are long lasting and fragrant - the scent is even and continuous right down to the bottom of the candle. Other cheaper brands don't last ¬º the time or have ¬º the scent and actually turn out to be more expensive than a Yankee Candle because of this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: R Dwayne Stevenson
review: Nice size candle, pretty, and smells like Christmas!  No complaints--Recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Riss
review: Comforting, warm scent. I have been searching for the longest time for a candle that reminds me of my childhood Christmases and this candle is it! My mother always had a candle that smelled just like this lit during the holidays and I missed that smell so much.  Now i will light this candle during the holidays just like my mother did.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: SquirrelGirl
review: Smells great, and Yankee Candles seem to burn really slowly, so they are long-lasting.  I was hesitant in the past because they are expensive, but the quality is great, and they last longer than other comparably-sized candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Michael Taylor
review: The Red Apple Wreath scents are supposed to be composed of cinnamon, red apples, maple, and walnut.  The cinnamon and red apples appear to be the strongest.  In my humble opinion, while the candle can be used year-round, the scent is most appropriate for the fall and winter.  A pretty good scent from Yankee Candle.  If you like red apples and cinnamon, then this candle is for you. Recommended.

author: gwen benene
review: Smell my whole house up sooo goodüíñ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Michelle
review: I bought this candle since my mother loved apples and we just lost her unexpectedly. I took a picture and sent it to my brothers. I looked at the picture again and noticed a glare made a cross with the cinnamon sticks. It was a nice sign from her. Scent is subtle yet very nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Saw
review: great holiday cent candle came well packed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: .david chad helms
review: Love these candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Dh
review: Love it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kathie Lee
review: This has been my favorite candle for many many years... Unfortunately... I would say that Yankee Candle has gone cheap... as the smell is not as strong as it used to be, nor does the smell last as long... After one use, there was little to no smell in one room.  I remember being able to burn the candle in one room and the sent was perfect and nice throughout the house.  Very disappointing.  I like Kringle Candle much better.  Yankee Candle's quality diminished after the company was sold. Kringle Candle is the same family that started Yankee Candle and has a better ethos.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mellie
review: This candle (Midsummer Night) used to be one of the strongest scented (if not THE strongest) made by Yankee Candle. As I have written in many reviews on Amazon, and YC too, Yankee Candles have practically lost their scent. Almost 20 years ago, I saw these candles in a gift shop, and bought my first one (Ocean Water), and I was hooked. I actually became a crazy candle lady. Well over time, YCs became less and less scented (and no, it's not my nose, I've ruled that out). So I stopped buying them, though I went kicking and screaming. I now buy other brands that have stronger scents, but I miss the nice burn quality of YCs. Anyway, I bought this candle on impulse, thinking it just MIGHT still have some scent throw, since it used to be such a strong scent.  I burned it for the first time yesterday evening, for the recommended four hours for the large-jar style, and only got hints of the scent. It is the same one from days of yore but is greatly reduced in strength. I'm going to burn it again later today and decide if I can smell it enough to keep it. I hope I can decide to. And it really does have that good, consistent burn--no tunneling, soot, or anything like that. But what's up with the loss of scent, Yankee Candle? (I called the company one time, and they just blew me off). Update: I'm keeping this candle. I really enjoy it and its nice, consistent burn. I can smell it, but the scent is indeed greatly reduced compared to in the past. This is still probably one of the stronger scents offered by Yankee Candle, though most of them, these days, have practically any detectable fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Candle Harlot
review: *Notes included* Top Notes: Ozone, Leafy Greens, Bergamot Mid Notes: Lily of the Valley, Rose Base Notes: Vetiver, Cedar, Musk, Woody Notes I loved Yankee Candles until they went into cost saving mode. I can't smell this dang thing. I even purchased it 3 times to make sure I just didnt get a dud. Maybe the lid stored ajar or something. No sir. No smell. It turned into a half bath candle for chili night. I wouldn't even trust it to scent a whole bathroom. If you want a close scent with much more throw, look towards Goose Creek's Soft Linen Breeze or Kringle's Warm Cotton. Both are better money spent. This was my favorite scent...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Molly
review: Classic, masculine and haunting. This is my all time favorite Yankee Candle scent. Tip: If you keep the wick trimmed, burn it for about 3-hours at a time, and snuff it with the lid instead of blowing it out, you will find that it burns more evenly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Nick
review: I'm a single 25 year old male who lives alone. Normally I opt for plug-in or "set and forget" air fresheners, but the ambiance of a candle goes a long way when you have company. A friend of mine purchased this candle a few months back and I had no clue they made candles with such a masculine scent -- couple that with the affordability/convenience of Amazon and I had to jump on it. Just buy it, bro. Trust me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: First I wanna start by saying this is the best candle I've ever smelt in my life so far. I used to steal my mom's midsummer night candle when I was younger and I've just recently gotten into using candles every day. It helps with my depression, anxiety, ADHD, and ocd. They're just something simple that helps wake me up in the morning and calm my mind at night. I purchased this online because shopping with my 1 yr old gives me panic attacks when I don't have my fiance or mom with me. I was very happy to receive my shipment next day for no charge and it came in tact. It's a GORGEOUS yet simple addition for my collection. I was disappointed in the amount of cardboard that was used in the package. There were 3 boxes. And I can't recycle where I live so I try to not bring non reusable boxes into the house. Still 5 stars because despite my disappointment in the amount of cardboard used, it's still absolutely perfect. I wish I would have gone to the store instead because of that, but amazon has made my life long battle with panic attacks SO MUCH easier and less stressful. 100/10.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: L. L.
review: For decades I purchased this candle above all others, then about 7 years ago I discovered the scent had less and less, or very little throw of scent, if any scent at all..I've burned several large candles in a small room at once and hours later, nothing but a smoking candle. (Yes, I cut wicks to size) .I heard the original owner sold the company, so after looking it up...I'll purchase from the owners sons shop of WONDERFUL candles, and not waste money anymore on Yankee candles. I'm very disappointed in what a Corporation buying this once great candle has done.The current owners should TALK to whoever is making your candles now, and tell them to put scent back in them, or they'll keep declining at this rate and so will your business.People do catch on eventually if you cut costs.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: MotoSpark
review: I purchased this Candle after a friend a work had a very small version of this Candle, I had a great scent and would fill his office with no problem.  Well that was a few years back.  I received my full size Midsummer's Night Candle and found the scent to be very weak.  Both the Candles had the same weak scent, my buds tiny version from years ago blew this one away in strength.  I can only guess that YC has been skimping on The Old Family Recipe.  Maybe cost savings, who knows.  I know that I will think twice before purchasing another one.  Its a shame, shame on your YC.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Enzo Matric
review: Smell wonderful but came with no wick and bad looking candle, this is ordered in oct not that hot, it should not look like that, just horrible, made yankee candle brand looks bad. No qulaity control at Amazon warehouse? Waste of time. Package looks fine shipped out defective product. Amazon gave me a refund so gave 2 stars

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Spazoo
review: This is my favorite candle/scent, it has been for years.  I usually buy them at BB&B but saw them  on Amazon so restocked my supply here.  These have NO SMELL!!!! I've burned them in big space and in little space, just to check, but they give off a faint scent  and only if you are standing right above them. I'm not sure if Yankee messed up or if these are knockoffs but what a disappointment, especially since I bought 4.  Color me sad. :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Just4M0
review: Didn't like it at first but changed my mind! Purchased this on PrimeDay based on Amazon reviews.  What caught my eye was "Masculine scent"  "Department store smell".  However, when I opened the jar it smelled more like bad underarm deodorant you'd purchased at a low end drugstore. Figured I'd give it a chance.  Burning it makes the room smell wonderful. Yes, it does indeed have that "Department store smell". Lasts a long time. Slow burning. Very little ash. Cons:  Does contain synthetic fragrance.  Not 100% natural

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: D.
review: I saw this candle at a friends house and love the scent. My friend said her husband had the candle for 10 years. I went on Amazon and read the reviews. I noticed most people said the candle had a very faint smell and the scent wasn't as strong as it used to be. I was hoping the company had read the reviews and it had improved the scent. Unfortunately, this is not the case. My candle arrived yesterday. I had high hopes for this candle. This was my first time purchasing a Yankee Candle and I was looking forward to enjoying this scent in my home. I was sadly mistaken. This candle do not have a scent. I literally have to lean over the candle and even then I can barely smell anything. The scent fades so quickly that even when the candle is burning, you still can not hardly smell it. I paid $18.00 for this candle which more than I have ever paid for a candle before. I get stronger scented candles from the Dollar Tree that smell better than this one. I will never purchase this brand again. I don't recommend anyone to purchase this candle if you are looking for a decent smelling candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mikey
review: I mostly use candles from DW Home. I'm a fan of Sea Salt & Thyme. I would open the candle lid and even without lighting it, you can already smell it in the room, although quite lightly, and much more intensely if you light it. Since I heard good things about Yankee candles, thought I'd give this one a shot. Very nice smell, almost like a masculine cologne. I lit it for 15 minutes and can barely smell it, I have to have it right near my hand as I'm typing on my laptop to even smell it as much as I'd like to. The smell is fantastic, once again, but it does not spread throughout the room very much, it either has to be near my hand or I have to literally pick it up to smell it well. With all of my other candles, like the one I mentioned above, it takes all of 5 minutes and I can smell it throughout my entire APARTMENT. Sorry, Yankee, but would not purchase from you again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Chris W.
review: Sage and Citrus has been my favorite scent since the 90‚Äôs. This was absolute junk. There was absolutely no scent throw when lit; no one in my house could smell it burning. The old Yankee Candles would scent my whole house. It was hard for me to believe this was even an actual Yankee Candle, so I looked it up and discovered the original owner of Yankee Candle now owns Kringle Candle and still uses the old Yankee family recipes. I‚Äôm going to order from there and hopefully have better luck. I hate when tried and true companies cut corners and think no one will notice. I tried to burn this one to get my money‚Äôs worth, but it ended up in the trash. Don‚Äôt waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Webster
review: I bought several Yankee Candles at once with this type of flat,tin "lid" that simply "sits on top" of the jar..  Until now, I had always bought the chunky, tumbler glass "lid. " I decided to try this lid because the candle looked sleeker .  Anyways,..... when I went to burn it, it had NO  scent.  I tried another, then a third.  It seemed that perhaps because there  was no tight closure with the looser " flat lid"  , the scent had "worn off " or "worn away." "escaped"  When I mentioned this to my girlfriends at lunch, they had had the same experience with this kind of flat lid vs. the tight -fitting  glass, chunky lid.  So... If you want a lovely candle and are not looking for a scent,  this candle _style is for you. It burns slowly, ( all Yankee Candle do !!)  ,so you get more for your $.than a regular candle.  I just always buy Yankee Candles for their scent.  The scent is ALWAYS consistent, as is the quality of the product.  Yankee Candles don't get smokey as some candles often do. I'd also like to add that Yankee Candles do an excellent job wrapping and shipping their candles.  All the candles are well-wrapped and arrive amazingly fast. Bottom line ?  I LOVE  Yankee Candles . Great value for product and service.. I'd just  warn you to think twice before choosing the  candles with the "flat lids."  over other options. I get so upset just thinking about the $$$$ I spent on these flat lid, scentless candles that are just sitting in my cupboard !!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Ikram
review: My first time buying this famous American candle and I was simply shocked how shoddily it was put together! Looks like the candle melted somewhere along the way and a 3rd of it traveled all the way to the top. Had to dig around with a knife to chisel the top part to even find the wick! The candle has a good scent (not sure if that's really eucalyptus) and once I coaxed out the wick, it worked. Not sure if it's the product manufacturer or the person/company that's shipping these! Or maybe it's just Amazon that doesn't pay attention who they allow here to sell stuff. For the price, I think I got jipped! At $28 a jar, almost twice as much as similar size candles form other manufacturer, this is totally outrageous!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: D. Ward
review: I had read some reviews and wrongly took a chance anyway thinking perhaps it was older stock on clearance. This candle burned hot and ashy in spite of constant wick trimming. The scent is different and burns"off" I should have taken photos of the black soot mess. I was impatient on a genuine YK order and jumped at prime delivery and a sale price. It was not worth more than this review as a warning. Yes it's half burned because it burned quite  quickly and it is a candleesnt to be burned. If you don't mind tons of soot, it's okay, but who knows what's in it ?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: MC
review: I normally order my Yankee Candles directly from Yankee Candle's website, but I wanted one in a hurry because company was coming. I adore the scent of the Citrus & Sage Yankee Candle and have been purchasing it for years at stores, and online from YC...So, I know very well what it's supposed to smell like...it's a strong, very pleasant citrusy/herby scent, and it always lasts down to the very end of the candle. This candle had absolutely no, and I mean NO scent at all...I was so very disappointed...And it was not cheap by any means!! It was supposed to be coming from Yankee Candle, but I find that hard to believe..I will never order candles from here again and I cannot recommend these candles!!  F-

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Ginny Williams
review: If you are looking for a candle that is long lasting, burns evenly and is perfectly scented with a clean scent I suggest trying Warm Luxe Cashmere by Yankee Candle. Cold whiff it has a soft, clean scent. Warm whiff after it's lit it gives off just the right amount of Clean cashmere with hints of light musk. I've had so many compliments from those visiting about the scent this candle carries. My husband isn't much of a candle fan but he actually enjoys this particular candle. I love sitting down after I've cleaned my home to enjoy the scent this candles gives throughout the home. It seems to travel well but isn't over powering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Char
review: It‚Äôs funny, I read a bunch of reviews saying the candles don‚Äôt have a strong scent anymore....I purchased anyway, then, on the raido this morning I heard people have been reviewing on Amazon that candles no longer have a strong scent...they said it‚Äôs because people who have COVID lose sense of smell and it‚Äôs a bunch of people who don‚Äôt know they have Covid. I thought that was interesting. Still, about my candle, it had some bubbles up top as you can see but it did arrive packaged well and seems to be burning fine. I did not trim the wick as recommended. The wick seemed like it was a fine length and it‚Äôs burning well. I had read a review that someone said they trimmed the wick and then the candle didn‚Äôt burn. I just put it in a safe place that‚Äôs up high and level...fireplace mantle, and it‚Äôs burning great. This scent smells like men‚Äôs cologne. It smells great, reminds me of my teen years (25 years ago).

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Senior Citizen
review: I bought this candle because Yankee Candles have always had a wonderful fragrance. The faint fragrance is okay, but barely detectable. Fragrance is the reason I bought this candle. I can buy candles with no fragrance a whole lot less than I paid for this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Scottyre
review: I have always liked Yankee candles. This is one of my favorite scents.  Their candles have always burned well for me and this is no exception.  I especially like the way they are packaged and shipped. There is no way they will arrive broken to your home. That is a huge factor for me.  I've purchased a couple different brands through Amazon that have arrived shattered. Only to have them replaced to have the replacement arrive shattered also. How does that? Yankee candle goes to great lengths to ensure their candles arrive to you just as they suppose to, all in one piece. This candle might be a bit strong smelling for some people, I however enjoy the deep woodsy smell this one gives off.  It's also a long burning candle.  Not one that you will light and then be almost empty  in a few short hours. I very much like that. No one likes spending extra money on a quality candle only to have it burn down in a few short hours.  Between the wonderful scents they have that are true to their name, and the longevity of their burn time, this has been bringing me back as a very happy repeat customer for years

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: Got these on sale for $10.00 which seemed like a steal but these are definitely counterfeit yankee candles, scent is much weaker than original, stickers and serial number look off. Didn‚Äôt even think it was possible. Stay away from this seller. No wonder these were on sale. Original candle is on the right for comparison

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kataholik
review: I purchased two 'medium perfect pillar' candles in Clean Cotton. Scent is great and was happy  so reason I gave it four stars. My mom then bought a 'large jar' and the scent is about one half of the candle in the pillar size. The complaints on the Clean Cotton were ironically from the large jar. I contacted Yankee and they said that "we use as much fragrance oil as possible to to create a smell that is true-to-life as possible while delivering a candle that will burn properly from beginning to the end." They also said that there are factors that that could impact the scent such as room size, other odours present, air flow and temperature (which sounds like hog wash to me). Yankee will replace the candle along with necessary attachments if you receive a weak candle, so please contact them accordingly. Hope this helps.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: JoMarch
review: The scent of the Sage & Citrus is great.  I have  high ceilings and a 2-story foyer which makes it difficult to get the scent to stay in the living room as it wafts upstairs.  This scent does permeate the first floor.  The candle was less money than usual and I assumed the reason was it wasn't top quality.  I was right. There were bubbles on the top of the candle.  I don't know if that means it's old or not, but I've seen that with sale candles before.  It's fine for my use but I wouldn't give it as a gift.  That's why 4 instead of 5 starts

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: J. Lopez
review: I haven't lit the wick yet but when I smell the scent of this candle right out of the jar it doesn't impress me at all.  The smell of this candle almost reminds me of bug spray and I'm tempted to throw this one out.  I'll update this review after I've had this candle lit for a few hours but until then I am not impressed. UPDATE- Well I've been burning this candle in our bathroom off and on for a few days now and I must admit that I don't mind this scent.  In my personal opinion it smells terrible straight from the jar but the scent that the candle releases when it's burning is actually pretty nice.  The scent isn't my all time favorite but I wouldn't mind purchasing this again.  As far as it's potency goes,  I was expecting this candles scent to be a bit stronger, especially since this candle is a Yankee candle so I'm a tad bit disappointed about that.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: NanaNow
review: Weak is not the word for this. There is a slight smell but what I don‚Äôt know. Let‚Äôs call it semi sweet. I at first thought something was wrong with my nose so I decided on a little experiment. Since I am home all day, I lit the candle in my living room and let it burn the full 8 hours that my son was out of the house. Only the second time with this candle. When he returned I asked if he like the candle scent. HE COULD BARELY SMELL IT AFTER AN 8 HOUR BURN WALKING FROM OUTSIDE DIRECTLY INTO THE ROOM. Need I say more??

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Candle Harlot
review: *Notes include* Top Notes: Bergamot, Citrus, Blackberry Mid Notes: Cashmere Vanilla, Powdery Rose, Tobacco Flower Base Notes: Amber, Cocoa, Musk Great clean scent with a little hint of baby powder. I used to buy these for the last few decades. Unfortunately I believe it's been discontinued by Yankee Candle U.S. You might be able to buy it in europe on a normal basis.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mermaid Girl
review: I have several Yankee Candles and we burn one each night with dinner. It is something we enjoy as we prepare dinner every night. I can say it truly makes each night a lovely event. This candle scent does not disappoint! It's a wonderful sage and citrus blend. It is a soft and natural scent and not perfumey at all, if that makes sense. It is reminiscent of something earthy without being too harsh. I have enjoyed using this candle as part of our everyday life. If you like a soft sage with touch of citrus then you will likely like this candle very much. The citrus is soft and not overpowering what-so-ever. I truly hope this helps.I highly recommend this candle! Of all the Yankee candles I have, this is among my very favorite!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: O truant Muse
review: I love eucalyptus so much - I have horrible sinus problems and anything that smells like it really helps. However, I can tell you right now that this smelled nothing like eucalyptus whatsoever. I had family property in a eucalyptus forest - it's honestly not a hard smell to replicate. I regret buying such a large candle now - if you're looking for something more like Vick's or something soothing for sinuses, try Oh Comadre! She makes a Vick's scented candle (tea tree, eucalyptus, etc, not medicinally harsh) and several mint scented candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Scratch Smith
review: I must have angered the candle gods recently, as I have ordered 3 candle duds from Amazon. The first had almost no throw, the second, almost no throw apart from burning wick scent, and then there was this: Yankee Candle's Midsummer's Night. I like the scent, but is very much like cologne, strong and heady. And it's rarely ever on sale like some of YC's other offerings. My first clue that something was off was the fact that Amazon shipped my order from the other side of the country, which they never do. My second clue was that while the YC box was undamaged, the softer material cradling the candle was stained and reeked of the candle itself. Ignoring the warning sign, I pulled the candle out and found that it was partially covered in fragrance oil and dark dye. I opened the candle and fragrance oil and dark dye sprayed out, onto the kitchen counter, my right arm, and one of my favorite Old Navy t-shirts. My spouse was nice enough to bleach the stains off the counter for me, but I will not be able to get the spots out of my t-shirt. Anyway, the candle was melted. The long trip across the country must have been too hot for it. And despite washing my arm twice, the strong scent and stains wouldn't come off until I had my shower that night. So I stank of Midsummer's Night for the rest of the day. I had a headache from the smell and the odorous experience has put me off wanting to purchase another Midsummer's Night candle for quite a while. Two stars because Amazon did give me a full refund for my ruined candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Clarissa
review: If you live in an actual oven, don‚Äôt buy these online from amazon. I love the scents I got, however whoever packed the boxes at the amazon warehouse missed Yankee candles instructions on how to orient their packing (there‚Äôs a very clear ‚Äúup‚Äù marking). Because of this my candles were placed sideways and they melted in the box. The wick is totally covered and they aren‚Äôt able to be used.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: BodeMeister
review: This candle does burn clean but requires some tender care to make sure the less heated sides are involved and have to be pushed in with a knife to get the full liquid head that is required for a great burn.  It is a great scent that starts out very pungent sage that luckily goes down and is a nice soothing scent that is good for any relaxing event.  i have had several Yankee candles and have to say the 2 wick ones with soy just aren't as aromatic and as long lasting as the mottled paraffin ones they are known for.  It burns clean but so do the paraffin ones and not sure what the advantage is unless you are able to determine a toxin/comparison between the two. When it domes down to burning this I usually have to push the 2 sides that are not near the flames inward so it burns evenly. It does have a great scent that is better after the first burn which is wickidly strong. I prefer the later stages of subtle scent of sage with a very small amount of citrus poiking out.  It lasts long  but not as much as their large paraffin wax candles that seem to last for a very long time.  Great thing is no soot, smells great after the first burn. The bad is very hot candle that needs constant attention and uneven wax burn.  I would not buy a 2 wick yankee again because of this.  Don't last as long and throw is less.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Yuki
review: I imagine I'm not alone in this issue - the candle's wick DOES NOT fit the candle at all! I burn it for a few hours and BLACK SMOKE is coming from the wick (which was properly trimmed beforehand) and the wick begins to MUSHROOM. So for those of you who don't know what that is - it's when the wick becomes messy and bigger and looks like a mushroom. It means that the wick does NOT fit the candle. I love the scent, I love Yankee candles, but this wick just wasn't it for me. Take that with a grain of salt.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: SandyVD
review: This candle reminds me of a man's cologne. I really like it. I am not one for floral smells. I tend to like scents like pine, linen, musk, and such. I found this to be a very pleasant scent and really enjoy it. There's nothing wrong with florals, I don't think they are feminine necessarily, but if you are a man and you want your home to smell good but feel like "classic manly" or something like that, you would like this candle. I am a woman, and not saying this candle is for one gender over the other, but it just reminds me of men's products so there you go, that's my opinion. Anyway, I will definitely buy again once this one is finished.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: LisaJ
review: I like the scent, it's really clean and fragrant enough to fill a room. It smells a little like fresh laundry. Compared to other candles in the same regular price range, I don't find it to be as good as a value. The jar isn't as pretty as others and looks much like inexpensive candles you can buy anywhere. It also doesn't burn as long for the size as other candles I've purchased. It's giftable in a sense that many people like candles, but the jar isn't very pretty and definitely the box it comes in isn't. For gifting, I'd suggest a nice bag with tissue and a little card because on its own it's not all that impressive when opening.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Yvette G
review: Unfortunately, two of my candles arrived damaged. As you can see from the pictures, it‚Äôs like they were re-melted on their sides. I wouldn‚Äôt have even cared but the wick is completely buried in the candle so it cannot be lit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Geralt
review: I gave this two stars because it is at least an effective candle. I think some of the people giving it one stars got a dud. My entire apartment smells like this candle and it‚Äôs just one candle. With that said, I can see why this candle is consistently $12.99 for a large jar. It smell horrific. If you want your room to smell like someone has too much cologne on, this is the candle for you. I mean I guess cologne is supposed to be a pleasant smell but it is just not what I‚Äôm into. I bought five of these candles because I got a good deal but now I regret buying them before smelling them first. So frustrating!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: wildflower1971
review: This is a very strong fragrant candle and carries it's fragrance thru my large living room.  I was impressed.  Love the smell.  It smell more masculine but I know of a lot of women who do love it.  ha....maybe because it does smell like you've just passed by a man that smells lovely. Can't smell much better than that.  Compliments to the men out there.  We women love it... (:

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Last Hope
review: Mine leaked a little but it wasn't broken, no cracks, nothing like that just leaked some weird fluid. Candles are mostly wax, no wax leaked, but a fluid like thing leaked into the clam shell and the side of the jar. It was the same color as the wax so it was easy to notice but from a candle prospective it wasn't deformed or anything but I had to clean up this fluid which had a very strong scent. I almost wonder if it was the scent they add to them, like if they scent separated from the wax during shipment? Not certain but after a few mins of cleaning it off its perfectly functional so I have no complaints. The mystery fluid though did stain the seal for the lid, not a big deal at all just its now anywhere from dark tinted to dark lol.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: a customer
review: Not my first Yankee candle. In fact I bought this exact candle/scent 1 yr ago, was very pleased.  When I received this one I opened it and actually caught no scent. I even checked the label on the last candle. Sure enough they were exactly the same.  This will be my last Yankee candle and I truly hate that. I'm 'breaking up' with a brand I always enjoyed! It is difficult to burn. The wick burns very dark very quickly. Unevenly. Must be frequently trimmed and has a tendency to gutter out. Also, this particular candle has turned a very opaque color. No comparison to previous candle. It seems to bubble a bit, odd as that may sound. I am left to wonder if I received a counterfeit or if this brand has become useless after last years satisfactory purchase?? A tough lesson to learn during this time of rising costs and shortages!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: macdragonflies
review: I've always burned the large Yankee Candles jars, but never tried this scent. It's a light warm scent that filled our living room last night. Just remember to always trim the wick before you burn againüïØ!! I don't burn the large jar size for short lengths of time... this size jar is meant to be burned for hours at a time. HINT: We use a topper that helps it burn clear to the bottom of the jar & these are sold from Yankee Candle. I believe that's the secret of not wasting any bit of these amazing candlesüëå

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Deb
review: I read a lot of the reviews because I just couldn't put my nose to the scent. In reading the reviews I read multiple times that the smell is of men's cologne. I believe those reviews are accurate it does have the scent of men's cologne however I can look past that and I do like the aroma throughout the room and I continue to burn it it. If you keep the wick trimmed it does have long-lasting burning time. I've purchased so many other Yankee Candles, they don't even have half the smell of this so at least the aroma is good and strong and I can live with this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jason Przybylski
review: First one came mislabeled. It smelled like sugar cookie or something. I returned and reordered and this was my second experience below.... I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on with Yankee Candle, but it appears that they have toned down the fragrance on the older scents such as the Clean Cotton in which I purchased. Possibly a marketing strategy to encourage consumer to purchase the higher priced new fragrances? Anywho, I won‚Äôt be purchasing this fragrance again. And it was my favorite for years. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Vir Robinson
review: I'm going to sound a bit biased, but this is my favorite scent! Midsummer's Night was one of the first candles I've ever lit in my room, and what a difference it has made! Nice smell, a bit musky (I guess if that's what you call it) but perfect on what I like to set my mindset as; a chill, laidback evening while sitting at my desk either playing games or watching a movie. Good times. Also, I feel as though with Yankee Candles when you blow out the wick, it doesn't have a bad smoke residue or anything like you're inhaling anything toxic like another "off-brand" candle I tried. Always sticking with Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Aoi Aoi
review: I used to love Yankee Candle, been using it for many years until Bath and body work has came up with candle so I tried that and the scent was good. However when I saw my favorite scent of Yankee candle on Amazon and also good price. I bought it right away and when I used it, I‚Äôm so disappointed because the same scent that I used to love doesn‚Äôt have the same affect just like the old time. Before when I lighted the Yankee candle, I could smell it all over the house. Now I have to sit next to the candle so I can smell it. I think it must be an old over stock candle. So disappointed that I have to return it just keep the one that I‚Äôve already used it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Brian D.
review: I've learned my lesson about ordering candles from Amazon.  Of the three I ordered, one is completely unusable and the other two aren't great.  They all melted and re-hardened at some point.  It must have happened quite some time ago or in another area of the country, because it is in the 40s in Missouri right now. Hopefully two of them still work, the wax is flowing into the empty void to the side so it isn't getting a layer of melted wax on top.  As the pictures show, one of them can't even be lit. I threw out the box and the trash ran today, so it isn't worth the hassle of a return/replacement.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Christina Beheler
review: This candle smells like faintly of sage, but mostly like orange essential oil. It's sweet, and can quickly fill up a room. This is a perfect sent to cover lingering cooking smells or pet/smoke odor, without the room smelling like you're trying to mask something. It offers a sweet, clean smell to a room that I found very relaxing to walk into. The smell will last long after the candle is put out, which is something else I truly appreciated. This is an excellent candle to add ambiance to a bedroom, or bring a sense of cleanliness to a living room or kitchen.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: David Barker
review: I have been buying and trying several different candles recently as I enjoy them in my office while I work.  I bought this one because I recognized the name and the price was right for the volume of candle offered.  This one provides about twice the candle for the same price as some other name brands on Amazon.  Here's why. Wick is cheap and mushrooms a lot.  I had to trim it constantly to keep the flames from growing very large. Wax is cheap and smokes quite a bit.  Crackles and pops too. Scent is okay. My wife bought me a Mainstays (Target Store Brand) and I think it burns nicer; less smoke and mushrooming.  Don't know how much she paid for it but it was probably less.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jburke
review: Really... I ordered Clean Cotton scent,  I received Macintosh scent instead. Requested a return and replacement. I sent out the return promptly and received the replacement,  but it still wasn't clean cotton, instead I received Sicilian Lemon. Ill take any kind if cotton.... im not doing a return replacement again its just too inconvenient at this point.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Maleficara
review: The scent is fantastic, if you can catch a whiff. The color and idea of the candle is fantastic. The scent, also fantastic. However, if you're used to the strongly scented, typical, Yankee Candle, this one is not for you. It is a lovely, masculine, scent. However even after a couple of hours of burn time it is not one that is going to perfume even the immediate area. You will get hints of the scent, a tease of it from time to time, and that's it. There were a few moments after I extinguished the candle that the scent was stronger than at any other time. If you are looking for a more subtle hint of fragrance, this may be for you. If you're looking for a whole room scent bomb, give this one a pass.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: R.
review: at the time or purchase a decent price. when that price fluctuates this rating might not be appropriate. it burns well, so well i burned it up quickly after hours per night while smoking my favorite tobacco pipes. a scent that stands alone or mixes well with other smokes. some of these candles are hard to smell but not this one. a pleasure at a price i could afford on prime.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: JOHN
review: I thought I'd take a chance on this scent/candle after getting a GQ box candle that was wonderful but prohibitively expensive and....ugh.  It smells like the industry-mandated MEN's "fragrance" that apparently MUST be added to any product marketed to males.  It smells like (Insert ANY basic men's shaving gel).  NOT worth it and I would recommend avoiding.  Anyway...candle scents SHOULD be neutral, I feel.  Nature-based scent categories and not even venture into "clean linen" or goofy things like that.  HARD PASS.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: dann
review: For 25 years I only bought Yankee Candles due to the consistently high quality products. For the past 4 to 5 years they have reduced the aroma for each candle to almost nothing. $27 for a candle seems high for a candle but "used" to be worth every penny. Now they are worth 27 cents at best. In such a high competitive market I am surprised at the decisions they made to reduce the very one thing that made Yankee standout from the others. Never again will I waste my money on Yankee

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: damitdon
review: I've been hooked on Yankee Candles for a couple of years now after discovering this scent. It's so hard to find a candle that doesn't smell like grandma's house. As a single man I wanted a candle that complemented by home without making it smell like some cheap air freshener. One candle burning in my front room of an evening fills the entire house. I've tried other scents and they've been good, but this is my favorite and I'll buy it over and over. I recommend their candles to everyone that asks.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Elika
review: came with a mold on it!!! wtf?!?!! on 4 different candles! If i'm burning the candle while having mold on it, It means I need to breath it This is so upsetting!! I will ask for a refund but for now I would'nt recommend buing for sure!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Brandon Gordon
review: First time ever buying a Yankee Candle and this will definitely be the last, I decided to the Clean Cotton scent since in general I love that smell of fragrances in a house. I had it lit for 30 minutes and didn't smell nothing at all. The next day after I got done cleaning the house, I had it lit for an hour and still didn't get any sort of aroma from it! I don't know why they get the praise they do but this will be my last time trusting the general public about a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Chrissy
review: I love Yankee Candles!! I thought I would try this scent and stray from my usual baking scents I am so glad I did. This has a cologne type smell and this scent is calming. It is not overwhelming like some scents that are perfume base scents. I loved it so much I went and bought the air vent clips and the same scent in the one that hangs from your mirror. This candle burns very well and not fast like most scented candles. It started out in our family room so I could share but ended up in our bathroom next to our whirlpool tub. I was told to order another candle just like it. They said I was being selfish and keeping it for my own pleasure. Of course you would do the same

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Rhonda Lee Vanryswyk
review: It was not good it was not like it used to be when I would buy them last year there was barely any scent to it the cheapest there's no fragrance it my house didn't even smell like it and you usually did I was horrible and this is my favorite scent usually when I light up one of them candles an hour later my whole house smells like it the room that I lit it in did not even smell like it I don't know if they're old or what

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: jake
review: This candle is as close as you can get to a scent less flame. In fact I‚Äôm not sure what could provide less scent. Even burning gas or wood has a scent, but this, absolutely nothing. I wish I just bought an electric candle instead of this. I actually got scared that I had covid and lost my sense of smell so had 5 others try to smell this candle and they also concluded its completely without smell. It‚Äôs so bad I want to return it bcuz it must be broken, like as if they actually forgot to add the scent broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: SER
review: This is a nice candle and smells lovely. However, the smell doesn't linger after you've blown it out. I let it burn for about 5 hours before putting it out and the smell vanished within minutes. I also noticed I couldn't catch a whiff of it at all the next day. I've bought cheaper candles from my local DG and the smell lingers for a few days afterwards. Still, this candle smells nice when it's burning, I just wish that smell lingered around once the candle is put out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Vdub
review: I have been buying this for years, I love it, smells clean and comforting and not too sweet or headachey. Husband doesn't mind it either. People have complained that some YC are not as good as they used to be, but my candle arrived with a nice fresh fragrance as I remember it, was in good shade, no issues.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: DJ Thomas
review: It's a Yankee candle so you know...jump on these when they're on sale üòÄ. This is one of my favorite scents and Yankee Candles do possess some solid longevity. I'm notorious for falling asleep with a candle still burning and even after doing that a couple of times a good portion of the candle still remains. When used in an appropriately sized room it can make everything smell clean upon entering...now I just need to figure something out for living room with cathedral ceilings.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: RedüíÉüèª
review: When something sounds too good to be true it always is! I noticed a strong sent coming from box as I opened the inner box the actual candle was in there was an oil stain inside & black oil leaked stuff on lid! It was the oil sent of the candle itself, and then I saw the candle wax was melted to one side from the top of the lid to the bottom of the jar. So very very disappointed that is why this particular sent and size was so so much cheaper than the others its probably been sitting in some warehouse melting for a while so disappointed will not take a chance and order any more!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Tashah B.
review: I‚Äôve been wanting this candle for a long time and when I came across it on sale here, I couldn‚Äôt resist. Well, I‚Äôm sad because I can‚Äôt smell it. I can smell it when I stand over it, but if I leave the room and come back in I smell nothing. I‚Äôm really disappointed. I have a dog and am paranoid about my house having a ‚Äúdog smell‚Äù so I‚Äôll probably have to buy another candle. My last YC was great so maybe it‚Äôs just this particular item. It‚Äôs pretty to look at so at least I have that. üòû

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Qson
review: Be wary when ordering these candles during summertime. Of the 7 candles I received recently, two of them were melted in a way that buried the wick -- the two that melted were the original and the replacement for it, lol. Ended up having to use a torch to melt the wax down to make them usable, so it wasn't a big deal. However, not everyone has tools to make them usable again, so gotta have to take some stars off.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: aSm
review: The  2-WICK TUMBLER  has no problem throwing the scent and filling the room and its vaulted ceiling space with the scent of... ‚ÄúMidsummer,‚Äù I guess. I wish I lived where summer smelled like this. Fragrance: A nice compromise between male & female fragrances. The best description I can muster is a ‚Äúmusky‚Äù jasmine. I have burned this candle for about 12-hours and the level has dropped about 1/2‚Äù.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Shark-bite
review: This was a birthday gift for my daughter. It‚Äôs her favorite fragrance and candle company. I have bought Yankee candles for 33 years and my daughter just had her 30th birthday so she has grown up smelling these wonderful candles. They last a very long time if you follow a few instructions such as trimming the wick and extinguish it as instructed. The fragrance last to the very end of the life of the candle and fill the house each and every time with a wonderful smell. I buy nothing but Yankee Candles and hope they are always around.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: GTexas
review: So, I ordered this candle because it has a nice, fresh scent, perfect for spring and it was a great price. I got one called Midsummer Night instead, which is nice, but very heavily scented. Contacted Amazon, they said I had to send it back or they could pick it up. After waiting for a product, only to get the wrong one, then having to figure out time in my schedule to return it -- not worth the trouble. Sure, everybody makes mistakes but Amazon needs to do better at remedying issues that doesn't inconvenience customers any further.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kimberly
review: I‚Äôm beginning to think these Yankee candles sold on Amazon may be faulty and/or old and that‚Äôs why the price is almost half off. I bought warm lux cashmere because I have the wallflower which is great and smells divine. Lit this candle up and nothing, not even when you‚Äôre standing right beside it! I even let it burn for a while to see if the smell would kick in later after some of the wax really melted and still nothing. What is the point of buying one of these if it does not smell? Might as well buy a regular wax candle from a dollar store. Extremely disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: onashelf
review: It's a beautiful candle. It is suposed to be dark blue I guess but looks black to me. It is burning very evenly /smoothly. I have not had this candle before so I can't speak to the scent being "Weaker" but I will say it smells nice and it is not overly strong.. which for me is a good thing, the really strongly scented ones can sometime give me a headache.  Pleased with my purchase and the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Marie
review: I‚Äôve ordered these for years.  It burns long, but not as long as it has in the past.  Had problems with the wick mushrooming causing black smoke.  The scent wasn‚Äôt as strong as it has always been either.  Good seller, but I‚Äôm going to start ordering Kringle candles so I am don‚Äôt have to clean the black soot off my ceiling.  Still gave 5 stars because it arrived on time and in good condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Ashley
review: I‚Äôve brought this candle in store before and this one isn‚Äôt as strong in smell

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Richard Riggs
review: I made the mistake of having a candle delivered to me in Phoenix, when it was 110¬∞. Since the seller didn't post any warnings about the candles melting during delivery in a hot climate, I am posting this Public Service Announcement. Avoid having candles delivered in the summer, if you live in a very hot climate. Your candle will end up arriving melted. I had to put the candle on a candle warmer, in order to dig out the wick. The candle was still usable, however I should have known better than to have a candle delivered in this excessive heat. Lesson learned!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Pancho Pistolero
review: Yankee Candle has fallen off. The candle was a good value. It just doesn‚Äôt smell as strong as they used to. I remember burning a candle inside your home and as you walk up your driveway, you could smell it outside. I could barely smell this candle in our half bathroom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: N. E. L.
review: I've ordered this candle a few times through this supplier and I have to say I've been happy with it each time.  I've noticed no diminishment in scent, it burns evenly, and it lasts a fair amount of time.  We like it so much in our family (of 3) that we each keep one in our room so we can enjoy the smell when we retreat to our own spaces.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Marina
review: I was skeptical after reading some of the reviews about the Yankee Candles not being authentic on Amazon, but figured I would try them since it was on sale.  I love the scent Midsummer Night and I thought it smelled exactly like it did when purchased from Yankee Candle. It had a long burn time and the fragrance was not overwhelming at all. It came packaged in a Yankee Candle box and was intact when received. I would definitely recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: RUTHIE D.
review: If you love the clean and herbal type scents like me, then I think that you will love this. I am not fond of overly floral fragrances so this one is just right. It came on time and was well packaged.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: melomaniac
review: I usually love yankee candle but this was a huge disappointment. there is barely any scent. and then the weak scent does not smell like eucalyptus to me. hopefully this was just a one-off... if not, please make it stronger!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: April K.
review: Bought 4 of these large candles in my order all same fragrance and have lit 3 of them and can‚Äôt smell anything. Very faint scent if any at all. I usually only buy this brand so I know how fragrant their candles usually are. Very disappointed and will not buy these from Amazon again will purchase directly from the store or their online store. Waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Dominique
review: I really like Yankee Candle, I bought three different ones a week ago but this specific one (Sage & Citrus) it doesn't smell! I got it because someone else posted that it was great for after cooking, I like to use garlic and onions, and usually my kitchen and really, my house smells for hours after we finish eating! So I got it for that purpose but it didn't work, so I moved it to the bathroom which really is not big (4'X8') and it took a couple of hours to actually be able to smell it in the air. I have the sparkling cinnamon and midsummer's night burning right now and those have a stronger scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: J. W.
review: Yankee candles rarely disappoint in terms of their longevity and quality. I love this particular scent - it has a darker profile than many of Yankee‚Äôs other fragrance options. Unfortunately my partner commented ‚Äúthat smells like Axe‚Äù and I‚Äôm not sure I can argue with him. It is exponentially more subtle and the light notes are much less acrid than the body spray.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Captain
review: My favorite YC scent (Midsummers Night). Even with initially, and continually, trimming the wick to the proper length this scent continues to burn unevenly and too hot. Out of the 3 different scents purchased, this is the only one that does that. Balsam & Cedar - amazing scent, heavy throw, and perfect burn Catching Rays - excellent light scent, perfect throw, and burn

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: Its a candle, if you set the wick on fire it will burn and melt the wax. When the wax melts it makes the area around the candle smell good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Terri Henderson
review: I'm very disappointed with this purchase. I thought I was receiving a Yankee candle that would have a wonderful smell, but there's barely any smell at all, & the wick is not in the center. It's all the way to the side of the glass so that when I burn the candle, I'm afraid the glass will pop, and I could start a fire.  Not the Yankee quality that I'm used too. It got 2 stars just because of the longevity.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Megan Ciotola
review: Received this candle in good shape,  however it produces no scent when burned. I reached out to Yankee and they have not responded. Disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Melissa C.
review: For those with sensitive allergies & or to smells. This sent combination may not be right for you. I know it isn't myself with allergies. Plus it made my home smells similar to almost weed. At least to myself & 3 other people.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: TFD
review: Yankee Candles are absolutely wonderful, and this one is no different. The beautiful "Cotton" fragrance smells so clean and fresh. (This soft, beautiful scent will not offend anyone who has a sensitive nose to smells.) And the jar is not only very strong and durable  -- it is also a reusable jar when the candle has burned down. I give this candle and this scent, 5 stars each! ***** *****

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Ian Parks
review: This candle is better for a small space than a large room. I had it in my office at work, and it has a nice subtle, masculine scent. Smells faintly of cologne.  Gentle scent, not super strong or overpowering. A good gift for men who don't want a flowery or sweet smelling candle. I have noticed that when the wax is dark, the candle doesn't always burn evenly. Tent this one with foil to make sure it doesn't tunnel. (look up videos on youtube if you don't know how to do that, it works really well!)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Clementine
review: My first criticism is more subjective- I'm just not a fan of this particular scent. I was looking for more of a "masculine" fragrance but I honestly think this candle smells more like men's deodorant than anything. My second criticism is more objective- About 15 minutes after lighting it, the whole top layer was melted. Personally, if I'm going to pay this much, I'd rather that the candle lasts longer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Carolyn S Boggs
review: So, I visited our near Bed Bath and Beyond store, my daughter wanted to smell the Yankee Candles there, she fell in love with this scent. We purchased a candle, ($$$). She was so happy that we did, she loved how it made her room smell so good. I had noticed that her candle was getting low, so I found this one here, purchased it for her. When the candle arrived she was ever so excited because this candle is so much larger. This candle burns slowly allowing a long burn with the much pleasure of aroma. I plan on buying more here on Amazon when this one is burning low.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Fay Sims
review: So far I think I've summed up the reason for the bad reviews. As it'll be a Christmas present and it's cold outside, my candle didn't have any sign of melting or use. Looked exactly as pictured and described, I recommend not buying any kind of child enduring the heat of summer unless u buy at a store. But shipping was extremely fast, smell was great, lid fit snuggly, and it was wrapped in a car board protector to ensure no damage would befall the product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Anna
review: This was my favorite candle/scent 8+ years ago so when I was looking to make my apartment feel like home, I picked this one without hesitation. I‚Äôm beyond disappointed. I cannot smell the candle at all. It barely smells when you open the lid without being lit, and when lit it isn‚Äôt noticeable. I‚Äôve given it about 5 tries and 1/4th of the way through and no luck. I wouldn‚Äôt care if it was a cheap $5 candle, but $20 is unacceptable. I have a sense of smell and have had friends come over to ask their opinion. NONE of them can smell it. Not a happy customer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: L.Charlton
review: I love yankee candles and I‚Äôm always trying new ones.  I went over to a friends house and walked in and was like omg what is that smell? My friend said it‚Äôs warm lux cashmere by Yankee candle. Well I had to get it. It‚Äôs amazing. Very light and mild smell. And as always these candles burn very nice and even and last along time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: lord of the ducks
review: My primary concern when buying these kinds of candles online is that the packaging will not suffice and the glass will shatter during transport. This candle was placed inside of a perfectly fitted cardboard casing inside of it's box so that it couldn't tumble around in transit. The candle is in perfect shape, it smells great, and I will definitely be buying again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Greengirl
review: I don't know why but I have never found a Yankee Candle fragrance that ultimately wasn't, forgive me, awful.  No matter the scent they ate just too...TOO.  And so years ago I gave up trying and just stuck with my much beloved and decades old standby by Thymes. But then I was browsing Lightening Deals, saw these, read scent reviews many of which hit the right scent cord and so I thought I'd give them one last try.  NOPE!!  Heavy HEAVY fragrance (and in a large ventilated room) and the reviews that described the scent as similar to a 'cheap mens cologne', for me, were right on the money.  Sorry...I tried..but Yankee Candle and I are just not meant to share the same olfactory airspace.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Anthony Munoz
review: This candle (Soft Blanket) smells amazing! If you‚Äôre looking for a new all around home smell, give this one a try. I would describe it as a clean smell yet warm and cozy. If you‚Äôre bored of just the classic linen smells, or looking for something like that but with just an extra ‚Äúsomething,‚Äù get this one. This is also a safe gift to give, as the smell (I think) is pleasing for everyone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Brandon
review: The media could not be loaded. Smells good, I like this version, I just recently started using candles, I like the smell of this one.  Good deal.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jae L.
review: I didn't realize how small it was; that was probably my own fault for not reading. This is the second time that I purchased this fragrance in candle form (the first one was mini and I purchased it from the Yankee Candle store) and while it does smell nice when you first open it, the fragrance isn't strong enough. You literally have to be standing right in front or beside it to even get a hint of the scent. I also bought the car freshner that hangs from the rearview mirror and THAT one was very strong and effective! I wish the candles were!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Tpaskygirl
review: Disappointing. Scent was so, so faint, even in 4x3 half bath with door shut. Also, way too much soot, with wick trimmed. Yankee should consider more soy. This was my last Yankee Candle purchase

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: josh
