review: *14 DEC 2013 UPDATE: I've actually come around to the scent of this candle. I burn it more frequently and will definitely buy another when this one is done. It's potent and definitely appreciated by almost everyone that comes over to my house. Initially the candle is extremely overwhelming, and I'm even talking about when it is unlit. Within a couple weeks you'll love it. It's cheap and will definitely fill a whole house with a pleasant scent. Still, seek out the Voluspa candles. Their scents are more experienced and unique. Absolutely awesome candles. *ORIGINAL REVIEW: 24 yr old bachelor. I bought this because it was recommended as a 'manly' scent for my house. This smells like a cheap cologne / Axe Body spray, and to me it is a little overwhelming. Traveling with it, unlit in my car with the lid on gave me a slight headache. I don't have too much experience in candle selection but I would definitely seek this out before you purchase it. I know plenty of women out there probably appreciate this scent, and for the price you can't find too many masculine scents, but to me it reminds me of a frat house or a 16 year old kid getting ready for a date. I also purchased some Voluspa candles with this, and they are the best candles / scents I've ever experienced. The Voluspa scents I got are much more refined and resemble a more expensive and interesting cologne/guy smell. They are pricey, but I promise you they are worth it (buy the small sample sizes first) Here are the Voluspa scents that will blow you away: Suede Blanc, Ambre Lumiere, Warm Perique Tabac, Golden Cypress Sawara.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: arethereanyusernamesleft
review: One arrived in great condition.  I used it (loved it) and put the other one in my cupboard.  About a month later I went to grab the 2nd and found this?!? Check what you order.  It didn't happen at my house I live by the beach.  I wish I opened both the boxes.  Of course the return window has now closed so I guess I'm stuck with this expensive garbage.  CHECK YOUR ORDERS UPON ARRIVAL!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Dolly
review: No smell at all! I though I would try something different. I put this in a smaller room and still no smell. I was surprised because of the reviews. Maybe I got a old one or something. I won‚Äôt buy again waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Dan G.
review: I burn this candle a few nights a week for about ban hour or 2 and I love the scent, but after having it for a bit over a month it is now completely unusable but also barely half burned. The wick has burned all the way down to the bottom but the sides are all the way up to the top.  It's like it burned a hole down the middle without using all of the wax. If this candle was $7 I would expect better.  But over $20 this is unacceptable.  Worst part is that this is the 3rd o e that has done the same thing. Last time I bought 2 mini candles and the same thing happened.  Figured I would try the bigger one because I like the scent, but I'm done with Yankee candles.  Sorry.  Do better.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: L. Naugle
review: I was so looking forward to a candle that smelled of sage and citrus and had the burn-time of a Yankee candle.  Unfortunately, this candle only smells like baby powder.  The scent was so strong when I was opening the packaging, it made me a little dizzy.  There is no detectable sage or citrus scent while the candle is lit or otherwise.  If you want a highly scented, long lasting, baby powder candle, this might be a good deal for you.  Otherwise, it is highly disappointing, and I suggest that you keep looking elsewhere.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Maria
review: I ordered this and I don't like the smell. It smells like you sprayed men's cologne straight into your nose. This might be better in a larger space but idk. I burned it in a 450 sq ft apartment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: David Beblo
review: Yankee Candles used to fill the room with their wonderful scent. That's what made them worth the cost. Since the company was sold they aren't the same. It does smell nice when I walk by but 6 steps away and you can't smell anything. It's a shame.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: LK
review: This candle smells amazing, so of course I was super excited to burn it! Come to find out, the throw is not very good. This would probably be better in a small room or a bathroom, rather than a living room. 3 stars because it smells so dang good! It‚Äôs kind of got a cologne smell to it, but it‚Äôs also very refreshing at the same time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Justine Gorski
review: Always liked Yankee candle for filling your home with great aromas. You would think for the price you'd get some scent from it, you have to be within a foot to smell anything, to bad there is hardly any scent anymore

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Taylor
review: Be prepared that this is going to be a dye mess. Black/blue everywhere. Leaked out of the candle in shipment and all over the place and stained my shirt as I dropped it due to the oil slick. Never had this happen with Yankee candle and my favorite scent. Very disappointed but hopefully the replacement is not like this. Also this Candle smells old like it‚Äôs been left open for months. Not a strong scent at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: James Edwards
review: I don't right or read many reviews but I should have read the reviewed on this candle. It is a nice looking even burning 2 wick Yankee candle. The problem is there is zero scent. Nothing at all. I'm very surprised coming from Yankee. I don't recommend this candle if you interested in smelling it because you won't. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Foxcye
review: VERY SECURE PACKING when I ordered ONE candle... SO...I ordered 10 MORE candles‚ù£ Love this Sacred Suttle Scentü•∞ THANK YOU !  I WILL ALWAYS ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY!! **UPDATE**  purchased 7times TEN CANDLES each month...last FOUR were broken or melted over couldn't open! What happ to QUALITY CONTROL?!  REMOVING 4 STARS

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: George Ferrari
review: The scent and value are incredible...who doesn't love some fresh clean cotton haha. But my problem is the fact that the candle is crappy, to say the least. It's like the wicks are burning faster then the wax, so the wicks get super small and the melted wax ends up covering the wicks...such a waste of a good candle. That's the 2 wick candle as well, o switched over to that style because the single wicks were burning terribly, I got a candle that burnt almost straight down, it was a pain and I ended up throwing it away, wasting probably a ‚Öì of the candle. I've always had good luck in the past, but my last 2 purchases have really left a bad taste in my mouth and I'm not sure I wanna spend my hard earned money on wastful products. Thank you for your time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Fox
review: First bottle came broken but they were great about getting me a replacement. Unfortunately I didn't smell the first one bc the scent is awful. Smells just like Right Guard deodorant. Unless you're a middle school gym teacher, I'm not sure why you'd want to be in a room that reeks of this smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Candice dryden
review: What smell?? I hate that I spent this much on two candles and they have zero smell what so ever. One of these was supposed to be a gift for my mom. This was a waste. A complete waste of time, energy, effort, cost, and now patience. I am extremely disappointed. So much so that I went to the Yankee candle website directly and bought replacements

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Carolina
review: The candle came in right away and I was able to uses it for a few weeks since we are only home in the evenings. I like to light it while I am cooking so the smell of the food does not take over my house. I love the smell. It has a clean but flowery smell to it that you can appreciate through out the kitchen and Livingroom since it's an open concept room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: its_trycki
review: Absolutely LOVE this scent. It‚Äôs great for the Christmas season and not too overpowering! I would give this review 5 stars for the scent and quality (duh, it‚Äôs yankee candle) but I  unfortunately recived the candle broken in the box upon arrival. I was disappointed to receive the product damaged (glass all shattered). I‚Äôm still waiting on a refund from Amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: D
review: Love, love, love the classic Yankee candle scent! It's extremely giftable. I bought the large and gifted it. They love it! You cannot go wrong with Eucalyptus. The scent is crisp and clean. It smells so good. I'd recommend it to anyone who wants their place smelling great! The only con is the price is a bit excessive for a large at almost $30.00, but IMHO it should be around $25.00 + tax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: 4what-it‚Äôs-worth
review: Buyer beware with this one. Very sweet smelling and not in a pleasant way. Barely any eucalyptus scent even when burning. First time a eucalyptus candle has ever given me a headache and lid can‚Äôt be left off when not burning because it‚Äôs very strong sweet to almost nauseating odor.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Cookielishious
review: I love Yankee candles & I love Midsummer's Night scent. I also love the price point that Amazon offers for them for. I added them to my subscribe & save & just received these. Maybe they're melted, maybe they're fake. Idk & I don't care, but buyer beware. The substance is not wax, it leaked through both shipping boxes & is oily & transfers onto everything you touch. Gross.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: LMG912
review: This has to be a fake it has no scent to it. Initially upon opening the lid you smell the traditional yankee candle clean cotton smell, or so you think, but upon burning it, you get no smell at all! So disappointing. anyone who buys this should get a refund and Amazon stop selling these.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle couldn‚Äôt be worse. If you like how your Sunday school teacher smelled in 1973, this candle is for you. If you enjoy migraines buy this candle. My cat ran away from home because of this candle. If the power ever goes out I will sit in the dark before I light this horrific candle. I can‚Äôt say enough about how bad this candle is. I hate this candle. It has 2 wicks for to double your misery.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Maria Kally
review: I love Yankee Candle! The candles last longer than any other candles I‚Äôve tried and, like 96% of the time, they smell stronger. Unfortunately, this particular candle was in the 4%. It didn‚Äôt really smell as strong as other YC candles I‚Äôve had in the past. It still good, just not the ‚ÄòYankee Candle Great‚Äô that I‚Äôm used to. And sadly, I missed the return time frame because I didn‚Äôt use it right when I got it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: jram
review: The scent used to be the best and now is only noticeable if you have your nose 6 inches away yet they charge you plenty. I bought a dollar candle from dollar tree and it had more smell than the Yankee candle. Well I lost on this candle, but the good part is it will be my last time ever paying for a Yankee candle with no scent. Yea

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Pamiam 218
review: I buy only Yankee candles but his one had a strange and thick wick that remained a pain until I tossed the candle.  I trust this was a fluke but wouldn't try another one of these.  My history with Yankee candles is long and pleasant but I am sharing the truth of this particular candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: kirk
review: I bought this candle as a gift for someone that preferred clean smells over sweet or fruity smells.  It was a great gift and smelled really good. The person who received it really loved it.  I got it on sale and it‚Äôs a really large jar candle.  I would definitely purchase again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Viking Princess
review: "MidSummers Night" scent Yankee candle is a favorite of mine. While I prefer Soy based candles for the benefit of my felines, the location in the house for this "MidSummers Night" scent Yankee candle is in a purrfect location, so I get to enjoy one of my favorite scents by Yankee.  GREAT PRICE!  Normally $29.00, this was on sale for $16 and change.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Ji
review: This Sage & Citrus candle smells pretty weak. After burning for 2 hours, I can only smell a hint in my small living room. If you are going for a subtle smell in your home, buy it. If you want a more obvious smell, it's a no. Although everything else other than the weak smell is perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Piper
review: Not sure what‚Äôs happening with Yankee candle but I‚Äôve bought many, many candles over the years. The last bunch I have bought have very little scent even after first lighting them. So I will look for something different and pass on Yankee candles moving forward.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: LOVE TO SHOP!
review: Yankee candle tends to be a little on the expensive side but they have the greatest scents! The sage and citrus is wonderful! But I wish they would go back to producing the "teakwood and citrus" scent also! That was my favorite of all time! Still a fan- 30 years

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Nicole
review: I like this candle because sage & citrus are both extremely effective magical substances, and the scent fills my bedroom with an aroma similar to sitting by the fire on a cold winter night.  Great price and strongest scent I have found in a candle. Yankee Candles are the best brand on the market and Amazon for some reason offers them at a great price. Thanks Amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Evan Gisonna
review: I ordered this candle many times! So i ordered two this time around. The problem is i feel these candles could be fake or aftermarket YanKee Candles cause they didn‚Äôt come in a Yankee candle box like they usually come in. And also the tops don‚Äôt sit secure and click into the candle with a tight seal. Potentially got two knock off candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: ishrim
review: Yankee candle is a staple in my kitchen for eliminating odor and keeping the area fresh. Love how the scent is non synthetic, very natural . I stock them up whenever they are on sale. Quality remains the same over years. You wont be disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Nate
review: It‚Äôs definitely a candle that burns fast. Even after trimming the wicks, within 10 minutes of lighting it the flames are way to big. Wax melts the whole top layer within a half hour. The cover SHOULDNT be used to extinguish as it‚Äôs plastic, which is sad for an expensive candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jenniefromtheblock
review: Feel like Yankee candles have lost their quality.  This used to be my favorite candle and scent but you can‚Äôt smell like it like you used to- it‚Äôs not just this scent but the brand overall I've noticed lately. Candle was lackluster.  Really disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Janice
review: Very disappointed as I lit two of mine and neither of them have a scent.  The other two were gifted and I feel sorry for them.  So it smells out the box but when you light them I get nothing.  If I can return a lit candle I would! I want a refund.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Floydboy
review: Not sure if I smell anything from this candle that represents a soft blanket. Merely a gimmick title for a candle that has mostly a vanilla scent with a hint of laundry detergent. It certainly doesn‚Äôt smell bad at all, but the name of the candle ‚ÄúSoft Blanket‚Äù, to me was very misleading.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kasey
review: I don‚Äôt think this is Yankee. Mine came with a weird thin plastic seal that doesn‚Äôt seal. It wasn‚Äôt the normal seal in the top of the lids. I know for 2 reasons. #1. The plastic ‚Äúseal‚Äù was out of the jar. #2: At some point the jar opened and the wax had melted everywhere and was all over the box. Which was an black oily mess.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Barbara Elyse
review: Nice strong scent that filled my home - not over sweet as many are - I tend towards pine, balsam, spices rather than lilac, vanilla or baking cookies and this was just perfect - not evergreen but not sweet and as usual the candle lasts for days.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Angelcat47
review: I absolutely love Yankee candles.  I buy almost nothing else.  They burn cleanly and evenly all the way to the bottom.  They have great throw. My townhouse fills with scent within an hour.  This scent smells something like a man's expensive cologne.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: H2O
review: This smells absolutely fan-freaking-tastic! It takes me back to when I used to be able to go inside used bookstores and occult gem/incense shops in my home town. I am in love and will definitely be buying more in the future. The nostalgia is real ü•∫üíï

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Lois Keith
review: I normally love Yankee candles, but I gave this one a 1 star because it smells old and does not burn right. I would have returned it but I gave it as a Christmas gift and they told me of the problem. I don't recommend that you buy this product

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: PerfectStranger
review: Are we getting the real deal on Amazon?  Have burned Yankee Sage and Citrus for many years.  Last night I lit one and fell asleep on the couch while my husband was watching football. Woke up sneezing about 20 times in a row and nose hasn‚Äôt stopped running since.  In the trash!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Hansen Family
review: When I first received this scent as a gift I was hesitant to burn it as I thought the evergreen would be too strong. I was so wrong. It is a beautiful light citrus scent with a hint of evergreen that is so subtle. This thing burns forever because it is so large!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: Looks like a Yankee Candle, burns like one but doesn't provide the rich room-filling scent of candles of past years.  The Eucalyptus candle used to fill the house and  this latest candle you can't tell if it's burning when you're in the same room.  What a disappointment as this was my favorite.  Not any more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sh
review: I gave high stars cause yankee is the best candle but very disappointed one has been lite before as you can see in pic I just took them out of boxes and one wick been lit. Now I can‚Äôt even give that as a gift. I won‚Äôt return it not worth my time. Very disappointing for such expensive candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jamie
review: This candle is almost certainly a fake Yankee candle, or I got a defective one. The wick is not centered so the candle burns very uneven, the scent is almost undetectable - smells like a plain unscented candle. Wish I could submit pictures so you can see, but it doesn‚Äôt give me the option? Please buy a Yankee from a trusted place, not off Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Guy Monday
review: Used to get these so I would have a long-lasting candle that covered up the funk with a fresh laundry smell, but despite lasting just as long as I remember, the smell doesn't seem to be nearly as powerful or long-lasting as they used to. It had a decent smell towards the beginning, but you had to be near it to smell anything, after I got half-way through the candle, it was almost non-existent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Pyriel
review: The product smells amazing. Unfortunately, I am unable to use it because it came to me melted. As I held it I noticed it dyed everything it touched haha. I did ask for a replacement, here's hoping the next one actually comes in tact. If my replacement is good then I will update my review.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Ras
review: The first burn smelled amazing but every time after that barely smelled like anything. It‚Äôs like the scent was only on the top layer somehow. These candles are overrated

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Allyson J.
review: I feel like lately the candles that I've gotten from YC have been a little less smelly, which is sad because they've always been so good about that, but this one was NOT a disappointment. The price was better than YC, had free shipping, and it arrived safe and sound and uncracked. If you're curious about the smell, it smells exactly like warm laundry should smell, in my opinion. It's so inviting and soft, not too sweet and not too powerful. Just right. I'm a huge fan of fresh smells, sweet/tropical scents make me sick to my stomach. So this is just sweet enough without being overbearing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kellz
review: Glad I could bring life back to this candle! It‚Äôs smell is addicting! Like mans cologne uwu

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Gretchen McPhie
review: Yankee Candles used to be so fragrant but this candle doesn‚Äôt even smell. Won‚Äôt buy anymore of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Debbie
review: I can only smell it if I hold it right against my nose, even after having it lit for an hour. I would have liked more for what I spent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Loves Amazon86
review: I bought the cashmere luxe candle because it was gifted to me in years past and I've become obsessed with the scent. This candle however is so disappointing. Large in size small in small. At this point I've burned it for a day or 2 and it is appearing to only be useful if the lights go out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kestrel
review: I like the candles I buy to be actually scented - I‚Äôm too old to need candles just for the romantic flickering. This has zero smell. I put it 2 feet away from my head in my nightstand and left it lit for over and hour and there was not even the suggestion of a hint of scent. Bummer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: This is my first Yankee Candle and honestly I'm not at all impressed. I love the reed diffuser of the same fragrance but this candle only smells like wax. It's not because I've gone "nose blind" to this particular smell because I rotate several other different manufacturers candles on a daily basis. They have my whole apartment smelling like the fragrance listed. But not this one. I left it burning for around four hours holding out for hope but it never even gave the hint of any fragrance other than candle wax. I'll stick to the other brand of candles for this reason.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Breanne89
review: This candle smells like soap. Not a fan. Not what I was expecting. Would be good for someone that likes soap. Has good throw.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jacques Lux
review: This is terrible!!!!! Doesn‚Äôt smell !!! What a waste of money !!!! I‚Äôm so disappointed!!!!!!!! I wish I can return it after is  been lighted  Don‚Äôt buy this item!!!! This is a SCAM !!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Diva Hail
review: Does not give off scent as expected. Have it on a warmer as I have done with other candles but can't smell it at all. Burned fir days and nothing

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: D
review: It is just as pictured. I love this scent as I burn before I go to bed. It helps me sleep better. It last quite awhile for me as I put ut out before I go to sleep. I personally put the lid on yo snuff it out as I don't like the smell of blowing it out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: KrsnamVJm
review: The scent is very weak If any at all. Not worth it. Should have listen to other reviewers.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mary Jean Shulkowski
review: I was very disappointed with this candle.  I purchased Yankee candles in the past and was pleased with them.  The scent was good but I could barely smell it.  I also purchased Balsam and Cedar.  Hopefully this candle will have a stronger scent.  Will let you know when I burn it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Grace
review: The candle was very sooty in the air.  The soot from it clogged up my furnace filter and my CPAP filters in one day so much that air could hardly pass through them.  The scent and longevity didn‚Äôt matter since I couldn‚Äôt continue to burn them without damaging my airways (and my little chihuahua‚Äôs) and the mechanical items in my house.  This is a bad product.  Beware!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kaydub
review: I love Yankee candles. But the last 6 I have purchases through A m azon have been a huge disappointment.  The fragrance is almost non existent and they have burned incredibly fast. Think I will switch to a new candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Shilej
review: It‚Äôs like no scent at all! It‚Äôs my third day lighting the candle, and i still have to smell the candle! Waste purchase!! I‚Äôm surprised it‚Äôs yankee candle I had great hopes on these candles, but this made me very disappointing!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Samy
review: I love, love Eucalyptus and was so very happy to find it on Amazon.  I want more but there is no more.  It is very hard to find and had disappeared from the scene along with us old hippies.  Hope they bring it back.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Courtney
review: I always get these candles when they are on sale for my family. This year when I got this candle it came blank, no info on the scent or anything. Normally I wouldn‚Äôt care but it was a gift that I couldn‚Äôt even give.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jacqueline
review: I gave this candle 5 stars on longevity only because there was no wick

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: None
review: I love Midsummer's Night and have a Yankee Candle store near me, so I'm in there often. I was worried about buying these on Amazon, shipping, product authenticity, etc. but they are very well packaged, and are the real deal. The scent and throw are as strong as ever!  I've bought 4 so far without any problems. Great candles and the best scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Cathy Woodard
review: I love this Yankee Candle, it‚Äôs a subtle scent,not overbearing.I had this scent before and my friends and family wanted to know what it was.It seems to be a scent that a lot of people like because it‚Äôs nice and not to strong,it‚Äôs just right!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: SunLove
review: Are used to purchase this fragrance from Yankee candle many years ago many times. This new product is not as good. The fragrance is off and it emits a ton of black smoke. I only use for short periods of time on stove when windows open.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: ernest g ruiz
review: Quality candle in the make of the candle , the candle scent is very, very weak.I stand above the lit candle to try to pick up the scent , again, very, very subtle.This is the last time I buy this selection, but Yankee candles are an excellent choice, but for me , this one , not so much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: David Smith
review: I think Yankee candles are a little overpriced, but midnight summer is my favorite scent, and they last longer than the rest of the candles out there. Overall a great candle, but can get 3 of the off brands for the price and it takes two to match the time of one Yankee.  Your choice. It all depends on the use you want. One room or multiple rooms.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Michelle
review: This is a very strong scent, which is usually what I like. My boyfriend came in the house and said is smells like a bordello. To me, it smells a bit like when my 13 year old sprays axe body spray all over himself.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Barbara
review: As you can see from the attached photo, the jar wasn't full to the top.  I've never seen a Yankee Candle like this before.  I guess that explains why it was a little bit cheaper.  I like the scent, and I decided to keep it rather than return it for a refund.  However, it was a disappointment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle was horrible to burn. The wick was split so there was an excessive amount of smoke/soot. Perhaps it was a QC fail or maybe Yankee Candle has just gone downhill.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: MARIA  C.
review: Great scent but does not flow throughout the room. If u have trouble with the wick remember to cut it or it will not light and or will send sparks onto the surface where you have the  candle resting..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: love boxers
review: This is such a clean fresh scent!  This is my third one!  I also love the Macintosh Apple for a lovely not sweet scent of fresh sliced apple!  Yankee Candles are the best for long life and fragrance!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Andrew j Livolsi
review: What can you say about Yankee candle they are the best candles in the country and the midsummers night is there top selling candle i know this because i have been buying them for 20 plus years love you Yankee you're buddy BostonDrew

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Brandy & Tina
review: If you like a the cologne scent candles then you will probably love this one. Had to back off burning it though because it honestly seem like the candle was burning up a little faster than I expected.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: thempress
review: This is my absolute favorite scent! I love this candle. It lasts pretty long if you burn it occasionally. Myself I tend to burn it for several hours in a day and it lasts me a week or two.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: Great price for this Yankee Candle.  The scent of it smells wonderful as well.  I always try to find deals through Amazon on the Yankee brand candles, because the stores prices on these are way too high.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jessica Forrest
review: This scent is very light & not very noticeable. I‚Äôm pretty disappointed in this yankee candle scent. The wax lasts as long as their other candles just can‚Äôt get past the fact that you can‚Äôt even smell the damn thing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Nicole Boyer
review: Very disappointed in this candle.  I generally love yankee candles because the are so fragrant they sometimes make both levels of my house smell great. I placed this one five feet away from me while I worked and smelled nothing. After about three hours I went to my DW candles that did the job.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Lantana Al
review: I don't usually use/burn candles but I decided to try this one (Midsummer's Night) and I'm pretty pleased. The scent is very nice and my son even likes it (he often says smells give him a headache but apparently not this one). So five stars from me... hopefully it will last a long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: K81k
review: I love the Warm Luxe Cashmere yankee candle. This is my favorite and doesn't give me a headache. Perfect package wrapping. The candle came in the original yankee candle box and unbroken. I have purchased the same candle from other retailers and the the glass always came broken. I will order these again!!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Melisa A.
review: I always get Yakee Candles and I never ever saw a candle melt so weird. Aparently, the candle wick is way too short so the flame is very small and does not burn the wax evenly. I had to use a tool to remove solid wax from the sides (the small hole was getting deeper and deeper) and now my candle looks horrible. I

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: GVD-66
review: I bought 2 of these candles in the ‚ÄúClean Cotton‚Äù scent. The scent they give off is almost non-existent. Usually I light a Yankee Candle for an hour In my living room and blow it out because the scent is so strong. These candles were lit for hours with virtually no scent. Very disappointed since the price and convenience of delivery were just right.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Doug John Garner
review: all my friends love this candle when i have it lit, always been one of my favorite scents. it's not too masculine, but not too feminine and covers up the cigarette smoke odor really well in my room. love this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Betty Boop
review: This scent has absolutely no throw at all, I have to stand over it to smell anything. I am surprised this has the Yankee Candle name on it. So disappointing. I'm beginning to think these are rejects from Yankee Candle and hence the lower price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: sticks61
review: Well that‚Äôs what I get for buying a scented candle on line! The candle is perfect‚Ä¶ Except it smells like Right Guard deodorant spray! I order another one, with a more traditional sent‚Ä¶ strawberry! I‚Äôm sure it will be fine. Excellent candle!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sarah
review: I read the reviews but still hoped for the best. Nope. The scent is definitely underwhelming (in the sense that it's very weak). I will be returning this and buying a candle at TJ Maxx, as their candles have stronger scents. Disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Nag1113
review: I've bought hundreds of Yankee candles over the years and this is my first disappointment.  The scent is gone and the top of the candle is not smooth.  Maybe Yankee or Amazon had this candle stored for a very long time.  I will buy directly from Yankee, either in store or online from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: F
review: Did not like it at all, this is my favorite scent and it didn‚Äôt even smell like my car freshener. It probably smelled good for 30 seconds and then poof, no scent at all. Definitely not worth the price, wish I could return it but I‚Äôm well over the due date. Keeping it for emergencies but will not light it up anymore.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sperling05
review: So disappointed, I‚Äôm sure we can all agree that yankee normally does a fantastic job capturing true scents in their candles HOWEVER this eucalyptus is way off, this candle 100% smells like yankee‚Äôs fresh cut roses, this eucalyptus doesn‚Äôt have menthol or even musky notes that we would all expect, it‚Äôs straight floral. If you‚Äôre looking for eucalyptus like bath salts or essential oils this IS NOT it :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kimberly E.
review: I love this scent!  But I tried to save afew bucks by ordering on Amazon rather than Yankee Candles website. Big mistake. I‚Äôm fairly positive these candles are old or recycled wax. The wax is splattered in the inside of lid and looks detached from the jar. From the Yankee store, this scent is strong and lasts for hours and hours. From Amazon though, I can‚Äôt even smell the wax when it burns. Let alone after. Don‚Äôt waste your time or money on Yankee Candles from Amazon. They‚Äôre subpar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Peachy Kia
review: Was a gift for my Mother in Law; it‚Äôs her fav scent so for Christmas I added this as a reoccurring gift every three months! It‚Äôs such a cheap gift and a good way to become a fav with her! Comes wrapped perfect so it‚Äôs not broken!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: tundra on 35s central Florida
review: To all the young men with smelly rooms buy these, open a window to let that stank air out and when you have a date over light it before she comes. Smells like really awesome cologne.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jovs & Larry
review: What‚Äôs the point here? It‚Äôs like there is no scent whatsoever. Where do I get a heavily herb-scented candle? I guess jo Malone‚Äôs $200 candle is really the only way to go cuz this sucks.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Anonymouse
review: I ordered this (as shown) Yankee candle "Clean Cotton.'  I received "White Gardenia."  Still 2 stars because at least it really is a Yankee Candle, but COMPLETELY wrong fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: I absolutely love this scent from yankee candle. Sadly there is almost no scent in this candle. I can‚Äôt even tell it‚Äôs lit unless I sniff it. Sad. Do not purchase here if you‚Äôre looking for the real thing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Olivia
review: It smells like I put Old Spice classic deodorant on the end of my nose. If you like that smell, get it. It‚Äôs pretty overwhelming but it‚Äôs enough to overpower my two dogs‚Äô rank farts so I kept it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Liane
review: Yankee does it again! This scent is earthy and surprisingly floral, considering there aren't any flower scents involved. I love the way the scent of one of these candles burning on the bathroom shelf fills my entire apartment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: sher
review: The scent is minimal, wax turns dark while burning, heavy smoke when blowing out. Terrible.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Dawn W.
review: I‚Äôve bought this scented candle for years and the scent is so strong, you have to blow it out. This smelled good until I lit it. No fragrance whatsoever! No wonder it was so inexpensive!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: S
review: Smells like axe body spray. From the name I was expecting something floral and woody like VSs old midsummers night fragrance. It‚Äôs not awful, it‚Äôs just axe body spray so if you don‚Äôt like that, don‚Äôt get this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: AKN
review: Candle came as described. I like the scent but it can be a bit overpowering. A little goes a long way with this candle and it lasted a long time. Would make a nice gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: DeniceD
review: Love Yankee Candles! Midsummers Night is my favorite scent. I don't remember the wicks smoking so much in the past though. I'm careful to trim the wick to 1/4" and it still smokes to a degree. Great candle, however!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jerod Shepard
review: Best candle ever for a single dude

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kristen SW Washington
review: This last candle I got didn‚Äôt burn for some reason. I would light it & it would burn itself out by drowning in its melted wax. To force the candle I would have to pour off excess wax every time I lit it & the wax turned all ugly & brown.‚òπÔ∏è I was very disappointed w/this last candle, usually they are lovely!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: CrazyBird
review: Scent not like store bought candles I've previously purchased.  The candle melts giving off a waxy smell and the wick, though not too long, has a high flame. I'm disappointed üòû.  Counterfeit?  From now on I'll make the trip out to buy my candle instead of mail ordering.  Usually Yankee Candles are GREAT.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: T. Lee Burger
review: Typically I love the smell of sage and citrus but there seems to be none of it or very little, in this candle. As they are not inexpensive, I really had higher hopes, especially as it's Yankee Candle. Shame really. Now that we are locked down I can't even return it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Tresjolie1
review: This candle was not as fragrant as I expected. In addition, I was surprised it only had 1 wick. You have to burn this quite awhile before you get the slightest scent from this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Matt
review: The scent was accurate and smelled as expected .  The issue is that it‚Äôs incredibly weak and can‚Äôt fill a small room.  I‚Äôve had better luck with generic Wal-Mart brand candles for a far lower price point

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: TheTeOfWinter
review: I'm visiting Georgia and there is no time to have this replaced. All the wax has melted into the lid. Can't use at all. For such an expensive candle I thought it be packaged better to keep this from melting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Imtm
review: Love the masculine scent. Long lasting candle that has a potent, but not overpowering, scent. I've bought this candle before, and I'll continue to buy this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kiriaki

Now I have to go through the return process and spend the money on another gift! If I could give this 0 stars I would!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: pcd1221
review: I have bought Yankee Candles for years but this was the first one I purchased from Amazon.  The only way you can get a whiff of the sent is to stick your nose in the jar. Absolutely no scent in surrounding area when burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Penny
review: I have no problem trusting Yankee Candles.  However, this Clean Cotton scent does not have as powerful fragrance throw as I would like. Still a good scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: KS10FL
review: No scent what-so-ever. Smokes like crazy. How dare Yankee Candle sell this. This is my first Yankee candle. I have many friends that waste their money on these over-priced candles and some smell really good so I thought I would waste some money and I sure did!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: brix3
review: I‚Äôm so disappointed. In order to smell the scent you have to basically hold up the candle to ur nose, it‚Äôs a real shame because it smells amazing. Will be purchasing directly from yankee candle in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Diezel152
review: Love the scent, need to make it in body wash, soap etc, I like having my candles lit pretty much all day so not sure how long it lasted but love the scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Hoosiermama
review: These candles leave a clean fresh strong scent. Always gets tons of compliments. Good at keeping bugs away. So sad that yankee quit selling them year round

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: supermom
review: Well packaged for delivery. The scent is ‚Äúblah‚Äù at best. It‚Äôs very faint, if at all. You need to so close to the burning wick that your nose hairs catch fire to get a whiff of the delicate scent. Recommend it only if you like burning scent less, expensive large candles. Try their other scents. Love the company!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Yolinda F. Walro
review: The media could not be loaded. The candle is unusable. It came in melted and all the excess candle is on top of the wick. I want a replacement

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Chris M.
review: I first purchased this scent over ten years ago. It is by far one of my favorite yankee scents, the other being storm watch which is nearly impossible to find anymore. Very strong scent, almost like men‚Äôs cologne (Sauvage). If you don‚Äôt like strong cologne, then this is not for you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Haruka
review: The media could not be loaded. The scent is very strong. Like the name, this candle gives a summery night vibe with its strong smell. Not my cup of tea, but the quality is great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Carla
review: This does not small like eucalyptus at all. Not even close. More like a sweet woodsy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Assaf
review: The scent is on the masculine side which is good, it does have a slightly chemical scent, like burnt fuel but maybe it‚Äôs because it‚Äôs new or something

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Orchid D.
review: Eucalyptus (single scent) is one of my all time favorite yankee candle scents.  I am so glad they brought it back.  This candle is so good at driving out/neutralizing cooking odors that its my go to when cooking fried foods; specifically fish. In general I love this scent for freshening up my kitchen, dining and living rooms any time. A shopping list staple.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: BJ
review: The scent feels cologne-ish, it‚Äôs a bit strong but my husband is a huge fan. The candle seems to last a decent amount of time as well. It‚Äôs become a staple in our home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Shark slayer
review: Came melted in the box did not want to send back so used a heat gun to  Re-melt the candle and got lucky found the wick happy with the scent works fine

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Therese Masi
review: This scent is so clean and it lingers for a while.  We have a 3000 sq feet, tri-level, and the scent finds its way all over the place.  I also use the leftover wax in a burner,

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: nrt
review: Does not smell anything like it is supposed tp nor is it really fragrant at all. Too expensive not to be made well , not what Im used to from Yankee. Will not buy another one from Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mrs Ref
review: After months of receiving the Eucalyptus scent, I did not receive this scent on my last shipment! The candle was darker and didn‚Äôt smell at all like eucalyptus. Someone must be adding labels to the wrong candles. Not pleased!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

review: Ordered about 2 weeks ago received a lovely smelling candle so I ordered 2 more... There‚Äôs no scent. It doesn‚Äôt even make a singular room smell vs. the original candle made the whole room fragrant. Super disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Legs820

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Cat Pietanza
review: This has no scent at all. So disappointed, I‚Äôve been purchasing this scent at yankee candle since they first came out, never had one that had little to no scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: KeithDavid
review: If they were going for "burning wax" scent, they nailed it!! Otherwise, my pits generate more aroma while burning than this $17 candle...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Albert
review: love this scent, my wife is obsessed with it. I will say though it‚Äôs Not as strong as the balsam fir candle we have, in the sense that the smell doesn‚Äôt spread throughout the house as fast.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kimi
review: Always have used these in the kitchen and family room. I prefer Yankee but prior to COVID they closed the store down the street. Didn‚Äôt realize Amazon carried them: ) love having free delivery! Such a bonus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Gianna
review: These are fake :( and I bought two for prime day. Yankee candles are normally super fragrant. I have both burning and can‚Äôt smell a dang thing. Such a bummer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle has the freshest scent ever. We really love how inviting and calming it is. I would definitely give this as a house warming gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

review: I turn this candle on every night when I get home. My job is very physically demanding and I work out in my home so it always smells like a gym if I don‚Äôt have a candle on. This candle has managed to last the longest and provide the strongest scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Dewspin
review: I heard a lot about this brand and bought 2 in case i got a fake shipment. Bottom line - for the price, the non soy quality and most importantly- almost negligible smell compared to brands like lulu - this is absolutely useless. After burning This for more than 30 mins, a faint scent started in the room. Compared to other brands which had a me grasped with their smell in less than 5 mins. Either there are fake reviews or users have never tried a good candle. Pls avoid buying this if you can - invest your money in better, higher quality candles out there for the same price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Lynn C
review: I loved Yankee candles because of the beautiful scents. It would make my whole house smell nice. Now there is little scent. I have it in the table next to me and I can‚Äôt smell it. It does burn nice. Long lasting. But if you are looking for a scented candle don‚Äôt buy Yankee candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sam
review: I love sage scents but my boyfriend however things it stinks. I like it and would recomend if you like the smell of crafting stores...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

review: Saga and Citrus is my favorite Yankee Candle scent. It smells wonderful and isn‚Äôt overly strong. These candles really last. Make sure to keep the wick trimmed. Delivery was on time, and the candle was in perfect condition. I‚Äôll definitely be repurchasing in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: mesh
review: A refreshing scent by Yankee Candle! Genuinely smells of clean freshly washed laundry that sticks around for long lasting enjoyment! Gave 3 for Christmas gifts & they were thrilled! Definitely recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: The Sage & Citrus lets off a very very mild scent. If you‚Äôre looking for a candle to be more fragrant- I‚Äôd suggest a different scent. Love Yankee Candle... but this one doesn‚Äôt fill the house like other scents we like.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Heather the Great
review: Smells like those guys from high school that used to bathe  with cologne! It just smells like men‚Äôs cologne! Even husband hates it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Rodney
review: The candle was fake. List no scent at all. Total waste of money

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Customer
review: While this candle had lasted the designated time, and the scent does fill the air, the actual "burn time" of it leaves a black residue on the inside and cause the whole container to be extremely hot.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Skye Welsh

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Tina L E.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: moe
review: Nice Fragrance. I have 2 big dogs. Cleansing but Not overpowering. I wouldn‚Äôt use it in the kitchen as it wouldn‚Äôt blend w food items unless you are serving Margaritas or a lime & citrus food.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mel
review: Smells good this is a great company I had a problem it was damage and I told them and they send me another one so fast thank you so much

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: dabronx
review: Love this scent. The price is phenomenal! My mailman Came in the house today and stated: WOW, your house Smells good and he was no where near the kitchen Where it was burning. Gotta say, Amazon : I really Don't shop anywhere else!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: K Klein
review: Bought this scent for the first time and wasn‚Äôt very impressed with scent. Can hardly smell unless your right up next to it. Will try other scents next time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mommomof5
review: I love Yankee Candles ,have purchased for years directly from them, but now only Amazon.  They are half the price of Yankee!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Tami Gee
review: First, it still amazes me how fast Amazon can get an order to you!  This candle is one of my favorite top 5 scents.  The price was outstanding.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Janine
review: I didn‚Äôt like the fragrance. It‚Äôs kind of an outdated men‚Äôs cologne odor, like wearing Halston or the like. I gave it five stars for value because it does last; in fact, I can‚Äôt seem to use it up. I‚Äôll throw it out since I have other fragrances coming.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Debra
review: Not really impressed.  Scent is way too light... Can't smell it when it's burning.  Frustrating to spend money on things that aren't what they claim to be.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

review: The media could not be loaded. Completely shattered.  Poor packaging. The box smelled lovely,  too bad this gift was sent broken. You could hear the glass,  not sure what the driver was thinking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: NC BLUE
review: Nice candle for summer. Great strong smell

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: When these go on a lightning deal, they‚Äôre a great buy. This particular scent is interesting. I would describe it as a fresh-smelling man. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Bella2009
review: Disappointed! This used to be one of my favorite scent‚Äôs from Yankee. I purchased this candle from Amazon and the scent is very weak. Honestly, no smell. I‚Äôm not sure if Yankee changed something but it wasn‚Äôt from the best

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: LeNoir LaFlora II
review: No sent at all when light. Thought it would be strong but it's not. Have to have it in close area then you'll be able to smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: ASHWIN S.
review: After having read the reviews I decided to give this a try despite few warning us not to. Well I‚Äôd have to admit this candle is a colossal waste of money. The aroma from my Bath and body candle that I lit for an hour 4 days back still manages to fill the room whilst I almost burnt my nose trying to smell the candle after being lit for over an hour. I‚Äôd rather buy the cheap ones from Walmart. Atleast they smell better.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: AnthonyW
review: The smell is very light, even cannot smell it. I prefer the apple cinnamon candle.. and it costs almost twice than the apple cinnamon candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Gwendolyn E. Jenkins
review: One of their best scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Melanie Newman
review: What happened to the scent intensity of Yankee Candles?  I am unable to smell the candle at all when burning. The scent is pleasant when you open the jar, but do not expect to enjoy this scent when burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kathy Linnane
review: Is a good candle. The scent used to be stronger. I have a big roo. With high ceilings so it has to burn for about 5 hours to be really noticeable.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: cica_trix
review: This may be my 1st 1 start review.  There is little to no scent coming out from this brand new candle.  Thais all you need to know.  It used to be great but not anymore I guess.  If this was a regular item I would return it as a defect.  Thank you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sharon B
review: My favorite scent, clean fresh and soft. Quality as expected from Yankee candle along with longevity. I purchased pre-owned‚Ä¶ Just came in a plain brown box, No problem for me saved half the price!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kevin in Alabama
review: I love Yankee Candles, but the one I purchased had absolutely no scent and my son agrees. This particular candle is a DUD even though I purchased it on sale.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amanda
review: This is the most wonderful smell in the universe. And $10 less than what I see on store shelves. Yankee candle makes some damn good products.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: James
review: I ordered this candle expecting it to smell more on the citrus side given the name. When I got it, I was not unpleasantly surprised to find out that it smelled more like shaving cream. It's not a bad smell, but's it's not what I was expecting or intended to order at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: darkglobe00
review: Happy with shipping/packaging, especially being a glass product. Arrived in tact, no cracks in the glass container and the house smells good!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: sleepingmoon
review: The product arrived broken. The packaging was in tact, and this candle was shipped  with others in similar packaging in the same box, but this one was broken. The scent was great and I  will keep it for use at home, but had to purchase an alternate gift as a replacement.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: SaveYourMoney
review: This is a great soothing scent. If I could have a lifetime supply of this, I would. However I don't, so it is sort of expensive. The duration of the candle is decent. Depends upon your use though. Overall the scent is awesome.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sky
review: Loved this buy! The price was wonderful, as I‚Äôve always loved yankee products but not usually the prices. Nice addition to my Halloween decor!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: J
review: This is absolutely my favorite scent from Yankee Candle.  The Jar Candles last for a really long time and will fill a room with the scent well.  I've been buying this scent for years and it's great to provide a cool/dark/pleasant smell in any room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mom of 2
review: This was a favorite STRONG scent from Yankee. Finally finished Midsummer's  night purchased a couple years ago so bought another just bought another. Burned 3 straight days around 4 hours and can barely smell in bedroom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Eva N.
review: Delivered Jul 28, 2021 Yankee Candle Eucalyptus Scented Large Jar -  Can't open it because the wax fills the entire jar.  Can light it cos I can't open it.  It's gotta go back!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Natalie Williams
review: This is my favorite Yankee candle, I like the two wins and the scent lasts for a long time as well as the candle! Best value for the money I am sure of it! Highly recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: kelly sheehan
review: Smells like Senior year of HS - drakkar forever hahah

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Ryan
review: A lot of reviews showed the candles arriving melted and unusable. I can say for my experience I ordered four after being placed on sale and they all arrived in original packaging correctly with no defects. I‚Äôm highly satisfied with the product and delivery.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: reflux
review: This just arrived and it has almost no scent, just like the others have said. I tried adding yankee candle scent oil to give it more smell, but it hasn't helped. The product is garbage.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Vontrise
review: Meets expectations!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: imma
review: My mom used to burn this scent (midsummer) 20 years ago, it still smells the same. Nostalgic. I miss my mom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: La Princessa
review: Love these candles. Very nice aroma but not overbearing.  Also, family and friends like the smell. It also, burned evenly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kathie N Folts
review: I had hoped that this candle would have a stronger scent as it was a Yankee Candle.  I would not but this one again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Lavinnia
review: Love the scent! I wanted something clean and fresh, not at all overpowering. This was perfect! It was well packaged, not damaged in any way. Good price for Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Barb
review: Wick burns too high no matter how much I have clipped it, resulting in a huge amount of scent released in the living room where it was placed. I am very disappointed with the candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Kristen SW Washington
review: I have diligently kept the wick of this jar candle trimmed to 1/8‚Äù & it still smoked & left black residue on the inside of the jar. It also seemed to burn more quickly than other Yankee Candles I‚Äôve had that were the same size & scent. For $20, the candle ought to last for at least 12 hours of burn-time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sherrie Loyd
review: I was not happy with this candle..I use to buy Yankee Candles all the time years ago and the scent was stronger and I was pleased with them.. This candle had a very little scent to it..Yankee Quality isn‚Äôt there anymore..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Stan
review: The gifts arrived on time and in good shape. My wife likes them and the candle she has list so far smells nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: woof
review: The citrus & sage scent is such a mild smell i could hardly  smell it at all, it does burn well though

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Florida flamingo
review: Gave it as a gift for an 18 yr old & she loved the scent & the black candle fit into her bedroom there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: SG
review: Love the scent. Foe some reason this candle Did not seem like it burned as long (lasted as long) as other Yankee candles, but I do burn it daily. Definitely it is gif table candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Jessica T
review: First it is a good size.  At first the scent was amazing, but about halfway down the candle it did what I think most candles do- the scent wasn't as strong and took a long time to be able to smell it.  Still used it all up, didn't want to waste it.  But again, good light smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: JulieMO
review: I just received this candle and I have to say I barely smell anything. I guess the scent is meant to be very subtle but I would prefer something a bit more overpowering for my living room. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Donna T.
review: Love the smell. Not strong or overwhelming. It does burn quick for the cost.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: William Ormsby
review: Scent is great but burned too quick

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: palevass
review: This is my favorite fragrance from any candle in many years.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: mmd
review: I love the scent of this candle. It makes me feel happy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Kim Ellis
review: Love this candle. I should have bought more than one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Amazon Customer
review: Aroma

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Daniel Page
review: Great candle great value

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: NYC Mama
review: This candle smells amazing and it lasts so long!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: barb l
review: I always burn candles and I like the air smelling clean and a variety of great scents to choose from.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Deanna Zink
review: Smelled great... Doesn't last long

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Victoria A. Paul
review: Disappointingly little scent for a Yankee candle. Will not purchase again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Lee Lee
review: Would definitely buy again. Smells amazing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: Dakota Morton
review: Love this scent! Not too sweet, gives off cozy vibes.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: SantisHelper
review: This is a great candle! It burns evenly and cleanly, all the way down. No smokey glass, no pileup of wax on one side. It's expensive but you do get your money's worth!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Scented Candle, Seaside Woods
author: M.S.
review: These candles are amazing! The scent lasts and is strong. I‚Äôve ordered 3 so far and will be ordering more!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mariah Keane
review: this candle eliminated any remaining need for real men in my life. if you are any kind of man but you don't smell like this candle, i'm not interested. unsure how a candle can be so relaxing and exciting at the same time but i highly recommend this smell to everyone who likes hearth fires, frasier firs, Chris Evans, flannel blankets, soft dirt, hiking, that one shady part of the forest that feels extra peaceful, Chris Pratt, afternoon sunlight, cuddling in the winter, cuddling in the summer, Chris Hemsworth, freshly chopped wood, crunchy leaves, napping outside.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle smells like I woke up to the feeling of a broad-shouldered man in a worn white long-sleeved henley gently draping a second blanket over my still sleep-soft body before crawling into bed with me only to gather me in his arms while I drift back off to sleep to the sounds of him softly calling out to our old but loyal husky-retriever mix. Men should be required by law to smell like this candle. Please buy this candle.5 stars.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: mechanicalfantasy
review: I ordered this half as a joke because I saw a really dramatic post on tumblr singing about how this smells like the perfect man.  I was not prepared.  The day I got it I went around to all three of my roommates telling them to smell this.  The first thing one of them said was "Smells like man".  I was literally walking around my room just sniffing this candle.  I am never, ever setting a match to it. Anyway, nice woodsy pine scent, and you'll never need a boyfriend again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Maine95
review: Bought this as a joke  for my daughter after reading the following tumbler post: " Yes, the Yankee Candle Company has just eliminated the need for men. This medium tumbler Mountain Lodge candle jar is now your boyfriend. The Yankee Candle Company has effectively replaced the need for contact with the male half of our species with a compact and clean-burning candle in a jar." It does smell really good...clean, woodsy, "lumberjacky"... I think it may be my new son-in-law...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: I ignored the bad reviews and bought it because I laughed so hard at the funny ones plus I have always had a good experience with Yanky Candle but this candle really does not have much fragrance at all. The slight bit you can smell if you‚Äôre hovering over it is nice but I‚Äôm not about to burn off my eyebrows for it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Marcella
review: I bought a bunch of candles at the same time a few weeks ago and this was by far my favorite! The smell is nice and fresh, and the scent carries throughout the apartment, but its not overwhelming or "artificial" smelling. I'm a cat owner and this candle covered all pet related smells, as well as my trash, old food, etc - it covered up every smell and left my apartment smelling delicious :D. I typically like floral smells but this is more like... the fresh smell that you smell right after it rains, with a little sweetness. The smell is difficult to describe, but trust me, this candle is worth the price! The best thing about it is that the candle itself lasts a while and the scent is the perfect strength (not subtle at all, but not overwhelming).

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Colonial Girl
review: NOT the Patchouli that Yankee Candle produced in the past....disappointed.  I have a small Yankee candle jar candle with a little wax left in it and the new one is not even close to the other.  I bought another one from a Patchouli specialty shop and am even more disappointed in it...no fragrance at all.  I will have to "smell it in person" before I buy another.  Very sad, because Patchouli is my favorite.....wasted a lot of money trying to find what I want.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: L. L.
review: After decades of buying Yankee Candles I have noticed a steady decline in scent. Now I have 4 large jars in one room. They have all been burning for two hours, and when I go into the room, I can't detect ANY SCENT AT ALL! I realized recently a corporation purchased Yankee Candles, from the original owner, and he died. Again, I see the results of what happens when a greedy corporation buys anything good. They ruin it, and perhaps cut back or use a cheaper essential oil. Whatever they're doing, it's a shame. This decline has gone on for years, and I have had it! Why must corporation buy great companies and ruin what was once the best candle on the market?  From now on, I will purchase candles elsewhere, from another company..Perhaps the original sons new Candle company will return to create the original great scented candles. Maybe corporations will learn, they can only short change decades long customers for so long before they ruin their investment and lose more customers for good. Shame on corporate greed ruining a once great candle company. FOUR candles and two hours in one room, and NOTHING??

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Shannon L
review: Was the new scent, not the old one. This is NOT the boyfriend candle that smells of Hemsy. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: FH
review: This is my favorite scent from Yankee Candle.  I ALWAYS order from their website but decide to go straight to Amazon.  This is not the silver birch I‚Äôve come to know and love.  The color is off and the scent is VERY VERY weak. My candle is more gray.  What I was sent looks blue like and like a fake Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: SomeGuy Nobody
review: I really can't top the reviews already posted for this fantastic candle, all I can do is add to it's praise. Sure it's nearly $40 for a stinking(no pun intended) candle but boy is it worth every penny. I've always been a big fan of Yankee Candles, especially their winter/holiday pine-scented ones but Mountain Lodge beats every other scent by a mile. I really don't consider this to be a "seasonal" scent although some may suggest it's better suited for cooler weather, as it's very rich and robust. I will admit (as a single, "hetero-male") this candle makes me question why women's perfumes don't smell as good as this thing does because if a man walked past me smelling anything close to this I may have to start playing for the other team. I think that covers it. TMI - I know but this candle is just that g o o d.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: John
review: The reviews on this are definitely overstated. The whole ‚Äúthis smells like a man who built a cabin‚Äù are  off.  It smells more like Chris Hemsworth took a dump in the woods after a cheat day and then sprayed it with the essence of Mark Wahlbergs ball-sweat on a crisp Spring morning. But yeah we‚Äôll call it ‚Äúmountain lodge‚Äù

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Niagara,NY
review: I only buy Yankee Candles and usually from their local candle store in our area. However, due to the Covid Pandemic I decided to order on line via Amazon. I enjoy a woodsy candle scent during the winter months and my favorite was Cozy Cabin, that is discontinued. I ordered Velvet Woods for the holidays and it was absolutely satisfying and put me in a relaxing mood. This soy based candle melted evenly and the double wicks didn't fray. I bought Mountain Lodge at the same time, to try it too because it was a reasonable price. Sadly, the scent is hardly noticeable and the wick frays terribly. It may be due the difference in the soy verses just wax. I don't know if I just got a badly mixed candle but I'm very disappointed in this Mountain Lodge scent. Plus, the poor quality wick frays as it burns, shining an unequal glow. I may purchase the Mountain Lodge candle scent from a different seller just to compare the two. If you order this candle, I hope you have better luck.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Shelby
review: My grandma ordered this for me as a gift for my birthday. I was super excited because Mountain Lodge is my absolute favorite scent from Yankee candle. I received the candle today, and immediately smelled it. It smelled lightly like my fond memories of mountain lodge, but I thought ‚Äúoh, it‚Äôll definitely be stronger when I light it‚Äù. That was my first mistake. Everyone knows most Yankee candles punch you in the nose when you smell them for the first time. My candle has been lit for about two hours now, and I smell absolutely nothing. I‚Äôm disappointed, to say the least. I know this isn‚Äôt something you should expect from Yankee candle, because I‚Äôve had this before and it was AMAZING. My house smelled so good! But this one I just ordered? Major let down. That‚Äôll teach me from ordering them off Amazon vs going to the store and getting it directly. I wish I could return it, honestly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Michelle
review: I don‚Äôt really know what went wrong here, but it‚Äôs wrong - very wrong. Surely Amazon wouldn‚Äôt be sending bootlegged products under the guise of the real product, right?
