I purchased what was supposed to be a Yankee candle as a gift for a dear friend who, for years, has admired the silver birch scent. I knew that he longed for one of his own but wouldn‚Äôt spend the money on himself, so I got him one for his birthday. I‚Äôm not sure what kind of 2020 monstrosity this is, but in order to get a real (fake?) candle sent, the recipient will have to go out of his way to drop off. With COVID -19 hot in our area right now, the recipient said he will be happy to just smell the wax since he can‚Äôt burn the candle. He doesn‚Äôt get many presents and is just grateful for what he does get. (Don‚Äôt worry - I will make sure he gets a functioning candle.) As a side note, the silver birch scent of real Yankee candles is fantastic.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Nikkole.NA.
review: I know this candle has other reviews talking about it arriving melted beyond use to buyers,  but I still bought it thinking and hopeful that it could be a fluke thing. Well....it isn't. The Mountain Lodge candle arrived in the same box as another candle I bought (different brand) and long and behold the Yankee candle (like the reviews said) arrived half melted. I was one of the lucky ones though as I was still able to light the wick, however it isn't burning evenly now.  Very disappointed considering the price I paid for this candle., I've ordered MANY candles online (including Yankee) and have never had candles arrived melted. The candle it self smells absolutely great! A wonderful clean woodsy scent that doesn't have a over powering smell of pine like a lot of "outdoorsy" scented candles tend to have. It makes me reminisce about my stay in the mountains this past summer.  It also has a good throw but isn't super strong. I would definitely buy the candle again, maybe just not from Amazon? I'd give the candle scent and throw 5 stars but unfortunately until Yankee or Amazon fixes the melting issue it has to remain a 2 star product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: reader
review: Also bought Silver Birch, Warm Luxe Cashmere and Balsam Cedar., large 2 wick size.  I buy them for the winter because I like to burn several candles to create a cozy environment. They all arrived safely and were well packaged.. They all burn well. So why the 1 star rating?? All of them except Midsummer's Night have NO THROW. I mean NONE, even with 3 candles burning at the same time. I am sitting about 2 ft away from the 3 burning candles, and there IS NO SMELL. And, no, I do not have Covid. Midsummer's Night was a least faint, but that is it. I spent over $150 and expected SOME scent. Nope, only if You put your nose right over the unlighted candle.  What a disappointment and I will look at other manufactures.  I do not know who makes stronger smelling candles, but it is not this company.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Nat
review: The candle smells a bit more strongly of cologne than I'd expected. That's not necessarily bad, although I haven't lit it yet so I don't know what it smells like when it burns. As you can see from my photos the whole candle melted before it even got to me, so I can't actually find the wick to light the candle anyway. Maybe it's my fault for ordering a candle in the summer time, but I guess the combination of heat from transit and the candle actually being packaged on its side means it's very possible someone else might receive a candle like mine (messy and unusable). I might try to leave it out in my car for a day to see if I can get it melted back into the jar, but there's no telling if I'll be able to find the wick even if that works. If Yankee candle could make sure their candles shipped vertically instead of horizontally, this would likely not happen. Idk how much control they have over that but even a "this side up" message on their box might be helpful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: D.B.
review: I have yo agree with some of the other reviewers, the scent is not as strong when Patchouli first came out. I have been using Yankee Candle Patchouli for some time now, and it was definitely one of my favorite scents! Then Yankee Candle decided to stop producing this scent. I complained and I think others did as well, and they decided to bring it back. But it isn't the same. The scent is much milder and lighter, and it wasn't very strong then. But now it's just a mild waxy candle burning in my home. I also have a problem with the wick, it's not in the center and the wax is melting very unevenly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: harleychick
review: And by woodsy, I am referring to that crisp clean smell from nature, what autumn air might smell like among pine trees in the woods.  Its just a nice, clean men's soap-type smell that is very intoxication. When burning, the smell fills the room and the whole house very nicely. Other Yankee Candle scents to compare to: Not direct comparisons, but just the realm of scents is what I'm trying to say- But if you like Mountain Lake, Midsummer Night, or any other cologne-man type smell, you will probably enjoy this.  In fact, I really like that it is a "toned down" version of a man's cologne. Hope this helps!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Freiherr Diefendorf
review: My wife is an old woman at heart. She likes to get cozy, she likes to wear cozy clothes, and she likes cozy scents. Fall and winter are her favorite times of year because she can get cozy drink hot tea and watch Hallmark movies as we decorate the house with the kids. She bought this overpriced candle from Yankee candle and it smells like an old woman's house. It's not very cozy for me or for her and we're both a little disappointed. Some people might find this smell and nostalgic like gain laundry detergent. I don't. it was also disappointing to see the exact same candle for sale at Walmart for 1/3 of the price. I don't often go to Walmart and I didn't even know they carried Yankee candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kindle Customer
review: To say I'm bitterly disappointed is an understatement. I bought this candle after reading the reviews and was convinced I'd finally found what I'd been searching for. I paid a lot for this candle and am now stuck with nothing but a flame. THERE IS NO SCENT AT ALL. NOTHING. NADA.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: 5(me)ly
review: My son kept this candle because it really resembles the scent of his preferred deodorant. And he likes to be consistent with the fragrances :) The scent of the fragrance is very complex and the best way I can describe it is that it reminds me of the male version of Cool Water or Acqua di Gio perfume. It is fresh, clean and irresistibly masculine. Although I consider this to be a very masculine candle, there were some twists in the under-notes of this fragrance that I can not even describe, but that are very heavenly. The strength of the scent of this candle is remarkable - one of the very strongest Yankees that I own and I have like and army of them, really :) My other son did not like this candle because he is very scent-sensitive and this was very overpowering for him to the point that he might have a headache. I think I might reorder this candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: TRAILWALKER3000
review: I read a report recently that Yankee Candle company‚Äôs response to the negative Amazon reviews regarding their candles was that people likely had Covid and lost their sense of smell. But I can tell you for certain I do not have Covid my sense of smell and taste or fantastic just like they were before Covid. I bought four Yankee candles this one has no scent. Let me clarify, the scent is incredibly subdued. The Midsummer nights dream has a powerful sent, too much in fact. The balsam and fir has a nice scent but rather low on the volume.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Keltoikds
review: My sister is 72 years old and was one of the original hippies in San Francisco.  Naturally her favourite fragrance is patchouli.  I've been buying her patchouli candles from Yankee Candles for years!  This particular scent is no longer available from Yankee Candles so I go on line.  I would have given this a 5 star, but my sister said the scent is not as strong as it used to be (due to age of candle?).  She still loved it, so I guess I will continue to buy...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: John
review: Not sure what the issue was with this particular candle, but it gave off virtually no scent.  If you stuck your nose right into the jar you could slightly smell the fragrance and it smelled very good, but light the candle and even after almost an hour nobody could smell anything.  We love Yankee candles and I purchased two others at the same time as I did this one, they were exactly what we have come to expect from Yankee, but this one was just a dud I guess.  I would have returned it, but we had lit it and burned it for about an hour already.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Smart Shopper
review: I ordered the Silver Birch as a stocking stuffer. The smell was amazing! Jar was very pretty. Sometimes when you buy these candles from discount retail stores they don‚Äôt smell as strongly. That wasn‚Äôt the case with this one. Also, the 3 wick candles burn so fast but Yankee Candles last a long time. Would def purchase again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: mjcali
review: You can't beat a Yankee candle. I'm a full grown 60 year old man that knows when times are stressful, a great way to help destress is by taking care of myself in my home. My best friend and fishing buddy was diagnosed with terminal cancer. I live in a beautiful area of the forest in northern California. He and his wife would come up often in his final years. I would light candles in their guest room before they arrived and they always commented on how nice it was to walk into the room with that smell. Having a nice scented candle when trying to let go of the weight is a great way to let go. Treat yourself or a friend to a little relaxer now and then.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Bona
review: The scent is really nice, especially for this time of year. No problem with scent. The size is good for a candle lover as the large size is lasting a while. The only problem I have with this candle is the wick. I trim the wick before I light it, but I haven't quite reached that happy medium of trimming the wick just right. Too much and it's hard to light candle unless you tilt it, too little and black smoke gets on your ceiling and walls. All in all I like the candle but as much as I like this large size, I would buy two smaller ones the next time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: KDK in Texas
review: This scent in the large jar candle is currently not available through Yankee Candle, so I was pleased to find it on Amazon.com.  The scent is more complex than just "patchouli" and one large jar candle fills the room with a distinct yet relaxing aroma that reminds me of the original Pier One stores in the '70s--post hippy woodsy bamboo LOL! The candle is a dark sage green color which also goes with my decor.  Great price, too!  I will reorder.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kate
review: As a female, I also tend to like some of the 'masculine' scents (woodsy/earthy) but Silver Birch smells like a male's cologne, not anything reminiscent of the outdoors. If you want your home to smell like a male's cologne counter from a department store, this may be for you. It isn't for me. An otherwise good burning candle though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: ljvirgo
review: I don't need multiple wicks, and really have no idea why anyone does - God, really, it's a candle, what are people doing with all the shapes and sizes.  I want scent and I want it to last.  This is everything that Yankee does sooooo well with their classic jar candle.  This scent is new to me, but is a lovely woodsy masculine scent, not flowery, not heavy, but light and fresh smelling.  Very happy when I can get these long lasting candles at a great price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Anna
review: I was amazed reading reviews to this candle saying that it smells like a boyfriend. But when I got it, that's exactly how it smells. Maybe to me it reminds men's deodorant or cologne - something that you smell when you get to cuddle. I think that the candle should be renamed accordingly. It does not really remind mountain lodge to me. I'd want more smell of cedar and wood, which I don't feel in this candle. Balsam cedar is so far my most favorite smell, but it is also a Christmas tree smell, so I wanted something similar for other season too. This candle is not what I was looking for,  but it is well made.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: EPB
review: I bought a Patchouli Yankee Candle as I love earthly aromas, specially in incense but want to get away from incense due to the smoke. This Yankee Candle brand gave me hopes given its price (hoping, I'd get what I paid for as this is no cheap candle) but it smells like any other yankee candle smells like: That oily aroma used in bathroom pucks, not necessarily a bad aroma but one I'm just not interested, especially as it reminds me of urinals. The aroma is also incredibly weak. I definitely DO NOT recommend it

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: A. J. Morin
review: I‚Äôm a long time Yankee candle junkie and I love this scent I‚Äôve bought it for years!! And this large jar literally smells like absolutely nothing!!! You can stand right on top of it and burn your nose hairs off and you still can‚Äôt smell a thing!! I‚Äôm absolute shocked that Yankee candle sent me such a crap candle. I was trying to make my home smell like Christmas and instead it just smells like the pizza I reheated!üòû and no I don‚Äôt have Covid.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Beadchaser
review: ordered without reading reviews. oops. If you seek a candle with scent similar to patchouli essential oil, this is not that candle. Blessedly, the scent is minimal. Unfortunately there's also an undertone of cinnamon, which sucks if cinnamon scent is one of your allergy triggers.. WTF Yankee Candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Barbi
review: I have been buying and using Yankee Candles for many years, and usually love trying new scents. This one however - Patchouli - smells awful! It stinks so bad even my husband said something about it, and that is rare for him to complain. I'll go back to some of my favorites instead.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: me myself i
review: Smells great but the last few yankee candles I purchased smoked so bad...I had to constantly trim wick.  I am talking about two to three times a evening whenever I lit it. Did something change??  Will try yankee again in different scent...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: K_Thed4ord
review: I bought this after that one review blew up hoping this would smell like a hot man. I love men‚Äôs cologne and the mountains so I figured this wouldn‚Äôt be disappointing either way. But it straight up doesn‚Äôt have a scent at all. I bought another one from a different seller to make sure this wasn‚Äôt just a dud and neither of them smell like anything at all. Very disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: I don't know if this was old or just fake but I ordered 3 yankee candles on amazon and there is literally no smell to any of them! My Walmart candles smell stronger than these. Very disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: lizardwitch
review: I feel bad saying that there isn't much smell to a scented candle because you never know if it's just the candle you received is that way or the whole batch.  I've burned this a couple times and same result, hardly any scent.  It sounded like this would be perfect for what I wanted :(  The jarred candle it's self is nice & has lid, heavy glass..would be a great gift if had scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Anthony Cucinotta
review: I purchased this candle specifically for the Patchouli scent. The candle had a good patchouli scent when I removed the jar cover. I‚Äôve burned the candle several times now and it has zero Patchouli scent when lit. This candle was top dollar at $25+. Do not waste your money on this product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Lori
review: This is my favorite Yankee Candle scent.  As a matter of fact, it is the ONLY Yankee Candle scent I will tolerate in my home.  A lot of people complain that this scent is too mild, but I find it pleasant.  I can't stand walking in a place where my nose is assaulted by strong scents.  This is pleasantly in the background and is quite long-burning.  However, the smoke issues with Yankee Candle have caused me to begin to look at other, more naturally made candles without the sometimes garish artificial dyes.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: K_Thed4ord
review: I am extremely dissapointed in this candle. All the reviews led me to believe this was a man in a bottle but in reality this candle has... no scent at all. It doesn't smell bad or anything it just doesn't really have a scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Lady Reed
review: If you're like me and have been dreaming about the Mountain Lodge Yankee candle ever since you read that positively ethereal description of it on Tumblr by clarabeau from five years ago..... Well. It smells exactly the way you always imagined. It's not too heavy or heady of a scent; just clean, pure mountainy goodness. Go. Live your dream. Buy it. You won't be disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Josh
review: My ex called this the ‚Äúboyfriend candle‚Äù Apparently it smells how every man should smell. It really isn‚Äôt that fantastic‚Äî it smells good yeah but when lit it can barely make a tiny bedroom smell like the candle, it‚Äôs very light of a smell. If she‚Äôs worth it, then pretend it smells amazing and get it for her like I did. I still have the candle. :/

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: barbara
review: This was accurately compared to a man‚Äî-it‚Äôs so subtle it‚Äôs like it‚Äôs hardly there at all.  You know, ur husband is there but he might as well not be cuz it makes no difference either way.  I kept putting my face in the candle to smell it and hardly any scent.  Forget about scenting a room.  I even closed the door to see what happened.  I‚Äôm happy I started with a small jar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kindle Customer
review: I wish I hadn't read the words "cheap aftershave" in someone else's review AFTER I bought this, because that is exactly what this candle smells like. Years ago Yankee candles used to be special, they had nice and complex scents. This one is not, it's as bad as those hideous cheap candles you see at the supermarket that give you a headache.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Dale
review: I have bought Yankee candle for years at the Yankee candle store at a nearby mall. Always have believed they were over priced but were worth the cost because they have some of the scents I really liked. Bought the Mountain Lodge candle on Amazon and for the first time ever it hardly had any scent. Such a disappointment. I will never buy another Yankee candle on Amazon again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Wolf11
review: I hoped for a better candle than reviews mentioned. Mine has ZERO scent. I almost burned hair trying to smell it. There was a slight scent for a second when first unwrapped. It had a TWO-second heavenly scent that immediately was gone. Not sure if they even give back money. $24 of NOTHING.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Ben
review: This is not an original candle. I bought the same candle at a Yankee Candle store and this candle I received is not the same. The stickers are different and the fragrance is not the same. I paid for a dud apparently. I will get my candles at the store from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: I had the patchouli candle a decade ago and it was intense and rich. This candle is doing nothing for me, the scent is negligible. I figured it was a problem with my candle, so I replaced it with another. Still very little scent. Pretty disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Michele Kagan
review: There‚Äôs no way this is patchouli. When I first took the lid off and smelled it, it smelled like a cinnamon Christmas scent which I abhor. I‚Äôm sending this back. I burn a candle everyday and I usually can tolerate scent that‚Äôs off putting but this makes my eyes water and smells like Christmas. This is not patchouli.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Britta H
review: Smells amazing! Be ready to roll your eyes into the back of your head from the pure luxuries Yankee Candle smell. Seriously mind blowing! Relax and enjoy. I burn mine during yoga.  Like you have your own burly lumber jack sitting next you. Ummm ummmm good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: TM
review: I absolutely LOVE this scent, and every time I've bought one directly from Yankee Candle, I've had no issues. Thought I'd buy one from Amazon and while the scent is accurate, there is absolutely zero throw... and for what you're paying for... it's massively disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mom of 2
review: I love this scent but the candle tunneled horribly. I tried the foil method and even used a topper. Ended up having to just put it on a candle warmer. Im so disgusted.  Last Yankee candle i bought burned beautifully. This one awful. Waste of money.  2 stars because scent is great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: This has a great smell but the strong is not as strong as some of my other Yankee candles so I am not sure if it is old or what. It makes me think it is older and has been on a shelf for a couple of years. I will order directly from the manufacturer instead of by seller on Amazon unless I want a scent that has been discontinued.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Frtjth124
review: I was nervous about buying a candle online that I haven't smelled first. However, the reviews on this candle were great and spot on. This candle is not too strong but not too weak. It smells like a fall night and brings warmth to our home. Love it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: J. Lopez
review: I bought this candle with very little to no expectations and was very satisfied with my purchase.  I haven't burned the candle yet but the smell of the candle right out the jar is amazing.  I'll update this review once we burn this candle for a few hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: CE
review: The candle itself came in true Yankee style, however it is a bit expensive. I could not find it in stores. The smell is great but once the candle has burned half down the smell goes a way a bit. The top of the candle is great, it is magnetic or at least to stand a VUSE battery on

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Connie L Brown
review: Usually Yankee candle is my Go choice for candles. But this patchouli candle left me underwhelmed. Hardly any smell at all and it burned completely down in 2 days. Usually they last a long time and have a great fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Wright
review: Weird all these reviews say it smells like a man but in reality it smells like medicine. If you like your man smelling like that than ok but nothing special ..just average but won't buy again.  Kinda funny cause I asked someone what they thought it smelt like and they said doo..do.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: J. Larralde
review: I love the scent of patchouli and was so happy when I found out that Yankee Candle had one with this scent that I ordered it immediately. I bought it to light in my bedroom after work. It quickly filled my bedroom with its scent. It smells so good! I will be ordering another two candles of this same scent soon in the near future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: LindsayOrca
review: Love, Love, Love this fragrance, I always stock up on a dozen of them whenever I can. These are by far and away my top 5 YK scent.  So outdoorsy and woodsy, like I have a man next to me and he is chopping firewood for the cabin. Love it. Highly recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: J. Ellison
review: I bought this candle as the finishing touch to my birch-themed bathroom. I was worried about the "smells like cheap aftershave" review, especially when I opened it right out of the box--the reviewer was correct, this candle does not smell pleasant if you stick your nose in it. But once lit, the smell changes and it adds an incredible freshness to the air. It's definitely a favorite.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Edgar Allen
review: Sad that Yankee Candle is becoming just another ruse. They used to have the loveliest scent on the market. But are cheap stuff with the high end price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: annegirl56
review: Was really looking forward to this filling my house with a lovely fragrance.  Nope. Not like my soy candles at all. It's ok. Probably be moved to a smaller room. The candle is a pretty color and does have a gentle patchouli fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: misterjimi
review: The problem with this candle having no scent is that Yankee Candle for reasons only known to them decided to change the scent of Mountain Lodge about 2 or 3 years ago. The original scent was outstanding. This one is a complete bust as noted by other reviews. I have spent a lot of time trying to track down the original scent candles and found 4 or 5 but they now seem to be completely unavailable.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kathryn M.
review: Not sure if the makers of this candle actually know what patchouli smells like, because it certainly is NOT in this candle!!  I'm a girl of the 60/70s & believe me I know what patchouli smells like, & this candle is WORTHLESS!!!  I am sorry I paid the whopping $18 for this mini 3.5" candle.  RIP OFF!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: K Lazy Y
review: I bought this candle for a "mountain lodge leather/piney" scent.  What I got was a gagging odor that left me gasping for air!  Maybe it's the "wax" that caused me to hack and cough or maybe it's the fact that the smell of the burning combination was just plain offensive and nasty.  Don't buy this for a comfy laid-back Rocky Mountain sit before the fire experience!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Waldo Pepper
review: A candle I previously purchased and enjoyed was currently unavailable, so knowing Yankee candle's reputation thought I'd give this candle a try.  Looks great, packaged well, unlit smell noticeable, after lighting not much going on. Enter the room my old patchouli candle would fil the room with a beautiful scent, this candle doesn't.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Alixandria
review: When it arrives and you first take it out the smell is very strong but once it airs out and even when lighting the scent is gentle. Perfect even in enclosed rooms. Slow burning. High quality.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Heflin Parmenter
review: Over the years, the quality of the aroma of Yankee Candles has steadily diminished. I was very much looking forward to enjoying the combinations of scents with this candle. However, the scent is so week, it can barely, if at all, be noticed in a fairly small room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: fellicity
review: I'm a huge fan of candles to set the mood for the holiday/time of year. This year, I forewent my usual "pumpkin spicey/mulled cider" scents, and tried this one along with Mistletoe. OMG it's Christmas in a jar. I burn them together, and I'm suddenly in a ski lodge sipping hot cocoa, not living in SoCal in 70 degree weather. Candle has a nice, long Yankee Candle burn time, and fills the whole house with a warm, comforting smell of fireplace, flannel, and winter nights. My new favorite!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Pamela
review: I have never gotten a Yankee Candle I didn't love until now. After reading raving reviews describing this candles wonderful scent, I bought one. Unfortunately, there's no scent at all coming from this candle. Not when I took off the lid for the first time, not when I lit it, not while it burns.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Anezthy
review: Most unscented Yankee Candle ever. $28.00 for wax in a jar. I am surprised being it a Yankee Candle product that it would have some fragrance. I don‚Äôt understand it. Whats more it had some good reviews. Buyer Beware!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: JENNX
review: I'm a huge fan of woodsy, smokey cologne-filled notes fused with sandalwood, musk, amber, etc. Silver Birch embodies the snapshot of that woodsy/cologne scent‚Äîa snapshot of a roaring fire on a fall/winter evening.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: DM
review: Love Yankee candles for their quality and scents. Silver birch is my favorite. Burns for a long time. Unfortunately this one looks like a second. It's got strange bubbles in the bottom and the color is inconsistent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Sara M.
review: Can't comment on the smell of this candle.  I love Yankee candles but this one just smelled of old wax.  No scent.  Must have been sitting open for a long time somewhere before it was sold.  Awful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: plcooke
review: These are my favorite candles. I have two in the living room, one in our master bedroom, and one in the kitchen. They have an amazing scent and the color matches the color scheme of our home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kimber Turner
review: This product has ZERO SMELL!! I purchased yankee candles in the past and have loved every single one-UNTIL THIS ONE. I‚Äôm not kidding, I have tried using it in smaller rooms to see if maybe the first few rooms were too open or drafty to project the aroma but even my tiny little bathroom after burning the candle for hours had ZERO SMELL!! I‚Äôm very disappointed with this candle. Don‚Äôt buy this fragrance. Keep looking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Vanesa
review: I've used this particular scent many times over a few years now. I know what I the candle used to smell like, but this time the smell was very faint. The color is also off, it is usually a deeper red. Next time I'll go to the Yankee Candle store for this scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: D Matthews
review: I was very disappointed with this candle. The fragrance was almost non detectable. Certainly not what I remember. And the burn time was very short. Maybe 8 -10 hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: I have long used Yankee candles and bought two others along with this one; those being much cheaper than the $27.99 for this candle.  I could not be more disappointed.  There is little to no scent when burning this candle and the other, cheaper ones, are far better.  Not sure if this is just a new scent for Yankee or what, but this candle isn't worth buying, not even if they drop the price.  All that said, the other two purchased are fragrant as typically expected.  Stay away from this one though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: KellyKel
review: My sister loves this candle. When I received the box, I was pleasantly surprised by the size and the quality of the candle. I would definitely buy this candle for future gift purchases!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Avid Reader
review: Honestly disappointed. Yankee Candle usually puts out excellently scented products, but this smells like neither mountains or lodges. It lasts a while, but the scent leaves much to be desired.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Ryan J Miller
review: Patchouli  is one of my favorite sense, and while I like Yankee candles, this one to me, it smells a little bit week. Not only that, but it smells more like clothes than patchouli.  It still smells good, but I think the scent could‚Äôve been made a bit stronger on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: KE Wyrick
review: I love this scent.  It lasts so long even after blowing it out.  I am most excited about catching it on a lightning deal here on Amazon.  My favorite scent, delivered to my door, at the best price ever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Noelle
review: This candle smells more in the clean side with a hint of men‚Äôs deodorant scent, would buy again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: M.Christian
review: This is my favorite Yankee candle scent. It usually only comes out for the holidays, I was so happy and excited to find it here. This candle should be a men's cologne it smells amazing!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Julie Ann
review: I‚Äôd avoid this candle if you‚Äôre looking for a candle that has a scent. The only time I can smell it is if I‚Äôm maybe two inches away from it as it‚Äôs burning. I can see why this was cheaper than the rest.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: I purchased this candle for the scent.  It has no scent.  Not even a little bit.  I've never known a Yankee Candle to disappoint in this way.  Yankee Candles are very expensive, and I'm unlikely to purchase one again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Rhabyn S. McCowan
review: I thought I already reviewed this candle. Probably years ago. Anyway, I'm starting to favor it slightly more than Midsummer's Night, my typical boyfriend favorite. Mountain Lodge is a little sweeter, softer. Too bad it's not as common.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Meg
review: This fragrance is great!  It's an earthy, almost cologne sort of smell, but, it's not overpowering. It's perfect for women and men.  I ordered a few of these. One arrived broken and within 2 days I had a replacement!  You cannot beat that sort of service. !!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle smell fantastic and burns for a long time.  About 3/4 of the way down the wicks began to burn at different speeds and one got ahead and began to drown the second wick in wax.  I had to keep dumping it out which is annoying and about the time I missed a draining it buried the second wick.  Now the remaining wick has burned to the end and I've given up many hours of candle I paid for.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Omer Elmakais
review: I‚Äôm not even embarrassed to say I got it because of tumblr and tumblr only. The smell, if being directly inhaled from the candle is mind blowing. Honestly didn‚Äôt think I‚Äôd love it that much but guess what? I did! Although, when I lit it up I was disappointed, as the scent hardly spreads around an average size bedroom, and I really wish the aroma was stronger.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Miss Sharon
review: I meant to order the VILLAGE CANDLE MOUNTAIN RETREAT...I accidentally ordered the YANKEE CANDLE MOUNTAIN LODGE instead.  As far, as I'm concerned the Village Candles far exceed the Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Patricia Cadena
review: First of all,  I only buy Yankee candles.  This is another new scent for me and I am pleased. I just wish that Yankee would only give their candles real names instead of intangible names that don't mean a thing,

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Gianna
review: I should have paid attention to other reviewers. This ABSOLUTELY does not smell like the original patchouli candles. Total bummer because I loved them and was so happy to see that they brought them back. In fact, it really has so scent at all. I'm returning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Me Smith
review: My wife loves the smell of birch trees. Sadly this gift did not smell like birch trees.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Dale
review: I wasn't a big fan of the scent but that is strictly a personal preference.  It's good quality and I would still purchase from here again.  It smelled more like cologne to me.  Maybe I should've known that would be the case.  I guess:  Mountains = manly.  Man = cologne. ?  :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: CMJ
review: Nice scent with good throw. Not like the old school YK which was straight up patchouli. This is more like the old YK Halloween candle...patchouli with some spices and cloves thrown in. I  miss the original but this is still a nice warm scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kev Tustin
review: Bought this for my sister and I liked it so much I bought one.  Yankee needs to make more and keep this in stock !!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: Received one with bad melting, even on single insulated box and glass broke to pieces in my hand while trying to pick out of box...cannot return due to injuries from broken glass and a other has a big ball of wax and no visible wick, so not going to try to return due to fear of getting cut again if glass breaks. Will use 3 out of 5 but one of the 3 even has melting wax in and around jar lid. Please replace 2 candles, I cannot return the damaged 2, and please insure the inside box is upright and padded and outside box has fragile and top marked up, this side up, only!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: V
review: Loved it in the store but when I went back to buy it...SOLD OUT. Bought it on here, came with 0 smell. Sad

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Chelsea P.
review: I immediately ordered this candle after I saw it at my mother in laws house. Due to previous reviews, I was worried that it would be delivered either poorly packaged or melted. Fortunetly, it was in perfect condition and it was heavily packaged in bubble wrap. I was home when it was delivered so i didn't have to worry about it melting in the Florida summer heat. I absolutely love the scent of this candle, and it has a good throw. Definitely recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Tmart
review: Best candle scent out there. Brings a soothing tingle to my nose everytime I light it up. I am in my room...or a mountain lodge?! I have no idea. Also can be used to set the mood for funky time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Stephanie Vandervoort
review: This is by far my FAVORITE CANDLE EVER!!! For the cost, the scent, and the candle over all!!!! This is no# 1!!!!  I have tried bath and body candles, Yankee, and wood wick. To name a few.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mary L. Brown
review: The candle was somewhat disappointing for a Yankee Candle. I expected a much more intense Patchouli fragrance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Verified Consumer
review: This candle is a great addition to the home.  It has a nice cabin-y kind of smell that is reminiscent of the outdoors and a wood lodge.  It burns evenly and within twenty minutes of burning it fills the room with a nice warm aroma that is not overwhelming.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: colnajoe
review: Great price, quick sniping, and this one is impossible to find in stores.  Best smelling candle by far.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kirstin Miller
review: I don't think the scent is Patchouli (of the 60s and 70s) but the scent carries well and smells good (not great). The scent is kind of vintage, green with mint or musk, reminds me of a gift shop or tea shop.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: MrMojoRisin2438
review: Nearly odorless. The faintest scent of men's aftershave. Ugly doo doo brown color. Big disappointment. Bravo to commissioned reviews that sold it as the smell of a hot guy in a candle. Convinced me into being ripped off.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: A strong, slightly sweet scent, dark, musky-earthy aroma profile.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Love Gadgets
review: I had a Patchouli from the Yankee Candle store with a a diffent label.  That one had a GREAT throw of the smell.  Cannot smell anyting from this one.  I should have read the reviews better.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Chey
review: I love this candle... so homey and warm. Has a winter feel without being expressly Christmas, perfect candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mary R.
review: This is the large Yankee jar candle in the silver birch fragrance and gray color that I love. Very good price, and it arrived quickly. I‚Äôm really happy with my purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: valerie
review: How utterly disappointing. I have original patchouli votives from a decade ago that are more fragrant than these jars. After burning for an hour there was zero scent in the air. Wish I would‚Äôve taken the previous reviews more seriously.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Matt Edie
review: This was my first and last Yankee Candle. It's not the smell that I don't like, it's the lack of it. It seriously doesn't give off any scent while lit. I'm glad I bought it on sale. I've had better luck with candles from Walmart or Bed Bath and Beyond.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Laverne R. Swanson
review: As always, Yankee Candle is a pleasure, a fragrant offering, so to speak!  Pricey but always worth the cost! Quality!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: michelle t.
review: Smells SUPER good in the jar, but the scent doesn't carry while burning. I'm often overwhelmed by scent while burning candles, but I forgot I even had this one burning-because I couldn't smell it at all!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Michael & Alicia J.
review: I've always loved this product and other scents from this company. But, I have to admit I tried to save a bit of money and ordered from another company (Our Own Candle Company) because of their price and different types of scents. Never again will I do this because now I have grey walls from the black smoke from the candles. So, if I would have stayed with what I knew, I wouldn't have had to pay to have my walls cleaned and wasted money on a cheaper product. "You get what you pay for" rings loudly for me. Thanks for the excellent product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: carmela ragucci
review: I got this candle because I love patchouli, but when I burnt patchouli Insince I was chocking on it. This candle is just the right amount Of those fragrance I love so much. I will get another one when this one is gone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Konen
review: Liked this scent a lot, not too overpowering but enough to where you can enjoy it

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Unknown
review: I got this because I had heard multiple times it was comparable to the scent Nature's Paintbrush. It is NOT! This has a strong pine and spice odor. Some people enjoy that, I personally dont. But the seller did a great job packaging and shipping.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Eric Otfinoski
review: I love Yankee Candles and usually their products are great, but this one has almost no scent. What is the point of spending $20 on an expensive candle when you can't even smell the scent if you put your face close to the flame when it's lit???

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: Bought this with a larger lilac pillar candle and this candle smelled amazing also. But it burned down just as fast as the larger pillar. I'd still purchase again but wish they wouldn't burn down so fast since I love Yankee candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: me
review: I've bought this candle before and this was a re-purchase because of how much I love the product. Only downside is that a certain point the wick will completely burn out and you will end up with like a cm of unmelted wax. Great scent though! Packaging for arrival was also really well taken care of.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Greeneyedellen
review: One of my favorite Yankee Candle scents.  Will buy again.  I love Yankee Candles because they last much longer than many others.  Worth the extra money you spend due to the good scents and burn length.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Anne
review: I love Yankee Candle.. I ordered 2 silver birch candles and got 2 cinnamon candles.. which is ok because I like cinnamon, but it wasn‚Äôt what I ordered. The boxes were labeled silver birch.. oh well Christmas is right around the corner.. not going to return..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Maw
review: The patchouli candle doesn't hardly have any aroma to it at all. Not happy with it at all. Usually their candles have more aroma.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Christi
review: My husband found a candle last year that smelled similar, but we had never been able to find one that came close. We decided to order this one and we are very happy with it. Smells wonderful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Brooklyn Hooligan
review: It's a basic candle, dont know if this is old stock or something but it has no scent at all. I bought another Yankee candle in vanilla that smells great so it has to be this one. Save your money unless you just need an expensive votive light

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: G. Brunelli
review: We also buy white birch firewood , I guess we just love the smell ?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Clc1298
review: Just as expected! Exactly as it is supposed to be and in perfect condition! I love this candle!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mary Hall
review: Do not order candles from Amazon. I did have concerns this would come melted. And I was right. Obviously no air in transport just a humid ride. I would only order in the winter. And this is highly scented like cologne.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Nate
review: I bought one of this candles before and it was great. After it was used I decided to reorder another one. This one has been extremely disappointing, not even close the same amount of scent. In fact, my nearly empty candle puts off more scent unlit than the new one lit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Loraine Garland
review: Was really glad to find Pachouli scented candles. They have always been my favorite candle. I am pleased with order & shipping, I was disappointed that scent waned before the candle had burned even half way down. Don't think I'll be ordering again. It's a shame. That was my favorite. Now? Not sure why we don't get the benefit of pleasure for the products we loved before the Co. lost their promise of quality.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Timothy Condon
review: I don‚Äôt know if I got a dud, but this candle did not produce a significant aroma unless your nose was was inches away from the flame.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Vira
review: I love this scent, which I recieved as a gift, so I came to buy another. I opted for the larger, only because it seemed a better value than the smaller. Would have preferred several smaller in nice containers, but such is life.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Greg Herrmann
review: I kind of went out on a whim purchasing the Silver Birch scent, but I ended up loving it a lot! It has scents of the balsam fir smell, but with a muskier cologne smell on top of it. I really enjoy it and the candle came perfectly packaged.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Frugel Shopper
review: Love the smell.  Definitely more of a Cigar/S[ports room type of smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Jennifer C
review: Doesn't seem like a real Gold Canyon candle because of all the bubbles in the bottom, the thickness of the wick that knots up and smokes, the lack of strong scent in the air and how fast it burns. Not that impressed for the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Hanasaki F W
review: It smells good but I was expecting a stronger scent. Plus, I let it go for three hours the first time, but the pool was still too small. The tunnel just got deeper each time it burnt.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: paul baker
review: Ordered this candle and picked the slightly used option for 4$ discount off the new price. Item arrived and this candle was 1/4 burned down.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: You really can't do better than a Yankee Candle. They burn evenly and the scent is manly and just perfect. A great buy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Daniel A K
review: I don't often review my purchases ....In general I really like Yankee candles...And I like the smell of patchouli...I let the candle burn for a couple of hours and could  not smell it....I ask my dinner guest if she could smell it...Same thing...No smell...This patchouli candle has no scent...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Gale C Adams
review: I've always loved the pleasant clean scent of Patchouli. Not over powering and is a great scent all year round.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Roberta
review: I love patchouli and was excited to find this as a Yankee Candle. I have other Yankees that I‚Äôve had for years and still smell good. What a disappointment!!!  It just smells like wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Ros
review: I've bought this candle 4 or 5 times been great. This candle has 0 scent. Nothing... no I don't have rona either. Disappointing!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: animal lover
review: Nice size for my office & brings back memories from the 60s.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Monique Atgood
review: This scent requires a scene.  Imagine Capt. America (Chris Evans) chopping wood (shirtless!) in the middle of a forest and there's a nice little log cabin with smoke coming out of the chimney.  This imagery brought to you by my teenage daughter. Tumblr had a review of this candle that apparently sparked my daughter's interest.  She asked for this candle for her 16th birthday, this was the gift she jumped up and down and screamed about.  It's a very high quality candle.  IMO, I don't see what the big deal is, but apparently Tumblr is making this particular candle the rage.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Jodi Gibson
review: If you like the smell of Patchouli, you will love the scent of this Yankee candle.  You must like the scent though, it's potent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Brittney
review: Very confused about this candle because it doesn‚Äôt smell like patchouli but the box it came in did so I‚Äôm not sure ? But it smells more like chai tea than patchouli

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kendall
review: Arrived just as described and cheaper than retail

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: Most of their candles have a strong fragrance... i smell nothing with this one I actually don't know if I will keep.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Jessica E.
review: Large candle, doesnt burn too quickly. Scent is very nice and not overpowering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: ECB
review: The candle was smashed when I arrived........a second was smashed when it arrived too........so I will be getting a refund.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Brian D
review: This was a big disappointment.  All the women were saying they could replace a man with this sent. Id rather have my man than this boring weak sent. Bring back Treehouse Memories for a truly manly sent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: keri
review: This is my favorite Yankee candle scent. So it's not my first candle. I've never bought one from Amazon before and this one seems to be burning down a lot faster than any I've had before. Not real sure why.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: DJ
review: Purchased as a gift.  She dug it the most. Get your stink on....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Chris del Valle
review: Boom. This is the perfect fall to winter transition candle. It smells nice, not too strong.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Virginia Beach Shopper
review: Yankee is normally so fragrant it fills the entire room and I was so looking forward to the Patchouli scent. Unfortunately, this was a big disappointment.  It isn‚Äôt fragrant at all. Even when you get very close you can only barely detect a scent. My family agrees/flop

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Nicole Cook
review: These smell great! I bought these as a gift for my daughter and she loves them. They have such a wonderful outdoorsy smell. They smell differently... (sweeter?) when burning and it‚Äôs a very pleasant scent. If you like patchouli, you‚Äôll love these.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: The Mad Waffler
review: I originally thought I was ordering a different product known as a yankee patch. But upon receiving my package I knew something was a miss. The candle, however, is amazing. It smells great. And it has helped further my decent into depression  to levels I never thought possible. Nothing happy about this candle. Just terrible thoughts of self harm.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Paul Rose
review: Overall a nice candle, I like Yankee candles.  the low rating is only and specifically for the scent, which was ok, but certainly not patchouli.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle is Huge! And so is the fragrance! I‚Äôm so glad that Yankee Candle decided to make a Patchouli candle with its heavenly scent! I love it!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Melissa Cunningham
review: Big disappointment. No smell at all. Waste of money. Don't buy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Steven Day
review: First one came broken. Was replaced immediately. Does not smell anything like Patchouli. Not a bad scent but not what it should smell like.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: LIla
review: I love the scent. It doesn't exactly smell like Patchouli, but more reminiscent of it with an incense like smell.  Just wish they weren't so expensive. I'd burn them more often. Hope they don't stop making this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: SLSREP7850
review: Purchased for my grandson for Christmas and he loves the smell. He burned it on C-mas day, and I have to say it created a very pleasant scent. Not too flowery - not too outdoorsey ....just a nice clean smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: koln47
review: Great scent but over priced

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Judy K.
review: I have had Mountain Lodge yankee candles before but this one had no scent. Perhaps old stock?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: alittlesexy6
review: My candle arrived in a beat up box and candle jar was broken.... I have ordered about 4 yankee candles recently and all of those arrived great. It looks like someone dropped the box and then threw it in a shipping box without checking if to see if the product was damaged.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Barbara W.
review: I'm not sure if it's the fulfillment center this particular fragrance is shipped from, but the initial and replacement orders were both received melted.  But the other candles in the same order were fine.  Not sure what the issue is.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Pamela Pompey
review: Gave the House a great Scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: cindy blankenbeker
review: Very disappointed in this when it came it packed well, but then when I started burning it no scent what so ever after burning for several hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: ruthie love
review: Not quite what I'd like my woodsy, muscle-bound bearded imaginary boyfriend to smell like, but close enough. I don't know if Yankee candle can get the smell of wood smoke in a beard mixed with sawdust and Cedar chips and snow and a well-loved wool Pendleton in a convenient wax canister. In the meantime, this will absolutely work. Plus, street cred with the tumblr kids. Holla.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Sally L.
review: Yankee patchouli candles used to have a strong scent. This candle has no discernible patchouli scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: BTDoxies
review: A bit pricey. And not as strong as I had thought it should be.  I really wanted to smell patchouli.  I will try again - let it burn longer, maybe move it closer.  Arrived without a problem, wrapped securely and very quick.  Love the azure blue color of the candle.  Seems to burn evenly and no pooling.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: K.Mo
review: The smell was great but extremely short lived candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Stormbreath
review: I was another lucky on getting a completely smashed candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Paul L. Irvine
review: Not the patchouli scent that I‚Äôm use to  not at all  I wonder if a label sticker was put on the jar and a homemade candle was made to try to come near the patchouli scent ~ well it didn‚Äôt work ! Can‚Äôt fool this original hippie ~ I may have to add my $5 patchouli oil to see if that brings out the original scent.  Not pleased ~ and for the price ~ smh

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Kristen
review: I have never smelled a bad Yankee Candle...Until I received this candle. It does not smell like patchouli, it smells like cloves and burning sticks. And, the only time you could smell it, is when you're standing above it, blowing it out. I was very disappointed with this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Tara Wharwood
review: Had no smell i had this burning in a small room for 4hours and nothing was of money. This is odd seeing as I have never had this issue with any yankee candle ive purchased, I'm wondering if this is fake.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: MamaB
review: This candle smells amazing in the jar but surprisingly, we can barely smell this candle when it's burning. i expected more from Yankee candle, but won't buy this particular scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Julie Gillespie
review: It was delivered shattered!  I‚Äôve been waiting 3 weeks for a refund

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: Love the rustic color of the wax. However the scent is very faint which is disappointing. I do have Patchouli oil so a couple of drops helps. Overall disappointing for what you paid for and expect in return.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Jessica L
review: I was told that this candle smells like a man in all the best ways, and it is true! I like it so much I‚Äôm afraid to burn it all the way down and run out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: gibson64
review: great sent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: sandy feuling
review: i love the candle itself, but i must say that i feel they are over priced. the scent isnt that strong, and i was looking for a strong scented candle, so for almost $30, i dont feel i got my moneys worth unfortunately. $30 for a jar candle is pricey, but i thought it would be highly scented and its not.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Lindsay H.
review: Has a very nice scent but it is extremely light to the point you can‚Äôt smell it very much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Mrs. Margaret Willmore
review: I love Patchouli, but this expensive candle did not have much of a scent. Not happy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Rachelle
review: Doesn‚Äôt really Give off a smell when burning

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Olivia
review: So amazing. It smells divine. There's really no way of thinking about it other than "strong lumberjack wearing a plaid shirt flexing his muscles while carrying some wood and sitting by the fireplace" honestly. Just help yourself to this delicious scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Megan
review: Great

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Valda Fasano
review: Doesn‚Äôt smell exactly like patchouli but it‚Äôs ok.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Sean Morton
review: I have bought other Yankee Candles and they smell great. Why is this one different? I might be looking for other brands. I would recommend you do too

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: ASDRACHA
review: I love Yankee Candles and I love patchouli. My husband does not love patchouli...but he thinks this candles smells nice. So I was a bit nervous when I bought it, but it turned out to be ok.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Amazon Customer
review: It smells like a man, sure, but it's pretty weak unless your nose is literally up close to the wax. Maybe it's my sense of smell that's weak, but I'll stick to other scents. It'll last forever, anyways, since I rarely use it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: DLJMFSBL
review: Either the scent is too weak or it takes longer than my other Yankee candles to release the scent, but it takes a while to smell it completely. It's a good scent; very calming; I'd recommend it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Duke Suzuki
review: Been burning this candle now for 3.5 hours and there is absolutely no noticeable smell unless you stick your nose down toward the flame. Highly disappointing and really shocked since all my Yankee candles in the past have been amazing. What a really bad choice with this one. It has no scent that I would identify with being woodsy or cabin like.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Jessica
review: What can you say - One if Yankees beat scents - not too sweet, not too masculine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: mark A.
review: üëç

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Debbie
review: Smells like its supposed too! Not overwhelming, scents my room,I use it in a room I smoke in,keeps the smoke away.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Linda Gengaro
review: Love the scent but got 2 cracked!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: PyroBryan
review: My mom's favorite candle has always been Pier 1's patchouli, but they're not around any more so I got her this one.  She loves it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Carollee Hilton
review: This literally smells like nothing when lit... bought one for me and one for my brother (we both agree)... I‚Äôm surprised because usually Yankee Candle‚Äôs are the best...  I would give it a zero star if I could.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Silver Birch
author: Natalie
review: So, I'm marginally embarrassed to admit I'm one of the many people who read the infamous Tumblr post and *immediately* had to have this candle. Who wouldn't want to have all that woodsy manly manness just a sniff away?! Sadly, after receiving it and feeling a little more giddy while opening the box than I should admit, then taking a heady whiff and staring at the jar blank-faced like wuuuut, um no... I must conclude that either 1) I'm one of the few reviewers who got a rogue dud of this particular scent, or 2) I should be very disappointed in the Tumblr community's taste in what a manly man should smell like, because this candle made me think much more "air freshener in a grandma's bathroom" rather than "shirtless [any hot actor] chopping wood at a cabin". Sorry, Mountain Lodge, you aren't who I thought you were, we're breaking up.

author: Amanda Dempsey
review: I have purchased multiple of the cables. They remind me of of mother who past away. The last candle few cables had major problems with it's appearance, and this was the 3rd one it has happened to. I tried to be calm and figured it was a mistake but after this 3rd one I am very disappointed. I don't know what happen but it became discolored and weird looking then lost its set its fragrance. I would like a replacement for the 3 candles for the inconvenience. I spent almost $80 and very upset that I was unable to smell and reminisce thinking of my mama that has past away from breast cancer. It's all I have let of her with these candles and the smell that brings be back to her memory. I hope this can be resolved. Thank you, Amanda Dempsey

author: Amazon Customer
review: I ordered several candles from the website, because the reviews on here were so bad, but my candles were in perfect condition. Well packaged, wax was fine, nothing on the sides or glass. I don‚Äôt know what happened to other people‚Äôs candles, but mine were fine. Great quality.

review: I have always loved this scent and even bought it from other stores and loved it. But the one I got from amazon barely puts out any smell. You wouldn't even know i was burning a candle if you didn't see it. disappointed for sure.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Magnolia & Lily Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Joyce L
review: My daughter -in-law loved this candle.  The jar was very elegant and the scent was just wonderful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Rachel
review: As the title states, I suggest that you do not order candles while you're intoxicated. I hate patchouli so I have no idea why I ordered this candle. I think I liked the name of it and at the time I was searching for a candle to put in my bedroom. I don't think I bothered to read the description of the candle or the reviews, which I normally do, and ordered it simply because of the name and because I like other Yankee Candles. Even though the patchouli is not the main scent, the fact that I noticed it at all was enough for me to dislike it. Also the candle had some hardened bubbles on the top and was not level, like it had melted and was slightly tilted on its side and then hardened in place. Neither of those reasons would have caused me to return this item - just a heads up to anyone who doesn't like either of those things. I am returning only because the smell of this candle does not match my personal scent preferences at all. Ew.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Gabi
review: Y‚Äôall is NASTY. So I open up the candle and it smells amazing. Then I look and see that there‚Äôs a hair on top I though ok that‚Äôs gross maybe it‚Äôs my dogs hair and went ahead to light the candle and blow the hair away. After lighting the candle I realize to my horror that the hair is embedded in the wax, so I then decide whatever I‚Äôll cut the price of hair out with a knife and the hair is really up in this candle. I ended up being able to pull the rest of the very long piece of hair out of my candle. Was it gross? Yeah. Did I still use the candle? Oh yeah it smells good. But yeah it was gross and who is making these candles??  How on earth do you get you‚Äôre long hair embedded in a brand new yankee candle?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: The Machinist
review: To the reviewer below: It's not Yankee Candles fault you ordered a scent u know u hate cuz your drunk & then have the audacity to give the product 1 lousy star, shameful.  With that said let me say I ordered 2 PINK SANDS scented lg . jar candles for office gifts and they were just as perfect a quality as tho bought in an actual Yankee store.  Stickers were straight, no bubbles, no hair as other reviewer tried to claim was case, filled level, wicks even. If you are wondering about the scent,  I guess I can best describe it as a sweet mix of those strawberry hard candies, with a pinch of a cotton candy ish smell somehow combined with a light beach scent swirled with suntan lotion, sandalwood laden sand anotherwords ... ABSOLUTELY DELISCIOUS and not too summery that u cant can't burn mid January.  Infact, it helps me erase a little winter depression when I burn. One VERY IMPORTANT thing to remember with these candles for longevity is #1 TRIM WICKS down to 1/8 inch and monitor length. If you are seeing black soot on glass, wicks is TOO long. Also, all good candles recommend you light for 2 to 4 hrs at a time, let cool then trim & re - light. If you do this you will have perfect results. Ps. Never burn last inch or two as glass can crack ... *tip: Scrape out last 2 inches or so with butter knife (can put cool candle in freezer for 10 min. first for less mess) and put in a tart/wax warmer or save to use in one later. It smells amazing, gives u a few tarts worth and more bang for your buck, enjoy!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ashley Coffey
review: Full disclosure: I am a Yankee candle devotee. My usual scent of choice is Kitchen Spice, but I ventured out for this one to replace a very expensive Volcano candle someone gifted me for luxurious baths. I was not about to drop $40 on a replacement jar candle, nosirree, so this Yankee candle, on sale of course, fit the bill. The scent is refreshing and sweet, but not too overwhelming, and it reminds me of strolling on the beaches of Hawaii, i.e. heaven. I also love the cute, millennial-pink color, and as always, Yankee candles have many hours of burn in them. I am delighted with this purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Talia O
review: Yankee mistve changed its formula than the yankee candles I used to buy. No other candle could compare to yankee. One yankee candle would make your entire house smell amazing. This candle doesn‚Äôt do that. Its reach doesn‚Äôt go past one room but the smell is nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Amazon Customer
review: Fresh Cut Roses is one of my favorite scents from Yankee. It used to have a good hot and cold throw.  The label pictured is deceiving in that is the old label prior to the company being sold. I chose this Candle hoping it was the original candle. Expect to get the new label product not the one pictured.  No scent of roses at all. Yankee needs to go back to the old labels and the old formulations to maintain their reputation.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Frtjth124
review: I bought this candle based off of the reviews from Yankee Candle. It was rated 5 stars. I‚Äôm glad I purchased this candle because not only is it beautiful, it gives off the most lovely scent. It‚Äôs a clean scent but it has warmth to it. This will def be our go-to spring scent in our home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: jc
review: I absolutely love these candles. With the exception of being a little late I'm extremely happy! I was concerned about breakage after reading other reviews. However they came with plenty of packaging security for fragile items to prevent such thing! And as soon as I opened it you got a big wiff of lovely scent. And I've had it lit for a while and the scent has filled the room very nicely. I don't know why other customers had such a bad experience. They came perfect, smell wonderful and I love the pink, it makes the entire candle glow! I'm definitely gonna buy more!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: isaidso
review: OH. MY. GOD!!!!! I highly recommend that you DO NOT BUY this candle! It is NOT the best damn candle scent you will ever smell in your life! It will NOT bowl you over with its room-filling, DELECTABLE fragrance! You will NOT find yourself inhaling deeply just to breathe more of its scrumptious, juicy, perfectly feminine, fruity-floral deliciousness!!! You won't be wishing that you had this fragrance in a perfume! You won't find yourself FLOATING around your home with your nose in the air, like a cartoon character hypnotically entranced by the wafting scent of sweet, tropical fruits resting on a bed of fresh flowers. And you CERTAINLY won't be RUNNING back here to order another one (or five) of these totally UNamazing candles because you WON'T want one in every room! I hope I've been totally clear. Because I absolutely DON'T have an agenda here, to ensure that there'll be more of these candles available for ME!!! :-D

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Werehamster
review: Smells like the sand. As in not much of a scent. I usually consider Yankee Candle products as candles with strong if unrefined smell. This is not one of them. 4 hours of burning produced nothing but a faint whiff of something that could have been a bathroom air freshener.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Rebo Quintana
review: I have bought and used several of these candles in different fragrances, including: Lilac blossoms, Midnight Jasmine, Midsummer‚Äôs Night, Pink Sands, and Silver Birch. I have four dogs and one enormous great room, which includes the kitchen, dining area, entry way, living area, and the dogs‚Äô niche where their beds are. So I am always battling the smell to keep the house smelling nice. Overall, I would give this brand of candles 5 stars. Four out of the five fragrances I‚Äôve tried were pleasant smelling, had a strong odor that would fill the large room, and a long life. They were packaged very well (inside their own box) and burn evenly. Here are my ratings for the scents: Lilac: Five stars. Very strong smell. Sweet and flowery. I love lilac but it was a bit much for my taste for the main part of the house. Jasmine: Five Stars (more if I could!). Wonderful scent. Flowery but not over powering. Mellow. Lots of compliments on this one and asking where I got it, etc. Can be hard to find, too. Recommended. Midsummer‚Äôs Night. Five Stars. Pleasant, ‚Äúsoapy‚Äù smell. Reminds me of what the bathroom smells like after a shower. I loved this scent, but it is nicer for a bathroom than a main room IMO. Recommended. Pink Sands. Two Stars. Very ‚Äúpink‚Äù smelling. Reminded me of bubblegum. Scent was very weak. Could barely smell it at all. Wish I had returned it. Not recommended. Silver Birch. Five Stars. Very ‚Äúwoodsy.‚Äù Makes me think of fall/winter. Very pleasant smell for a main room. Recommended. I definitely recommend these candles overall, especially the four scenes above. The Pink Sands candle was such a dud I had to take off a star, but really these are good candles and worth the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Ladyhawk14
review: All yankee candles have lost what made them number one decades ago... their scent. I can burn them in a small room and barely smell what ever scent their supposed to be. Finally got a wif of this one bending down to blow it out. Its such a shame how consumers are duped and used by companies who get famous then reduce their product quality.
