If you like a warm fragrance reminiscent of baking you will love this as long as you dont expect it to be a strong scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Rae
review: It smells nice and lasts a decent amount of time, but you‚Äôre partially paying for the brand. You can get a candle that smells just as nice and lasts a bit longer for $5-$10 less, and if you use scented candles a lot that adds up fast. I still buy this one semi-regularly because my mom loves this brand/scent in particular and it‚Äôs an extra few dollars to make her happy, but otherwise I don‚Äôt think it would be quite worth it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: macdragonflies
review: The Yankee Candle Lg. Jar VANILLA CUPCAKE is my favorite scent. Every time you walk into the room you smell a true Vanilla scent. I promise you'll love this one! It's comfy scent, if you know what I mean! Great gift to give too! UPDATE- This is the 3rd Vanilla Cupcake scent we've bought thru Amazon & ALL have been top quality. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

So, it smells amazing, it really lingers, and I got a very fast shipping. Thanks Amazon and Yankee Candle!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: elle101

I ran it under hot water and scrubbed it off with a sink sponge. Not that big of a deal, but thought to be noted.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: K.M.
review: I love Yankee Candle, but my last two purchases have been beyond disappointing.  There is no scent whatsoever.  If I stand right over the candle I get a small whiff. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: elisa
review: i heard nothing but good things about Yankee candles so decided to try it myself. This french vanilla scent candle absolutely has no smell. It will burn all day in my room and not even the slightest smell. I won‚Äôt be buying this brand again. I tried glade candles and they will smell all rooms in my house with no problem.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Dean and Michele Hoover
review: This is NOT A YANKEE CANDLE!!!  It‚Äôs a rip off I have had several Yankee candles they all smell wonderful this literally has no smell very disappointed!!üëéüëéüëé

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Tango C
review: Scent is amazing! Its citrus + peach sweet in my opinion. Burns clean so far (it doesn't trigger increase in air quality in my air purifier - no black smut I see as well. Packaging is the same if you would buy directly from yankee candle website.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: cacomp
review: I love Yankee candles because they are fragrant, last a long time and are reliable.  This one came in a package that was very good.  A cardboard cover designed for the candle a box and then in a Amazon box.  No breakage.  Ordered two from Walmart and both were broken. no extra packing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: LG

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: RoadGypsy
review: Salted Caramel is my go to scent in fall, winter and even early spring. This scent is not a flora, nothing against floral,  but has warm, yummy, deep caramel/coffee scent but not too sweet. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: mesh
review: Yankee Candle is my favorite candle company. Beautifully designed candle jars, firm top, long lasting & wonderful scents at a good price. This was my 1st purchase of Cafe‚Äô Al Fresco. I definitely recommend this scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: D. Morgan
review: Horrible scent....way too powerful and the odor itself leaves me feeling nauseated. Too expensive to throw out so I‚Äôll probably just leave it in the garage and light up there on occasion. Single worst Yankee candle I‚Äôve ever had and I do enjoy most of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: charT
review: I LOVE YANKEE CANDLES, BUT HATE PAYING SO MUCH. THIS CANDLE WAS THE RIGHT PRICE AND ARRIVED ON TIME, PERFECT CONDITION, AND JUST WONDERFUL. DON'T UNDERSTAND OTHERS WHO HAD PROBLEMS. EVERYTHING WENT PERFECT. PACKAGING WAS GREAT-CANDLE HAD NO BREAKS OR CRACKS. WILL ORDER MANY MORE

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

author: Cierra

Better suited for bigger open areas like a living room or dining room because the fragrance could be a bit too strong for a small space like a bedroom or bathroom. CON ‚Äî none really. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Timothy

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Philip W.
review: I love the smell of this candle- makes my whole house smell wonderful - the first one i ordered glass was broken-- returned an had them send another one.  This one came melted an could not find the wick- let it cool down some an used a tool to dig in wax to find wick. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Katie

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Bunny

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: paz

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Deb

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Kimberly

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Didi
review: I live overseas due to being in the military, These candles were packed very well and arrived on a timely manner.  Even tho I am thousands of miles away from home, this candle gives me a sense of being at home.  Thank you!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Ann Marie Jordan
review: I think it was old , not the lovely smell you expect from a yankee candle. Cheap price maybe that's why.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Bwetnight
review: This was bought for my mother and she loves it. Only problem is she loves the way it smells without being burned and she doesn‚Äôt want to burn it. Will be buying again so she can use the one she has and have another after the first one is gone.

author: aly
review: I have been buying YANKEE Candles for over ten years and I can assure you this this NOT. A real yankee!!! There is minimal scent even if I smell right next to to while it burns! I lit a yankee I bought at the actual store and within 5 minutes of it being lit you could smell it in the entire house! Do yourself a favor and pay and extra $5 and get it from The actual store and not here!!!!! Very disappointed in the seller AND. Amazon for allowing fake or defective products to be sold!!! I‚Äôm not going to hassle myself shipping it back, but I will never purchase one from here ever again! Buyers beware!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar

review: SMELLS AMAZING! I haven‚Äôt even lit it yet and I could smell it outside of the packaging it came in. I‚Äôm so glad I ordered it! If you love citrus üçä smells buy this candle. product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Peace feline
review: I already knew that I loved this scent when I made this purchase. They were such a good price that I just had to get them.
