author: The Nerdy Narrative
review: It looks like it's from Yankee Candle, but I do wonder if it's a knock off.  I purchased from this seller due to the much lower price and I got what I paid for.  The scent if very, very faint and has to burn for hours to achieve even that.  Will not purchase from this seller again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: New Era Goldens
review: I love the smell of vineyard. Yankee candles last a long time and the scent stays strong all the way to the bottom of the candle. The wicks always work. The only downfall is the wick does not burn clean and leaves black soot around the top of the candle but that is the only fault I can find. Sorry, have to subtract a star

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Tina Hughes
review: What can I say, Yankee candles are the best. We love most all of the scents, they burn evenly and clean. Priced right, Amazon makes it easy to find what we want, order and always shipped fast and safely!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Favdoggy
review: I should have listened to the reviews indicating that this candle does not have a scent. I have been buying Yankee Candles for years because of the wonderful scents. I don't think this is an authentic Yankee Candle. Don't waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jose Costa
review: Love the smell and the price. Wish  all candles worked out as well as this one did. Guessing the next time i try getting it again price will have gone up.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jacqueline D.
review: I love Yankee candles, the Macintosh Apple scent smells fresh like real apples. I just wish they'd burn longer. I get the large jar and burn it continuously so they don't last very long in my home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Tiffany
review: Definitely melted at one point of its transit life. You can see that the wax even partially melted in to the lid. The wick is barely there. Smells great though

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Gallant
review: I ordered this candle and it came broken. Amazon replaced it (thank you). My replacement smells great. I like this fragrance over the holidays. Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Brenda V.
review: Love the smell of this candle! It‚Äôs so fruity smelling, smells like fresh grapes in a vineyard.  I was going to give it as a gift but decided to keep it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: DB
review: Yankee Candle large size is usually 40 bucks and I got this for half the price. Well worth it. I got plenty for friends as well. Made excellent gifts.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer
review: I must have received a bad one from a bad batch because I bought a small sample candle from Yankee Candle and the smell was lovely and this smelled nothing like it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: SL
review: I usually love Yankee candles because they smell wonderful, but this one has little scent to it. It‚Äôs a beautiful color though and brings a little sunshine to my kitchen

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Pamela H.
review: This is a memory from way back. This Blueberry Yankee Candle means so much to me. I had some about 30 years ago and bought one for a Christmas gift for my wonderful brother.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: BAK
review: I have used many scents of Yankee candles.  I am using an evergreen scent just now.  I got this one for a friend who loves fruit scents.  It is a great gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Danlin3860
review: It's one of my favorites all year. The kitchen spice is great for Thanksgiving  and Christmas. And Balsam for Christmas. Thankyou Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Smoochies
review: I have been purchasing Yankee Candles for decades.  Macintosh has always been my #1 favorite.  The Yankee Store left my area.  So glad I found some here & at a discount to boot!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: jill
review: i am a HUGE fanatic of yankee candle, i always buy the sale candles since its a great price for a great product. this scent sounded cool but i really dislike it, it has a resort spa kind of smell, which some people may like but it definitely doesnt smell like pineapple OR cilantro... oh well I'll just gift it to someoneüòÇ

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Valgirl
review: I burn candles for sent and mood often. This is my very first Yankee Candle ever. It is one of the longest burning candle I‚Äôve had yet. The lemon scent is very sweet.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: V. LaBore
review: This has been my favorite scent, MacIntosh Apple, since I first purchased one back in 1984. A nice crisp fresh scent of apples and long-lasting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Muddy
review: This candle smells really nice. It‚Äôs not too overpowering of a scent and I like to burn it in my bathroom. It‚Äôs the perfect sweet and clean citrus smell for a bathroom. I already bought a second one and will buy more!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Emily B
review: This is a lovely scented candle. I ordered it as a Christmas present for my mom to use in the kitchen. She absolutely loves it and uses it every day. product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Christopher Wells
review: The scent is good, it lasts pretty long, and it makes a great gift. My only problem is the price. It is a little pricey, but overall good candle.

author: DEB KAR
review: I buy Yankee candles all the time, and have for 40 years. This is the first time I have ever ordered candles from Amazon. product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: SDF
review: The allure of knock-off candles and their pungent scent as I stroll discount store aisles is always strong, and I must admit, more than once I have found myself swept up in their $8.99 temptations, but always have buyers remorse as the scents are never quite quite as good and the burn not as smooth as a true Yankee candle. My tradition of welcoming fall with an apple scented candle was soured by such a knock-off purchase, and after feeling disappointed that I had failed fall so massively, immediately went back to my roots and ordered this candle. Great burn, great scent--I promise myself and autumn I will not stray again. The extra money is worth it in this case.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jean-Pierre Kirkland
review: These candles are so easy to accommodate - no dripping wax, re-sealable to maintain the aroma and easy to move from one location to another.

author: Kimberly D. Rhodes

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Susan
review: The scent isn‚Äôt as strong or authentic as yankee candle was 20 years ago. I don‚Äôt know why. To me, the prevailing scent is simply wax. Disappointing

author: Non-fiction Addiction
review: Lovely scent of oranges and honey in a large jar (22oz) with a single wick. I‚Äôve enjoyed this variety before. Great packaging and value for a long lasting candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Audrey Teater
review: I ordered this for my room and I love the smell. It is subtle, but still there. product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: LionHeart
review: I love this, it's smells so light and fresh. True spring and summer candle. Arrived in one piece, was cheaper than Walmart and burns great.

author: Alexis
review: This candle does the opposite of grow on you tbh. It kinda makes me nauseous now and I really don't like burning it anymore. But it is nice and strong!

author: Julie

author: Amazon Customer

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jolyne
review: My favorite fragrance! Yankee candle does not disappoint with lasting quality fragrances. I‚Äôm a loyal fan. Sometimes though my orders have come broken , but they have been good about replacements

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: rebecca govan
review: Excellent purchase. I paid $14 for these candles. If I had ordered from Yankee Candle it would have cost $36.50. I will order my Yankee Candles from Amazon from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer

author: Lantana Al

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jessica S.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: jj
review: I had this candle burning for several hours and could not pick up on the scent. This scent has always been a favorite of mine, so that was disappointing!  I'm not sure if just got a dud; however, going off my experience --I would not recommend.

author: Cher

author: Matt Brown

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Ginny L.

author: jason ryan

author: Trever

author: SMB

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: J. Wright

author: Michelangelo
review: wish I didn't have to blast it with a torch lighter to get the sides to melt evenly, not a big deal, it's kind of fun, but probably not the best trait for a candle.

author: Me
review: I really liked this candle when I used it in the bathroom to cover smells, made it smell clean. However, the scent did not carry as when I used it in the living room. I would say this is a nice subtle scent for smaller spaces.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Nance
review: Nice candles for everyday use

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: cara smith
review: The candle smells great and takes a long time to run out however it was very frustrating for me since when i opened the candle box i noticed the candle was melted on one side and it melted to where all the wax was on the right side with the candle laying on its side. That is the reason im giving this 2v stars because i had to remelt it just to get to the wick to burn it and it was really hard to open.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Dan
review: Faithful Yankee candle buyer for years, haven‚Äôt bought one in awhile and the Macintosh is one of my favs. This one didn‚Äôt hold up to previous Yankee candles I‚Äôve bought. Still burns long and clean but the scent isn‚Äôt, wasn‚Äôt there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: amber
review: I don't know if this candle was old but I almost buy Yankee candle and they make my home smell amazing but this candle no one smelled anything. I wouldn't buy again

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: jose
review: I love this scent and I'm so happy I can find it on here in the winter time. It didnt seem to be as strong as I'd like but it was ok. I like these better than bath and body works because theirs smoke too much and leave black mark's on your walls.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: mary
review: I had to put it in a warm oven for a couple minutes to soften the wax so I could dig out the wick to light the candle. It arrived packed well but on it's side-not a good idea for a candle  in Arizona! But I am very happy with the size of the candle and the  strong scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Christine
review: As much as we adore winter holiday festivities, we're definitely a summertime family. So we'd love to thank Yankee Candle for coming up with an appropriate candle for us! All Is Bright smells just like citronella on a balmy August night! Love it! Seriously though, would love to see White Christmas candles back. At least something similar?

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Rene
review: I always get some of these for my mom for Christmas and they always arrive packaged nice and they smell great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Ralph
review: Smells great. Buybit now... All powerful pineapple scent though... cilantro smell is barely there. A 7 minute burn generated lots of smell in 25¬≤ room

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Riq
review: This candle will literally last you months if you don‚Äôt constantly burn it. Even if you do it will still last long and the smell is amazing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Cindy Kates
review: This lemon candle does have a scent but it's more like a citronella candle than lemon. I cant review the longevity of it because I put it out due to the smell. You could gift this but make sure the person likes citronella.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: EG
review: Long lasting and the fragrance is evident but not overwhelming .. not like some candles where there is no smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: J. Solomon
review: I was hoping for something like limoncello and got something a little more lemon house cleaner - will not repurchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Steven Nikolakis
review: This candle smells so good, anytime I light it before guests come over they rave about the scent. It‚Äôs smells like citrus with a hint of sweetness that is very subtle and pleasant. I would 100% buy this again for spring/summer season

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Ironsmom
review: Nice scent... I was worried it would be too sweet but it‚Äôs not... great especially for the discounted price.  I tend to prefer the other style with the 2 or 3 wicks as they burn a little better but couldn‚Äôt pass up due to the price

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: TJ
review: I am a Yankee Candle junkie.  This candle smells like a soy candle. I just happen to not like the chemical smell of soy candles. The first 1 hour it smells like sweet lemons and then it gets bad.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Rebecca Roy
review: Purchased this... smelled it and lit it.  It smelled wonderful but once lit we never smelled it again unless we were sniffing the candle. Not sure if this is typical as I don‚Äôt buy Yankee Candles a lot but I would not recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: cady
review: I was excited when I purchased this item regardless of the high price. It arrived yesterday and I lit it but even after an hour there was no scent. I am very disappointed with this product. I would not recommend for anyone else to make the same mistake I did by purchasing this through Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: John C. Sievers
review: Great candle- smells wonderful (especially for summer) and doesnt tunnel so it lasts a long time! Stop buying crap candles and just spend the money on a nice candle like this- would recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Tara
review: My favorite scent! So happy I could find it on Amazon since it‚Äôs seasonally discontinued at Yankee Candle. I haven‚Äôt purchased one in a while so I forgot what a great quality these candles are. They burn slow and smell wonderful without being overpowering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Michael & Alicia J.
review: I've always loved this product and other scents from this company. But, I have to admit I tried to save a bit of money and ordered from another company (Our Own Candle Company) because of their price and different types of scents. Never again will I do this because now I have grey walls from the black smoke from the candles. So, if I would have stayed with what I knew, I wouldn't have had to pay to have my walls cleaned and wasted money on a cheaper product. "You get what you pay for" rings loudly for me. Thanks for the excellent product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Carrie Rector
review: Great price and quality.  I work fro. Home and the cat boxes are in the computer room that I work from so i am constantly burning candles. It's hard to find candles that are long burning and still maintain their scent,  that arent yankee candles. I was pleasantly surprised when I found yankee candles on Amazon for $13-15.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sabrina Bateman
review: I bought 3 of these candles thinking they would last a while. nope. don't waste your money on this scent. I could have bought a cheap fragrance less candle to the same effect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Magnolia
review: Hardly any scent. Not my experience with Yankee candles. Pretty color . Don‚Äôt know if would give as a gift due to poor scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Tmat360
review: The candle smelled great in the paper bag package, but it wasn't wrapped in bubble wrap or in a cardboard candle holder so the glass tumbler that held the candle was broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: cheetocheeto
review: Expensive for no reason. I can barely smell this so it's a waste of money. It's a totally weak scent. Big mistake buying this!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Joshua Berger
review: The candle, although lovely to look at, melted very quickly down the middle which caused problems in re- lighting.  The scent is good, however.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Nicole A.
review: This is a favorite scent of mine. I absolutely adore it. It's fresh and relaxing. I will buy this again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Nancy L.
review: The yellow color is beautiful and cheerful and it will burn a long time.  HOWEVER, if you are looking for fragrance you should keep looking.  The fragrance here is SOOOOOOOO subtle that it's undetectable  (which defeats the intent of a scented candle).

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smelled great when I got it out of the box. I lit the candle and it smells like old laundry detergent . The lemon scent completely disappeared . This was for the Sicilian lemon scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer
review: It‚Äôs smells really good and I will come back in the near future for more purchases. Candle last for a really long time. The fragrance last a really long time

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: topshelfproducts
review: This candle has no scent and burns black. I have never been so disappointed in a Yankee candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: TS
review: No scent. When unlit you can kinda smell something, so I thought the scent would get stronger when I lit the candle. Nope. I even asked others in my house and they didn‚Äôt even realized a candle was lit. Disappointing since I normal get candles for half this price during Bath and Body Works sales.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sheila B
review: It's a nice light lemon scent, it actually smells like fresh squeezed lemons, one of my favorite scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Daniel koski
review: We ordered the Macintosh candle. When we got it, the initial smell was amazing. Exactly what we wanted. But by the 2nd or 3rd day the smell wasn‚Äôt there anymore? It was more faint than strong. I saw in the reviews that others were having that issue with the smell as well but I figured we‚Äôd give it a chance. Kinda disappointed in it. Gonna be trying it out in a smaller space such as a bathroom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jeff D.
review: These last a long, long time and smell great....in the beginning.  After it burned down a few inches then they lost most of their smell.  Even if you put your nose to it.  I will probably order again just because I also use them for ambiance and they last a long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sharon Kayal
review: I love this scent so much but it was melted and I‚Äôm not sure this is even salvageable, which is very disappointing because I was looking forward to burning this

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Mom.Nurse.Wife.08
review: My candles from Walmart smell much stronger. I let this burn all day and I smelled nothing. Waste of money. No idea why there are so many good reviews on the honey clementine...

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Annie
review: I absolutely love this scent! It is a refreshing and fun scent and it‚Äôs so nice to walk into my house and have this aroma fill my room after lighting my candle! I‚Äôve had many compliments from customers and colleagues. I would highly recommend this!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Supermom225
review: Was surprised at the fact that this candle had zero scent. Paying the price that I paid for Yankee Candle, I expected so much more. Instead all I got was a plain candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Art Department
review: Favorite candle. Long lasting smell. Best value Bought 6 in the last 6 months. Great gifts

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: angela avery
review: There was absolutely no smell to this candle unless you count the 1 you get when you blow it out. Very dissapointed. I gave 2 stars because yes it is a candle, and it did stay lit for a long time. I had a hope there might be a point where I would hit a burst of lemon smell. Never happened.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Staci N.
review: I love my candle. One of my favorites of Yankee candle. Will be buying more. Fresh/ clean sceny

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Barbara Giddens
review: I ordered 2 of these; the first one came and it was perfect, great packaging.  The 2nd one came on a different day and I thought I would have to throw it away.  Even with the great packaging, it was leaking outside the base and melted wax was everywhere, it even came through the packaging...what a mess.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Gina
review: These candles were for years highly scented, burned evenly and just all around, a great candle. But unfortunately, they haven't had the quality for a long time. I stay away from purchasing them for periods of time because of the lack of quality and return again to find they're the same or a bit worse. No more Yankee for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: sk
review: I usually enjoy candles with fruity scents but this one is terrible. Plus the smell is so strong it gives me a headache. A rare miss by Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Gessica Absi
review: This sicillian lemon is the least smelling  candle of the Yankee candle I have ever bought.  I had really high hopes and I have bribed it for hours and can‚Äôt smell it but a teeny tiny bit...so disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: jacqueline a.
review: Who doesn‚Äôt love the best candles around?!? They smell so good you want to eat it! You can even just open the top w/o lighting it & STILL scents a small area!! I even bought one for myself!! (They we‚Äôre part of a Mothers Day gift for my mother-in-law, whom I call mom! We bought our home mostly because it is across the street from her!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jadesky
review: Over priced, poor quality.  Cannot smell the candle when lit.  Can only smell when not lit and holding the candle to your nose.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: JazzyCarol
review: I don't care for this scent. I smelled it in a store and really liked it. This one says it's the same scent but it doesn't smell nearly as good...or even the same scent. I love Yankee candles but I won't buy this one again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Faith Rohde
review: It doesn't smell as fresh and lemony as I had hoped.  There is a chemical smell that over powers the scent of the wax.  Super bummer!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: garebear29
review: I love yankee and this is my favorite scent.  It does smell like watermelon and it is strong it will make the entire room smell like A watermelon.  I have been buying them for years and this one is even very hard to find for some reason.  I have no idea what anyone else is talking about I have never been disappeared in any of them Yankee is known for good quality as they always have been when I bought them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: kimmers
review: I don't know what is going on but I cannot smell this candle at all.  Macintosh is usually a very strong scented candle.  I think this might have been a few years old or something.  Maybe that's why it was so cheap?  Will just start buying from Yankee Candles going forward, very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Kesha James
review: This candle's, wick on the 3rd time bring lit, began sparkling like a sparkler on 4th if July.  I have never had this happen before with Yankee.  Window of return has closed so I trashed it.  üôÅ

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: WOLF-359
review: Love the sent  of these candles .......how ever they could be a bit cheaper than they are

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Angelo Figallo
review: Great item and probably my favorite scent. I‚Äôm on my second jar of this. 1st jar took me almost a year to finish. With this quarantine going on I‚Äôll see how long this one takes.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Kindle Customer
review: Enjoying the blueberry smell.  The candle lasts about as long as you would think.  (about 5 days constant use)  The only complaint I have is you need a flame thrower to start it as it gets to the bottom of the candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: T B
review: I was disappointed with this candle. I went to Yankee Candle because they have a great fragrance. This isn‚Äôt true with this one. After blowing out the candle black smoke billows off the wick for a while. I bought a candle that has no smell. Should have bought a glade candle. So disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Retail Therapist
review: Bit less throw than usual but worth the price. Arrived well packed and intact. Good gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Cass
review: Not sure what people are expecting when they get a candle. It's not a spray, it's supposed to be subtle. If I leave the room and come back in, I IMMEDIATELY smell the candle (almost enough to make my husband hate me for buying them ahahaha). Super glad I managed to get my hands on this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Alice
review: I really like the Two-wick Tumbler candles because they burn clean. There is no left over wax on the sides of the tumbler that refuses to melt. I also like the price. Great value. The fragrances are clean and fresh.clean

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: roger
review: There is no scent!! Loss of money, purchased Sicilian lemon it is a total lemon üçã üò¢

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: JennyWren
review: Not too fruity or sweet, this candle has a pleasant, uplifting scent. I have ordered other Yankee candles from Amazon that burned more quickly that I expected. However, this  candle burns slowly, lasting a long time, as I hoped. Very pleased with my purchase. Makes a great gift. Highly recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sam C
review: I haven't bought yankee candles in a few years due to disappointment. Seen this one on deal so I thought I'd give it another shot and it was just another disappointment and waste of money. Of course the candle may last longer but it didnt even have fragrance while lit. I'll stick to my Bath &Body Works candles from now on!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Michael & Alicia J.
review: I've always loved this product and other scents from this company. But, I have to admit I tried to save a bit of money and ordered from another company (Our Own Candle Company) because of their price and different types of scents. Never again will I do this because now I have grey walls from the black smoke from the candles. So, if I would have stayed with what I knew, I wouldn't have had to pay to have my walls cleaned and wasted money on a cheaper product. "You get what you pay for" rings loudly for me. Thanks for the excellent product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amber Chaffee
review: I got the lemon candle and it smelled good in the jar until you burn it then it don‚Äôt smell at all! This company used to be good until the new owners and now the candles don‚Äôt smell! Down thumb what a waste of money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: The Wolf
review: The wick is too low, the candle goes out. It is nearly full and I can't use it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jeana Lee Paccasassi
review: No scent! What a waste of $30 bucks! I‚Äôm sending back or asking for a credit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: L. Jones
review: Although the new jar shape has two wicks, these original Yankee jars last far longer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Charles Lamb
review: My favorite scent from yankee candle. the smell is crisp and refreshing. These candles also last a long time. the price was unbeatable normally 27.99 found it here for 16$ worth every penny

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Gina Marie
review: My wonderful cousin from Michigan brought this incredible scent to my attention! I'd never heard of that combination. . . for a Candle of all things! I had to buy one for myself!! This Yankee Candle is a star in it's own right! The scent and appeal of this pretty fresh lime green colored Candle is beyond colorful! Must get for that special person in your life!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: upinmaine
review: This use to be my favorite candle and I have bought several over the years but I think the scent is weaker as the years go by. The ones I bought 10 years ago had a strong scent. I keep buying them when on sale hoping that they will go back to their old formula but no luck.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Ashley
review: I'm usually loyal to B&BW candles, but this was a gift. I was pleasantly surprised with the honey clementine scent and how evenly this burned with just one wick.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: April Dennis
review: It's more pineapple than cilantro, if cilantro isn't your thing. I can't smell cilantro in this. It's still great. It may be the best smelling candle I've gotten. Wax melts evenly and it seems like it will have a long life.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: LIN C
review: Although it burns for a long time, it does not smell like anything-- at all! I could've bought a small glade apple cinnamon for half the price and would've been more fragrant than this cheap knock off.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: DTT
review: Excellent packaging for  the candle to ensure non-breakage.  Love the scenf!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: katrina lomneck
review: Oh My Gosh!! this candle is AMAZING!! well worth the money!! My house smells soooo good!! Thank you so much! I will be buying more from you!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sable Jean
review: Love the smell and the color is great! I wasn‚Äôt sure buying a candle over the internet that I never got to smell but after reading the reviews I gave it a try. I was not disappointed. Great size, doesn‚Äôt take up room on the counter with its slim style and the beautiful purple glow it gives off is really relaxing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Mary Sunshine
review: could be more lemony, but it is quite nice and long lasting and i love the fresh color

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: BoomerOK
review: It arrived with the candle "oil" leaking through the packaging leaving a red stain in the box. Had to wash off the glass jar and lid since the oil was all over the place. Strong scent at first (but not irritatingly overwhelming) - didn't even have to light it for the aroma - so we just leave the lid off for the "air freshener" scent and put the lid back on when it gets to be too much. Overall, like it and nice apple scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Lisa
review: I love Yankee Candles. This one did not disappoint! Smells just like fresh apples. Very happy with purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: S Radikal
review: My mother and I love love love yankee candles. The lemon lavender is her favorite of hers for sleep. Burns for 2 hours in the room before bed and just puts her right to sleep when she goes in! Anything and everything yankee is top notch!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: marjorie e.
review: I like Yankee Candles and strong but non-flowery scents. These were $16.99 with free shipping. Yankee candle wanted $29,99 plus $9.99 for shipping!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Paul
review: The candle smells fine. No issues with that. It came packaged in bubble wrap and cardboard but the glass container was still broken. Not sure if this happened at the warehouse or in transit. I can still use it but the cap doesn't fit the base due to the rim being broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: J
review: This candle really smells like the real deal freshly cut apples!! I had this candle in my living room, the scent was warm and overwhelming. I bought this candle 2 months ago and still have it!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Unruly Ghoulie
review: Smells like - 80's grape, grape blunts, grape scratch n' sniff stickers. Exactly what I was looking for. Scent is sweet and fresh and nostalgic af in my case. Smells good on a candle warmer or lit, strong but not overpowering. *Edit: Horrible for people with allergies/asthma. Still smells awesome!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: GKSFL
review: Scent is indistinguishable!  Had high hopes but a complete letdown!

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: JEEP614
review: There's no wick and it looks melted, it's cold and in the middle of winter so no idea how that happened.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Danielle Sincere
review: The smell of this candle is extremely faint. Like barely can smell it. I'm definitely not happy with this purchase. Keep looking for a different candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: C-LoS
review: Don't know how Amazon can sell this. It has little to no scent. Lit it up, and still nothing. It was a gift to my wife and she was disappointed and she loves Yankee Candles. Either this is an old batch or fake.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Stephanie karlsons
review: Love Yankee Candles and the price was great...shipped in a super sturdy case so it arrived perfectly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Amy Wieden
review: Delicious, lemony scent and a neat, steady flame (no 3" tall flames that cheaper candles often put out.)  I'm pleased with it as I have been with every Yankee Candle I've ever owned.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: monica oconnor
review: my favorite scent ever. Nice combo pineapple & cilantro, who would've guessed. I lived in Hawaii, and it smells like the Hawaii.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Niniruth
review: I love lemon scented anything... This candle smells nothing like lemon

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Kayla
review: This smell is addictive! I have it in spray form, jelly jar, and I just ordered car fresheners! The candle (when lit of course) is very strong, in a good way! My room instantly smells like lavender lemon. Also, the candle burns for a reallllllly long time. I‚Äôve definitely burned it for over 90 hours, and it still has a ways to go before it‚Äôs finished. I probably have another 15+ hours left, which is why I just repurchased another candle! I usually don‚Äôt ever spend $20 on candles- but with Yankee Candle Lemon Lavender I‚Äôll make an exception. It‚Äôs a really clean, fresh, yummy smell. Intoxicating, and appropriate for any time of the year.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Jenny
review: I love the Lemon Lavender scent, but am really disappointed with how it arrived (see photo). At some point, I guess the candle melted and altered the original state of it, to the point of completely covering the wick. I had to place the jar in a pot of boiling water to melt the wax, then dig for the wick and pull it out. Otherwise, I wouldn‚Äôt have been able to use it. All in all, it‚Äôs a great scent, sold at a great price, just know that this is something you might have to do, as well.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Dancing Nanny
review: NOTE TO SELF: Do not buy candles online unless you have smelled the scent in person! I love yankee candles and have several favorites but this one... omg!  NO!  Just...NO! This awful scent was so bad it actually gave me a headache and negativity impacted my emotions for the entire day..after only having it lit for 20 minutes!  I had to put it out in the garage because the smell lingered in the house and stuck to the inside of my nostrils the rest of the day.  Seriously... it smells like a urinal cake... my husband confirmed this assessment!  He walked into the house and was like, ‚ÄúUm...did you use the restroom at a gas station today?!?‚Äù  This would make a great gift for someone who‚Äôs not your favorite person!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Glitter, sparkle, shine, but most of all BE KIND!!
review: This lemon lavender is my favorite scent from yankee candle. But... lemon lavender is sold out in all stores. I ordered one not too long ago here on Amazon. I needed another just because... but Amazon didn‚Äôt have them in stock. I sent hubby to the stores and hubby said there was none in stock anywhere. I had him get home sweet home instead.  Just seen Amazon had them in stock and ordered this amazing calming beautiful scent! I‚Äôm feeling like it‚Äôs Christmas. These candles fill a whole 1,750 sqft area easily. They are absolutely worth every penny. I like home sweet home too but lemon lavender is the absolute best! Both are amazing and my preference. But lemon lavender omg amazing!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: NinaPurr
review: I was very disappointed. I saw the great reviews and figured this would be an amazing candle but I was ver let down. I will say, when I opened the box, I immediately smelled the lavender. However once it started to burn, I needed 2-3 hours in my bedroom with the door closed for the smell to linger. All to go away once I open another door. Pros: big and will take long to burn - the light scent it has is pleasant in small rooms - cute colors - great for gift Cons: - smell won‚Äôt last - takes too long to actually smell. - overpriced for the quality

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Fauxgoddess
review: I am not even sure if this is a Yankee Candle. I am used to lighting the Yankee, and the scent filling the room within 20 minutes. This one, when I lit it, barely gave off a scent even 4 feet from the candle. Very disappointing! The candle I chose (Lavender/Lemon) is not a subtle scent by nature, so it surprised me how little scent there was. I am hoping the other Yankee I ordered, which will arrive in a few days, will be as fabulous as Yankee Candles have always been. if not, I don't think I'll be buying them online anymore. I won't buy one unless I can open the lid and sniff it myself.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: MilsNY
review: I bought this for the first time shortly before Christmas 2021 and lit it for several hours almost every day. The scent is very strong, and it smells like real so yummy - a delicious combination of lavender and lemon. I've been looking for a scent with lavender essential oils for a while, because of the great benefits in relaxing the spirit. Combining lavender with lemon is perfect for me, as it relaxes me but also uplifts me, and so I used this during the day, and absolutely LOVE it. I extinguish the flame by putting back the lid, so the smoke stays inside the container. I noticed that the smell lasts long even after I had extinguished it, and even the days I don't lit it and the container is closed I can still smell the scent. Super high quality and lovely. Highly recommended. NOTE - I have never tested CVD  positive in the two years here in NYC, and never lost my sense of smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: P. Thompson
review: First of all, Yankee Candles are one of the best that I've found and one of my go to candle companies.  Even unlit, the scent is pleasantly alive, though not as strong as when lit. For this particular scent, I was looking for a lavender scented candle specifically to burn in the evening to relax me before going to bed.  While this one isn't entirely lavender, the combination is almost mouthwatering.  Must be the addition of the lemon.  Lemon, or any citrus, is a fond favorite of mine as well. It's been a while since I've been able to burn candles and I'm so glad I can still get my favorites from Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Stargazer Lily
review: The reviews are for lemon, lilac, balsam, all different scents.  Seems every once in a while someone gets a knock off.  I have ordered quite a few from Amazon and some are as strong as the ones I get from the Yankee Candle Company website directly.  Some are not.  Check the label on the bottom if you order multiple candles.  When I ordered from this page it showed 'lemon lavender'.  It does not throw a strong scent.  However, it lasts longer than my other yankee candles.  It has a different label on the bottom.  I think I got a knock off that was not as strong, but lasted longer.  The Yankee Candle Website sells Large Jar candles for $20 or less in their clearance section.  I will buy from there in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: ilsa mayer
review: Received the candle today and couldn‚Äôt wait to light it.  But what a disappointment.  Hardly any fragrance, according to the write up there should be a lot of lemon scent. It isn‚Äôt.  I ordered it because of the glowing reviews, but most of them are from 2018. So what happened.  At least I got it at the Prime day price. Won‚Äôt buy it again. A week earlier I received candles Midsummer Night and Sage Citrus.  They are both wonderful and the scent covers a couple of rooms at least.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Jason
review: The absolute best scent Yankee has!! This combination of scents is amazing for so many reasons but the biggest is that it kills cigarette smoke like magic. It smells so good but it also seems to freshen a house so very well. I've used these for years and there are no better.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: lain
review: I love Yankee candles! Yes, they are a bit expensive but, they 1. last a LONG time, 2. smell amazing, and 3. are very diverse in terms of scents and sizes they offer. This lavender lemon scent is a very refreshing and relaxing scent. It is one of those candles that smells more strongly once you light it, but it isn't a bad thing. It is not overwhelming, or nauseating. It is great for a smaller or larger space because of the type of scent (not too sweet/overpowering). Would recommend to anyone who likes lavender or lemon, as well as anyone who is looking for a "pick me up" or "refresh" type scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: KatMal
review: It‚Äôs always risky purchasing something with a scent online but I‚Äôm glad I took a chance with this Lemon and Lavender Yankee Candle. I enjoy lemon and lavender but never experienced them together and I needed a new scent for my home since we‚Äôre all stuck here. I would say that the scent is a bit sweet/sugary but is not overwhelming for someone who isn‚Äôt too sensitive to smells. I‚Äôm happy with my choice and will purchase this scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Chalcopyrite
review: I hate the smell of maple bacon, and my brother bought like 3 yankee candles that were not maple bacon but smelled like it. After a month of trying not to puke whenever I smelled it, I bought him this one and it's much more tolerable. Stop making gross smelling candles, thanks.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Steven B. Nichols
review: Bought as a Christmas gift for my sister-in-law and she was happy and enjoyed the scent. I didn't realize that my brother doesn't like the scent of lavender and this seemed to be a minor issue as she doesn't want to burn it at her office because of a co-worker that complains about everything... but other than that it was a hit!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: austin
review: The candle must have been stored in the heat. It was previously melted and dried over the wick. It did not occur on the delivery truck bc it was completely dry by the time it arrived. I‚Äôm not able to request a new one without shipping this one back which is a hassle.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Lauren
review: Bought these on sale on Prime day. I am not 100% convinced these are legit Yankee candles. Every yankee candle I've ever opened can be lit for 15 minutes and the smell flows through the entire house. With this one, I can hardly smell it while standing right next to it. Big disappointment because the smell is a nice light citrus smell when not lit

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Courtney
review: I love this candle! I have bought this one 3 times now and it never disappoints. One sniff of this and all my tension goes away! It gets the whole main floor smelling wonderful and lasts a long time. Paying $18 on here instead of $30 at yankee.... You can't go wrong!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: rjc311
review: I love Walmart‚Äôs Lavendar Lemonade candles and waxes so I decided to see if Yankee had a similar scent.  I was happy to see they did and ordered it right away.  Here I am burning it and finally had to extinguish it because it literally smells like a urinal cake to me.  The lemon smells so synthetic I can hardly believe it.  Oh well, back to the Walmart ones I go!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Matthew
review: Once again Yankee Candle delivers.  There is a reason why, in my opinion, YC is the industry standard in candle scent / value. Just a few minutes of burn time and my Apt smells fantastic. 26.00 may be a bit much for some people to spend on a candle. I get that.  This is also a 22 oz behemoth.  The value for the price is ridiculous at whatever size you get. Dont cheap out when it comes to beautifying your living space.  Do you really want your apt/house smelling like cheap no name candle you picked up at a convenience store? I didnt think so.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Lady DJ
review: I love fragrant candles and this one does not disappoint! The scent is lovely! Its a bargain considering the size of the candle, and the quality of fragrance, especially when compared to some others that are half the size and double the price. I understand why it's one of Yankee Candles most popular. Would make a great gift. Will purchase again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Mel
review: I was extremely impressed when I lit this candle and placed it on my nightstand. The throw it emits is one of the higher throws that I have encountered in quite some time from Yankee candle. The overall scent is extremely refreshing and relaxing to soothe your stresses as you try to wind down. It has become one of my favorite scents, especially for the bedroom and the bath. I would recommend this to anyone who has stress in their life. It is perfect for gift giving as well. Highly recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: TFaC
review: I prefer a strong, long lasting fragrance.  Yankee is not making as strongly scented candles as before. I see other reviewers saying the same. C'mon Yankee, just charge a little more if you must, but PLEASE go back to your previous great quality, don't just sell scentless candles on your old reputation....people are noticing! Yankee has sold out. Just read the blogs that are easily accessible. Kringle Candle Company looks like a good alternative. No more Yankee candles for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: jessica
review: The media could not be loaded. So this is not a real Yankee candle... very disappointed. The labels were all off and the wax was of a lower quality than expected for a Yankee candle. It was also leaking all over itself before we opened it....

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Kevin
review: I bought this candle for my girlfriend, and she loved the smell of it and put it into her car. She claimed that during the warmer summer months it would make her car smell great- it did just that. However, she got into a car accident and forgot to take it out of the car, so this candle melted to the seat. After the candle was removed (the stain stays to this day) she brought it into our home and was actually able to light it for 12 more hours! This candle has long-lived past what we ever imagined it could. HIGHLY SUGGESTED!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: B
review: This candle smells awful - I am not quite sure what it is about this candle as I have had lemon lavender scented items from Yankee before and they did not smell like this! This smell is pungent- almost like rotten lemons with a sickening sweet smell that is nothing like lavender. When lit, it does not get much better.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Dana D. Smith
review: I'm one of those people who certain scents trigger a migraine. Had I been able to smell it before buying it I wouldn't have. Way too perfumy for me. That being said, the throw is excellent. My hubby often commented on how nice the house smelled when he came into the house.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Heidi S.
review: First of all, I absolutely LOVE the scent of lavender! I've been buying Yankee products for quite some time now.  I love the scent of this candle but they could improve on a couple things.  When lit, the scent isn't very strong.  The level is strength varies with each candle, I think.  Plus, the scent does not travel from the room it is in.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: ra2151
review: I love the scent and it isn‚Äôt overpowering. But, it‚Äôs burning down rather quickly, which surprises me for a Yankee Candle. I usually buy Village Candle jars and those have all burned much more slowly, so think I‚Äôll stick with those since they last longer.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Dex
review: The candle smells great. I once ordered this in the past from someone doing a Yankee Candle Fundraiser and loved it. When I saw it on here for cheaper, I ordered it again. It still is a great candle, but it does seem a bit weaker than I remember from the previous purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: ols
review: the scent is AMAZING  love it  I wish it could be packaged  as Yankee says with the top of the candle up, but no whoever did it just throws it in a box with packing materials, candles were on their sides luckily they did not melt like others in the reviews I read

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: GeorgiePorgiePuddinPie
review: The scent is unremarkable, I can't hardly smell it even after it's been burning for quite some time. The longevity of the candle is the same as other Yankee candles. I love Yankee Candles but for the price of them I'd go for more popular and distinctive scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Lindsey Brzowski
review: I like a strong scent but this is truly over powering. I‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôve ever had a candle give me a headache but this one did in under five minutes of lighting it. The smell is not unpleasant it‚Äôs just too much. If you have a large open space... like a barn; this is your candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Paige
review: I usually love yankee candles but this one just isn‚Äôt it. It doesn‚Äôt smell like lavender or lemons. It smells like perfume or fabric softener. It is very strong, as Yankees usually are. Definitely giftable if the recipient likes those types of scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Nia
review: My absolute favorite candle of all time. It has an amazing scent, amazing throw, amazing longevity, just overall great. It‚Äôs also a very very pretty color so I find it great to give as a gift as well. The scent is very fresh and isn‚Äôt too flowery or too lemony, just the perfect balance of both. Everyone I have ever given this candle to has loved it. Would highly recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Michele Milliken
review: Since lemon and lavender are bright, uplifting smells, I bought this to encourage myself during this coronavirus outbreak and my quarantine. But, it is neither bright nor uplifting. Its a dark-ish smell, heavy and depressing. I'm so disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Shara
review: Just opened for holidays. Glad I didn‚Äôt gift because unless the room is 2x2 one isn‚Äôt going to smell much. The other scent I purchased won‚Äôt even left me review it! And no, it is not a result If covid.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Amazon Customer
review: I feel like something is off about this candle. The scent was not anywhere as strong as usual yankee candles are that I've bought in a store, you can only smell it when in close proximity. It smells pleasant, but it's kind of ridiculous to have to be so close to smell it.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Michelle K
review: I love the scent of this candle!!! It is not overwhelming. I always buy Yankee Candles because they do last and don't loose their scent. A perfect gift for anyone who loves the scent of lavender.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Fungi-man
review: Figured I‚Äôd give this scent a try as I had never seen it before, i did not like it. It wasn‚Äôt and unpleasant smell I just wasn‚Äôt a fan of it. Burned even and for a long time just like you expect from a Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Kayvon Zad
review: I was very disappointed with this candle. No scent whatsoever. First and last time to buy. I expected more from the Yankee brand.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Mr. Lynn E. Bailey
review: This has always been a good brand scent wise.  The dropped their Lavender candle a decade ago which was one of the best on the market. This is almost as good but not quite the original. Longevity has been above average.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Gail Reck
review: This candle is ...... OMG amazing!  Lavender and Lemon!  Are you kidding me?  My favorites scents - combined?  My entire house smells so great and fresh and it's very long lasting!  Even after you blow it out, it continues to fill the air with the fabulous scent!  I will order this again!  And I will gift this to friends and family!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Kitty keeper
review: So happy with this Yankee Candle.  The lemon lavender smells amazing.  The same candle is $29.99 plus shipping on the YC website.  Really good deal, came in YC box in perfect condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Patty Jo
review: Love the scent, lasts a long time nice gift for your mom, sister or whoever you think might like it. I should of bought more than one when it was on sale. Also tell the driver on this package not to lie about where or who they left it with.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Linda N.
review: What could be a better incentive, a quality product, on sale.......the scent is long lasting, not overdone.  At every stage of burning the scent is there.  Not unpleasant smoke orders, just keep the wick trimmed.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: puglover98
review: This is one of my absolute favorite Yankee candle scents. It‚Äôs so refreshing and I love using it in my kitchen to neutralize smells. Truly a nice mix of lavender and lemon.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: music fanatic
review: I love the scent it. It is smooth and soothing. It will last long. The wick should be clipped periodically so that the flame doesn't burn to high nor smoke too much.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Melissa Ghafoori
review: The scent is incredible and lasts for a while. Definitely a strong sweet and fruity scent, I have an indoor cat and I use this candle in the bathroom- smells amazing

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Mic Lee 63
review: Love this scent! Very pleasant. Longevity was very good! Overall,  very happy with the purchase!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Debra
review: Not impressed.  Can't smell it like the balsam cedar.  This one will not work for me house.  It's way too light.  I can only smell it if I put my face near it.  It's supposed to be one of the strongest smelling candles...NOT!!! I won't purchase again.  No happy.  Money wasted.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: CASSANDRA O.
review: I love the scent but it doesn‚Äôt last long. It lasts for a few minutes and then I can‚Äôt smell it anymore. It‚Äôs beautiful and smells wonderful I just wish it was a little stronger

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Mary S.
review: I bought this candle for my daughter‚Äôs birthday and there was no wick üò≥ I have purchased many Yankee Candles and this freaked me out! I can‚Äôt send the candle back because it‚Äôs beyond the return date ‚òπÔ∏è

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Elizabeth Thomas
review: I am a fan of Goose Creek, bought these on impulse.  YC has much less scent than GC. Close up, the very light scent is very nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Lee
review: Item arrived shattered, does happen and that's o.k.  However refund was given in site credit. I think the card should have been credited. Now I have to spend money on something I don't need/want.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Amazon Customer
review: Smells so good I love this candle. I will definitely be ordering more . !!!!Just noticed that the price went up from $16.88 is what I paid to $26.88.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: vicki andrew
review: Lit the candle and within a few moments my apartment was filled with this beautiful scent.  Not overly sweet, or cloying, not overwhelming, just clean, refreshing.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Vettegirl
review: This had ZERO scent of lavender or lemon. Just a really strong chemically fake odor. AWFUL

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Amazon Customer
review: I love these candles,but when they are shipped laying on their side they melt and you can not get to the wick. I put it in the sun and it melted back.  but then you have to dig in the wax to find the wick

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: TMS
review: This is a nice lightweight, clean summer scent. Perfect for yourself or a gift. Love how yankee candles have a nice long burn life.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Michael & Alicia J.
review: I've always loved this product and other scents from this company. But, I have to admit I tried to save a bit of money and ordered from another company (Our Own Candle Company) because of their price and different types of scents. Never again will I do this because now I have grey walls from the black smoke from the candles. So, if I would have stayed with what I knew, I wouldn't have had to pay to have my walls cleaned and wasted money on a cheaper product. "You get what you pay for" rings loudly for me. Thanks for the excellent product.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Katherine Fraga
review: I have been purchasing Yankee Candles from the store for 6+ years. Although the label looks convincing on this candle, it is not the lemon lavender candle from Yankee Candle. It smells totally different and has such a terrible smell, I could not stand it. There is no trace of lemon in it.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Jamie Smolinski
review: I've been buying Yankee Candles for years and have never had one smell so bad.  At first it smells like bathroom cleaner, but as it burns it starts to smell like grape soda.  Very odd scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Alexander F.
review: It smells wonderful!! With a very strong but not too strong aroma. It fills the room just right. It provides me with a sense of comfort I have never known. It is everything i‚Äôve been looking for in a candle and I couldn‚Äôt be happier. When my kids visit from Ohio they smell the candle and feel at peace. author: Tricia
review: UPDATED: So this has grown on me, I stick it in the bathroom and eventually the entire house will smell... the smell doesn't smell cheap to my anymore. Perhaps just the top layer was concentrated or something? Truly smells like lavender and lemons. By the time it fills the rest of the house it smells like soft lavender and soft lemon... and it's a bit stronger in the bathroom where it should be. I love it now! ------------- Woah.. this is strong. When reviews say it is very strong, they're not joking. I'm not entirely too fond of the smell. It's not a cheapy bathroom cleaner smell, but it certainly smells like it belongs in the bathroom. It is a little too strong for anywhere else. I was hoping it would be a good kitchen candle, but I rather use the pure lemon scent in the kitchen, and use this one in the restroom. Doesn't smell cheap, but it's certainly strong and VERY "clean" smelling.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Passionflower Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: JPH
review: This is my first, and probably my last, Yankee Candle. Takes a while to get going and would probably have been more effective as a 3-wick rather than 2-wick candle.  Scent throw is very good, subtle but pervasive over a wide area and remains in the air for a while after the candle is extinguished/covered.  The scent is very floral, pleasant, but I don't pick up the advertised lime/jasmine tea. As one reviewer has noted, after the candle burns down a bit, it really does look like a brain.  There are channels throughout the candle, making it look like the amygdala.  Perhaps a cost-cutting measure, candle burns using less wax. This candle was a nice one-off, nothing about the candle that would compel me to purchase it again.

author: Samantha
review: This was my first purchase of Yankee candles and I can't believe I haven't invested in them yet. First off, I got the tall tumbler with the 2 wicks. It was only $14 which was well worth it, in my opinion. These candles live up to the hype. The scent is wonderful and aromatic. Reminds me of fall which is exactly what I was trying to go for. These candles burn so evenly. I don't know if that's due to the brand and their formula in general or the double-wick, but I love it. I've burned for hours already and it's only gone down maybe about half an inch. I'm in love and a forever customer of Yankee Candle now.

Perfect for apple cider lovers and fall! Would recommend.

review: These look and smell great - and smell great in the heat circulating from a "fake fireplace heater" and when on a warm day the sun streams through the window on top of them and I am sitting down to eat.  I have to note that I prefer this "Brand" because other candles have given me headaches - so though they are more costly - I am sure that the cost went into making a product that smells good and is more "friendly" to more people "scent wise".

She‚Äôs been using is just about every other day (roughly 2 to 5 hours straight) for the last month and it‚Äôs still got a lot of candle left to burn.

author: Eusebius
review: I like most all of the larger candles from Yankee Candle, but I don't really love this one. Even though the scent is somewhat reminiscent of apples and cinnamon, to me it smells a little too artificial. When I first lit it and later came back into the room I couldn't recognize the scent and couldn't connect it with the candle. Maybe it's the walnut and maple that throws it off, but either way, it's not my favorite. I like it, but not as much as the other Yankee Candle fragrances. As I wrote in another review, we've tried different brands of fragrance candles and none of them even come close to the Yankee Candles. They are long lasting and fragrant - the scent is even and continuous right down to the bottom of the candle. Other cheaper brands don't last ¬º the time or have ¬º the scent and actually turn out to be more expensive than a Yankee Candle in the long run.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Courtney G
review: I am very disappointed in this candle.  I have been buying authentic Yankee Candles for 20+ years and I‚Äôve never had such a low quality dud. This candle had no scent and the wick burned so quickly that I had to dump out wax so the flame would stay lit.  Even after dumping out wax, the wick burned unusually fast (for a Yankee candle). I went out and bought a comparable Yankee Candle from a reputable, authorized dealer and the difference was night and day. The candle I purchased from the dealer was exactly what I was used to seeing in a real Yankee Candle. I have a feeling this was a fake Yankee candle, but have no way of proving it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Talia O
review: The scent is amazing, but I remember being able to smell one yankee candle through the entire house. I don‚Äôt know if the formula has changed recently but the scent remains in the room. I miss the strong smell of yankee carrying throughout the house. I‚Äôm a little let down with the strength. The scent is amazing besides that fact.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Nicole
review: I don't think it's an authentic Yankee candle. I've bought this sent before at a Yankee store, and what I bought on Amazon isn't the same quality. What i bought on Amazon has no smell while burning. And Yankee candles are known for their scent.
