The pictures shown are from about an hour and a half of burn. I cleaned the glass and wall and burned it again to see the difference. Sent back the others.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: DevonColleen
review: I am not sure if these are the types of candles yankee sells on clearance because of defects. My candle came and  the wax inside of the candle was not visually pretty. Still it's a candle and that part melted away. The lable on the candle was also ripped off. I did buy this as a gift for my mom but had to keep it and buy a new one at our local drugstore who also sells candles and jewlery. Same scent just not pretty. If I was buying a defective candle, I shouldn't have had to pay more than what you would find in at the store for. I would just suggest buying it else where, but this scent has always been my favorite.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: inlovewithjesus
review: I don't like writing negative reviews, but I felt like I needed to write this one to help people!  So I read many positive reviews about this scent - that's why I bought it - that it had a true lemon scent.  However, when it arrived, I couldn't believe how strong the scent was - and this was BEFORE I even opened the glass lid!  You can smell the scent through the glass.  I opened the lid, and it was overwhelming.  I like a nice, strong scent but this was over the top!  I had to put it outside on the patio overnight because it was smelling up the entire house WITH THE LID ON!  Sadly, I had to return it.  Sorry I couldn't write a nicer review.  But maybe this will help someone who is thinking of buying this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jane H
review: This candle has a nice scent to it. That's the good part. However, it is super strong, which is the bad part for me. I like a lightly scented candle. This candle is super scented, and even in a really big, open area, it is very strong. I couldn't let it burn for more than a few minutes. I think I will need to put it away and get it out when warmer weather comes and I can burn it out on the sunporch with all the sliding doors open to the screens. If you like a strong candle, you'll like this. If you are like me, and only like a light scent, take a pass on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sunny417
review: This was a blind purchase and I'm glad I took the chance. I was worried it was going to smell like furniture polish, but it is a lovely fruity lemon scent almost like kids cereal. Very pleased!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sheila H.
review: My candle arrived safely packaged and in a timely manner. I love Yankee candles as they burn well and have a great fragrance. This one is a little different. While it burns nicely with the two wicks, the smell of Honey and Clementine aren't really there. After burning in for three to five hours I can tell its more of a perfume type of smell over a natural citrus. It doesn't have a very good throw either as you need to be right up on it. Great candle but I'll try a different option for Orange/Citrus. Update- After burning for approximately 15- 20 hours it has gotten better. Better throw and scent. It just shouldn't take that long to be effective.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Purpledog
review: Smelled great out of the box: until I lit it. 3 hours of burn time, nice pool of warm wax and I can't smell a thing: not even when I put my nose to the flame (ok, almost!). It smelled amazing when I removed the lid and I couldn't wait to light it. Dreary, drizzly, damp October in New England and this would have made the day a lot more cheery. Right now, 3+ hours of burn time, and it is pretty much just a red, unscented jar candle. I'll keep it for power outages but as far as scenting the house, I suggest Red Apple Wreath - soft apples and cloves (I think. It is definitely not cinnamon - so I'm thinking cloves). The throw on that once isn't terrific, but compared to old Macintosh which has zero throw and zero scent once lit, it will do on this dreary day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Ryan Odom
review: I would probably be more upset if I realized how ripped off I was but I was curious as to why this candle had hardly no scent when people have been ranting and raving about how good and strong they smell. I should've read the reviews beforehand but got it during the primeday lightning deals, but I'm pretty sure I bought a dud. Someone else reviewed this and mentioned not buying a candle again online. Too easy to get ripped off on something arguably subjective as smell. Not worth it to me. Buy a candle from a more reliable source.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Cathy
review: I love the candle, and have ordered it many times and it arrived fine, but I think the clamshell packaging is being made flimsier, and two in a row arrived with the clamshell broken.  First one the candle jar was crushed.  The replacement arrived today, and the glass was fine, but picture is of the clamshell.  The outside boxes were in perfect condition, so it wasn‚Äôt like the shipper threw itxaround.  I think the clamshells are being made cheaper and it is NOT working!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Ronni & Ray
review: Not happy at all. I normally buy the larger 28$ candle of the Honey Clementine but I decided to order this size. The candle itself looked different upon opening. The appearance is more of a melted crayon than the regular 'glycerin' (for lack of anything better to call it) look than I'm used too. There's practically zero scent to this candle and I feel it's a waste of 16$. Going to attempt to return for credit. Will stick with larger candle from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: 5(me)ly
review: I have purchased many Yankee Candles and can compare them to each other. The watermelon candle is ok. The scent is similar to that of the watermelon lollipop or hard candy. It is not fresh like I anticipated the watermelon scent will be. It is sweet, fruity and smells just delicious/edible. The strength of the scent is however not so strong for a Yankee, I would rate the fragrance strength 3 out of 5, especially comparing to the most fragrant candles in my Yankee's collection now which are Salted Caramel and Chocolate Layer Cake. As usual, Yankee candles last forever

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: lcb
review: Some candles are just way too strong but level of scent is perfect. I found myself not wanting to put it out at all. With many candles I am overwhelmed after an hour but I left this burning most of the day. I love the apple scent and I love the aroma strength. It is not crazy sweet smelling either. I ordered another IMMEDIATELY, because am going to burn through this one fast. Really nice candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Kristine A. Criscimagna
review: I have purchased these the last couple of years for my Daughter's Birthday. They are her absolute favorite and now I live them as well. Perfect for any room and they quickly fill the room with a beautiful scent that's not too overpowering and lasts a while. You really won't find a better price all year long. Great Deal !!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Lisa
review: The candle arrived on time and packaged perfectly. The scent is very fragrant no matter what time of year it will be a perfect addition to your space or a wonderful gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: quiltmaker
review: This candle does not have a lemon scent. I was expecting a candle when burning would give off the smell of lemons. Maybe  Sicillian lemons smells different. I don't know but this scent is not to my liking. I can't even describe the odor, it is sort of sweet but not fruity. At any rate if you're expecting the smell of lemons this is not what you want to buy. The jar is nice and the color is very pretty. It was packaged very well to prevent breakage.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Megan
review: I bought this for 12.99$ for the price it‚Äôs a great deal. Smells great and can be given as a gift. I would never pay more than $12.99 for a yankee candle. There are far superior candle brands that cost less than the retail of Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: 5(me)ly
review: Son kept the candle for himself after he discovered this candle in my bedroom :) I have no idea why this candle has "mango" and "peach" in the name, because the scent not even close reminds neither peach, nor mango. The scent kind of reminds me of the "Love Is" bubble gum from my childhood, otherwise I don't know what to compare it to. It is sweet and fruity. Something otherworldly heavenly beautiful and delicious. Amazing scent. The fragrance strength of this candle is 3 out of 5 - ok/acceptable: it is not the strongest but either the weakest of Yankee scents. Fills up the small bedroom nicely, but nothing that fills up the whole house like other Yankees. I would have expected a stronger scent from a Yankee candle, but overall worth it. Will definitely purchase again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Ralph
review: This has a weird but clean lemon scent. When burning for long periods of time, it made me feel kind of nautious and hungry. Not a bad or a stinky smell... just a powerful lemon food/fruit smell, blended with fresh laundry sheets... so don't burn it on an empty stomach... didnt use it often and moved from room to room... so it lasted a long time in our home .. Good kitchen candle, not recommended for bedroom, office or hallway use. Would not gift...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: V.
review: Product delivery was great however fragrance is Far Below the Quality I have experienced from Yankee Candle in my Many years of purchasing Seems off to a bang  at first burns then 3 later  virtually No Fragrance At All! So disappointed!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Bridgett
review: My daughter and I love this scent.  It's a classic from Yankee and one they should never discontinue.  This grape-scented candle burns evenly and the throw is truly the best I've ever encountered.  We had food in the crock pot yesterday evening, I was burning a peppermint scented candle, and my daughter had this Vineyard candle lit in her bedroom (she's 13...don't freak), with the door cracked open. I could smell this Vineyard candle over all those other potent smells.  As an avid candle fan, I have never had a candle with a throw like Vineyard.  It fills a house with it's amazing scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Joanna P.
review: The media could not be loaded. The large Mango Peach Salsa candle I purchased was defective! It was not poured/mixed properly and has been bubbling/separating every time I light it up. I got another straight from Yankee Candle and it has the exact same issue!!! I have purchased dozens of Yankee Candles and this is the only scent that has had this problem.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Nora
review: I have seen reviews on Amazon stating items are fake and it finally happened to me. I have purchased Yankee Candles a hundred times and this has absolutely no smell whatsoever! Will be the last time purchasing a Yankee candle with Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Barbara Elyse
review: I've never been to Sicily or found any Sicilian Lemons in the produce department to know for sure how close the scent is to the real thing - but the scent was not anything like the fresh zesty scent of a lemon - sorta cloying sweet - this was one time when I wished the scent was not strong - thankfully it was not so strong to fill the house but not a scent I will purchase again !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: 5(me)ly
review: Where do I find enough words to describe my excitement with this heavenly scent?! I am so grateful and happy that I found Passion-fruit Martini. This fragrant masterpiece is staying with me forever! I would rate the fragrance strength 5 out of five! The scent is somewhat similar to Coconut Guava Fusion, but is twice more fragrant, and much richer with a greater depth of sophistication and a play of under-tones in the scent. Along with Chocolate Layer Cake (love also) and Salted Caramel (not in love) , this is one of the most fragrant Yankee collection that I own. Will reorder again and again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: L Massie
review: love the scent and the first half of the candle burned fine ... But for some reason beyond that the wick was wicked ... I've often used Yankee Candles ..  most of them can be burned down to about an inch from the bottom before it goes wacky .. This one didn't last nearly as well.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Z66 Avalanche
review: Not sure what happened with Yankee Candles, they were my favorite. I've bought several different ones, and the scent isn't as strong as it use to be. I cant remember when one burnt evenly. The only thing that seems to remain the same is the price. The smell is faint with this, and the strawberry lime is just the same. Really not worth writing a review on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Julie smart
review: I don‚Äôt think this is a real Yankee candle. When I buy Yankee candles and I open them up they pretty much set up the whole room before I‚Äôve even let them. I‚Äôve bought two of these in an orange and a lemon and neither one of them have a very strong smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Irene
review: I don't believe the Macintosh candle is the same as the ones from the store. This candle smells like chemical and seems fake. It's been sitting in my room for a long time and I will not be lighting it again. Will defnitely go into the trash. Just buy the candle in store and save the disappointment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Bora K.
review: When I first received it, I got it broken inside the box. However, when I informed Amazon about this fact, I was very satisfied that they sent me the new product again immediately. I personally love this scent. I'm using a few Yankee candles but I want to buy them again when I'm done.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Kamal Sharma
review: Happened to read the instructions that came with this candle. They recommend to keep it lit till the whole top melts. Doing that now, wick is staying nice and in place. Candle burns neatly. This particular scent works well in the kitchen to mask smells from cooking, those are great when you eat the food but must go before it is time to prepare the next meal. Stuff we have had to learn during the pandemic!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Nora‚ÄôsMom
review: I ordered the honey clementine. I lit the candle in my office/bedroom and let it burn for about an hour. Usually tanker candles spread through the whole house but I had to keep coming back to check if it was still lit because I couldn‚Äôt smell it. Even when you‚Äôre right on top of it you barely notice a scent at all. BUT I will say my fianc√© said ‚Äúyeah smells great‚Äù but you know how men are  lol

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Katie
review: I've been a Yankee Candle devotee for years and years. Maybe decades!  BUT finally this Sicilian Lemon candle has NO scent whatsoever! NONE.  My smeller seems fine, but wow. Nothing.  Candles these days are a real luxury for me and this one def disappointed.  Well, one out of how many over the years? Guess my odds are still good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Joe Morrow
review: Yankee candles are great. They last for a very long time (I would estimate around 100 hours) and there is lots of variety. Lemon is my favorite for everyday use, and this scent is my favorite lemon of all time. It's a little sweet, but not sickening sweet, and it's not the tangy lemon smell of kitchen soap or cleaner. It's perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: CheeryToes
review: I was really expecting this candle to have more of a cilantro scent, the idea of the candle is great, the reality is a heavily pineapple scented candle that makes me rather nauseous. I waited a year or two for the price to drop on this when it did I snapped it up - what a disappointment - I cannot recommend this scent. blech

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: fatima
review: its very average, rather than the fresh citrus-y scent i was looking for, it smells like lemon candy.  It also doesn't fill a room at all, even after burning it for several hours.  It burns well through, didn't have any issues with the wick.  Walmart candles for 3.99 are stronger, i would just go there. EDIT: two stars.  It burns terribly.  the wax melts at an angle so you have to constantly keep an eye on it. Absolutely not worth the money :/

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Chris M.
review: For the price I was expecting a nice scent and long lasting but got just the opposite. I have not smelled anything besides was as this candle quickly burns. I got a generic lemon scented candle from Food Lion that was smaller but lasted way longer and filled my room with a nice lemon scent. Will not buy any more candle from this brand and will see if I can find the supermarket candle again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: H. Hun
review: I buy this scent often and have loved it for years. My son and mother also love it. The color can be great at spring summer or fall but the smell is more spring and summer. I returned this one because the smell was great and strong and I was in early pregnancy and couldn't take it. It's not one of those scentless scented candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jennifer Moseley
review: I love Yankee candles, but this scent is definitely not one of my favorites. It seems very similar to a previous scent I bought - pineapple cilantro. I was hoping for a clean, fresh lemon scent, but this smells more like sweet candy. If you‚Äôre wanting a clean, fresh scent, I think lemon lavender is a much better option.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jill
review: I was excited about trying out this candle(lemon Sicilian)..I buy tons of candles...and after burning this downstairs in my livibgroom,I had to blow it out..The smell was like plastic w lemon..It was bad..I think I will burn it outdoors..but definately not inside..I wanted to give more stars..but I I can not on this one scent..sorry.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Adam F
review: I ordered the Lemon-Lavender scent and it smells great and is quite strong! The candle came packaged well so it wasnt broken and the candle had not melted from the summer heat. My only critique is how small the candle is (the small tumbler). Considering the candle cost about $13, i would have hoped that it would have been a bit bigger. Other than that, the candle is nice!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Mw
review: This candle was sent lying on it's side so the wax was coming out of the lid.  I then had another one sent in it's place.  I lit the candle and had it burn for 30-40 minutes.  No scent.  Let it burn for 2 hours, no scent.  I have a feeling the seller is bogus.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Tirzah Price
review: I'm such a fan of the fragrance! It's sweet and exotic, and so relaxing. It's not overbearing and it doesn't get too strong or sickly-sweet smelling when the candle is burning, which is an issue I have with many cheaper candles I buy. The 22 oz. jar is nice and big, and the packaging boasts over 100 hours of burn time, which I can attest to. I lit this one 2-5 hours a day for over 5 weeks before it burnt out. My only complaint would be that I still have probably a half of an inch of wax in the bottom of the jar, but my wick is completely burnt. This could be be due to the fact that I had to blow it out at one point, and if I had kept burning it, the wax would have been used up completely. Otherwise, this is a wonderful product--pineapple and cilantro aren't two scents you'd think to combine, but they're fantastic together! At $25, it's a little bit pricey for a candle, but this is a big jar and it really does last, so it's well worth the money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Shannon
review: This produce came on time. However, the box was falling apart and the candle is clearly very old. It is leaking red oil and is unusable. It ruined one of my shirts and leaked all over my white mantel. Wouldn't recommend unless newer candles are being sent now. Mine was clearly not good anymore.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: tracy
review: I love the smell of this lemon candle. The price was great so I ordered 3 of them. I have ordered 1 at a time previously. when they arrived used the 1st one right away for the holidays. When I finally got around to opening the next one was surprised that it was NOT lemon but french vanilla as was the last one as well. It would have been 5 stars if I had gotten all Lemon like ordered. I didn't send them back as it is a pain to have to mess with that during the holidays I just used them as gifts instead. I will order again but only 1 at a time so as not to be disappointed again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: HectorC
review: Bought four Macintosh candles at 23-24 bucks a pop‚Ä¶ can‚Äôt smell the Macintosh‚Ä¶ I can smell the wick though. Daughter-in-law works at a site that has been receiving a whole lot of returns on the Yankee Candles for the same reason. Extremely disappointed‚Ä¶ Guess what I‚Äôll be doing?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Ranger
review: Have enjoyed these candles for many years. It was a nice surprise to see some of the scents here on Amazon for far less than retail at their stores. Of course, not all inventory was available but I found three that I like. Highly recommend purchasing these Yankee Candles on Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: paulinespens
review: This smell of this candle is horrific. It isn't no where near a fruity, Happy smell. I lit the candle soon as I got it. I was so excited. Lemon is one of my favorite smells. It burned for a few hours as I did my own thing around the house. I realized I hasn't smelled lemon yet so I went to check the candle. Whatever you used for this candle please never use it again. The smell is like burnt hair. That's the best way to describe it. I won't even give this away. Worst candle ever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Peggy
review: SMELLS LIKE GRAPE! so if you love grape smells go for it! - I thought it would be a bit more vineyard / wine smelling but it is super grape, the wick also only burned on one side and I have it going for 8 hours while I am at work, which is usually enough time for an even burn.  Otherwise great price and came fast and packaged in a nice cardboard case so it doesn't break in transit

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jennie McCracken
review: I hope the lemon and lavender scent stays on in their product line. I discovered this candle in the stores during the spring and this candle burns for hours, keeping me relaxed and focused while I am working from home or spending time alone to read a good book. I purchase two at a time on Amazon every couple of months and never regret it. I‚Äôve gotten almost 10 of these candles so far and will continue to buy this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Amazon Customer
review: Using this candle made me sick. It has some sort of toxic irritant in it. Within a day of burning it my sinuses were clogged & I started becoming sick. This was not normal. After airing out the house and recovering I tried the candle again and realized it was the source of the issue as I started becoming sick again. Ordered this & the carmel version to the same effect. Other options they have didn't do this to me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Rhabyn S. McCowan
review: Watermelon is my favorite food in the world, and this lovely candle makes me want one, or jolly rancher candy or something juicy and sweet. A quality watermelon candle is difficult to find. Yankee has got one. Rarer than the Macintosh Apple, the watermelon is usually more expensive compared to other scents, but I'm not sorry one bit for overpaying this one. It's stronger than any brand of watermelon candle I've ever had. Absolutely the best.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: lain
review: Very lovely summer-y smell! I believe they re-vamped this scent, because in the past this candle did not smell this amazing! And, when I bought this one, it came with a NEW sticker around the top of the container.  Keeps the room smelling fresh, and eliminates any odors that are currently residing or potential occurring odors (like food, dog farts, whatever).Definitely a candle worth keeping around in your collection.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Clarissa M
review: We had a small lemon one, was happy to get a large one for the table as I know the color and scent will last.  This was a warehouse deal and came well packaged in original yankee candle packaging.  Very happy all around.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Hel M.
review: I was worried, reading the other reviews, that it'd arrive misshapen and I'd have to boil it, but it was perfect. The scent even without lightning it is really strong too. Can't wait to use it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Amazon Customer
review: I love Yankee candles and always buy them but this one was terrible. Not sure if it was old, fake or what but there was no scent throw (mild cold, no hot) and I let burn for hours. The candle aesthetic was bad as well, looked separated from the glass (which i know happens but this was extra). sent it back. Purchased from Yankee and it was AWESOME!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Nick Hollingbery
review: This candle smells incredible. It‚Äôs light and fresh and wonderful. I am sensitive to certain floral smells and get migraines frequently. This candle is simply the best.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Lucia C.
review: Other retailers candles/wax melt scents have been known to cause a headache and irritates my sinus cavity. Sicillian Lemon is subdle perfection. Strong enough to envelop my entire 1100 square foot townhome over 2 floors yet not overpowering or chemical. I liken the scent to taste of lemon italian ice. The large jar is an absolute great deal on sale! I highly suggest burning a minimum of 2-3 hours each time to avoid uneven wax around the outer circumference of the jar. Cheery bright yellow color. Arrived on time in secure packaging.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: K. M. Benjamin
review: I can smell this wonderful apple scent ! Which I believe means I don‚Äôt have COVID . Who knew that candles could be so important in the fight against it. Of course the shipping was super fast and the product was careful bundled to make it to me !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Shannon Ainsley Burnett
review: Smells great would be awesome if I could burn it in the jar but it melted on the way I‚Äôm guessing. I‚Äôm just cutting pieces off and putting it in my wax burner. Definitely would not gift it to anyone with the shape it came in. But I have gotten other ones that came in perfect condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Krsone
review: I knew I was taking a gamble on this purchase after reading all the other reviews, and I‚Äôm sad to say that I‚Äôm super disappointed. Yankee definitely dropped the ball on this one. The scent is SOOOOO mild-it barely fills my kitchen with the scent after 3 hours of burn time. Spend an extra $5 and get a better oneüò¨. I won‚Äôt be reordering and I do not recommend this candle. On the plus side, packaging was superb and I received one day shipping. Ty for that‚ÄºÔ∏è

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jane S.
review: I love scented candles and have looked at a wide range of products.  I was biased against Yankee  Candle, but after ordering more expensive products products that arrived broken or had little scent, I decided to try that Yankee Candle.  They ship in a egg carton inside a box.  No breakage.  One negative was fewer interesting scents and that's true. Macintosh scent was ok:  Balsam & Cedar & Kitchen Spice are favorites so far.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Happy customer
review: When i opened my box i had wax with a wick in a pile of shattered glass inside a cardboard holder inside a box. So no idea how it smells once lit and for the price im not trying again. Super disappointed got it for the holidays now im looking at throwing it away before i can even enjoy it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Brittany
review: My lemon candle unfortunately came broken, but I‚Äôm ok with that. It wasn‚Äôt a sweet lemon smell like I was hoping. I guess I‚Äôm looking for a lemon cookie candle. But this was a pure lemon smell and it was bitter.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Lexi
review: Not the WOW  factor I thought it would be. Barely smell the fragrance. One time purchase for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Prime Addict
review: Idk if I received a bad candle or what. But this BARELY had any kind of scent & there was no throw. I‚Äôm just super sad Bc I absolutely LOVE candles and I was looking forward to a Yankee brand candle providing a pleasant ‚ÄúLemon-y‚Äù scent but‚Ä¶.I didn‚Äôt get that.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Mayli
review: I had high hopes for this after reading some other reviews for this particular scent. I'm usually a fan of Yankee Candles but was really disappointed with this one. I burned it all day and there was no scent at all. I don't recommend buying this scent and will probably return it since it wasn't cheap.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: TDavis
review: I've ordered many candles, mostly all in glass jars, and Yankee Candle is the best at shipping and delivery (with no busted glass, unlike other companies!) Plus, they are the best for a reason, and the scent is great for covering foul odors.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Tarjara
review: It isn't the newest label candle like in the pic. If you are a Yankee Candle fan you know what I mean. Luckily it still had good throw but then again it's Vineyard and to me it is one of the best they ever made.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Liane
review: I remember back in the day when Yankee discontinued my favorite (lemon) scent and I had to hunt of stores with old stock to get one. I'm so glad they are back to doing lemon. I love the way the scent of a single one of these candles burning on the bathroom shelf fills my entire apartment.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: mamabear22
review: after losing my favorite go to spot to buy candles and other decor, i've had to resort to online ordering, and sometimes it's a bit of a gamble when it comes to candles and scents, because i can't smell them until they get delivered. just received this one today and it smells heavenly! got it for the end of summer, perfect way to enter fall with this nice sweet not too overpowering honey clementine candle! lovely, just lovely!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Stubby
review: I purchased two of these candles in Sicilian Lemon. I received a different scent in the Lemon box, however, I returned the wrong candle and was sent the correct on within days. I'm so glad they had them on Amazon. I will definitely purchase them again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: A. Hassan
review: I am very sensitive to air fresheners and scented things, in general-- including most YC scents. This one smells clean and light and does not make me wheeze. The lid fits tightly enough to keep in all the "post candle extinguishing smoke of death".

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Nick
review: This is one of my favorite Yankee candles. The scent is mouthwatering. You can't beat the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: ernest g ruiz
review: I bought this candle a while back ( not from amazon ) , beautiful aroma.I ordered the same candle form Amazon, and as you can see in photos it's damaged.The Amazon customer service is excellent and they are sending me a replacement.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: TheRyan
review: We‚Äôve bought a bunch of these when they on sale for $15. Never again, we get duped every time by a good price but none of them have ever filled a room with scent like the ones from the store.  Don‚Äôt buy these from Amazon, you‚Äôll regret it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Lisa D.
review: Although the product was packaged and shipped well protected, which I appreciated because of the glass, the candle had melted or leaked a bit. It was not a huge mess, but it was not suitable for use without a good cleaning of the upper portion of glass and the lid which required removing the plastic ring on the lid. This was a pain/annoying; but the product was of good quality otherwise.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Shana
review: I was so excited for this candle but I‚Äôm so disappointed. It smells of nothing. Ive had it burning for over 7 hours and the room does not smell a drop like it‚Äôs supposed to. I even tried wafting the smoke directly into my face and I barely smelled anything. Sad

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: BargainBecky
review: The scent is not very strong for this candle.  I expected my kitchen to be full of lemon and I can barely smell it while I am standing near it.  I have left it to burn for a couple hours and still do not get much scent.  I like the color and will continue to burn but am thinking twice before I'd purchase a Yankee candle online again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Mariel ward
review: Not sure if these are not real Yankee candles or maybe these are the rejects bc the one I got had looked like it had already been used with wax on the sides of the glass and the scent didn't seem as strong as I saw other comments for the same one. But has lasted a long time so far and I do notice the scent I love honey Clementine

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jbird
review: I wasn't sure what to expect of this scent.  For me, it is amazing.  It smells tropical but most of all, the scent is strong and carries throughout my room which is exactly what I wanted.  I ordered the Lilac Blossoms previously and the smell wasn't very strong.  You had to walk out and back in to notice the smell, but with this candle that issue does not exist.  I could smell it on the bubble wrap before I even had it completely separated from the protective packaging.  Absolutely the best I've had in years.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Christine
review: I normally buy this candle directly from Yankee candle but I wanted it sooner so I ordered it on Amazon because of the price I was totally disappointed that this candle did not even fill my living room with the scent would definitely  not by again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: ZQ
review: The scent was weak and didn't last like my other Yankee Candles have.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Michael Kopecky
review: This product comes badly packaged off Amazon shipping and will easily break like mine did the second you open it.  It also smells absolutely disgusting, worse than any artificial lemon scent I‚Äôve ever smelled!  What a waste of my money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sushi07
review: I love all scents with berries and was never disappointed. This was too, is absolutely great, but I have to add, that I could only smell the blueberries nothing of vanilla. The scent is very strong and lingers in the room for hours. Definitely one, I would buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Amazon Robin G
review: The only problem I have is that I‚Äôve ordered yankee candies in the past (which Are the BEST) and I lLOVE Amazon buy the Macintosh candle I received today looks like it melted and reformed with weird bubbles on top and candle wax inside the lid. As usual it was packed VERY well, I‚Äôve had other things shipped so poorly it was amazing (not from amazon) anyway I gave five stars anyway before I see how this problem will affect the candle???? It smells sooooo good!!! So I‚Äôm hoping this was just a fluke and won‚Äôt smell bad or burn too fast !!! Fingers crossed lol

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Erin
review: I love this sweet citrusy smell. I know it's meant for summer, but I like to burn it with the windows open on a cool day. It's a nice scent to air out the room, especially on cleaning days, when it covers cleaning sprays' scents subtly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Elizabeth James
review: I‚Äôll admit I was skeptical of purchasing this candle not directly at the store however I was extremely happy that I didn‚Äôt! Not only did I save money, I also saved myself the headache of fighting crowds during Christmas time. My friend absolutely loves this scent and she immediately started to burn it the moment she opened it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Mel C.
review: Was really really excited to turn my room into a mango tropical paradise. When I opened the package I was excited because it smelled heavily of mango. Unfortunately, that was the strongest the candle would ever smell. When I lit and burned it, it had little to no aroma and I could only smell it when my nose was a few inches from the hot wax. I don't know if they are fake but I amextremely disappointed. This product on the other hand by the "same company" Yankee Candle Medium Jar Candle, Passion Fruit Martini was almost too strong (but nice)! Something is fishy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Isnt She Lovely
review: Thank you Yankee!!! Will you bring back "BLACKBERRY TEA PLEASE?" PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE????????? I LOVE  THAT CANDLE!!! I WILL BE WAITING>>>>>>>I HAVE BEEN WAITING!!!!!!! Sincerely, Patty Gale With the Love Of YANKEE

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: mady b.
review: I ran out of a candle with this particular scent and was glad to find it on amazon for such a great deal. I‚Äôve already been burning it for hours and it still smells as amazing as it did at first and barely any wax has melted so I know this will last a long amount of time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Kindle Customer
review: I have to update my review.  Yankee candle associate contact me and send me a replacement.  Their customer service is Very Good. (old review. This candle does not give any aroma.  I bought other in the pass and was excellent.  I am not happy with this one.)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Seabreezy
review: The media could not be loaded. It is fragrant the minute you light it, and it is fragrant until it is finally done.  I love this candle, it is among my top 3 of all time. üëçü•∞

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: carl cammisa
review: It's true you get what you pay for. This is my first purchase of a Yankee candle as I heard rave reviews!!! Excellent candle. My whole living room is apple scented!! Will never buy dollar store candles again. Good job guys!! Also it was delivered quick and not broke!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: maricartav
review: The scent is not as strong as i thought it would be.  I had a smaller version of this same scent and it was really strong and pleasing.  This larger one is not as strong but it does burn for a long time and looks nice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: kid1carus
review: This candle smells SOOOOO freaking good!  It smells EXACTLY like a freshly cut Macintosh apple. You walk into the room and it smells like late October at the apple farm or pumpkin patch when they are making fresh hot apple cider. Such a warm and cozy smell, makes me miss home! I must get more if these!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Karen
review: I love citrus scents, especially lemon, so I was excited to receive the Sicillian Lemon candle.  It does not smell like lemon or any citrus fruit at all.  The closest comparison would be a super strong smelling pineapple.  Very disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: EmBee
review: This is an amazing fruity scent!!! So summery! You will feel like you are on a beach at an all inclusive resort. The only disappointment? You feel like a server will come by with a cocktail. Sadly, they never show up lol.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Amazon Customer
review: The Secillian Lemon scent is a little sweeter than the usual citrus, but very pleasant.  You can't beat Yankee Candle for scent throw.  I try other brands/types, but always come back to YC.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Wendy L
review: Love Yankee candles but this scent has no scent. Arrived melted so returned, no problem...easy. The new one was in perfect shape but no odor. Will continue to gets the scents I know are good. Disappointing!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sushi07
review: Smells delicious and very fruity cold, but warm it was a total failure as I had nearly no throw at all. Two points only because of the delicious scent of mango and peach, both equally smellable.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: MO
review: I‚Äôve bought this candle before and loved the scent. However the scent is almost too sweet. I live in a studio apartment abs the candle lives up to the description yet it‚Äôs too sweet for a small area.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: LilMar
review: I've been buying McIntosh for many years. Great throw, and it smells like fresh, crunchy apples..... Just apples. Perfect scent in September when the orchards are harvesting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: JAF
review: Love this scent--its not a heavy perfume scent but a nice light fruit for spring.  I only gave 4 stars because mine arrived broken around the rim.  However, I got on Amazon immediately and it was no problem to receive a replacement without having the hassle of sending the broken one back!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Dennis Toland
review: I mostly buy my scented candles from BB&B and their fragrances are typically strong enough that you can smell the scent throughout the house.  - By comparison I've sat next to this candle while lit and barely could smell any fragrance. As a candle it's functional, but I wouldn't consider it scented.  You'd likely get more fragrance from an actual bag of cherries.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Tracy J
review: It smells wonderful but when I opened it today it was all melted and rehardened like it was someplace hot before I got it! You can't get to the wick or anything.. For the price of Yankee candles I am very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Alicia Davis
review: This candle has a light lemony mango scent. The only drawback is that it must burn a long time before you can smell it. Other than that I would recommend it for small areas.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: amazon frequenter
review: This candle smells great when you open up the lid, but it is so faint while it‚Äôs actually burning. I love The longevity of Yankee candles, but this one just smells so weak. I‚Äôm bummed because the scent is wonderful if it was just stronger.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Adrian
review: Candle is great, however, it took two try‚Äôs to get it and I think I know why? So the first one was marked as delivered but I never got it. When the second one came today I learned one possible reason why. The packaging has Yankee Candle written big all over. So I think that makes it enticing to steal. I recommend marking as gift when ordering so it‚Äôs in a second box as well as for yankee to remove logo from their boxes.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: LentenRose
review: Wish it were a true lemon scent It smells like sweetened lemonade-which is probably good for many- Personally I was looking for real citrus/sour hint

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Hadaway-JohnsonAmazon Customer
review: I dislike the fake yankee candle. Lack of scent, less burning time. Unclean burning. Just not the quality that Yankee Candles have always been. I would definitely say the label on the right is a fake Yankee Candle. I‚Äôm just so disappointed and dissatisfied that I thought I was buying the real thing and it‚Äôs not.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Christina
review: Barely has a scent, I only bought them cause I re-did my kitchen as a lemon theme and was hoping they‚Äôd give off a lemon scent but you can‚Äôt even tell when I lit them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: elise
review: Arrived partially broken , still usable,  maybe that's why it was discounted because it was packaged nicely. Great scent, don't feel like returning it so I'll just make due.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Barbara
review: Let me just say that this is one of the best smelling candles I've ever had. It smells like im at an apple picking farm. The scent is so fresh and SO relaxing. I will definitely be buying another once this one runs out. This is by far my favorite candle, and I have quite a few

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Nicholette Corn
review: When you smell the candle up close it smells great. However there is no throw of the scent. You can‚Äôt even tell it is burning when you walk by. I would not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Mrs. Leeaton
review: I love yankee candles, and I guess each smell is subjective.  But this scent is not my favorite.  The smell when you first open the jar, does not match the smell when its burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Steven Doyle
review: Disappointed had high stars and reviews but I have a snall apartment left candle on came home 4 hours later and when I walked in there wasn't even a scent....garbage

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Just me
review: I wanted to like this so bad. It came well packaged , quickly, but it has absolutely no smell and for sure no throw. This was a waste of money for me because I wasn‚Äôt looking for long lasting but more of strong smell and throw. I got Sicilian  lemon. Sadly disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: jennifer
review: I love yankee candles, but this candle scent is faint. Only smells when you first open lid and light. No scent after or anywhere else is room. I would not buy unless from yankee store where you could make sure scent is there. Disappointed in waiting for candle and spending the money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: shirley
review: I usually love yankee candles but this one had no scent (unless you were right on top of it). I ended up buying a $4 lemon scented candle from a generic brand and it gave off a significantly stronger aroma, I think I'll stick to buying my candles in-person from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Adam
review: Scent is a preference. I personally feel meh about the scent. It's pretty okay! Though the product itself (burns long and looks amazing to have on a table) is great!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Addison Stick
review: Of course it lasts a long time it‚Äôs a large sized Yankee candle but the poached pear that I received came with a sticky ring on the inside like it was old and lacking smell. Pretty annoyed as it was nearly 32$.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: twinkleshops
review: The scent isn't overwhelming.  It's a very light, lemony fragrance with a sweet undertone.  Reminds me of the smell of "lemonhead" candy.  I really wanted a more true lemon scent, but this will work for now.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Joann F.
review: I loved the scent and the fact it burns slowly and you can smell it when you first walk into the room instead of having to sit next to it to smell the scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Abhija
review: Please do urself a Favor and skip this buy. Its just waste of money there is ZERO throw on burn not even know what the‚Ä¶ is this it literally smells nothing normally there is good ..ok..bad smell .. but this is like there is nothing even after a good 2hr burnüôÑ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Belsy Gonzalez
review: The lemon smells wonderful! Not overpowering and the candle lasts forever. A clean yet refreshing smell with a touch of lemonhead scent. The smell will fill a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: The Nerdy Narrative
review: It looks like it's from Yankee Candle, but I do wonder if it's a knock off.  I purchased from this seller due to the much lower price and I got what I paid for.  The scent if very, very faint and has to burn for hours to achieve even that.  Will not purchase from this seller again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: New Era Goldens
review: I love the smell of vineyard. Yankee candles last a long time and the scent stays strong all the way to the bottom of the candle. The wicks always work. The only downfall is the wick does not burn clean and leaves black soot around the top of the candle but that is the only fault I can find. Sorry, have to subtract a star

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Tina Hughes
review: What can I say, Yankee candles are the best. We love most all of the scents, they burn evenly and clean. Priced right, Amazon makes it easy to find what we want, order and always shipped fast and safely!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Favdoggy
review: I should have listened to the reviews indicating that this candle does not have a scent. I have been buying Yankee Candles for years because of the wonderful scents. I don't think this is an authentic Yankee Candle. Don't waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jose Costa
review: Love the smell and the price. Wish  all candles worked out as well as this one did. Guessing the next time i try getting it again price will have gone up.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jacqueline D.
review: I love Yankee candles, the Macintosh Apple scent smells fresh like real apples. I just wish they'd burn longer. I get the large jar and burn it continuously so they don't last very long in my home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Tiffany
review: Definitely melted at one point of its transit life. You can see that the wax even partially melted in to the lid. The wick is barely there. Smells great though

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Gallant
review: I ordered this candle and it came broken. Amazon replaced it (thank you). My replacement smells great. I like this fragrance over the holidays. Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Brenda V.
review: Love the smell of this candle! It‚Äôs so fruity smelling, smells like fresh grapes in a vineyard.  I was going to give it as a gift but decided to keep it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: DB
review: Yankee Candle large size is usually 40 bucks and I got this for half the price. Well worth it. I got plenty for friends as well. Made excellent gifts.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Amazon Customer
review: I must have received a bad one from a bad batch because I bought a small sample candle from Yankee Candle and the smell was lovely and this smelled nothing like it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: SL
review: I usually love Yankee candles because they smell wonderful, but this one has little scent to it. It‚Äôs a beautiful color though and brings a little sunshine to my kitchen

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Pamela H.
review: This is a memory from way back. This Blueberry Yankee Candle means so much to me. I had some about 30 years ago and bought one for a Christmas gift for my wonderful brother.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: BAK
review: I have used many scents of Yankee candles.  I am using an evergreen scent just now.  I got this one for a friend who loves fruit scents.  It is a great gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Becca
review: I always really enjoying key candles I always last a long time and have a very strong scent! I would say that the scent is definitely nice in my opinion I wish it was stronger but maybe that's because I like to be overpowered. definitely not a bad kennel whatsoever I would definitely recommend to anybody!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Danlin3860
review: It's one of my favorites all year. The kitchen spice is great for Thanksgiving  and Christmas. And Balsam for Christmas. Thankyou Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Smoochies
review: I have been purchasing Yankee Candles for decades.  Macintosh has always been my #1 favorite.  The Yankee Store left my area.  So glad I found some here & at a discount to boot!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: jill
review: i am a HUGE fanatic of yankee candle, i always buy the sale candles since its a great price for a great product. this scent sounded cool but i really dislike it, it has a resort spa kind of smell, which some people may like but it definitely doesnt smell like pineapple OR cilantro... oh well I'll just gift it to someoneüòÇ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: MtnLady
review: Got this from my husband for Christmas and absolutely love it! Macintosh has a crisp apple scent that is light and not too overpowering in the room. Highly recommend this scent for those who don't like something sickly sweet, but fresh & crisp! Actually smells great when you burn a Yankee Cucumber scent candle at the same time! :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: GooGooDolphins
review: This candle smells so good! Very strawberry with a hint of lemon! The only downside is that it did not burn evenly even though I had it lit for hours. I would still buy again though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Valgirl
review: I burn candles for sent and mood often. This is my very first Yankee Candle ever. It is one of the longest burning candle I‚Äôve had yet. The lemon scent is very sweet.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: V. LaBore
review: This has been my favorite scent, MacIntosh Apple, since I first purchased one back in 1984. A nice crisp fresh scent of apples and long-lasting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Muddy
review: This candle smells really nice. It‚Äôs not too overpowering of a scent and I like to burn it in my bathroom. It‚Äôs the perfect sweet and clean citrus smell for a bathroom. I already bought a second one and will buy more!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Emily B
review: This is a lovely scented candle. I ordered it as a Christmas present for my mom to use in the kitchen. She absolutely loves it and uses it every day. My only complaint was the packaging it came in...it was clearly plain to see what it was based on the names on the packaging and I was really hoping it would have been more discreet at Christmas.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Christopher Wells
review: The scent is good, it lasts pretty long, and it makes a great gift. My only problem is the price. It is a little pricey, but overall good candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: DEB KAR
review: I buy Yankee candles all the time, and have for 40 years. This is the first time I have ever ordered candles from Amazon. I don't know if they are reject or if something just went wrong in production. This Large candle completely burned in 3 days. So the difference in price makes NO sense at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: SDF
review: The allure of knock-off candles and their pungent scent as I stroll discount store aisles is always strong, and I must admit, more than once I have found myself swept up in their $8.99 temptations, but always have buyers remorse as the scents are never quite quite as good and the burn not as smooth as a true Yankee candle. My tradition of welcoming fall with an apple scented candle was soured by such a knock-off purchase, and after feeling disappointed that I had failed fall so massively, immediately went back to my roots and ordered this candle. Great burn, great scent--I promise myself and autumn I will not stray again. The extra money is worth it in this case.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jean-Pierre Kirkland
review: These candles are so easy to accommodate - no dripping wax, re-sealable to maintain the aroma and easy to move from one location to another.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Kimberly D. Rhodes
review: I bought these because I love scented candles, but I am very disappointed in these! They smell fantastic right out of the box, but the scent is no longer evident once the candle burns once or twice.  Yankee candles are supposed to be the best, but these are definitely not.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Susan
review: The scent isn‚Äôt as strong or authentic as yankee candle was 20 years ago. I don‚Äôt know why. To me, the prevailing scent is simply wax. Disappointing

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Non-fiction Addiction
review: Lovely scent of oranges and honey in a large jar (22oz) with a single wick. I‚Äôve enjoyed this variety before. Great packaging and value for a long lasting candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Audrey Teater
review: I ordered this for my room and I love the smell. It is subtle, but still there. The candle has lasted forever, I still have a little bit left and I have used it quite a bit (especially when compared to other candles). Overall, I would recommend and I would buy it again. I probably will when this one runs out!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: LionHeart
review: I love this, it's smells so light and fresh. True spring and summer candle. Arrived in one piece, was cheaper than Walmart and burns great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Alexis
review: This candle does the opposite of grow on you tbh. It kinda makes me nauseous now and I really don't like burning it anymore. But it is nice and strong!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Julie
review: I read all the reviews before purchasing about how great this scent smell, however I was very disappointed that I could barely detect the scent. The tart candles from Walmart smelled better and stronger

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Amazon Customer
review: This was slightly disappointing in how little it smells like actual orange. It smells more like artificial orange candy, or an orange drink like Tang.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Margaret Allen
review: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter. It has a very pleasant smell, and It was in a well protected package. I am pleased with it. I got it for half price on sale so it is worth the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Tracy Good
review: The Macintosh  apple has a classic, fresh scent. Not too overpowering. Yankee candles last way longer than any I‚Äôve tried in the past. The price on amazon was more affordable than the stores.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jolyne
review: My favorite fragrance! Yankee candle does not disappoint with lasting quality fragrances. I‚Äôm a loyal fan. Sometimes though my orders have come broken , but they have been good about replacements

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: rebecca govan
review: Excellent purchase. I paid $14 for these candles. If I had ordered from Yankee Candle it would have cost $36.50. I will order my Yankee Candles from Amazon from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Amazon Customer
review: Bought these on a sale for $10.  They came individually boxed and perfect for gift giving. Love the lemon scent.  Burn great.  A+

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: kayrn brumley
review: Smells wonderful...just like every Yankee I've bought before. I will add that I've never had covid, so my sense of smell is still 100%. Love your products!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Lantana Al
review: This candle looks nice... I like the yellow color... but I am quite disappointed in the smell. I'm not a fan of this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Amazon Customer
review: I love Yankee candles & this was a great find on Amazon.  The scent of lemons is really nice, plus the price was awesome as well.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jessica S.
review: The cilantro part threw me off at first but after reading comments,  I figured I'd give it a try. It smells so good. There's nothing cilantro smelling, to me anyway. Def glad I tried it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: SC
review: If your looking for a strong fresh lemon scented candle this is not for you. If you want some weird citrus chemical crap then hey hey good things have come your way. üëéüèª

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Cole
review: I buys these quite often! They are a little pricey, but you can‚Äôt find them in stores.... The Blueberry is our favorite one! They last a long time makes the whole house smell like Blueberries üòä highly recommend this candle so worth the money ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Buy this one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: jj
review: I had this candle burning for several hours and could not pick up on the scent. This scent has always been a favorite of mine, so that was disappointing!  I'm not sure if just got a dud; however, going off my experience --I would not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sue
review: I don't mean to be a smart-a$$, but the candle smelled like mangoes and peaches- a wonderful scent! I've had mixed results with how evenly and completely my Yankee candles have burned, but this one was great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sara Slick
review: Came in perfect condition and packaged very well. Shipped quickly with no issues. Smells nice and burns like a yankee. Would buy again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Cher
review: I really like Yankee Candles for the quality.  This scent is very light but smells good.  If you are wanting a fill the room scent this is not for you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Matt Brown
review: You can‚Äôt go wrong with Yankee Candles and lemon for the warm weather. I really love this clean scent. Great for a gift. Their candles seem to last longer than they print on the label.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Ginny L.
review: I enjoy Yankee Candles and this is no exception. Long burning. Smells wonderful. Extinguishes when you put the lid back on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Minidonut
review: Pictures shown what I received. The wax spilled off one side and it covered the candle wick. I had to melt the wax around the wick for a while in order for it to light. It can not be gifted anymore, but I do like the scent. It's smell of citrus scent and last long in my kitchen. I love all the Yankee candles; especially this scent in my kitchen. It keeps my kitchen smell fresh and odor-free

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: jason ryan
review: I like the smell, I had this candle before and had to get another one. It was more than I wanted to pay for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Trever
review: Honey Clementine smells exactly like a teenage girls room Edit: I take back what I said, once you start burning the candle is actually smells pretty good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: SMB
review: This is one of my favorite scents from Yankee Candle.  Makes you think that you're apple picking on a sunny fall day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: J. Wright
review: with a blindfold on I‚Äôd probably guess every other fruit besides pear. Smells more like vanilla than anything else, & it‚Äôs that artificial vanilla smell. disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Michelangelo
review: wish I didn't have to blast it with a torch lighter to get the sides to melt evenly, not a big deal, it's kind of fun, but probably not the best trait for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Me
review: I really liked this candle when I used it in the bathroom to cover smells, made it smell clean. However, the scent did not carry as when I used it in the living room. I would say this is a nice subtle scent for smaller spaces.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Nance
review: Nice candles for everyday use

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: cara smith
review: The candle smells great and takes a long time to run out however it was very frustrating for me since when i opened the candle box i noticed the candle was melted on one side and it melted to where all the wax was on the right side with the candle laying on its side. That is the reason im giving this 2v stars because i had to remelt it just to get to the wick to burn it and it was really hard to open.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Dan
review: Faithful Yankee candle buyer for years, haven‚Äôt bought one in awhile and the Macintosh is one of my favs. This one didn‚Äôt hold up to previous Yankee candles I‚Äôve bought. Still burns long and clean but the scent isn‚Äôt, wasn‚Äôt there.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: amber
review: I don't know if this candle was old but I almost buy Yankee candle and they make my home smell amazing but this candle no one smelled anything. I wouldn't buy again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: jose
review: I love this scent and I'm so happy I can find it on here in the winter time. It didnt seem to be as strong as I'd like but it was ok. I like these better than bath and body works because theirs smoke too much and leave black mark's on your walls.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: mary
review: I had to put it in a warm oven for a couple minutes to soften the wax so I could dig out the wick to light the candle. It arrived packed well but on it's side-not a good idea for a candle  in Arizona! But I am very happy with the size of the candle and the  strong scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Christine
review: As much as we adore winter holiday festivities, we're definitely a summertime family. So we'd love to thank Yankee Candle for coming up with an appropriate candle for us! All Is Bright smells just like citronella on a balmy August night! Love it! Seriously though, would love to see White Christmas candles back. At least something similar?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Rene
review: I always get some of these for my mom for Christmas and they always arrive packaged nice and they smell great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Ralph
review: Smells great. Buybit now... All powerful pineapple scent though... cilantro smell is barely there. A 7 minute burn generated lots of smell in 25¬≤ room

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Riq
review: This candle will literally last you months if you don‚Äôt constantly burn it. Even if you do it will still last long and the smell is amazing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Cindy Kates
review: This lemon candle does have a scent but it's more like a citronella candle than lemon. I cant review the longevity of it because I put it out due to the smell. You could gift this but make sure the person likes citronella.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: EG
review: Long lasting and the fragrance is evident but not overwhelming .. not like some candles where there is no smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: J. Solomon
review: I was hoping for something like limoncello and got something a little more lemon house cleaner - will not repurchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Steven Nikolakis
review: This candle smells so good, anytime I light it before guests come over they rave about the scent. It‚Äôs smells like citrus with a hint of sweetness that is very subtle and pleasant. I would 100% buy this again for spring/summer season

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Ironsmom
review: Nice scent... I was worried it would be too sweet but it‚Äôs not... great especially for the discounted price.  I tend to prefer the other style with the 2 or 3 wicks as they burn a little better but couldn‚Äôt pass up due to the price

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: TJ
review: I am a Yankee Candle junkie.  This candle smells like a soy candle. I just happen to not like the chemical smell of soy candles. The first 1 hour it smells like sweet lemons and then it gets bad.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Rebecca Roy
review: Purchased this... smelled it and lit it.  It smelled wonderful but once lit we never smelled it again unless we were sniffing the candle. Not sure if this is typical as I don‚Äôt buy Yankee Candles a lot but I would not recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: cady
review: I was excited when I purchased this item regardless of the high price. It arrived yesterday and I lit it but even after an hour there was no scent. I am very disappointed with this product. I would not recommend for anyone else to make the same mistake I did by purchasing this through Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: John C. Sievers
review: Great candle- smells wonderful (especially for summer) and doesnt tunnel so it lasts a long time! Stop buying crap candles and just spend the money on a nice candle like this- would recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Tara
review: My favorite scent! So happy I could find it on Amazon since it‚Äôs seasonally discontinued at Yankee Candle. I haven‚Äôt purchased one in a while so I forgot what a great quality these candles are. They burn slow and smell wonderful without being overpowering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Michael & Alicia J.
review: I've always loved this product and other scents from this company. But, I have to admit I tried to save a bit of money and ordered from another company (Our Own Candle Company) because of their price and different types of scents. Never again will I do this because now I have grey walls from the black smoke from the candles. So, if I would have stayed with what I knew, I wouldn't have had to pay to have my walls cleaned and wasted money on a cheaper product. "You get what you pay for" rings loudly for me. Thanks for the excellent product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Carrie Rector
review: Great price and quality.  I work fro. Home and the cat boxes are in the computer room that I work from so i am constantly burning candles. It's hard to find candles that are long burning and still maintain their scent,  that arent yankee candles. I was pleasantly surprised when I found yankee candles on Amazon for $13-15.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sabrina Bateman
review: I bought 3 of these candles thinking they would last a while. nope. don't waste your money on this scent. I could have bought a cheap fragrance less candle to the same effect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Magnolia
review: Hardly any scent. Not my experience with Yankee candles. Pretty color . Don‚Äôt know if would give as a gift due to poor scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Tmat360
review: The candle smelled great in the paper bag package, but it wasn't wrapped in bubble wrap or in a cardboard candle holder so the glass tumbler that held the candle was broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: cheetocheeto
review: Expensive for no reason. I can barely smell this so it's a waste of money. It's a totally weak scent. Big mistake buying this!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Joshua Berger
review: The candle, although lovely to look at, melted very quickly down the middle which caused problems in re- lighting.  The scent is good, however.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Nicole A.
review: This is a favorite scent of mine. I absolutely adore it. It's fresh and relaxing. I will buy this again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Nancy L.
review: The yellow color is beautiful and cheerful and it will burn a long time.  HOWEVER, if you are looking for fragrance you should keep looking.  The fragrance here is SOOOOOOOO subtle that it's undetectable  (which defeats the intent of a scented candle).

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smelled great when I got it out of the box. I lit the candle and it smells like old laundry detergent . The lemon scent completely disappeared . This was for the Sicilian lemon scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
