author: Amazon Customer
review: It‚Äôs smells really good and I will come back in the near future for more purchases. Candle last for a really long time. The fragrance last a really long time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: topshelfproducts
review: This candle has no scent and burns black. I have never been so disappointed in a Yankee candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: TS
review: No scent. When unlit you can kinda smell something, so I thought the scent would get stronger when I lit the candle. Nope. I even asked others in my house and they didn‚Äôt even realized a candle was lit. Disappointing since I normal get candles for half this price during Bath and Body Works sales.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sheila B
review: It's a nice light lemon scent, it actually smells like fresh squeezed lemons, one of my favorite scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Daniel koski
review: We ordered the Macintosh candle. When we got it, the initial smell was amazing. Exactly what we wanted. But by the 2nd or 3rd day the smell wasn‚Äôt there anymore? It was more faint than strong. I saw in the reviews that others were having that issue with the smell as well but I figured we‚Äôd give it a chance. Kinda disappointed in it. Gonna be trying it out in a smaller space such as a bathroom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jeff D.
review: These last a long, long time and smell great....in the beginning.  After it burned down a few inches then they lost most of their smell.  Even if you put your nose to it.  I will probably order again just because I also use them for ambiance and they last a long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sharon Kayal
review: I love this scent so much but it was melted and I‚Äôm not sure this is even salvageable, which is very disappointing because I was looking forward to burning this

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Annie
review: I absolutely love this scent! It is a refreshing and fun scent and it‚Äôs so nice to walk into my house and have this aroma fill my room after lighting my candle! I‚Äôve had many compliments from customers and colleagues. I would highly recommend this!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Supermom225
review: Was surprised at the fact that this candle had zero scent. Paying the price that I paid for Yankee Candle, I expected so much more. Instead all I got was a plain candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

review: Favorite candle. Long lasting smell. Best value Bought 6 in the last 6 months. Great gifts

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

review: This sicillian lemon is the least smelling  candle of the Yankee candle I have ever bought.  I had really high hopes and I have bribed it for hours and can‚Äôt smell it but a teeny tiny bit...so disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: jacqueline a.
review: Who doesn‚Äôt love the best candles around?!? They smell so good you want to eat it! You can even just open the top w/o lighting it & STILL scents a small area!! I even bought one for myself!! (They we‚Äôre part of a Mothers Day gift for my mother-in-law, whom I call mom! We bought our home mostly because it is across the street from her!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Jadesky

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

I have no idea what anyone else is talking about I have never been disappeared in any of them Yankee is known for good quality as they always have been when I bought them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Kesha James
review: This candle's, wick on the 3rd time bring lit, began sparkling like a sparkler on 4th if July.  I have never had this happen before with Yankee.  Window of return has closed so I trashed it.  üôÅ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

author: Alice
review: I really like the Two-wick Tumbler candles because they burn clean. There is no left over wax on the sides of the tumbler that refuses to melt. I also like the price. Great value. The fragrances are clean and fresh.clean

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Michael & Alicia J.
review: I've always loved this product and other scents from this company. But, I have to admit I tried to save a bit of money and ordered from another company (Our Own Candle Company) because of their price and different types of scents. Never again will I do this because now I have grey walls from the black smoke from the candles. So, if I would have stayed with what I knew, I wouldn't have had to pay to have my walls cleaned and wasted money on a cheaper product. "You get what you pay for" rings loudly for me. Thanks for the excellent product.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

review: I got the lemon candle and it smelled good in the jar until you burn it then it don‚Äôt smell at all! This company used to be good until the new owners and now the candles don‚Äôt smell! Down thumb what a waste of money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

review: could be more lemony, but it is quite nice and long lasting and i love the fresh color

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice

author: mommacass83
review: UPDATE: I have received the 2nd candle, and it is in good condition, so I have increased my rating and added photos of the 2nd candle. I still think the packages should have been labeled as "keep cool" or something.  Please note: the original candle did not sit out on my front porch for more than 2 minutes after it was delivered, and was already solid when I opened the package - so it definitely was melted in transit. Original review: I ordered two of these candles on Amazon, since Yankee Candle didn't seem to have it on their site anymore. Perhaps it was my mistake to order a candle during the summer, but the first of two candles arrived like this (see images). I will try melting it down and remaking it, but I wish the candle had been shipped with instructions for the carrier to keep this package cool. Oh well. It still smells great, at least lol... hopefully I will have better luck with the second candle.

author: Stephanie Keefer
review: I won't be without this!!! Thank you Amazon for keeping it going!! I LOVE LOVE LOVE this scent! Yankee nailed it with this one, please don't discontinue it!! Smells EXACTLY like maple syrup & pancakes! Spot on & I burn this all year I love it soo much & never get tired of that delicous smell! THANK YOU!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Maple Pancakes Large Jar Candle
author: Mitri
review: My parents being from upstate New York, I grew up in a household obsessed with maple.  We had to have real maple syrup on our pancakes--none of that Mrs. Butterworth's nonsense.  I inevitably became a maple connoisseur, as we discussed whether those so-called "maple" cookies were "maple-y" enough.  When I found this Maple candle, I was quite excited by the prospect but afraid to be let down.  Let me assure you--you will not be let down if you love the sweet smell of maple sugar!  Recently I forgot to put the lid back on my jar, and when I came home from work I asked my significant other, "Did you bake something?  It smells delicious."  Soon after I realized that the sweet, heavenly scent was simply wafting from the unlit, open candle.  If you're not careful, the aroma may inspire you to make one too many sweet pancakes & treats!

Iv had it for awhile so it's almost gone. Going to have to order another one soon. I get a lot of compliments when I have friends over. Smells exactly like the name.

product_title: Yankee Candle Maple Pancakes Large Jar Candle
author: CzechMeOut
review: I purchased this candle at the Yankee Candle store yesterday and decided to test it out this morning. I was extremely surprised at how accurate the scent is: it is just like smelling a yummy batch of pancakes with maple syrup. Also, this smelled up our entire home. It was placed in my bedroom and you could smell it all the way in the basement. Very strong and fragrant. Another great quality about this candle is that it has a long burning life. I let this burn from 9 AM until 10 PM today and it only used up a tiny portion of the candle. Yankee Candle is a bit expensive but well worth it, as their candles last long and are of high quality. I definitely recommend this scent, especially for the upcoming fall season! It makes me want to stay inside all day!

product_title: Yankee Candle Christmas Cookie Large Jar Candle
author: G.W.
review: The media could not be loaded. Very pleased! I bought the box of 12 candles a couple of weeks ago and it sat on the dining room table until today.  The unburned candles gave off a very pleasant aromatic scent in the dining room, just sitting there.  I finally opened the box today to give one a test. For the test, I lit the candle and placed it in a small amber glass punch bowl cup.  The candle was then placed on a shelf where I could keep an eye on it through the day.  (See picture.) I timed when I lit it (9:38am) and when it went out (2:31pm).  Elapsed time was therefore 4 hours and 53 minutes. I also took a 3-second video at about 3-1/2 hours into the test.  As you can see, there was a gentle draft in the room, but the flame was mostly protected from air currents.  I suspect that other reviewers who complain of short burn times either have the candle in a low-walled tealight holder where the flame is exposed to air currents, or place the candle in significant drafts (central heating or ac, or outdoors).  Drafty areas can dramatically shorten a candle‚Äôs burn time. The smell was rich and warm, without being too cloying.  It was a fairly faithful rendition of ‚ÄúChristmas cookies‚Äù scent, though no burning candle (or tobacco, or incense, or pine needles)  ends up smelling exactly like its original fragrance, since burning essential oils is very different from simply heating them to diffuse the oils. I‚Äôm quite happy with these candles.  Almost a 5-hour burn time and a pleasant scent ‚Äî pretty much exactly as advertised.  Based on this experience, I ordered a box of Yankee Candles patchouli tealight candles to try them out, too.

A Glade candle from a grocery store that was $3.69 , burned longer , was able to scent my entire room and quickly in addition to a more fulfilling smell. product_title: Yankee Candle Christmas Eve Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Paula
review: This is one of my favorite Christmas scents from Yankee Candle. If you're like me, and can't handle the heavy pine scents, this may be for you. The notes I get are citrus, berry, vanilla and a little bit of cinnamon. I've seen other reviewers remark that it smells like Dr. Pepper, and I definitely get that too.  But somehow all of those scents combine so well, and really just smells like Christmas to me. Everyone in my family loves when I burn this candle, too, so I make sure to always have a few on hand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Christmas Eve Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: R. A. Buss

Apparently they got bought by another company so they must not be producing them the way they used to.

ZERO ZILCH I thought it was just me. Nope the hubby and kiddo can‚Äôt smell it either and it is burning really really weird... I dont plan on using it anymore.... waste of moneyüò©

review: This is the first Yankee Candle I've bought in a long time but never had a problem with them.  This candle has absolutely zero scent!  I've let it burn for several hours thinking the oils need to just head up to release their aroma and still nothing.  Do not buy!

review: Burn is inconsistent.  One day I couldn‚Äôt keep the one wick lit.  The next day it was burning too much, big flame and melted half-way down the container.  The scent is therefore not consistent either, smelling like burnt wax when the wicks get flaming too much.  Yes I have trimmed the wick.  I will not order this again.

author: BCMueller
review: Smells great and is not overpowering as other Yankee candles have been.  When the candle starts to burn down and the wicks get lower in the glass, it‚Äôll cause soot to form on the glass. You‚Äôll have to wipe it out each time. I even trimmed the wick and soot formed nonetheless. Yankee candles are expensive, but nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Sunlight Sands Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Val
review: For 5 dollars less I got a cheerful giver candle that has so much longer burn time and smells just as good, if not better than yankee candles. Cheerful giver papa candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Sunlight Sands Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time

review: It was ok. If you just want a slightly scented clean smelling candle, this would be good.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Sunlight Sands Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Sunlight Sands Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Bona
review: I like Yankee candles and more than the scent, the glass it is in is nice and thick. I feel safe with a thicker glassed candle.  Candles have to be safe as well as smell nice to me. Rather have a mild scented candle in thick glass than a stronger scent in chintzy thin glass. Very squeamish about fires starting. YANKEE gives you both--great scent and nice thick glass. Would definitely give as a gift to candle lovers like me. I was also concerned about whether it would break in shipping but it was packaged well.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Evening Star Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time

review: Very fragrant but not overpowering. Perfect for a mid to large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Evening Star Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Angela A.
review: I've been looking for a good candle for a while now with a perfect scent and THIS IS IT! Oh and that doesn't cost $50! Haha....I've been through multiple Bath & Body Works Candles, some Tuscany Candles, some homemade Grandma's Candles....and this is, by far, the BEST! Especially this scent! It reminds me of a JimmyChoo perfume, it's on the VERGE of being musky but it's not...it's got a sweet, vanilla-ish smell to it...and yes, definitely reminds me of a starry, romantic, evening night! Definitely recommend!! I will be buying more scents like this from Yankee!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Evening Star Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Rice Milk & Honey Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time

review: This candle smells amazing when you open it, but something awful happens when it melts. Almost a sour, burning smell. Disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Rice Milk & Honey Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Yvonne

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Rice Milk & Honey Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time

review: This scent is wonderful.

The wrapping was very flimsy and box broken and tor n.  should have had bubble wrap or other suitable material.  however the candle smells heavenly.  we removed as much glass as possible and placed in another container.

product_title: Yankee Candle Classic Small Jar, Dried Lavender and Oak

product_title: Yankee Candle Classic Small Jar, Dried Lavender and Oak

product_title: Yankee Candle Classic Small Jar, Dried Lavender and Oak

product_title: Yankee Candle Classic Small Jar, Dried Lavender and Oak
author: Michael Walsh
review: Another great scent by Yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Classic Small Jar, Dried Lavender and Oak
author: Gerd Wonderstone
review: Smelled great, but the package arrived in pieces...

product_title: Yankee Candle Classic Small Jar, Dried Lavender and Oak
author: Elaine Brust
review: It is broken

product_title: Yankee Candle Classic Small Jar, Dried Lavender and Oak
author: Lisa Brunson
review: Absolutely LOVE this scent.Fills my house with such a wonderful aroma! Truly a MUST BUY!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: David S. Young
review: I don‚Äôt know why Yankee Candles chose to dramatically reduce, or at times eliminate the scent in their candles. They were reknown for consistently strong scents, that wafted throughout your home, but no longer. I purchased 20 for gifts last Christmas, and no aroma at all could be smelled in 11 of them. Too late to buy other gifts or return them. I had them wrapped and distributed. I still feel guilty. Many Companies risk quality when mass produced for Amazon. I‚Äôll never buy another, anywhere. Without vigilent quality control batch testing, a manufacturer often goes bankrupt. Amazon must educate and inspect quality measures consistently, lest they sale garbage. However, as long as it sells, they could care less.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Melissa Kelley
review: If you're a fan of vanilla cakes, ice creams, and puddings, your mouth WILL be watering from this unbelievable, orgasmic scent which fills several rooms.  It's so good I often hesitate to light the candle, knowing that it's going to TORTURE me with its delicious smell.  I think once this candle has been used up, I will definitely buy another one.  This candle alone has earned Yankee Candle a customer for life.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: J
review: Great scent that lingers hours after the candle has burnt out. Smells of caramel, brown sugar, freshly baked pastries, rich grain. Yankee Candles tend to be very hit-or-miss in my experience, and when spending so much on a candle it's important to get the right one. I've tried dozens of Yankee Candles and Salted Caramel is one of the top two or three I've experienced and one of the few I've bought more than once. Highly recommended.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: I wanted to love this candle, I really did especially since vanilla cupcake is my favorite scent. But this candle literally has no scent even when I sniff it right out of the jar I barely smell it. I can burn all day and it won't even smell in my bedroom. I wanted to love it especially since it's a large candle, but I'll stick to my Bath and Body Works candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jonesy
review: Wow, was I ever disappointed in this Yankee candle.  I use to buy these all the time and the scent was delightful and lasted throughout the entire burning of the candle.  This candle had NO scent at the beginning.  It wasn't until the last inch of the candle that any scent was noticeable and even then it was very faint.  I bought two different fragrances in this purchase and both acted the same.  Won't be spending the money on Yankee anymore.  Plenty of other candles out there that are way superior to Yankee these days.  Sorry.  Do not recommend Yankee candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: TBR
review: Despite the name of the candle, this smells like baking - a warm vanilla scent. It's absolutely wonderful to light about 20 minutes before I have my morning cup of coffee. There's just something special about the background of baking cookies while sipping coffee. My husband loves it too. Whenever he walks into room he says "that candle smells so good!" It arrived on Wednesday and I've been burning it every day. It's about half used. Not bad. Like other single-wick candles, the wax often needs to be scraped down the side otherwise a cavernous hole develops down the middle around the wick. But just a little time investment and it burns evenly. This one is a winner. If you like warm smells, dessert aromas, this is the one for you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: CindyOhCindy
review: Yankee candles are hit or miss for me but this one is a winner.  It smells like a warm creme br√ªl√©e, even when it's unlit.  I went out to run errands this afternoon and left the candle uncovered on my kitchen counter.  When I came back an hour later I walked in and immediately smelled this sweet lusciousness.  I thought my husband had lit the candle, but no, it's just so richly scented.  I'm going to order a couple more in case it's discontinued.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kim w
review: I love this French vanilla Yankee candle.  I look forward to lighting it every time I walk in my door.  It has a very comforting scent and you can smell it throughout my house.  A definite must buy!  Very happy customer!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: dustrho
review: Ordered five of these candles and four of them came this way as shown in the pictures I have attached to this review. It seems to me that these may have been subjected to extreme high heat conditions since they are so warped in shape within the glass container. No way am I able to find the wick within this wax, so I am forced to return these back to Amazon. Since this came from the Yankee company I was really expecting these to be exactly as you find them in the store, but I would wrong with that thought. Even though these seem to be a good deal especially with them being on sale the way they are, I will not buy these anymore through Amazon. I‚Äôve already asked to have a full refund on the four defective candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: IIWII
review: What an expensive disappointment from Yankee Candle! Have usually been very satisfied with the candle scents.....until this time. No scent at all upon opening the "jar", but had high hopes for burning the candle. Absolutely NO scent. Come on Yankee Candle, these aren't cheap, and now I have 4 large candles that are only going to be useful during a power outage! Reading through numerous reviews that are also stating that their candles also have no scent, even one the day after mine, it seems there might be a problem! Would be helpful if someone would read this thread of negative reviews and offered a solution!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: pourfrosting
review: Unlit, this candle smells like salted caramel. Lit, it smells like someone cooking hot pancakes with syrup. I can‚Äôt explain it ‚Äî but my whole family loooooves the smell! Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lisa J. Rief
review: After reading all the rave reviews about Yankee Candles, and loving Vanilla scented candles, I was extremely disappointed after spending $30 on a large French Vanilla Yankee candle, receiving it, lighting it, and smelling.......NOTHING. ZIP. Even when I put my nose right up to it, lit or unlit, I smell NOTHING. I usually buy the Woodwick Vanilla candles, which are phenomenal. I happened to have one stashed away, so got it out, lit it up, and the wonderful vanilla aroma filled the room, and the whole house.....along with the delightful fireplace-like crackle of a Woodwick candle. I am baffled by all the 5 star reviews, unless I just received a dud!!! Will be returning this one for sure!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: What the deuce?!
review: This candle is only good for when the lights go out. As for the vanilla scent...there isn't any. I'm really surprised because I have 2 other yankee candles right now that are very powerful. I've never had this issue with this brand. Although, this is the first time I've purchased one online. Maybe it's an online scam, like it's a regular candle and they slap on a yankee label. The other candles, that actually have a scent, I bought at Bed Bath & Beyond. Anyway, I spent $20 on nothing more than a candle to use when a storm knocks out the power. Waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: laura
review: Very very weak scent.  I was unable to smell much of anything when I opened the jar, and thought it would increase once it was lit.  It definately did not, and was not strong enough to smell when placed in a small bathroom for a couple hours.  I wish I hadn't lit it, otherwise I would have returned it.  Very disappointed, yankee candle french vanilla used to be one of my favorite scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Vicki Hartmann
review: I have been buying Yankee Candle buttercream for years now.  However, after ordering this one I noticed the scent has changed even though it is still marked buttercream.  It does not smell like buttercream at all and has a completely different scent.  It turns out Yankee Candle did change the scent.  I am very dissapointed and will not be buying this again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Beth Neilsen
review: I purchased this on Prime Day 2019 for a Christmas gift. I finally got around to opening the Yankee Candle box this week and realized that this product is defective. Not sure what I am going to do with it now. I am upset that they sent a defective product and now it is too late to return it. Warning: Be sure to open the box and examine your candle as soon as it arrives just in case it is defective and you need to return it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Vicki
review: Yankee candles have been my favorite for more than 20 years. When I saw this great price, I jumped on it!  Now I am glad I only ordered one. It smelled wonderful until it got around the midway point. Now that it is half burned, I can barely smell the fragrance unless I lean over the top and really concentrate. It has been burning on an end table right next to me for the past two hours and nothing, no fragrance. So disappointing.  This candle is still long burning as are all Yankee candles, and it does not put out an off-putting waxy odor, but I will not buy this again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Retired teacher JDM
review: I purchased this candle as a gift for my supervisor, who loves coffee in all forms.  Four months I noticed that it had been placed in the employee break room and the wick was hardly burned.  When I took the lid to see the wick, the scent almost made me sick This was a gift to my supervisor, who loves all kinds of coffee.  four months later I saw it in the employee break room.  when I took the lid off, the wick had hardly been burned and the scent almost made me sick!  It was never mentioned to me but, obviously, she did not care for it and I can understand why.  I will try to find a better one for another gift!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Karina-Oh!
review: I was expecting a "slightly damaged" product, as that's how this Yankee Candle was listed when I purchased it. It was a French Vanilla large jar candle, reduced in price from Amazon Warehouse. I figured that for the discounted price, I could deal with that. My candle arrived today, a couple of days early, which was nice. When I opened the box and inspected the contents, it was in pristine condition! The box and the protective enclosure inside was a little damaged, but that was it. So, I'm a happy camper with this purchase! I've purchased a couple of things through the warehouse and have never been disappointed, so I make it a habit to always check the warehouse before I make my purchase. Who doesn't like to save a few dollars ever now and then? As always, my Yankee Candle is highly fragranced, and I know I'm going to get good, quality burn time as well. 5 stars from me!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Andre
review: Great scent if you love birthday cake. Unfortunately everyone goes nose blind to scents after a while of being in the vicinity of a scent and after those few first glorious minutes of being in a room with this candle lit, you won't even notice the smell. That is ... until you walk out the room to so something (whether to go to the kitchen, bathroom, etc) and return to the room. Then the soothing smell of fresh birthday cake returns for a few minutes. Nose blindness is no fault of the candle. Just our stupid noses üò† Anyways I used this candle beyond what was recommended and had no issues. Do so at your own risk but I did use the candle until all the wax was nearly completely burned out. I've lit, put out, and relit this candle multiple times with no issue. So long as the bottom of the glass isn't getting hot there shouldn't be a risk of the candle and glass exploding. But then again, what do I know? Do so at your own risk but I just could not allow myself to stop using this candle once the wax reached below half. It smelled too good to waste. Also this candle is very aesthetically pleasing in a room. It blends in and the fire burning inside the glass jar just looks elegant. I recommend this candle wholeheartedly and will likely try a new scent from this company too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: ken
review: i used to buy all yankee candles particularly liked this one the scent was real nice .not anymore .i ordered this .received it i lit candle .absoluletely no scent .after 2 hours nothing . put it out .in the trash it goes cash in the trash .who the heck wants /pays for uncented candles .the whole purpose is the scent. what happened to the great yankee candles. DO NOT BUY> i certaintly will not. DO NOT RECOMMEND>>>>>

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Stephanie
review: I purchased this for My Mom's funeral. French Vanilla is her favorite. I didnt open the box til the day of. The candle was for the communion table in the sanctuary. Lit before the service started, couldnt smell even a hint of Vanilla. I dont understand how a company could push their obviously old merchandise. Always bought yankee brand. And trusted that there wouldn't be a problem. Wish I read THE REVIEWS. I see the media is blaming it on covid. LOL üòÜ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Planet West
review: First of all, I don't think men smell the "fume" background smell in this candle, from reading the reviews and hearing what my husband said about it. He thought it smelled GREAT, and he never comments on things like this!  I like the smell of it, but I also am annoyed by another smell in it, which might be the cherry in it. Did you ever use potpourri or wax all of your furniture and then turn on your gas logs, and the fumes of those two things start burning, then you call the fire dept and ask tell them you might have a gas leak in the house, then the fire dept tells you it's just your potpourri burning in the gas logs? That is the smell I'm talking about. There is a slight hint of it in this candle, which I don't like, but I'm not returning it. It still doesn't hold a..candle...to the salted caramel!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lauren
review: There was not much fragrance from this Yankee candle. I expected much more. I thought I was familiar with this brand, but this candle doesn't even fragrance a small room. It has to be burning for a while and you pretty much have to be on top of it in order to smell it at all. I was very disappointed in the quality. I admit that sometimes I burn it when I don't really care about fragrancing my home just to get rid of this thing. before burning it there was no way to tell that the scent would be so weak. if I could have returned it after I let it I would have. Pure integrity candles are superior, and even bath and body works candles were better than this one. I am officially ready to leave Yankee candle back in the 1990s.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: R. Freeman
review: Either we got a bad/defective candle somehow, or this is a knock-off.  We burned it in our medium size living room for 3 hours and smelled literally nothing.  As a test we put it in our bathroom and closed the door.  After an hour i opened the door and i could *barely* smell a little vanilla.  Definitely not normal for a Yankee Candle. Disappointed. I had heard from several people that the Yankee French vanilla was traditionally a very strong and pleasant candle scent, so something is definitely not right here!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Susan Kwon
review: This version sold here is unlike others sold in the shop. When you burn it, you see the black smoke rising off the flame. The flame dances crazy, and its shape is too sharp, narrow, and long. The rim of the jar gets black coated with too much soot. Also, the burnt/black wick particles keep falling to the warm wax while burning. I concluded this quality was not meant to be used indoor.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Consumer #X3-272
review: I was able to light the wick in seconds, and it stayed on until I blew it out. The flame rose slightly above the glass, and quite honestly I said to myself, that seems a little higher than what I expected or remembered. The candle looks acceptable on my coffee table - but listen, I wouldn‚Äôt buy this thing for spectacular looks. It is just okay. I guess it comes down to great smell, and it does smell nice. I guess an air freshener would probably be cheaper, but the candle‚Äôs light is rather calming. I like it, but it was on sale, and I probably wouldn‚Äôt pay full price for a candle in normal circumstances, but I‚Äôm glad we have it, and if the power goes out I have something to stare at.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Katy Martinez
review: I was so excited to receive this candle but upon arrival the smell was off. When I took off the lid it smelled like pancake syrup. I confirmed with family and friends that this candle smells nothing like buttercream and in fact just smells of syrup. Now, being a fan of yankee candle company for many years I am shocked to find that this formula has changed. Words just can't really describe how disappointed I am at not only the scent, but how much I spent on a candle that was suppose to bring back the sweet memories I had when lighting it. I am heartbroken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: DWilliamB
review: I purchased the large Yankee Candle jar in french vanilla, and it arrived speedily a day early. As soon as you pop the top, you instantly smell exactly what the candle has to offer. The wax stops right at the neck of the jar, so it was slightly awkward to light without a long neck lighter but I managed just fine. I have a fairly medium sized room so it took a couple minutes for the aroma to spread after I walked away, but once it did it was extremely pleasant. Turned off the light to see how well the flame lit the room on a cloudy day and I was actually pretty surprised. The illumination was faint but created a pretty nice atmosphere that was exactly what I was looking for. I definitely recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Susan
review: I was never really a "candle person" until my next door neighbor's cigarette smoke started to waif over to our side of our townhouse.  Enter Yankee Candle... One of my favorite flavors and aromas is vanilla, so of course I ordered two Vanilla Cupcake candles to not only enjoy but to try and combat the lovely flavor with the pungent odor of cigarette smoke.  It worked so I keep them burning all day, up until I go to bed for the night.  Yankee Candle is one of a kind and burns just right.  Don't get fooled with imposter candles, which I won't mention their names out here.... Just stay with Yankee and you won't go wrong!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: ELM
review: I don't know if I got a defective one or not, but it doesn't smell at all. I gave it two stars instead of one, though, because it does have excellent longevity. I'll probably put it in our emergency kit stash, as it's going to last a long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jennifer Sparks
review: When I was a kid at the mall the yankee candle stores were a great place to visit to pick out a candle that would fill your house with amazing smells! However, yankee candle now is like cable television old, outdated, and not worth the price! Even at the discount price of this candle it is a dud.  No smell, just plain hot wax burning away.  Yankee candle what happened to you? Oh well, lesson learned about listening to the reviews saying these candles sucked. On the bright side, at least I have a large power outage candle to use for years to come‚Ä¶. #do better yankee candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: I love Yankee candles. The second most bought candle I ever buy. Only because they are expensive, but they are so worth it. They really last a long time and will permeate the room if you burn them long enough. I accidentally left a pumpkin one burning for two days in the back of our house. That room smelled lovely for weeks and weeks. If you get yours and the packaging has residue all over it, just wash the candle and lid off and it's fine. I don't know how it happened, but I don't mind. I really only was concerned about the cats so I put the box away from them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: rodney thomas
review: So sad and disappointed. My 86 yo Mother asked me to use her recent Amazon birthday gift card to buy her some of those "good & strong" scented Yankee candles. I bought her 2 ... the Honey Clementine one was acceptable but this one ... the Vanilla Cupcake has almost ZERO SCENT. The worse part is that she especially enjoys the Vanilla scent. I'm not sure if it's an Amazon problem with an old candle or a Yankee Candle problem but this one was a total waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Reid
review: This candle has no scent! I won't buy another yankee candle. They are expensive garbage. Choose another brand and read the reviews before buying, I didn't because of yankee candles rep. As far as I am concerned, that reputation is ill deserved.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: Look at how this item was received.  Completely damaged and useless.  Amazon has deleted several of my reviews for this product that included pictures of this item (which I will include again).  This is a defective product and I will also leave negative feedback about the seller and AMAZON who has REFUSED TO REFUND!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Forever and Always
review: I'm not sure if these are genuine yankee candles or just old but they seem very inconsistent in the condition they arrive in. This particular candle arrived with one side kinda melted and the oil had leaked out all over the jar and lid. We were able to salvage it but please keep in mind it will be a case by case with the condition of these candles. The scent is lovely. It smells just like chocolate. I do find that it's detectable in a large room but not to the extend I'd like it to be. They also don't last very long for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: SUE-ELLEN DAVISON
review: Yankee Candle's primary claim to fame was always their marvelous scents. This Salted Caramel "scented" candle has none. The only scent you'll detect is if you stick your nose into the jar before lighting. Yes, there's a scent there, but no matter how long you burn it, you're never going to get to enjoy Salted Caramel or any other scent wafting about your room. It's just not there. And yes, my sense of smell is still good, thank you for asking. Also, the Yankee Candle makers, like all candle makers, used to know how to gauge the thickness of their wicks so that they burned down at the same rate that the wax melted. The company has stopped concerning themselves with that nicety since they've decided it's really their customers' job to constantly trim the wicks. If you overlook that, next thing you know, a six-inch flame will be shooting out of the jar threatening to crack it and/or set your curtains or something else on fire. Yankee Candle has evidently lost interest in selling a quality product. That might be all right if they had the decency to reduce their prices accordingly because their new product is  only worth the price of the jar. That, at least, can be used for something. I've loved Yankee Candles for more than 40 years, but now I'm looking for a candle maker who still knows how to make candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Bree
review: this is the crappiest candle i‚Äôve ever gotten. i‚Äôve used other candles in this scent and they were very powerful. i let this candle burn for over 4 hours and it still give off any kind of scent. this i have no idea how they have so many good reviews on this scent. maybe i got a really bad batch but i will NEVER IN LIFE PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY AGAIN!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Justine
review: Even thought this candle lasts for a very long time, the scent is not very strong. I keep this candle in my bedroom, and I usually keep my bedroom door closed. Normally, the smell of most candles will envelope my room and my roommates will compliment the smell when they pass by, however, there is no smell wafting or emanating from my room with this candle. Also, since there is only one wick in this candle, it melted unevenly. It was kind of unsightly to look at. I tried hard to even out the candle but scraping the unmelted wax off, but sometimes it wouldn‚Äôt budge. Overall, I don‚Äôt recommend this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Marina
review: I was skeptical after reading some of the reviews about the Yankee Candles not being authentic on Amazon, but figured I would try them since it was on sale. I wasn‚Äôt the biggest fan of this particular scent (Salted Caramel)  and it wasn‚Äôt very strong like some of them are. It did take a long time to burn which is something I appreciate since candles are so expensive. If you like the scent and prefer something more mild in terms of potency, I would recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Matt Wallenstein
review: I like to burn candles in my apartment because I find that freshening sprays don't always last as long as I would like, and incense is just too strong and invasive for me to want to use it consistently. Yankee's salted caramel scent is probably my favorite one so far. It is extremely sweet-smelling as you would expect, but it is not sickeningly sweet like I was worried it would be. It almost reminds me of bread baking or fresh cookies. It is a very warm and soothing smell that I would not necessarily describe as subtle because it will definitely fill up a room, but it is not overpowering and becomes part of the scenery. I got the Bahama Breeze scent along with this, and while I like that one, the scent is not nearly as strong as this one and is much less noticeable. I would be cautious of giving this as a gift to someone because I could see some thinking it is overly sweet. I don't think it is, but I like sweet scents so I may have a higher tolerance than some people. On the same token, I definitely recommend trying this for yourself, it's definitely a treat and will make you feel cozy the whole time it's burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Sam
review: I'm used to Bath and Body Works candles and have always heard that Yankee is basically the best brand out there, so I thought I would try the vanilla cupcake one. I can hardly smell anything when it's lit! Bath and Body Works candles fill up my entire apartment, this Yankee one does nothing. I might as well bought a cheap dollar store candle because it's about the same.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Joe C
review: I have bought French Vanilla Yankee Candles for years. I have multiple candles going constantly. I love the way it makes my home smell. I get lots of compliments. Due to C-19 the store I get them from is closed. I ordered 6 candles through Amazon Services. I am currently burning two. They are either knock offs or rejects!  GUARANTEED!  I did a test. I started two candles in my home and worked outside for three hours. I came back into house and could barely smell anything. Something is wrong with these candles. Amending two weeks afternoon burning. These candles suck and provide no scent. Total rip off.  Do not buy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: EricaSim
review: This candle, while it smells great on cold sniff, once burning, it has no scent throw whatsoever. Sadly, I find this to be true all too often with most Yankee Candles. I am not sure what happened to Yankee, because one of their candles used to have the ability to permeate my entire apartment, easily. That just isn't the case with this candle. I can only smell it when and if I put my face directly over it, and even then it isn't a strong scent. It definitely isn't worth the $25 price tag. I wouldn't buy this one again. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Molly S.
review: I have ordered many Yankee Candles from Amazon. The first thing I do when I get one is open the lid and take a big whiff. I'm always happy until this time. The only smell I got was unscented wax. Very disappointing. I like to light a candle at night and this one was listed at a good price, plus I've used this fragrance many, many times before. I know exactly what it smells like. The jar I got was nothing but unscented wax. Too bad. I was really looking forward to burning it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: DFB
review: Very disappointed in the Yankee Candle. There is nothing more frustrating than spending a good chunk of money on a candle that can't send out a fragrance (not even in the room that it's  placed in). The scent throw is very poor. The cold scent is also weak. My husband bought 5 Yankee Candles from Amazon.  Two Vanilla Cupcake, which is the worst of them. Two Spiced Pumpkin, which has a strong cold scent, but again little scent throw when lit. And the 5th candle, called Home Sweet Home, we haven't yet burned. Hopefully, results will be better. I guess Yankee Candle Co. has switched production materials since I last had their candle (it's been a long time).  I've been buying other candle brands & I love using wax melts. Even Thompson wax melts, that I buy from Tractor Supply (and are carried at independent country stores) are WAY better then this Vanilla Cupcake candle from Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: jspears
review: I usually buy the standard vanilla but my husband ordered the vanilla cupcake.  I came home one day and thought for sure he was baking something good to eat.  To my disappointment, it was just the candle.  But wow, the Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Vanilla Cupcake has a great scent and might be my new favorite. And of course, its hard to beat the longevity that you get out of the Yankee candle compared to the store candles.  They are definitely worth the extra money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Cat Daddy
review: It completely melted and turned solid again rendering it useless. I wasn‚Äôt home when it arrived but my roommate was so I KNOW it wasn‚Äôt because we left it out too long. (Her dog is an alarm and let‚Äôs us know when people come on our porch). I‚Äôm disappointed and returning. I love the smell so much that I want to get another but I don‚Äôt want the same thing to happen.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: SS
review: Hate it! Absolutely hate the smell. It smells like acrid, heavily burnt maple syrup. Not pleasant maple syrup but burnt in a bad way. There is also a weirdly spicy, musty undertone or quality to it that I can't quite explain. Whatever it is, the candle does NOT smell like creme brul√©e as someone else here claimed. Its cloying, heavily charred, burnt maple stench just sticks to the back of the throat like mad medicine. Plus, unlike some Yankee Candles, the stench is STRONG and lingers, so there is no escaping it before for quite a while afterwards. Even my poor dog's fur smelled of it for days. (Why are bad fragrances or aromas always the strongest or last forever?) Don't get me wrong, I like sweet, foody, gourmand-scented candles, but this one is dreadful. I should have bought Yankee Candle's Vanilla Cupcake again instead because that one is delicious, not obnoxiously cloying.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: coljpm
review: Yankee Candle has got it right! Triple boxed to protect their product and your purchase. These are great candles and I have buying them for years. They last a long time (of course depending on how long you burn them). I highly recommend Yankee Candle! Of course for the ladies: nice mellow fragrance, suttle glow for those romantic evenings. You'll look beautiful bathed in its flickering light. Gents: if you don't have one of these for those romantic evenings you came unprepared.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ruby K.
review: I have bought this candle several times but this time there just is barely any fragrance????? I normally buy from Kohl‚Äôs or Marshall‚Äôs or even Home Goods but this has been the worst Yankee Candle ever. I wasted my money - Generally always happy with Yankee Candle products and have Never had a complaint so this is a first.Update, Amazon replaced my item and refunded my money back! How awesome is that!  As I said I am a faithful Yankee Candle Girl  and I remain a buyer to this day and haven‚Äôt had a bad experience since and have purchased dozen‚Äôs of candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Michele F
review: I've been a big fan of Yankee Candles for many years. Vanilla cupcake is one of my favorite scents. If I baked, this is what my house would smell like. It definitely fills the room with a yummy vanilla aroma. Several years ago, I learned from a Yankee Candle store employee that the multi wick candles give off a stronger aroma than the single wick candles, so this is the only style of candle I'll buy. It arrived well packaged to guard against damage.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: TallyKatBird
review: I love, love, love a Yankee candle. I was soooo excited to get this scent bc it's literally my favorite. For some reason though this particular candle doesn't smell at all when it burns. You can smell it faintly when it's not burning, but I let it burn for over 2 hours and smelled nothing. I even asked my daughter and husband and even when you stand over top it, while burning....nothing. I've had many Yankee candles and even the mildly scented candles give off much more scent than this one. I'm thinking the candle is maybe just old, hence the price. So disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lanie
review: I question whether or not this is authentic Yankee Candle brand or a cheap knock off labeled and being sold as Yankee Candle.  I keep the wicks trimmed on all my candles and even doing that, the scent throw with this one can only be described as very weak.  It was used in a 12 x 12 bedroom so it should have filled the room with vanilla scent and it just didn't deliver.  I bought this one because it was $9.00 cheaper here than company's website so I thought it would be a good deal.  The Walmart brand vanilla bean throws more scent than this candle did.  I love French Vanilla Yankee Candles but am on the fence whether or not this one is authentic so I won't be buying it here again.  Very disappointed in this purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Barbara Schallick
review: After burning this candle it turned our filter in the AC Black!!! Had the same candle burning at office removed the filter to check it and it was also Black!! Just wanted to let everyone know!! Always burn Yankee Candles, and religiously change our filter every 30 days!! This is the first time this has happened, so it must just be this particular candle!! Smelled Great, but freaked me out when I saw the soot that came from it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: ChristiGrace
review: One of our all time favorite Yankee scents. Warm cozy Vanilla scent with good throw. I highly recommend this candle as well as the use of a Yankee Candle Illuma ring lid with these candles it helps them burn so much cleaner and using every drop let's you enjoy it that much longer! The Illuma lids are both pretty and functional, and can be purchased very reasonably during Yankees clearance sales. Enjoy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jane H
review: The scent of this candle is really good. However, this is what I have noticed. When burned in a smaller room, such as a bedroom, I find it to be overwhelming and just can not let it burn. When burned in a larger, more open area such as open floor plan kitchen/dining room/family room area, it's perfect. Bit of a scent, but not overpowering. So I will say I do like this candle, and would buy it again, but only burn it in a larger more open area of the house.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: Using this candle made me sick. It has some sort of toxic irritant in it. Within a day of burning it my sinuses were clogged & I started becoming sick. This was not normal. After airing out the house and recovering I tried the candle again and realized it was the source of the issue as I started becoming sick again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Josephine Marshall
review: This candle has no scent. I kept wondering for two days why My eyes were burning.  I realized that it was the candle. I am shocked that yankee candle would put out such a Piece of junk. I paid good money for it and it is in the garbage

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Maureen  Spaziani
review: I love Yankee candles and the next order I made for village candles was a huge mistake! The pics looked so much like Yankee that I accidentally ordered 4 of the "look a likes " just received them yesterday and what a let down.  Nothing like Yankee and I've tried to burn 2 of the 4 I ordered and absolutely no scent at all!  I was misled by the fact that I thought it was Yankee, but they are not worth ever spending money on if you're hoping for some scent.  Just wicks burning without any scent.  I will be more careful in the future and I only made the mistake since I noticed that the bottle looked exactly like Yankee.  Too bad I ordered 4 of them! I wouldn't even ever give as a gift since they are junk. Sorry to be so honest and blunt.  I'll most likely go to the local Yankee shop at the mall for future candles since I use them quite a bit

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: kim tindell
review: This review is for the salted caramel candle.  Before I even got it out of the box I could smell it.  Couldn't wait to light it!  It has a great throw and burns evenly.  Smells just like caramel.  Warm and cozy scent. This review is for the Vanilla cupcake.  Bought the large tumbler.  Has almost no throw.  Disappointing.  Would not buy this one again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jcar4
review: Well, I gots a stink problem in me home. I farts a lot, and they doesn‚Äôt smell good. But this here candle by Yankee smells good! In fact smells so good that you wants to eat it! It turns me stinky fart house into a lovely smelling vanilla bakery! I ain‚Äôt kidding neither! So I gots to recommend this here candle as must have! I‚Äôm ah hoping this company comes out with a fried pie scent, for me that‚Äôs the best scent you could have.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Marcia
review: One of my candles were defective.  It was melted and the top seal was cracked.  I have never had this issue before and I have bought numerous Yankee candles from Amazon.  The other candle I bought with the same order was fine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jessie Lee
review: I love Yankee candles but they are so expensive that I never get to buy any. So I was super excited when I found this French vanilla yankee candle on sale. The candle smells good but the scent isn‚Äôt as strong as it should be for a Yankee candle. For that I wasn‚Äôt impressed and probably won‚Äôt buy this scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kindle Customer
review: I have lots of favorites from Yankee candle and this one is on my list. I love balsam for Christmas and lots of others but this is my go to fall fragrance. This is a such a welcoming and cozy scent for me. My entire house smells like cool crisp fall air and leaves . I like to purchase from Amazon and not have to travel to the store which is about an hour away. Delivery is always fast and price is great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: MrsBee
review: I got the vanilla cupcake scent as a gift for someone. I ended up keeping it‚Äînot because I liked it that much. The scent is disappointing. I don‚Äôt know about you, but to my nose, ‚Äúvanilla cupcake‚Äù suggests sweet vanilla with warm sugary notes and a hint of buttery goodness. This is not that. This is no cupcake, all vanilla, and a generic, slightly weak vanilla at that. That‚Äôs a nice-looking cupcake on the label, though. I guess that‚Äôs where the cupcake part comes in...oh, well.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Gee Kim
review: This is supposed to be review of the products but I would like to point out how impressive the packaging was. I live in overseas military address and I had a bad luck ordering glass container products. However, these are packaged from the factory. Order 6 jars and received within two weeks in a great condition. Well packaged but lots of cardboard trashes ( can‚Äôt complain, it got here safe!!) I am very happy with the products!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Terry Cee
review: I used to absolutely love Yankee candles. But I've found that my recent purchases of their candles were very disappointing. "Christmas Cookie" was my favorite! I would get 10 of them every December.  But now every one  of them that I have purchased have no scent! What happened? I will stick with my favorite Homeworx candles  and the few Bath and Body candles ( Pumpkin Apple is my favorite. Very strong throw) for now.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: C and K Sayi
review: For an Amazon product and the price, this candle is AMAZING. The scent isn‚Äôt over-bearing, but it‚Äôs also just enough. It perfectly filled our 3 bedroom house with one candle, within 30 mins of burning. It lasted about 6 days burning nonstop (probably would have lasted about 2 weeks if we ever blew it out each night). Will be buying these from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Shing Zhang
review: The candle has no scent after the first burn. The first burn was amazing and smelled so good, and it was so disappointing to relight and smell absolutely nothing. Halfway through the candle now after many burns and there is no scent as all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Shelly
review: I searched all over the web for a chocolate candle for my husband that was made by a popular brand that I bought him years ago. Come to find out, it was discontinued so I decided to give this one a try. I am so happy I did because he likes this scent even better! You can't go wrong with yankee candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Heidi
review: I knew better than to buy a candle that I didn't smell first and I was right.  First of all, the scent is super weak so you need to keep it lit for long periods of time if you want any type of smell. Second, it didn't burn all of the wax in the container which is super irritating and wasteful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kadelia
review: I LOVE this scent so when i seen that Amazon had it, i thought YAY! Because it‚Äôs so hard to find in stores. But i don‚Äôt think the scent was all that strong like i remember it. When i bought them out the store i could have it lit all day and my whole house would smell wonderful. But i hardly smelled anything with these. I won‚Äôt purchase on here again, I‚Äôll just look for them in the stores.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Wendy Mondelli
review: We ordered 2 of the chocolate cake scented candles based on the one I already purchased from the Yankee Candle store. These were nothing like the one I already have. I could smell them before I even opened the box they were shipped in, where they were then in another box and in protective shipping cardboard with the lids on them in that 2nd box. Once opened the smell went throughout the house and was stuck to everything the candles touched (hands, clothes, counter top). I put them and the boxes in the garage after I got a severe headache (within 60 minutes) and returned them to a Kohl‚Äôs drop off center soon after. While in line the associate asked me what I had that smelled so strong and I felt bad leaving them with her to deal with, but I happily did.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: Highly suspect this is not a true Yankee Candle.  The smell is always amazing and this one has zero scent even when burning for an hour.  It‚Äôs also burned through very quickly. Highly disappointed... do NOT recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kim
review: Wasted my money :( can‚Äôt smell a thing. Yankee used to have amazing candles, not anymore. I wanted my house to smell like Christmas. I bought this one and two Christmas cookie ones and they were all disappointing . I should‚Äôve figured why they lowered the price . Extemly disappointed, I should have spent that on Christmas presents :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Marissa
review: I bought two scents in the same order (french vanilla and steamed vanilla milk) but for some reason I can't leave 2 separate reviews. The former scent is fine, not very vanilla-y though; it smells very artificial and too waxy. The latter scent is amazing though. Especially when burning, the steamed milk candle is very sweet, and reminds me of cereal milk. Would recommend the 2nd, but not the 1st.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Samuel Chase
review: This is an alright, slightly below average candle. The candle is fairly durable but what it has a pretty weak scent. I don't really smell the cafe fragrance, even if I am close to the burning candle. I think in the future, I will buy a different brand of candle that hopefully as a somewhat stronger smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Mickeylyn
review: Ahhhh... Is that a chocolate cake baking? This candle is truly everything the description says & then add extra points for the BEST fragrance wafting through surrounding rooms of the awesomeness that is chocolate! Candles have burned evenly, lasts as long as they say and are heavenly to smell when you need a boost. Please, Yankee Candle, keep this one using same formula as it's truly the BEST smelling candle I've ever used. And trust me, I've got a closet full of half used candles that should be tossed out & perhaps will now that I've found one that makes the whole house smell like something special. Bonus: no calories with this chocolate layer cake! Just pure joy! Highly recommend!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Gloria
review: Wrapped the way it should have been but something ripped in transit, it looks like, no fault of the seller. I also love the fragrance. But the very best was this candle was a decent price for Yankee Candle. Most are getting out of hand.. I went to cheaper candles lately and saw this and grabbed it right away. Thank you for the quick delivery also. I am pleased and would recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: J. Collins
review: With the Cafe‚Äô Al Fresco I guess I expected a coffee cafe outdoors scent so my mistake, but  I never expected such a sweet fragrance, which is not appealing to me at all.  I would have never ordered this had I known. I think the candle is good quality though.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: N. B.
review: I bought this hoping it would provide a calming scent to enjoy being stuck at home during the pandemic. Instead, the scent was cloying, fake, and too strong. I tried it a couple of times and ended up donating it to Goodwill. Disappointed. I would recommend the Hearth and Hand with Magnolia candle in Sugared Birch instead -- smells like a Christmas tree and is very pleasant without being overpowering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Michelle
review: Weak scent and doesn't burn evenly. These are not the same candles they once were. Yankee used to be the best and I loved them but not anymore. Disappointing purchase.  Homeworx candles are WAY better (on qvc)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Michael
review: I live in a 3-floor townhouse and within 5 minutes of this candle being lit, the house is filled with smell from this candle. Although it is salted caramel, I actually think it smells closer to maple syrup. My guests think I have been cooking pancakes all day (which nobody has ever complained about). In addition, the longevity of the candle is fantastic. I have had it lit for over 10 hours and it is not even 1/4th of the way burned out. Excited to continue lighting this all Fall!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: I purchased this and had to return it the moment I was in-store at Walmart and saw the same scent via Better Homes & Gardens (French Country Vanilla) that was 2 ounces less but worth $10.36 less than Yankee Candles!! It's literally like you're just paying for the brand! As someone who has to watch every penny, it's not reasonable to purchase a candle that I could get for $5.97 with the same scent and durability. Make smarter purchases guys. This is not it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Leticia
review: I have noticed something with these Yankee Candles after buying them for years. The newer ones with the narrow label shown in  this ad, have almost no scent. If you can find one with the older wide label you will have alot of scent.I buy them from all over...here on Amz, Ebay, etc and if you have a choice get one shown with the older wide label. There seems to be a big difference in the amount of scent. My bad for buying this one :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Arinna
review: These are on sale for a reason. They were obviously stored upside down all summer in a hot warehouse. Now all the wax is melted into the lid. No wick to be seen. A useless paperweight. I've bought candles from Amazon dozens of times. This is the first I've seen anything like this. Disappointing & a hassle to exchange. Don't waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jess B.
review: I know, I know. Yankee Candles have a high price tag. But you get what you pay for, and I have to say, this candle makes my house smell like the baking gods have smiled upon me. I've been lighting it every night for hours, and it's not even half gone after a month. Being trapped in my house through this pandemic is tough, but getting to smell this candle makes it slightly better. Yankee Candle, if you're reading this, feel free to send me more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: S. Lucyk
review: I thought this price was too good to be true, and I wish I'd stuck with my initial suspicions. The Cupcake candle I bought has zero scent throw. Even when it's right under your nose, there's no scent. I'm really irritated and will just keep this in the cabinet to use as light when a storm knocks our power out because there's no scent benefit at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Valerie Fernandez
review: This scent (which is exactly what I love) must have been on sale for $16 while the other ones were $24, so I ordered these and I‚Äôm so happy with them.  Very highly scented and lasts for a long time, considering that I keep one burning in my bathroom almost all day, every day.  I hope that‚Äôs the regular price because I‚Äôm in love with this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Brandon & Isabelle
review: Lasted us about 2 weeks. We had it in the living area of our home, which was a big space to cover (kitchen/dining/family room all in one open area). Scent was noticed and helped give a nice warm vibe. It didn't fill the whole house with the nice sweet scent, but the large common area was smelling tasty! We are new to candles, so we are not sure if 2 weeks is average lasting time for this size of candle, but we did burn it daily and for a majority of the day. Either way we loved it enough to buy another one (different scent, same size, same brand)!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ms. Anthropic
review: The ad for this candle promises a soft ivory colored candle scented like vanilla cupcake. The candle I received is a bright yellow and has no aroma at all. It also is rattling around in the jar leading me to believe it‚Äôs been sitting around the warehouse past its prime. Super disappointed in Amazon‚Äôs lack of quality control on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kd
review: I Love Yankee candles, truly a joy to own an give. Then i saw this one. Do you love chocolate? Want your home to smell like chocolate cake without all the work or calories? I light this candle everyday.  Fills your home with that comfort smell of fresh baked Yummy cake! Highly Recommend You will love it

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: LL
review: Because of the Yankee Candle brand name I was expecting a quality candle.  Sadly there was very little fragrance to fill one room, let alone the entire house.  I have a one-floor cottage.  Next time, I will purchase a Yankee Candle through their store.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ms. Beastie
review: This arrived to me along with another scent, Clean Cotton, without any problems! it‚Äôs my 2nd time and everything was perfect, just took longer than usual to get to me. I was worried they will arrive with cracks and spills again like my first Yankee Candle purchase here, I went and got 6 but they arrived severely damaged. I took another chance and I‚Äôm happy I did! very pleased with this purchase!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: David S. Lynch
review: I like the candle, but my last one has lasted many years. I am using this one the same amount, and I don't expect it will last more than 2 years. I bought another candle this year because I do like the scent, but UPS delivered it, unfortunately. They claimed they left the package "at the gate." I do not have a gate. They dropped it in the dirt at the bottom of my driveway where I almost ran over it with my car. Unacceptable!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Maggie Mack
review: C‚Äômon!! This had to be store someplace hot. Back it goes

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: shawn m.
review: Yankee candles must be going downhill. It does smell nice, but as you can see it burns terrible. Half of the candle will be wasted. So basically what you get is half the size for more money. I will probably be switching brands.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Karma caramel
review: The media could not be loaded. I can‚Äôt really smell anything and when u come up close on the candle the vanilla is chemical smelling I would of been better off buying another salted caramel candle that 1 and the vanilla cupcake when u light them it goes through the whole room but not this French vanilla candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: joe fugo
review: didnt like ! the chocolate smell was not that strong of a scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Christine Berkebile
review: I'm so sad.  In February I ordered 4 of the Salted Caramel candies intending on giving out 3 as gifts and burning one myself.  It emits absolutely no scent! I would be embarrassed to give the other 3 as gifts.  I am stuck with 4 scentless candles. Definitely not like any other Yankee candles I've had before! I'd rate it zero stars if that was possible

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: BHC
review: So in all fairness, this candle is great IF you like the scent. I ended up not being a fan of this particular scent, but the candle itself is great quality and HIGHLY scented. The jar yankee candles I‚Äôve gotten recently all smelled like nothing, this one was the only good one so it‚Äôs a bummer I don‚Äôt like the scent. But if you have smelled in store and like it, definitely worth it :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kindle Customer1
review: I was so eager to get this as I'd read several reviews-not all on Amazon- describing it as heavenly. Throw was listed as 5, meaning the fragrance would easily fill a large area. The scent is excellent but not strong at all. I wanted a candle that would scent the large open area of our home. This does not. If you like a warm fragrance reminiscent of baking you will love this as long as you dont expect it to be a strong scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Rae
review: It smells nice and lasts a decent amount of time, but you‚Äôre partially paying for the brand. You can get a candle that smells just as nice and lasts a bit longer for $5-$10 less, and if you use scented candles a lot that adds up fast. I still buy this one semi-regularly because my mom loves this brand/scent in particular and it‚Äôs an extra few dollars to make her happy, but otherwise I don‚Äôt think it would be quite worth it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: macdragonflies
review: The Yankee Candle Lg. Jar VANILLA CUPCAKE is my favorite scent. Every time you walk into the room you smell a true Vanilla scent. I promise you'll love this one! Trim the wick before lighting & it'll last right to the bottom of the jar. Lasts with nightly burning in our living room for weeks too. Look at my pic & you'll see how it glows in a dim room. It's comfy scent, if you know what I mean! Great gift to give too! UPDATE- This is the 3rd Vanilla Cupcake scent we've bought thru Amazon & ALL have been top quality. It's burned every day, just trim wick before lighting up.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: J. Barker
review: One of the other reviewers said that Yankee candles are HIT or MISS with scent.  I have to agree.  Bought 2..Autumn Wreath and French Vanilla.  Autumn, strong scent.. only burn for a couple of hours a the house smelled great...HIT.  French Vanilla..NO scent.  Standing right over the candle and nothing...MISS.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Mimi G
review: I was very disappointed by Yankee Candle.  Normally their candles are my favorite and this one smells like burned cookies.  This is not a good scent and it doesn't smell chocolatey or like a chocolate layer cake at all.  It is no longer available in stores and I understand that Yankee Candle discontinued this scent.  I purchased as a gift and also bought one for myself.  Once I lit the candle, and smelled how horrible it is, I returned the one I purchased as a gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Karol Austen
review: At first I thought that the smell wasn't long-lasting, but my the first thing my husband said when he got home yesterday was "It smells really good in here, it smells like donuts". Then I showed him the candle and he said that the smell was coming from it. The best thing is that the candle was in a different room when he first smelled it. So, it smells amazing, it really lingers, and I got a very fast shipping. Thanks Amazon and Yankee Candle!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jillian
review: I went to a friends house and while I was there I said "what are you baking?" and she's like "absolutely nothing!" I asked why her house smelt like chocolate and she showed me this candle. Not even joking it smell's exactly fresh baked brownies/chocolate cake! I immediately found the candle on amazon and bought one for myself and for my mother.
