Just as a warning, the smell is so fantastic you'll seriously want to bake something chocolate. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: elle101
review: This candle is very strong, but I love it. The smell can linger in the room for a couple days after burning. I can always depend on this scent. It tends to last a little while and I leave it burning for hours. *The one I purchased here did come covered in wax residue and was separating from the glass. I ran it under hot water and scrubbed it off with a sink sponge. Not that big of a deal, but thought to be noted.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: K.M.
review: I love Yankee Candle, but my last two purchases have been beyond disappointing.  There is no scent whatsoever.  If I stand right over the candle I get a small whiff.  It certainly doesn't fill a room with a wonderful fragrance.  I don't buy candles to watch them burn.  I want my home filled with a wonderful scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: elisa
review: i heard nothing but good things about Yankee candles so decided to try it myself. This french vanilla scent candle absolutely has no smell. It will burn all day in my room and not even the slightest smell. I won‚Äôt be buying this brand again. I tried glade candles and they will smell all rooms in my house with no problem.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Dean and Michele Hoover
review: This is NOT A YANKEE CANDLE!!!  It‚Äôs a rip off I have had several Yankee candles they all smell wonderful this literally has no smell very disappointed!!üëéüëéüëé

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Tango C
review: Scent is amazing! Its citrus + peach sweet in my opinion. Burns clean so far (it doesn't trigger increase in air quality in my air purifier - no black smut I see as well. Packaging is the same if you would buy directly from yankee candle website.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jeff from Sunny Florida
review: I've had other flavor candles that hardly produce a scent. This one.... WOW! A few minutes after lighting it, you can already notice the sweet scent of Chocolate Cake! Amazingly, hours after turning it off, you can still notice the scent! Big Bang for the buck! No disappointments here!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: cacomp
review: I love Yankee candles because they are fragrant, last a long time and are reliable.  This one came in a package that was very good.  A cardboard cover designed for the candle a box and then in a Amazon box.  No breakage.  Ordered two from Walmart and both were broken. no extra packing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: R. Hamatani
review: I'm on a diet and I love chocolate.  This makes me happy (without the calories) and makes me smile each time I light it.  Though it smells just like warm chocolate, it doesn't make me crave chocolate so that's kind of perfect. I light my candle before I settle in to read in the evening and it smells so good the whole time it's lit.  I'm very happy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: LG
review: I like Yankee Candles & I bought this on Prime Day for $13.99 for the large size. I love vanilla scent but Yankee Candle could certainly have made the scent much stronger. If I burn it for 4 hours I will smell a faint scent. Anything less than 4 hours you don‚Äôt get a noticeable scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: RoadGypsy
review: Salted Caramel is my go to scent in fall, winter and even early spring. This scent is not a flora, nothing against floral,  but has warm, yummy, deep caramel/coffee scent but not too sweet.  Large candle has long burn time and scent fills the foyer, kitchen and great room without being over powering. Please don't stop making this scent, it's a winner. I also purchased the SC melts, can't get enough of this scent. Will go beachy/floral in summer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: mesh
review: Yankee Candle is my favorite candle company. Beautifully designed candle jars, firm top, long lasting & wonderful scents at a good price. This was my 1st purchase of Cafe‚Äô Al Fresco. I hoped I‚Äôd love it & did. It‚Äôs like sitting a busy coffee shop or cafe all day soaking in all the luxurious scents. If this sounds good to you then you‚Äôll love this candle. I definitely recommend this scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: D. Morgan
review: Horrible scent....way too powerful and the odor itself leaves me feeling nauseated. Too expensive to throw out so I‚Äôll probably just leave it in the garage and light up there on occasion. Single worst Yankee candle I‚Äôve ever had and I do enjoy most of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Greg Miner
review: Keep in mind that when I purchased this candle it was about $13. I noticed that the price changes a lot. To me this candle is not worth $24. However smelled great and it lasted at least 3 months of moderate to heavy use. Really a warming, vanilla cakey, yummy smell. Loved it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: charT
review: I LOVE YANKEE CANDLES, BUT HATE PAYING SO MUCH. THIS CANDLE WAS THE RIGHT PRICE AND ARRIVED ON TIME, PERFECT CONDITION, AND JUST WONDERFUL. DON'T UNDERSTAND OTHERS WHO HAD PROBLEMS. EVERYTHING WENT PERFECT. PACKAGING WAS GREAT-CANDLE HAD NO BREAKS OR CRACKS. WILL ORDER MANY MORE

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Linda Narin
review: The candle and the scent are great.  When I opened the package, it appeared that the candle had melted to one side.  The wick was buried in the wax.  I had to dig out the wick and make a canal for the melted wax to drain, because the accumulating wax extinguished the flame.  It seems to be OK now, but I had to watch it, and tilt it to drain it, for the first couple of hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Cierra
review: Nice candle, but I was just looking for a different kind of vanilla scent. I think I was looking for the Christmas Cookie candle but bought this one instead. Says cupcake, but this one is more of a cheap store bought cupcake lol. It doesn‚Äôt necessarily smell bad, it just isn‚Äôt the kind of vanilla I like. PROS ‚Äî burns for a long time without giving you a headache after awhile like some candles do. Pretty big and only has one wick, so it‚Äôll definitely last a while. Better suited for bigger open areas like a living room or dining room because the fragrance could be a bit too strong for a small space like a bedroom or bathroom. CON ‚Äî none really. Just wasn‚Äôt the scent for me. Wouldn‚Äôt be fair to give a bad review for my own purchase mistake.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Timothy
review: The candle is nice, burns a long time.  Decal is easy to remove, but the scent?!?  Faint and not really vanilla...more like old play dough.  Plenty of good reviews, maybe I just got a bad batch.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Philip W.
review: I love the smell of this candle- makes my whole house smell wonderful - the first one i ordered glass was broken-- returned an had them send another one.  This one came melted an could not find the wick- let it cool down some an used a tool to dig in wax to find wick.  Really wanted to keep this candle or was not ordering another one in this middle Ga heat!  I found the wick an the wax was soft enough to shape it back close to normal as possible.  Kept it but wont order another one till winter.  Giving it 5 stars because salted caramel smells wonderful!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lovetoshopalot
review: Very pleased with the yankee candle. It truly smells wonderful and being on sale was great. Candles have gotten too expensive to burn as much as I would like. So I keep looking for ones on sale. As far as the longevity goes, I don‚Äôt know, for I just received it today.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: StJean
review: Pumpkin Apple Smells better than French Vanilla. Recommend it. After a minute or so the house started smelling nice. Not easy to find candles like this, worth the price. Also try ‚Äúsmell my nuts‚Äù scented candles (yes the name is so bad, but they have great candles for the price, also smell good in short time and also the glass jar is reusable).

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Katie
review: The scent is so strong and these candles last so long. I never Knew what the fuss was about until i got A yankee candle for Christmas. It was a Christmas scent so i burned It everyday trying to get rid of it and it lasted until the end of January. I just Lit this candle about half an hour ago and the smell is already filling my house. It smells like a bakery in my house! I will Never buy another brand again and this scent will probably be ordered again and again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Rebecca Silberstein
review: First the wick was not centered so the burn was to one side and it made the glass full of black soot. The smell was not pleasant at all!  My kids thought it was yogurt flavored not coffee at all. We threw it away.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Mellie
review: I took a chance and bought myself this candle for my birthday (Buttercream scent, large jar) As I should have expected, this candle had very little scent throw. Most Yankee Candles I've bought have also had very reduced, if nonexistent scent, but I just wanted to try again. Nice looking candle and nice burn too. Too bad YC didn't add more fragrance, so it wouldn't be just another candle. Am returning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lisa Brindley
review: The product Excel is great! My favorite candles are Yankee candles, because they burn all the way down and they have the best long lasting smell. I was lucky to get this candle on the glitch deal for $10 each. If you know anything about Yankee candle you know that was an awesome deal! My candles arrived and I assumed during shipping the glass jar broke on only one of them. I kept the candle instead of returning it because it was just the top of the jar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Emilie
review: Is this a legit Yankee Candle? I have been burning this for over an hour and I cannot smell it if I am more than one foot away. Complete waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Yolo
review: I always loved Yankee Candles for their beautiful smells.  This was a lightning deal so I grabbed it.  It did not smell like anything, just a candle on my desk.  I even let it burn overnight in my room, and there was absolutely no scent in the morning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Bunny
review: Smells like it should‚Ä¶the whole box smelled like the candle should but that‚Äôs because the candle leaked out into the box. It also looks yellow and looks white in the product pictures‚Ä¶not sure what that‚Äôs about. Oh well it at least smells like it should

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Laura R.
review: That classic Yankee Candle French Vanilla. Can‚Äôt go wrong. I like to light this one during early Fall in one room, in addition to an apple scent burning in my kitchen. The mixed smells make it extra cozy, especially on those drizzly days.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kaydub
review: I have bought hundreds of Yankee candles through the years and this particular candle doesn't seem like a Yankee at all. It has no scent and burns much more quickly than usual. I would not recommend purchasing this scent at least. I will definitely not purchase in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Bobbi & Tony
review: Absolutely no scent. I have burned this candle twice now for hours at each time, on 2 separate days and can not smell anything. I can remember candles from Yankee candle shop that would make my entire house smell like I'm baking cookies. Which is what I wanted. This is not it. Wasted money, which is sad when you live on A TIGHT budget.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Angela M
review: I am not a candle person but ordered this as a gift and it's very nicely packaged.  I opened it to see how it smells and it is nice for a salted caramel candle.  I don't have much to add as I won't be the user, but it seems like a typical nicer jar candle and I know the recipient will enjoy it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Tera
review: This candle smell just like chocolate cake! I love lighting this candle every night but my only complaint is that it has a build up of wax along the sides and this is with the wick being trimmed like they suggested. For the price I would expect it to burn like my Tuscany candles.  I‚Äôm trying Village candles now and hope it burns evenly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: mbvang
review: The candle did smell like chocolate cake but it has a strange corn undertone that can't be ignored.  I'm not sure if it was a bad batch but I was dissapointed as I have been searching for a chocolate candle. Right now it's just being used as a decoration.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Gracie99
review: Love this candle scent. Ordered two, one was packed carefully in corrugated cardboard. However, the other was bubble-wrapped and came broken. It's more of a bother to return it, but we'll probably by these from Yankee Candle from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: a must read
review: The candle came with a broke sharp edge but I kept it. The fragrance does not fill my apartment - I was really hoping for a vanilla cookie fragrance but I can barely smell any - disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Adam Fogel
review: The description of the scent sounded wonderful. Tangerine and vanilla should go together very well. Sadly, this candle smells like neither and whatever this scent is supposed to be is just awful. Can‚Äôt imagine burning this all the way, will probably try to give it to someone else.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kmc
review: This was one of the worst candles I have ever purchased. Could not smell it at all. I will never buy anything from Yankee Candles again. After trying this candle, I feel like this company is completely over-rated. I basically just threw 23 bucks away...I'm completely disappointed. I should have just gone to Wal-mart.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kirsten Myers
review: We‚Äôve loved Yankee Candles for decades and always felt like they were worth paying more for due to the superior quality and fragrances. But they seem to have changed their formula recently. Buttercream was our favorite scent, but now smells like maple syrup ?? Maybe we just got a bad or old one but we probably won‚Äôt try again as the scent is pretty awful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: NurseMel2019
review: I bought the salted caramel candle and it was so amazing! The scent filled my large living room and kitchen. Smells so delicious! And it lasts forever! I honestly light this candle almost everyday for hours while I read or watch TV and it has lasted months! Definitely buying another one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: EG3891
review: While the scent is actually salted caramel when I lit this lovely candle, I can‚Äôt help but be reminded of freah pancakes and maple syrup. It‚Äôs a strong scent and filled my living room and kitchen with its aroma. I am a big Yankee Candle fan and this was a new scent that I will purchase again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Robert in Glyndon MD
review: I normally buy the Yankee Candle "Creamy Vanilla," and it's very good.  I switched and tried "French Vanilla" because it was a few dollars less.  I guess I found out why... it had zero scent.  If you want a true vanilla scent, skip the "French Vanilla" and go for the "Creamy."  No wonder it was a few dollars less.  They saved the cost of the scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: paz
review: I‚Äôm a little disappointed. Although this does smell like vanilla it‚Äôs not buttercream. I have bought a lot of buttercream yankee candles in the past and this is not it. (Update) apparently Yankee candle has changed their recipe for this candle so unless you can find an older version you won‚Äôt get that original buttercream scent. Bring back the original scent Yankee, please.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Deb
review: So disappointed- what‚Äôs the deal??? I cannot smell this unless I am within a couple Of feet. I would have thought that the cafe Al Fresco would have been a good strong scent?? I think in the future I will just order from the actual website. I am wondering if these are very old or something.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kimberly
review: My husband bought this for me for Valentine's Day, its AMAZING!!!! ‚ù§ü•∞‚ù§  It smells the whole house of thick luscious chocolate cake, you literally crave having a piece of it, if only there was cake to have! The price was high, but I'd definitely love this again. Its one of my all time favorite candles from Yankee! ‚ù§ü•∞‚ù§

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Didi
review: I live overseas due to being in the military, These candles were packed very well and arrived on a timely manner.  Even tho I am thousands of miles away from home, this candle gives me a sense of being at home.  Thank you!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: abillings
review: This is by far my favorite Vanilla scent in a candle. But unfortunately it just doesn't smell the room up very well. So it is half burned and in my closet. I could pick a bath and body works candle, or even a glade candle works better and is what I use. Maybe it was just mine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ann Marie Jordan
review: I think it was old , not the lovely smell you expect from a yankee candle. Cheap price maybe that's why.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: mary s
review: I have bought Yankee candles on sale from emails they send and they invariably gave almost no scent when I receive them, so they don't end up being a bargain at all.  I have received two of these salted caramel scented candles from Amazon so far (subscribe and save) and they retain their strong scent until the candle is burned away.  Make the whole house fragrant. Highly recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Bwetnight
review: This was bought for my mother and she loves it. Only problem is she loves the way it smells without being burned and she doesn‚Äôt want to burn it. Will be buying again so she can use the one she has and have another after the first one is gone.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: James D. Beehler
review: You walk into the house and there is a gentle fragrance (not overpowering) that fills the air.  We utilize the fireplace in the winter, have a hairy dog, and normal household cooking smells -- this candle takes care of all your concerns about any odors.  The only candle we buy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lulu
review: If I hadn't already boxed it up to return, I would attach a picture.  I took the top off the candle and it looked like it had melted in transit.  The wax was pushing up and there was no wick to be seen.  Boxed up and sent back the same day.  Will now buy Yankee Candles at Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Mark Burk
review: Delivered quickly. Smells great in my office. Easy to light and easy to put the top back on to extinguish. I managed to drop one a few inches onto a carpeted floor. It broke into pieces above the candle portion. Had to toss it. The glass is very thin, so now I know.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: A Nonymous
review: When I first saw this I was like, that‚Äôs so expensive, however; after I used it for several hours it barely melted and smelled great. I use it almost daily, for several hours and several months now and it‚Äôs still over halfway full. Other candles might last a week! I love it! Lasting so long a smells wonderful!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: ~K*Sea~
review: If you don't like strong smells, then you'l like it, and it did help my bonus room not smell like animals.  The smell itself is good, but it's not very strong.  The Chocolate Layer Cake candle is WAY better!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Carolyn Sanders
review: I purchased a large, $25, two-wick, tumbler candle in French Vanilla. I burned it for six hours on two different occasions.  Both times there was NO SCENT: Non, Nein, Niet Nahi, NO SCENT! I had always heard that Yankee Candle was the best of candle manufacturers, but it seems I heard wrong.  I will not purchase Yankee Candle products again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Stacey
review: This has got to be one of the best Yankee Candles. I think it is our 4th or 5th of the same scent. Very strong. I will say someone who did not have Prime ordered one as a gift one time and it arrived melted (Christmas in Texas). But I have not had any issues with it melting when ordered with Prime.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Art G
review: Leave it to Amazon to carry something that Walmart doesn't want to carry in their stores anymore and charges prohibitively for when ordering online... French Vanilla is the only candle scent worth buying. IMO

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: pamela kay adamson
review: I just wanted a good smelling candle and that is what I got!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: no
review: So i saw an article saying that people buying Yankee Candles from Amazon have no or very little scent. It was blamed on Covid...Well it is not covid because i can smell perfectly well and this Yankee candle has very little scent. So i tested and made sure by lighting a different candle from bath and body works. I was able to smell that candle perfectly. So for some reason the Yankee Candle reviews are correct by my nose.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Rich
review: Was so excited to get this candle today after everything I‚Äôve heard about it ! I can‚Äôt even light it as the wick is buried somewhere in what looks like wax that‚Äôs melted . Now it needs returned . The candle smells really good , too bad I can‚Äôt light it . Would only risk buying this if you don‚Äôt mind the hassle of return shipping !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Dawn Aleta Drawdy
review: Salted Caramel: Not only long lasting, but it's  decadent on the senses! üíó The other was damaged and Amazon promptly reimbursed me; Exceptionally excellent service as usual ‚ù£Ô∏è MERRY Christmas ‚òÉÔ∏èüå≤

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Erica L. Foster
review: Bought this for myself and my mom for her birthday. She is a ‚Äúvanilla‚Äù snob, as it is her favorite scent. She loves this candle! I am burning this candle daily, all day and am on day 5 and still have 1/2 the candle left to burn. These last way longer than the big box stores!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: C. Mathieu
review: I like these candles, but I wish they maybe had two wicks in them. It doesn't burn evenly and the scent didn't last as long as expected so halfway through the candle, it's tunneling and not as strong of a scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Duck MD
review: I love the smell of this candle. I just wish that I was able to find the wick so that I could light it. Somewhere along the line it was stored on its side and melted as you can see in the picture.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Brittany
review: Smells like chocolate tootsierolls candy! Not bad but I was expecting a more cocao scent instead. Came very well packaged. My husband enjoys the scent, it smells like burning chocolate to him. Next time I‚Äôll go for the cafe candle scent instead to see if it‚Äôs better. I love confection smelling candles since it reminds me of being in a bakery shop.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Rachael
review: This candle smells exactly like one of those caramel squares that you have to remove the plastic to eat. It stays delicious smelling the entire time and is such a rich smell.  10/10 would by again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kindle Customer
review: So thrilled to get a good large Yankee Candle with true scent - caramelized jaffa/ coffee, for my home. And,thanks Mr.Bezo for the perfect price point discount. One happier camper doing the "Riverdance" Happy Jig Dance - in my heart, these old bones and limbs are retired.üòçüòçüòçüòçüòç

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: L. Jones
review: Once the candles arrived I removed the tops to smell if the scent was potent and the candles smelled rather strong so I was hopeful these weren't duds. Once lit, the candle produced little if any scent at all. The funny thing is, I ordered 2 of them (the same scent-Vanilla Cupcake) and neither one had much scent while burning. Pretty disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Delecia
review: Yankee Candle is my favorite.  They last a long time and the scent last all the way to the last drop of wax.  A lot of candles start smelling like wax.  Not these.  And so many great scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kelsey
review: I purchased the vanilla cupcake scent. It smells great cold, but once lit has next to no throw. I have it sitting on a shelf a couple feet away from my desk, and I forget that I have it lit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Dave M.
review: Not only is this scent great, it also will fill the room.  Lots of times I can't smell the candle once I'm more than 5 feet away from it.  That's not the case here, this candle will fill my whole apartment with it's scent; but it's subtle and not overpowered.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: D
review: Amazing candle. The smell is strong. I purchased three candles. Have no complaints. They smell delicious.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Earthmoving
review: It doesn‚Äôt smell as the ones I buy at the store, the scent it‚Äôs so subtle and doesn‚Äôt linger as the other I have from store. Perhaps is fake? I don‚Äôt know, but I‚Äôll no but anymore from here.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jean Kulp
review: This jar candle has a great smell. It lasts a long time, and you can smell it through the house. I am so glad I bought this jar candle. I usually don‚Äôt like many jar candles this one is great. I highly recommend this scented jar candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Keeper of Time
review: If you stand over it you can smell it.  Otherwise forget it.  Yankee candles have really gone downhill.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: NL
review: I have purchased this particular scent from other places, and from Yankee Candle directly. This candle is a let down. I'm having a hard time believing that it is authentic. The scent is very weak.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: kate
review: I always buy this size jar and with 2 wicks now.  Easier to trim the wicks than narrower jar.  These  last longer than cheaper brands.  This scent is not as strong so it has to burn longer.  Cedar and Red Apple Wreath are stronger.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Brandi
review: I donno how there‚Äôs any good reviews for this. This candle doesn‚Äôt fill a room at all. Smells good when just smelling the candle but it doesn‚Äôt throw.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: AmazonCustomer
review: OMG this smells amazing! My husband walked in and asked me what I was baking! Sorry dude, candle for dessert tonight. It smells sweet but not overpowering, like fresh baked cookies. It does a good job filling the space of our large downstairs area with food smells and the wax lasts a long time. Good value and makes a great gift. I‚Äôll be ordering again so I can pretend the store bought cookies are homemade. Lol

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Sandy Cranston
review: I love yankee candles! The only problem I have with them, is that they smoke a lot. My ceiling has black smoke stains from them. Otherwise, this sent it wonderful! Fills the whole room with the wonderful aroma! Just wish it was smokeless.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Anita Birzer
review: Yankee Candles are so nice. The scent of each on is so unique and last so long. The do start off strong and then die down. They stay the same from the moment you first light one until the very last flicker of the wick. They are true to their scent from candle to candle as well. This is a very good line of candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jerri Hemphill
review: I love yankee candles and vanilla cupcake is my favorite. When I received my package, I had ordered 5 candles and they all arrived in the same box. I opened 1 and found it had melted severely but I tried with a candle lighter to melt it back down. It made a mess and turned the wax black. My momma said I should send it back. If if was just that one I would have let it slide. So I checked the other 4. I found 2 more the same way. These candles are not cheap and should not arrive in such a shape as they did. I would like them to either be replaced or refund me my money. Thank you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Hala
review: It smells amazing, it just isn't that strong to really fill the room up. It leaves a slight scent that isn't too overpowering, but it isn't as strong as I would like. I wish it were stronger because it does smell amazing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Elisa A
review: Love! I burn it in my kitchen and the whole place smells like a warm coffee and pastry shop. Also kind of smells like Creme Brulee. It is burning quite fast...but maybe this is because I let it burn for hours on end.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: pamela Persinger
review: So disappointed. I always purchase yankee candies because they are highly scented. This candle has no scent at all when lit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: I have bought several yankee candles over the years and have always had pleasant scents, not overwhelming,  and the are clean burning.  Yankee candle gives you  a quality product

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: 5(me)ly
review: Ordered for a son who is a fan of everything vanilla. We were greatly disappointed with this Yankee. Surprisingly weak scent, barely noticeable after hours of burn. I would rate the scent strength 2 out of 5. The most fragrant from our large collection of Yankees so far were Caramel and Chocolate Layer Cake. Will never buy this  scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Isaac Pelott
review: Yankee is so good, but this makes you area warm, relaxing and just gives a chill vibe....love it. So good üëç light this and pumpkin spice or the apple cider üòçü§îüòã...so niiiice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Steerfork
review: The salted caramel scent smells amazing! It smells just like what you expect. The scent smells up my whole apartment and will hit you at soon as you walk through the door. It also has longevity instead of the 3-wick candles I use to buy a B&BW that wouldn‚Äôt last no time. This candle does!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: JAMES B HARRIS
review: I purchased the French Vanilla, Salted Caramel & the Chocolate Layer Cake.  All smell great but the Chocolate Layer Cake makes me want to eat.  It smells like a delicious cake baking.  First time purchasing Yankee Candles & I have to admit, they are the best.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Mlea5678
review: Smells like play dough. Bummer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Westie
review: I have purchased Yankee Candles for years and been very satisfied.  However, I think they forgot to add the french vanilla scent to this candle.  It smells like....nothing!  And the same candle in years past has smelled great, so I don't know what happened to this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ren√© Utz-Pianos
review: Siempre apost√© a esta marca de velas, ten√≠an prefiri√≥ y su aroma estupendo. Todo se fue, el frasco abierto huele bien. Pero una vez encendida la vela, final del aroma.  Gran chasco. Pruebe otra marca

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: H. Longley
review: Smells exactly like chocolate cake! We love this and order whenever we can find it. Why I‚Äôm the world would they retire this scent? It‚Äôs a must have and perfect for every season and occasion.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: PJW
review: Yankee candles are high-quality candles. The caramel scent of this candle is delicious. I find it's best to burn for 1 hour...After that, it can get a bit overpowering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Bobbi F.
review: Very disapointed in the scent of this Yankee Candle Vanilla Cupcake. This is the second of Vanilla Cupcake I ordered in just one months' time. The first one ordered in December 2020 had a wonderful aroma while burning, that lasted throughout 30 days. However this second Vanilla Cupcake candle, while burning, has almost no aroma at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Fast Eddie
review: Great scent. Unfortunately, like another Yankee candle of mine, it began tunneling, so even draining wax it will soon drown before its time. Yankee has gone cheap with their wicks. So I bought proper size wicks to transplant, so the candle doesn't go to waste.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: theBruinette
review: I love vanilla, sugar cookie, frosting etc. smelling candles and this candle takes the cake (no pun intended)! It smells decadent‚Äîi could smell the sugary vanilla goodness through the box before I opened it! Would definitely recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Maribug971
review: Love, love, love the scent of this candle and look forward to many hours of burning it.  I was, however, disappointed that when it arrived, the glass was cracked just under the lid.  I didn't find any loose shards of glass in the packing material, so it makes me wonder if it wasn't shipped to me in this condition.  The damage won't impact how the wax burns, though, so I decided not to return it and will keep it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Seth
review: Great candle. Smells great and these last forever! My only issue was in shipping it seems to have melted and made a mess on the packaging but Amazon was quick to replace it! No issue otherwise! Smells like a chocolate cake!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: cindy
review: Not a very strong scent. I like the smell but doesn‚Äôt seem to be as well as I like them

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Rose Marie Bonilla
review: Love the scent of the candle but no thought was given on packaging.  The candle was shipped to be on it's side and so it melted and buried the wick. I had to carve out quite a bit of the soft candle(it was still soft from the heat of the current weather) and have tried lighting candle and moving it so that melted wax will drip into the side of container that is missing the wax. This is going to take a lot of time. Very dissappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Pattilyne B
review: I've loved Yankee Candles for many years and they haven't changed. I only wish they had the scents I liked before. Since COVID its been hard to find a lot of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Holly McClain
review: I usually love Yankee Candles. I also like coconut and vanilla bean, BUT these do NOT smell like coconut and/or vanilla bean.  I really cannot describe the fragrance, but it's not good. I kept them because I had opened them and used them. DO NOT BUY.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Helen cirignano
review: I was so excited to see this discontinued scented candle available....well sadly it does NOT smell like the original as I remember.I really don't know why, Although the label is different.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: P. Hayes
review: This candle is great! I love Yankee Candles and this one is one of my favorites but was unavailable on their site so i was so excited when i found it on Amazon. It is delightful and i have already started using it. I had given up on ever being able to have one in this fragrance and then lo and behold I found it...it just proves what I tell friends..."if it exists Amazon will have it on their site! "

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Patrick
review: typically not a problem, but the scent from this candle is very strong.. It lingers around too, for almost 2 fulls days I was smelling Salted Caramel. I used in a smaller room so results might be different in a large open area.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Phat Tater
review: From day one it had no scent, the candle is right next to me and I still can't smell it. I purchased a YC because I have always heard that they are great candles for the best value. I don't blow out my candle I smother it with the top. I normally use mist automatic airfreshner like glade or airwick but it was getting expensive, so I figured I'd just get a candle. Boy am I disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Father of six
review: Beautify jar and wax color but no smell.  What happened to Yankee Candles?  They used to smell great. Now, nearly nothing.  I'll be looking elsewhere for candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Suzanne Flanderka
review: This is a great candle. The smell  penetrates the whole house. When people walk in, they think I‚Äôve been baking a chocolate cake. It makes me hungry sometimes.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ashley Edwards
review: This is the second time we‚Äôve gotten this scent and we love it. We‚Äôve actually almost burned through it already. Lasted a little over a month with burning every day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amy Swanson
review: My boyfriend's favorite scent is Vanilla, I buy him this candle every year for Christmas like clockwork. You can definitely smell the vanilla without it being too overpowering. I love this brand and prefer it among all others although  I love the fruity scents more. Will definitely be buying again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Suzanne Russell
review: It smells good when I stick my nose to the wax but does not fill up the room at all. In fact, I can‚Äôt really smell it while it‚Äôs burning. It‚Äôs disappointing, and I would not buy it again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Scott S
review: Arrived on time, undamaged. Smells amazing and for the price..cant go wrong.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Smitty
review: I buy Yankee candles every year for family and friends so much so that they now count on receiving them!!! Great for hiding orders or bringing a beautiful scent to your home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: DonBarb
review: I like Yankee candles, they usually have a great smell and it laughs but this one that I bought the vanilla cupcake smell was very light and not strong enough.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Heidi
review: I just love the scent of this candle it lasts and lasts and lasts and you don't even have to light it you can just take the cover off and your whole house will smell like the scent of fresh baked cookies or butter but definitely of something homemade baking

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: Found this on prime day and ordered it for a sweetest day gift for my wife. Candle looked like it had melted. The top was slanted and there was wax on half of the lid. The outside of the glass was partially coated with wax. There was no seal on the lid, causing me to wonder if this was returned and then resold as new? If the candle had been stored in an upright position, I think this would not have happened. At any rate, I don't think I will be purchasing any more Yankee Candles from Amazon!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Sheri Jones
review: the scent is really weak. I burned the candle in a small room all day and the smell was barely observable. I will not buy it again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jillian
review: When I got this candle I immediately took the lid off. My whole house smelled amazing before i even lit it. It has such a yummy scent. This is definitely one of my favorite Yankee candles and i have quite a few. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: dianamartinez2515
review: The media could not be loaded. This is honestly my favorite scent from Yankee candle it smells like vanilla but is not over whelming or fake smelling. I had this scent for my car and I am happy to now how this scent for my house to smell. Honestly if you into vanilla I recommend this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Avid reader
review: I was a little hesitant to purchase a scented candle without a "sniff test". I needn't have worried as Yankee Candle is the standard-bearer when it comes to scented candles. Very happy with the purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Mick
review: It smells good the only thing is that during shipping or something the candle heated enough to reform in the jar. It was actually cold out the day it was delivered so idk. But I dug the wick out and lit it and it‚Äôs fine

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Cheryl in TN
review: This is the 2nd Yankee candle I have purchased on Amazon that had no scent at all. I bought this same scent a few months ago and loved it. Very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: LGREEN
review: I‚Äôve purchased this brand and scent of Yankee Candle, French Vanilla, many times and am disappointed that this one smells so faintly. Nobody likes to be overpowered by a scent but this one is barely distinguishable even with my nose almost in the wax. I‚Äôm not sure if this is a brand change or if this is an old candle but it isn‚Äôt what I am accustomed to or what I expected.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: STEPHANIE DESCHENES
review: I love these candles. They are perfect.  The candle itself was packaged very well and had a safe travel. Other candle makers can learn from their packaging skills.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Patricia
review: Great customer service.  Instantly!  I‚Äôll buy my candles from them from here on out.  Customer service is sometimes more important than the product.  But they also sell YANKEE CANDLES!  My fav!  Thanks for helping me with my questions and concerns. You put my worries to rest

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ohkellygirl
review: I know how to burn candles...light, get a full melt pool before extinguishing.  Not with with brand...I have a huge tunnel right down the middle of the jar. Complete waste of money. I‚Äôll stick to Village Candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Susan
review: I‚Äôve been ordering many yankee candles lately and I‚Äôve been disappointed in the strength of the scent of most of them. But this one is delicious! By far my favorite. It really does smell like real caramel and makes my whole living room smell delicious. Also, great price!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ryan J
review: Smells good, doesn‚Äôt last very long if you‚Äôre the type to actually use the wick instead of heating lamp and keep candles on for longer periods of time. Used this all up in about a week and a half. Not down to drop $40 on a candle once a week so I reverted to plug-in scents. Might buy from time to time. Recommend if you like sweet latte/mocha coffee scents vs fresh brewed black coffee

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jo J.
review: One smell of this candle and you'll immediately associate the wonderful fragrance with Summer, whether it's a day spent at the pool, beach, carnival, water park, amusement park, etc. The scent has that beachy coconut yumminess to it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: hunnypoop
review: Yankee is the only candle I‚Äôll buy. For myself or a gift. It‚Äôs a nice true smell. They burn even. A great value for the money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: xeric gardner
review: Yankee candles used to have an intense scent.  Other reviews mentioned that they have changed for the worst.  I will not buy the Brand again.  It‚Äôs really sad.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jane Bay
review: I‚Äôm wondering where these Yankee candles came from.They do not burn like the Yankee candles I have had in the past. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs because I ordered it from Amazon in their second products or what it is but they do not burn like my normal Yankee candles always have

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Susan Newhall
review: Smells wonderful and doesn't smoke (as long as I don't let the wick get too long. I use these almost every day in my living room, around the year, using scents appropriate and desirable for the season. This brand of candle is the brand I have settled on because it I've always been pleased with the scent and the wick burns down appropriatly so the candle doesn't burn out on it's own.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: AW
review: This candle smells wonderful! I love the French Vanilla scent! The scent fills the entire downstairs area. I highly recommend Yankee Candles!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: SoloFemaleHiker
review: Large Candle, but sadly does not put out a strong scent. This brand is cheaper on Amazon than retailers. The flame starts out strong but struggles to stay lit, the more you use it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kindle Customer
review: I am so disappointed in this Vanilla Cupcake candle. It doesn't smell any different than a cheap $5.00 or $10.00 candle from Family Dollar store and being a Yankee Candle it was expensive. I'm returning it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: CF
review: No scent whatsoever. For a candle that costs this much, the scent should last longer than 1 hour. 95% of the candle still left and there is no scent. Total waste of money. Could‚Äôve bought a better, cheaper candle at the dollar store.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Customer
review: As with all candles make sure to keep the wick cut short.  This scent is so wonderful, great fall and winter candle. Yankee candles are always a great choice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: zvirbulis
review: Scent not to my liking - a sickly sweet kind of smell, like a bottle of maple syrup broke and spilled everywhere. Very strong smell, can be detected in multiple rooms. Perhaps others may like the scent, but it was too much for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Chad Johnson
review: In the past, I was never a fan of caramel scented candles, however, my wife changed my mind recently when she began burning one.  After enjoying that candle, I decided to order my own for my office (work from home) to burn.  I have not been disappointed one bit with the Salted Caramel.  It is a pleasant scent and one that makes me at times crave a little caramel (heh, go figure).

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Linda
review: I have no problem with that candle!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jamie
review: A perfect size for smaller spaces when a full size is more than needed.  The vanilla smell is authentic and smells as though i am baking and does not fade.  It burns slowly and lasts a long time so it can be used more than once.  A simple design to fit in anywhere.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: kemdee
review: Smell is fantastic but doesn‚Äôt burn well... parts of the wick fall off and get into the wax even when used as directed .. will stick to other brands ..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Priyanka
review: This is an incredibly delicious scent. It can be pretty torturous when you‚Äôre hungry. That happened to me when I lit this up in the morning when I started my work and I was hungry in just couple hours. Hahha! The throw is pretty decent. The delivery reached me pretty safely and on time so I‚Äôm glad overall.  4/5 stars coz the throw was not as incredible as I had excepted it to be. It can fill up a small room pretty quickly but may take couple hours to work it‚Äôs way up in larger spaces.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: MaggiePie
review: I guess it's hit or miss when it comes to people's reviews about the scent. It smells great and it isn't weak at all. I purchased this as a gift for a friend and I know she's going to love it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: Absolutely NOT vanilla nor cupcake more lile nothing smell and very orange color It supposed to be a light beige or creamy yellow color I will stick with bath and body or a higher end candle Highly disappointed

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Michelle Smith
review: I ordered my Yankee Candle Vanilla Cupcake Scent yesterday and received it today (great!) The only problem is that these candles purchased through Amazon doesn't have that exuberant smell of a Yankee Candle like it did in the 90's via the Yankee Candle store where I live. I don't normally pay much for candles but I liked this price...too bad...money wasted...I will stick with Bath & Body Works!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Mike
review: Candle came right on time! It smells amazing, by far one of the best smelling candles Yankee Candle has to offer. I would recommend this to any yankee candle lovers. This is the 3rd one I‚Äôve ordered just this past year! Will be buying again for sure!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: L. C.
review: Too expensive for the product. See photo to see how it arrived.  An expensive candle, thrown upside down during delivery on a hot day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Vegas123
review: Yankee candles are one of my favorite brands. However, my experience with is purchase is less than favorable. The scent is very weak. This is the first time purchasing a candle where you cannot smell the fragrance. Very disappointed, possibly an old candle or not a true Yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: circawdm
review: Great, medium strong scent. If you like vanilla scent this is for you. Will cover a large living room and then some if burned a while. I later bought the two wick model, which prevents loss of wax by "tunneling." A quality product and well worth it. You can even open the lid and put in a closet to make things smell good!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Brent Perry
review: Very good candle not too strong not too weak just perfect smell throughout the house I was able to Catch this deal when it was $12 a jar I bought two at the time because I know the price will go up, now that when it fluctuates and price goes up to $30 I think that‚Äôs just ridiculous..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: AnimeLover1116
review: The candle came perfectly fine and packaged. Smells great and always lasts me a fair while, in fact this is my second time buying it.  (I got the vanilla sent)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Juli G
review: I got this candle for about $10 less than in the store. I always stock up when I see a good price. I hope this scent never retires because it‚Äôs my absolute favorite. Think coffee and caramel and toffee. Within about ten minutes my entire downstairs smells terrific. It‚Äôs a very cozy scent with an amazing throw. Best Yankee Candle out there IMO.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jessica M. Paskowski
review: Love these! Come in a nice box that can be wrapped for gift. The scent is lovely and not harsh or overwhelming. It smells like a home cooked desert and great for people that don‚Äôt want something different to vanilla or cookie. Large lasts me a long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Steven
review: I ordered the French Vanilla and got this instead. First of all that does not look or smell like the item I ordered, which obviously it is not. Was looking forward to my candle and what a bummer. Will return and get correct one but what a hassle. Now my office will continue smelling unpleasant lol.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Yaeli
review: This candle smells justLike caramel! The reviews saying that it has no smell are simply wrong . The room smells like caramel two minutes after lighting. I will say that if you do not like too sweet of a smell this is not for you. Very rich and sweet scent. I love it !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Cathy Brooks
review: Yankee candles are always quality and consistent. The candle smells as it is named. I use it in living room near fireplace.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Christine R. Kossek
review: I got this as a gift for my sons teacher who loves cupcake secent. It smells spot on. Scent is strong but not over baring. True yankee candle that we all know and love.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: cheri
review: This is not a real Yankee Candle, it smells nothing like a real Yankee Candle and looks weird, like it‚Äôs been filled over a real candle. Awful!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: Very large fragrant candle by Yankee Candle!  The Yankee Candle has a very alluring and realistic chocolatey cake smell. It filled my heart with the delightful scent that I once knew as a child(grandmothers chocolate cake) Highly recommend this candle for anyone who loves chocolate!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Thompson

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Stormy
review: No scent to the candle. My local Hallmark closed and I thought I had found my Yankee source. The candle had absolutely NO scent at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: J. McKinney
review: It has zero smell.  Usually the smell is delicious hence why we all buy candles.  I can‚Äôt smell it at all :( wasted $20

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

review: This smells soooo good. Perfect fall scent. I‚Äôm gonna have to order more! It does seem to be a genuine Yankee i was skeptical ordering off Amazon but it definitely is real!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: J Bethea
review: This is great for keeping your bathroom smelling great especially when there are no windows! Would like to see this offered in a  larger jar !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla

It also would be good as a bathroom candle when you're taking a bath or wanna get rid of a bad smell. Would've been 5 stars if I actually ordered pink sands.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Buys2much

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle is a disappointment. It smells like plain wax almost like a crayon.  No scent! Maybe a knockoff of yankee? Waste of money

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ginny Williams
review: I am in love with this Salted Caramel Scented Yankee Candle. It has a cool whiff of caramel with a hint of sea salt. Warm whiff when lit it gives of the long lasting smell of warm caramel candy. It's very inviting. My whole entire house smells very tasty!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Laura
review: I love Yankee Candle but this fragrance was not at all what I was hoping for from the description.  Kind of a weird smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ciara V.
review: The lid had melted wax on it and spashed at my computer screen after I removed the lid. Please make sure that your items aren't melted before shipping out or are in need condition. This candles look used before.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Natalie R. Spencer
review: I bought this scent because I received a small salted caramel candle for Christmas and was in love with it. product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Bargnhtress

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: chloe

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Nick

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lady Hecate
review: I love this scent and burn it throughout the year.  I buy enough to keep me in stock since it is considered a seasonal scent. Not only do I bar the large jar but I also like the tarts and stock up on them during the xmas/winter months.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: OperaGaga
review: Quick delivery and love the smell! It smells very sweet if you just smell the candle itself before burning, but I think it gives off a very warm and delicious smell that‚Äôs not overly sweet once it gets going. Delicious!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: A Tringali
review: I was so excited to receive this candle it‚Äôs been a rough year and I needed a space to sit and smell something good. I was disappointed that this is how the candle came. You can see it has not been lit... See pictures... it‚Äôs so sideways it does not burn right I live 45 minutes from a post office it‚Äôs not worth returning. Just a heads up candle may be uneven and unusable

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Jennifer B.
review: Scent isn't too strong but enough for a small room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: LindaK
review: ****UPDATE**** 6/25/2020 I called Yankee Candle to express my disappointment in this candle. The CSR was a delightful woman who is replacing the horrible lemon with another fragrance at no charge. I‚Äôm upping the stars to 4 because Yankee took care of my issue without question. If this candle is ‚Äúlemon‚Äù scented, Sicilian or otherwise, then I‚Äôm a road carcass. It‚Äôs horrible! It literally smells like some kind of petroleum residue. Yankee used to make a lemon scented candle, just plain lemon, and it was an amazing ‚Äúcure‚Äù for cooking odors. This ‚ÄúSicilian Lemon‚Äù scent makes me thankful for cooking odors. Just don‚Äôt buy this!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Beth
review: Smells and looks fabulous! I‚Äôve never been disappointed with Yankee Candle! **i also ordered the black cherry. The purchase was because the color was what I wanted. Well, turns out that it has a fabulous scent when lit! It smells just like a bowl of fresh cherries!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Bailey
review: The candle smells great and makes my whole living room smell good, but the smell doesn't linger and once the candle is out the scent dissipates quickly. Nice gift idea though

author: Chelsey K.
review: The scent isn't very strong (and no, I don't have COVID). It's very nice and burns for a long time but the lemon scent is not super noticeable!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Christi Erbe
review: packaging was awesome. they really had it protected.  smell is good and great for a gift which is what I'm using it for.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: S Williams
review: So disappointed.  I expected a great lemon scent.  I get more scent from our hand soap.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Eva Garcia
review: Scent didn't smell like lemon

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: kathleen
review: I have come to the conclusion that the lemon candles do not smell nicely. I burn them for hours and I cannot even tell they are on

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Amazon Customer
review: Great lemon scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: kathy T
review: Love this Candle. It has a double wick and slow burning. Smells  amazing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Amazon Customer
review: I just got it so I can only attest to the smell and it is fabulous!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: James
review: Both of the candles I ordered came melted in the jar

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Alexis
review: Awful do not buy

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Sunwarmed Meadow Scented Candle, Medium 3-Wick, 38 Hour Burn Time

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Sunwarmed Meadow Scented Candle, Medium 3-Wick, 38 Hour Burn Time

product_title: Yankee Candle Floral Candy Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer
review: Me agrada el producto pero no su precio

product_title: Yankee Candle Floral Candy Large Jar
author: sandra brown
review: I ordered this scent ,floral candy, it‚Äôs my favorite the wax melts I usually get but can‚Äôt find them, I thought if I ordered the candle it would scent up my apartment , it doesn‚Äôt give off a smell unless it‚Äôs not burning and you put it up to your nose. I think the scent is worn and gone bad purchase wasted my money

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: FerociousNPretty
review: Not the biggest fan of the Citrus Grove scent. The woodsy undertones are not my favorite. They make it a little too musky for me; I prefer fresh, zingy and bright citrus scents. With that said, the longevity has been pretty great. Because I'm working from home, I light this candle a few hours a day and it's still going...now to get a scent I like! üòÇ

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: TRA
review: I bought this sight-unseen (scent-unsmelt?) knowing I was taking a gamble, but I was really pleasantly surprised.  This is a really balanced scent. Not too sweet, not too citrusy, not too flowery, not over-powering.  Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Kelly L
review: I bought four of these new Yankee Candle candles and generally speaking they far too sweet smelling for my liking. I bought this scent as my "fresh" option. I love citrus scents, but you can hardly smell it. It smells much more like lemon tree flowers (kind of like honeysuckles) and it has this underlying sweet smell. On the plus side, if you like the scent, these candles will last you a LONG time. I burn them for several hours at a time and the wax has barely gone down at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: raincow
review: This is by far my all-time favorite candle scent. It can make any space smell fresh, clean, and bright. I really detest room air freshener scents, but this one passes the smell test for me.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: AM
review: Not a strong fragrance like other yankee candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: QAmidala29
review: Usually the stronger candles don't smell once you light them but this is strong all the time. Highly recommend for houses with pets.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Dawn D.
review: Not liking the scent of this one. Medicinal maybe?  It does have a pretty good throw (unfortunately) but the scent of citrus is off. Too bad.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Jeremy T.
review: This is the perfect size candle for gifting. The tall cube glass container presents very well and overall fits in many decorative settings. As always the Yankee candle scent was right on target.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Guitard
review: It‚Äôs definitely a nice candle a little light  as far as scent goes but overall good candle

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time

review: Clean burning, great smelling, well priced, long lasting candle. Would buy again in a heartbeat.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: StephHasTrips
review: Loved this candle! Just wish, of course, they lasted longer. Time burning was what was expected. Loved the scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Citrus Grove Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time

author: CJ
review: The candle burns well, like all Yankee candles. However, the scent was so subtle that I could only catch the faintest scent even after burning it for a couple hours. Compared to another Yankee candle I tested afterward, this one was incredibly disappointing. I would suggest trying another brand if you are looking for a good candy cane scented candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Candy Cane Lane Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Gypsy Lore
review: Has zero scent. What a ridiculous price for something like this. I would not recommend at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Candy Cane Lane Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time

review: This is my favorite event all year around. This candle, however, has virtually NO scent compared to my others (of the same scent). Is it old or what? Might as well toss it really

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Candy Cane Lane Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: J. Rollins
review: The Yankee Candle is a pleasant addition to my southern home. I  am a yankee from NH and although I now live in VA, the Yankee Candle aroma does bring me back to  the crisp natural fragrances of New England that no other candle can capture!

review: Candle was supposed to have a candy cake scent, but has no scent at all

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Candy Cane Lane Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: üéÄA/Jüíö‚òÜ‚òΩÔΩ•‡∏Ö^‚Ä¢Ôªå‚Ä¢^‡∏ÖÔΩ•üêà‚ú®üíúüëªüå∏ü•û
review: i am disabled, emotionally. being this way, makes me really sensory reliant and sensitive. scents cant be to overbearing or too perfumy in my home, or i get instantly nauseous accompanied by a migraine. yankee candle hasnt given me a headache so far. im also really careful with what scents i buy, always buying a wax tart first, before spending the $27 on the large tumbler on amazon (i honestly couldnt suffice any more than that on a candle, therefore i come here). i look for the scents that bring me closer to fall and the colder months, this is one of my go to comfort scents that i keep in stock. i have a small 7oz tumbler, but it just went so fast, so i decided on the large tumbler. i only buy soy wax because it just burns cleaner and more even to me, and the cold scent throw is just as amazing. i hate w*m's hard overtly perfumed paraffin candles, i can always expect a headache from that big blue box chain stores low quality, just bc of how much soot they throw off seriously sit in a room for 15 min while you have one of those burning then go blow your nose its black. i buy yankee candle because they have so many size options and the quality of their scents are just cleaner and better quality.

product_title: Yankee Candle Summer Storm Large Jar Candle, Fresh Scent
author: Diana Torres
review: Summer Storm is one of our favorite candle scents.  Highly recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Summer Storm Large Jar Candle, Fresh Scent
author: Tinibus
review: Love the scent and overall I'm happy with it. The candle arrived in one piece but it looks like it melted all over the box. Not a typical Yankee candle experience.

product_title: Yankee Candle Summer Storm Large Jar Candle, Fresh Scent
author: Olivia
review: Smells great! I gave this as a gift and they loved it. This candle has a long burn life

product_title: Yankee Candle Summer Storm Large Jar Candle, Fresh Scent

review: This is quickly becoming one of my favorite scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Summer Storm Large Jar Candle, Fresh Scent

review: It's good quality,very satisfied with it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Summer Storm Large Jar Candle, Fresh Scent
