product_title: Yankee Candle Company Seaside Woods Fragrance Spheres
author: Karen
review: Worthless. Absolutely no sense at all I even doubt it would work in a very small, confined area like an entry hall closet. Unless you open it up and stir the pellets with your finger and then smell your finger the scent is very faint. I like Yankee candle but I‚Äôll never buy this product again ever

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Providential
review: This is one of the few scents in the Yankee line that I'd say is totally compatible with someone looking for a "masculine" scent. To me this candle smells of musk and sandalwood and just a hint of citrus. Perfect for a man, but great for anyone. At one point in my life this was the exact scent I wanted for my home- plus just a hint of cherry tobacco smell to round out the nose. Every time I came home the smell of the place lifted my spirits. Smells clean, herbal, citrus-y, and not too "plastic-y" or floral like I'm finding a lot of other candles to smell nowadays. Highly, highly recommended.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Jo Webser
review: Great candle but if getting it shipped from Amazon in the summer expect it to be melted and unusable. Had to send mine back as it melted into the lid.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Donna P.
review: Sage and Citrus is one of my favorite Yankee Candle scents and I was so happy to find it on Amazon. This scent isn't sweet smelling and not 'girlie' so my husband even likes it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Lindsey Wilson
review: Didn't really smell at all. I've got a larger house, but I thought buying as many as I did andbit being Yankee candle brand that I would have at least gotten something out of it, but couldn't tell a difference if the candle was burning or not

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Christina Morgan
review: The sage and citrus is a perfect not too 'anything' scent. It's lovely and welcoming, but not too sweet, musky, vanilla-y, christmas-y, or any other one you can think of. Very clean and fragrant. I love it for my own home and gifting it to those moving into a new place.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amanda P
review: I was a little dissapointed by the scent when I first opened it, and I can't smelly anything at all in the house when it's burning. It does seem to last a long time. I am a little suspicious that it's a fake (not really Yankee brand) because the scent is so faint.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: The Sometimes Savvy Consumer
review: This was a gift for a friend who loves candles but worries about having something lighted for safety reasons.  The glass jar is great and the smell is divine -- just one hour of this candle and the whole house smells of citrus and sage.  Wonderful.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: My favorite Yankee Candle. Fresh clean scent that works in a small or large space because it is present but not so strong that it is overwhelming. When I buy mine, I buy one for my adult daughter. Otherwise, she‚Äôll end up with mine!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sarah
review: I love this candle and the shipping was really fast and prompt. The reason for my love of this candle is because it was my moms favorite. My mom passed away in October of 2011 and I am now the owner of her home. When I come home from a long day at work and I light this candle it reminds me so much of her when I used to come here to see her which was like everyday. Thank you : )

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Ellen
review: This candle smells amazing! Also you get a lot of hours of burn time. I've been lighting mine for a couple hours a night several nights a week and it's still at least halfway full.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: Bought one candle and it was defective. Did a refund and ordered it again (had to pay more). Then I received another damaged candle. This is a gift, so I'm trying again for a replacement, but I have a feeling that I will receive yet again another damaged candle. The reviews online show a lot of these candles like this. Very poor quality control!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Laura
review: My candle arrived broken. It was packed in a loose bubble wrap bag and put in a HUGE box with lots of that annoying bubble inflated packaging stuff Amazon uses that doesn't do a bit of good. The lid og the canlde was not secured in any way. It came loose. The edge of the lid and all around the top of the candle was shattered into little slivers and glass dust. The bubble bag had broken and the slivers and dust was all over inside the box and came out all over me, the couch and the carpet. The loose bubble wrap bag had holes in it and provided no protection and didn't contain the broken glass. I got online to report it broken and get a replacement. I found no way to contact the 3rd party seller, and when I went through the online refund system, i was told I WOULD HAVE TO PAY FOR RETURN SHIPPING to the seller to get a replacement and that an automatic refund is not avaiable. I would have to handle this hazardous broken glass item, repackage it, and pay for shipping in order to get a replacement. I paid 35 dollars for this candle, and now I not only have to deal with the mess, I have to pay out of my own pocket to fix it. Unacceptable. The only good piece of luck was that this item was for me and not for a christmas gift. If it had been a gift, I'd be out of luck.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sarah B
review: This is actually one of my favorites.  I prefer sweeter scents, but for whatever reason this particular scent is especially strong and i really like that. The only other one that i think is quite this strong is Sun and Sand. Even though it's not a scent i might normally pick, i buy this over and over. It's appropriate for any season and smells unique. Love it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: L. Curtin
review: Once again, Yankee Candles has performed up to snuff!  This is one of my favorite scents and it permeates several rooms after burning for about 20 minutes or so. One hint - when burning a candle, make sure the wick burns until the "well" is completely liquid across the top.  If you do this every time you burn the candle, you won't have a small well and more scent will diffuse into the air.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Gena King
review: Could not smell it. Please don't waste your time buying online. Go to your locale Hallmark store at least you will know it has a scent.The Glade Gain scented candle for 1/3 the price works so much better. Yuck!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mama Bear V
review: I love Yankee Candle. Hands downs. This scent is a little different than what I normally buy, but it is still nice. I wanted it to waft through the air a little more than it was producing, but it was nice when we all sat around the dinner table.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: motormag913
review: I have this brning in my office and it get lots of compliments from people walking by. HELPFUL HINT: Use a wick trimmer before you light it each time. It lasts much, much longer that way!

author: Anomalyzer
review: This is probably my favorite scent Yankee Candles has to offer by far, and I love how long the candle lasts when using it. My only desire is that the scent was slightly stronger.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: debra
review: This is by far my favorite scent. I‚Äôve used them for years. I‚Äôm still a fan of Yankee Candles inspite of all the different dispensers these days.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Cameron
review: The scent of the candle is one of the best Yankee has, and if you bought this for a gift for your wife or mom it is a great idea.  I also am buying one for my home as well for when I have guests over. This product only gets 4 star review (even with a great scent), because the candle jar arrived broken.  The first candle shipped to me on time, but when we opened the box the glass jar was broken into pieces.  I think it was due to the shipping company.  Thankfully, the Amazon Sellers replaced the product immediately and were not difficult to deal with at all.  They made it quite easy as well.  I would have expected it to be harder since I bought it as a gift, and the receiver of my gift was the one that requested a new candle. The ease of dealing with the replacement process (if needed), and the quality of the product is what brought my review back to 4 stars.

The candle arrived only with the  Fill-Air as a protectant.  Unfortunately, the Fill-Air is NOT a good idea to use with glass!  The candle should have been multiple layered with newspapers to prevent it from breaking.  Definitely, it is NOT a good idea to order candles or anything else made of glass online.  Also, the people who packaged it should take more caution in packaging glass candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Sharon Beverly
review: This is my 'go-to' candle when I need to relax.  Aromatherapy can be invigorating or calming and this fragrance is very soothing.  I've smelled sage in other candles and found them to be harsh.  This one isn't.  There's just enough citrus mixed with it to make it refreshing.  Think of the scent as a soft, powdery sage with notes of citrus. While Yankee Candles are not inexpensive, they do last far longer than any others I've bought.  They burn right down to the very bottom of the jar and the scent is as true as when you first lit the wick of your new jar. We live in a home with an open floor plan.  Being such a large space, you might expect the candle to scent just a limited area.  Pleasantly, that's not the case.  After about 45 minutes of use, the aroma wafts throughout the entire space.  And while strong enough to do that, it doesn't have an overpowering effect, either. Light your candle, listen to relaxing music, and you'll feel calm within minutes.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: strangefable
review: I wouldn't normally have purchased this scent, but I have consistently loved every Yankee Candle I've ever had, so when a lightning deal came up with a great price, I decided to give it a go. I was hesitant, because it definitely doesn't sound like a combo I'd want in my house, but it's actually quite lovely and mellow. As with all Yankee Candles, it diffuses wonderfully, without being overpowering or too weak, and burns consistently well, but the sage and citrus scents seem to balance really well. Neither one drowns out the other. It's a more masculine scent than I'd usually buy, but I'm finding it refreshing. I'll definitely be buying this one again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mom of 5
review: Every Yankee candle I've ever had has degraded into a stinky smokey mess by the time it is half burned. No matter how much I like the scent when it is new, the quality is a dangerous and unacceptable mess as It is burned down.  They are not cheap so it is disheartening to discard so much of it.  I don't buy them anymore for this reason.  I do receive them as gifts and sometimes use a melter to avoid the extreme smokiness.  This citrus sage is nice, if you don't burn it more than a third or so.  I pretty much just keep these for emergencies.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Michael Taylor
review: The Yankee Candle "Sage and Citrus" scent is an excellent blend of sage and a touch of lemon-lime.  In my humble opinion, the candle smelled great in the unused condition and has a pleasant aroma when burning. My only complaint is that the candle could have been a little stronger.  The scent is great but you need to burn the candle a little longer to get the aroma throughout your room or house. Complaint aside, still a good candle, particularly if you like citrus scents.  Just like other bargain shoppers, however, get the candle while on sale.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mel
review: This candle has zero scent when burning. Yankee used to be a great candle but since I‚Äôve been using bath and body works candles this is a major waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: violet flame
review: This is one of my favorite Yankee Candle scents. I first smelled it in a friend's kitchen and immediately bought it for myself. It's got the soft, slightly pungent, woody scent of sage and the clean scent of citrus in a perfect combination. I'd call this an all-season scent: it captures the scents of a spring and summer herb garden as well as the scents of the fruits and herbs of the fall and winter holidays. It's also equally appealing to both sexes; I gave it as a gift to our parish priest, who often burns candles, and he loved it. I have never met anyone who did not like the scent of this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: I have been buying the sage & citrus candles from yankee candle for years, love the scent, couldn‚Äôt wait to get a replacement when my last one took its last flame, what I received is a complete disappointment, not only did the glass around the rim break twice within the first 10 minutes, (super thin glass, don‚Äôt dare put a topper on it) but there is no scent either. Is this a knock off that I fell for or what. I want my old fave candle back. It did arrive quickly, but what‚Äôs the point.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Tom
review: Absolutely no smell, yes they burn pretty well but are not the Yankee candle I am used to .

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Mel C
review: This smells heavenly. It‚Äôs crisp and clean. I use it in my classroom and it can be smelled down the hallway.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: stephels
review: Yankee Candle shipped this candle to me by mistake.  My score of 1 has nothing to do with Amazon at all, for I love Amazon.  This is just about the candle scent.  I hate it.  I have about 20+ YCs at home of all different scents, I live with two men, I am female, so they enjoy masculine scents, I tend to enjoy things like clean cotton, bay breeze, early sunrise, .... but this. is. awful. We all agree that this is awful.  I can't even tell one of them to burn it in their own rooms, they won't take it.  Just having to take a couple more whiffs of it to write this review was painful.  I don't know if it's the lemon that is ruining it for me or the sage, but something about it just kills it for me and I can't stand it.  Maybe I just got a bad candle, maybe YC just had a bad candle making day,  but I would definitely try it in the store before you buy it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

review: Love the scent. Burns well.  Good value.

review: One of my favorite Yankee Candle scents for the house - it is clean and distinctive but not overpowering or stifling.  It is one of the few scents that both my husband and I can agree on as not too masculine or too feminine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: oeh
review: This is my favorite of the scents I have tried from Yankee so far. It is not overpowering but not weak either. I smell mostly sage with just a little hint of citrus. I would say this is a unisex scent, that can be enjoyed equally by both sexes. I highly recommend this candle.
